sems kyi phur pa de ni mi bsgom par bzhag pa lags sam zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgom pa'i yul med de la bsgom pa'i gnas// bsgom chags bde ba bdag 'dzin sdug bsngal yin// bsgom pa'i gnas med
dag tu rab rtogs na// bsgoms kyang skyon med chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de bsgoms kyang skyon med pa lags na bsgom pa nyid ni tshul ji ltar
bsgom zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo med de bsgom pa med// nam mkha'i tshul du rab 'byor bas// dngos grub kun tu rab tu grags// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub

sems kyi phur pa de las dang po'i rna 'byor pas blos ji ltar bzhagace na/ bka' stsal pa sems kyi skad cig dran pa la// yid kyi dmigs pa rgyun chad nas// byung tshor chad pa'i mtha' spangs te// chos rnams
nam mkha' lta bu ni// brjod med rgyun gyi chad par dmigs// don ni phyin ci ma lor par// brjod med ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i mchog/ yang dag don gyi rang bzhin 'di// ci yang mi len mi gnas shing// ci

yang mi thos thos pa med// ci yang mi byed byed dang bral// ci yang snang ba med pa ste// de ni snang ba'i dam pa yin// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid 'di// bsam du med par de bzhin bzhag/ rang bzhin med pa'i
chos nyid la// sems kyi gyin da skad cig ma// mi g.yo rgyun du dran par bya// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba// byang chub sems kyi phur pa de thams cad du dmigs shing dran par bya ba legs sam zhe na/ bka'
stsal pa/ bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min// gsal bya dmigs su med pa ste// de ltar sems kyis gang bsgoms pa// don la sems bsgom ting 'dzin mchog/ ces gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang

chub sems kyi phur pa de ci'i phyir mi bsam par gnas par bgyi zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la// shes blo yod pa'i sems mi 'gyur// mnyam nyid ston pa'i don 'di la// don ldan stong
pa'i sgro mi 'dogs// ma bcos rang bzhin zhi ba yi// mtshan ma'i rtog bral shes ldan pas// med do tsam du'ang mi dmigs na// byung tshor 'dzin par ga la 'gyur// thams cad mi gnas byang chub
sems// btsal nas grub pa ma yin yang// sgyu ma sangs nas 'khrul ba bzhin// spros bral ye shes snying po gnas// bsgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis med na// don dam ngang la bde bar gnas pa ni// byang

chub sems bsgom zhes kyang de la bya// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de blo'i yul med par blo la gnas pa de ci'i phyir lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dus pa chen po/ byang chub

snying por bzhugs pa'i tshe/ stong pa'i chos la stong pa'i yul med de ni mi gnas so// byang chub sems byang chub bsgrub pa'i rgyu med de ni mi gnas so// 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang// zhes pa ni de la ma
skyes ming mi dmigs// de las gzhan pa'i sems med phyir// bcos shing gnas pa gang zhig yod// ji ltar nam mkha' mkhan ma yi// de phyir nam mkha' de nyid bsgom par mi 'gyur zhing// ngo bo nyid kyis
ma skyes sems kyi ni// ma skyes de nyid bsgom par ga la 'gyur// mi mthun pa dang mnyam po dbyer med don// gang gis shes nas rtsol ba kun spangs te// btang snyoms chen por ma bcos ngang bzhag na// tha

snyad tsam du sgom zhes de la brjod// ces gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de bsgom pa'i dus na ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon dag ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ dran 'byung rjes su
'brangs nas ni// 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khor bar 'gyur// dran 'byung g.yo ba ci bkag pa// de ni 'gog pa nyid du 'gyur// dran 'byung med par blun par na// mu stegs can nam mun par 'gyur// 'di zhes

sems su gcig bzung na// mtshan ma rtog pa'i ri bo yin// snga phyi med pas phya chad na// med de chad pa'i mun can yin// gzhi yi don las yud tsam zhig/ ci g.yo skye 'gag 'byung ba de// de las dran pa mang

'phel zhing// lam 'tshal ba yi grangs byung na// lam gyi rnam grangs 'phel 'gyur gyi// chos nyid lam du ga la 'gyur// lhung bar gyur pa'i skyon chen ni// mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba rnam drug yin// rang bzhin yul
la g.yeng ba dang// nad dang mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba dang// yid la byed dang gnas ngan len// 'di dag rab tu gsal byas na// don la mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe// mnyam pa'i don la sgrib pa'i

skyon// rnam pa lnga 'byung 'di lta ste// byung tshor dbang gis g.yeng ba dang// bying rmugs dbang gis thibs pa dang// 'dzin chags dbang gis 'gog pa dang// ther zug dbang gis drug pa dang// phyal ba'i dbang

gis med pa dang// 'di ni mnyam nyid skyon yin no// ting 'dzin bde ba'i rol chags gnas pa// yod med rgyu dang lam lta chos nyid yin// de bas chags pa'i gnas la ting 'dzin na// zhi bas sa stengs mya ngan
de mi 'da'// sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas dang// ci la'ang mi dmigs shes bya ba// sems la gnas dmigs skyon sel ba// sems 'dzin phra mo de la yod// smig sgyu bzhin du sems med na// mi gnas mi

dmigs byed pa gang// nam mkha'i rang bzhin ma shes na// bsgom pa don dang ldan mi yin// ji tsam rtog med zab mo zhig/ blo yi yul du snang zhe na// mi rtog zab mo'i nyams myong ba/ myong ba yin phyir de nyid

min// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de ltar shes nas bsgom pa la/ theg pa 'og ma'i rtsal sgrub spyod mi dgos pa ji ltar 'tshal ba lags zhe na/ dka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi

byang chub sems// bla na med pa 'byung 'gyur ba// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang// de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs// der gzhol de ni mchod pa'i sprin// glong du gnas pa sgrub thabs so// ngang gis
mi ldog dngos grub pas// don du kun grub phyag rgyar rdzogs// ci la ma chags sbyin pa ste// nges pas mi gting dad pa'o// chos nyid las ma 'das pas dam tshig go/ man ngag dang 'brel bas gzungs so// de

bzhin nyid las mi g.yo bas ting nge 'dzin/ gnyis su med pas lta ba/ yin pa'i don ma spros pas 'phrin las/ bden pa mnyes pas sngags dang phyag rgya/ snang srid ye 'byam dbang gi mchog/ 'gyur med rtog pa
byin rlabs te// chos nyid gsal ba mchod pa dang// rtogs pas sgrol ba'i 'phrin las yin// goms pas sbyor ba'i 'phrin las yin// gsal ba'i ting 'dzin 'phrin las yin// phebs pas mchod pa'i 'phrin
las yin// gsang thub bka' yi 'phrin las yin/ 'phrin las rdzogs shes de la bya// kun gzhi bzang po'i rig pa la// rgyud ltar dgrol zhing lung ltar bskyed// don dam man ngag gzhung ltar

bsgom// sgrub thabs tshang zhes de la de skad bya// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa gong ma ltar bsgoms pa'i dus su mtshan ma phra mo ldan pa kun skyon lags sam zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/
'du byed med pa mkha' 'dra bas// 'du byed las byung bsam gtan skyon// brtag tu med pa'i chos nyid ni// rtog pa can gyis mi rtogs te// gang zhig de don mi rtogs par// g.yeng bar ltung ba

ci cha yod// chos nyid tsam du mi skyon na// sgyu ma phra rags smos ci dgos// bsam dang bral ba ye shes pas// mtha' kun yid la mi bya'o// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa bsgom pa la
de ltar skyon lags na/ ldang ba rnams dgag lags sam zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ ldang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten ci 'chang mngon du min// 'jam pa ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de nyid yin te der mi

gnas// bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyed cing bsgoms pas rnyed ma 'gyur ba ste// sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de la de dag chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid yin// rnam 'bras gang la'ang mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog

'di bsgom mo// 'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung med shin tu chos rnams mya ngan 'das// dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings shes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ci byung

yang// rtog pa de nyid chos nyid yin shes na/ chos kyi dbyings nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos// de la gnyen pos bcos shing dpag tu med// the tshom ldang ngo cog ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas// lhag par the tshom

bsal ba'i rgyu med do// de ltar shes na byung yang skyon med do// byung chos g.yo 'gog thams cad kyang// rang bzhin gyis 'byung ngang gis zhi// mdor na cir brtags bsam pa bzhin// 'byung bas thams cad ngo

bor snang// ma bcos g.yo ba med nyid la// sna tshogs 'byung rgyu mi skyon zhing// cho 'phrul mi 'gag nyam nga med// skyon med gnyis pos ma skyes phyir// rnam rtog mtshan ma ci byung yang// ma bkag rang byung rang zhi
ste// ma bcos ma byas rang gi ngang gis gsal// nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil yangs su// dngos po mtshan ma kun zhi ltar// rtogs pas yangs pa'i lta ba la// 'dzin rtog mtshan ma kun kyang shong// shong ba
bas kyang yangs kyang yangs// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur po bsgom pa'i dus na gol sar cis ma ltung ba lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ sems nyid dngos po yod ce'am// med
ces bya bar mi lta bas// mu stegs can du ltung mi 'gyur// bying rmugs can du ma gyur pas// 'du shes med par de mi ltung// 'du shes rjes su ma 'brengs pas// sems can khams su de mi 'khor// kun gzhi'i

don la goms pas na// nyan thos theg par de mi ltung// stong zhing zhi bar mi byed pas// rang rgyal lta bar de mi 'gyur// rnam dag stong par mi byed pas// byang chub spyod par yong mi ltung// mnyam nyid stong pa'i
don dag la// so sor tha dad mi byed pas// sa yi rim par mi ltung zhing// rim gyis sbyang zhing 'phar ba med// gang zhig gsal zhing dmigs yod na// de nyid nges par g.yeng ba yin// ci yang
yid la mi byed pas// gsil bar lhung ba ci zhig ltung// bsam med bsgom pa ma nor na// chos sku byang chub the tshom med// ces gsungs so// gsol pa// byang chub sems kyi phur pa bsgom pa'i tshe dmigs pa
bcug kyang chos nyid gsal na skyon ci mchis zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhan ma dman pa'i sgo nas ni// dmigs pa 'dzin pa med pa'i chos nyid la// dmigs pa'i rtog pa yod pas nor// ther tsher dmigs kyi
nam mkha' la// phra rab then thag 'dzud pa ltar// byis pa las gang byed pa ste// shes cam dag gis bya ma rung// byang chub de yang mi dmigs te// mi gnas shes ni gang brjod cing// gnas dang dmigs pa'i
gnas 'dzin pa// gzung 'dzin zhe ni de la bya// dmigs pa'i yid la ci gsal ba// shes pa'i yul du 'jug 'gyur bas// de dag ma rabs ting nge 'dzin// des na dmigs med rgyal bas gsungs// zhes

bya'o// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa bsgom pas grub pa'i rtags ji lta bu 'byung ba lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ de ltar don la mnyam bzhag na// rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung// drod dang rtags

dang cho 'phrul dang// rnam shes dang ni ye shes dang// drod ni g.yo dang thob pa dang// rtags ni myong dang brtan pa dang// cho 'phrul 'byung dang rdzogs pa dang// rig pa phra mo yan chad gsal// de ni don rnams
rdzogs pa yin// drod gsum nyams su lon pa dang// rnam gnyis rtags kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// ched du rtsol ba mi byed kyi// mi 'khrugs mnyam pa nyid shes dang// gang la chags dang yul gyis myos// skrag

med de ni mi 'bral mi gnas shing// mi 'phrog mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa bsgom pa de klong du tshul ji ltar 'gyur zhe
na/ bka' stsal pa/ de ltar yun rings 'dug gnas dang// sems ni mi 'gyur rdo rje dang// bzod cig sdug bsngal byang chub sems// byang chub mchog gi snying po ni// mtshan mas btsal ba ma yin te// dag pa

rnam gsum ma nor cing// rang gi rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// bsgrub par bya ba gang yin de la ni// btsal ba yang nas yang du mnyam bzhag ste// goms pa klong du gyur cing

khad kyis ni// rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de snying rje chen po zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'byung zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ thabs kyi rtsa bar snying
rje ma shar na// 'phral du phyogs chas yongs la khyab mi 'gyur// bdal ba chen po'i blo yis spyir khyab na// kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin ma bsgoms gsal// thugs rje 'byung ba'i gnas ni nyon mongs

lnga// nyon mongs de nyid yang dag yin rtogs na// don dam rgyu la 'bras bu yin rtogs na// sangs rgyas sems can 'bras bu yin rtogs mnyam// thugs rje chen po skye zhes de la bya// chos dbyings mtha' dbus

med pa la// skye 'gag med pa'i blo bdal bas// spros pa med par rtogs pa yi// khyab pa spyi yi thugs rje che// thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad// ces gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa bsgom

pa'i dus na/ thugs rje chen po thabs kyi spyod pa'i 'gro don bya'o zhes gsungs pa de don ji ltar lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ de ltar de bzhin chos kyi dbyings rig nas// ma rig rnams la snying rje chen po

bskyed// snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'gro don thabs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs ston// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos bar zung// zhes
gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de mtshan ma'i gzung 'dzin du mi 'gyur lags sam zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ thabs kyi spyod pas gdul bya kun gdul kyang// sgyu ma'i blo ldan rlom sems rdul

tsam med// ma skyes sems la sems can med pa'i phyir// ngo bo nyid kyi chos kun nga rgyal 'chang// chos kun sgyu mar mngon sum snang ba'i phyir// ting 'dzin sgyu mas ting 'dzin de ltar ston// zhes gsungs
so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas bden pa mthong zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ de ltar sems kyi sems mthong// ye shes kyis chos nyid
mthong// dus kun tu ni skye 'gag med// sngon nas mthong ba'i don mthong 'gyur// de yang dngos po mi mthong ba'i// thams cad rang bzhin med pa cig/ blo la 'das pa kho nar zad// de lta bu yi don mthong
na// mtshan mar mthong ba ci yang med// sgyu ma tsam du tshul shes na// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i don snang 'gyur// kha cig dang ni de don la// snang ba zhes ni ci phyir gdags// med pa'i don dang 'gal lo

zhes// the tshom za 'gyur de dag la// mthong ba med pa'i don de nyid// yid kyi ngo la snang 'gyur na// snang zhes de phyir brjod par bya// de bas 'khrul ba ma zad par// nam mkha' mthong ba med pa de// de nyid
yid la snang 'gyur yang// gzugs la snang bar gyur ma yin// sems nyid bden pas ma mthong na// yid la mtshan nyid don gsal yang// mtshan ma 'khrul pa rgyu ba gnyis// 'dren mar rgyu ba 'bras bu
med// de nyid bden par mthong 'gyur na// de nas de ma thag tu yang// yid kyis rgyu ba rgyun bcad nas// sngar 'khrul mtshan ma'i chos bral te/ des ni bden pa mthong ba yin// zhes gsungs

so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de'i bden pa mthong ba'i drod tshad ci gzung ba lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ nges don mthong ba'i nyams drod ni// man ngag lung gi brgyan cha ste// nges par drod

gsum myong bar 'gyur// de dag thog tu phebs pa'i drod// drod chen rtag tu bstan pa yin// de yis zhar la 'byung ba'i phyir// 'khor ba'i khams su snying rje yi// byang chub sems kyang skye bar 'gyur// mtshan ma

rtogs pa'i chos rnams la// yid ma ches pa'i 'du shes skyes// chos rnams 'di ltar yin pa la// log par 'khrul pa ngo mtshar zhes// ya char spyod pa'i 'du shes 'byung// 'di don ma shes 'gro ba rnams// rtsol
sgrub dka' ba'i thabs chen gyis// yang dag don 'tshol lam de ring// bsags pa'i 'bras bu yod gyur kyang// gzugs la snang bar don de mthong bar yongs ma nus// de ltar shes pa'i nyams drod ni// skal

dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang// rgyud 'gros tshig gis ma bkrol bar// sems las chos 'byung 'bum phrag yas// smra ba'i sgo mo thams cad gsal// don la nges pa'i gtan tshig dag/ tshig tu mtshon te 'byin par
nus// de ni chos sku mnyam nyid dang// dbyer med gnyis su med pa yin// bstan pa'i gzugs su gzugs brnyan dang// de ni mtshungs pa ma yin no// zhi lus mthar 'gog rkyen gnyis dang// de ni mtshungs pa
ma yin no// sa la slob pa'i sems dpa' dang// de yang mi mtshungs rgyal bas gsungs// rigs 'dzin drang srong don spyod dang// lus 'dra sems ni yong mi mtshungs// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub

sems kyi phur ba'i don spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de la bar chad kyi bdud kyi spyod yul rnams 'byung ba ji lta bu lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor bdud kyi spyod yul ni// dam par mdun mthong dam par
smra// sprul pa grangs med 'gyed mthong dang// dam pas gsung kun gsal mthong dang// dus kun shes gsal mthong ba dang// rgyud drug lam gnas kun snang dang// de la gdung ba'i shugs phyung dang// kun

gang gsal bar mthong ba dang// ci la thogs med 'gro ba dang// mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro 'dug dang// sangs rgyas phyag rgya lung ston dang// kun gyi skad du chos ston dang// dngos po brtan g.yo bsti gnas
mthong// thams cad mnyam par bkod pa dang// de nyid rang bzhin gsal snang dang// las su rung ba thogs med dang// dam pas don la bsngos pa dang// ting 'dzin gtso bos mchod pa dang// rang bzhin
shes na dam pa'ithabs// gang gis mi shes log pa'i bdud ces bya// chags sdang drag po'i yul dang ni// mi ma yin pa'i gzugs su snang ba dang// mkha' la sna tshogs gzugs su mthong ba

dang// de dag bdud kyi spyod yul lo// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur par spyod pa'i tshe/ gong gi spyod yul de dag ji ltar shes par bgyi ba lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ sems dang snang
ba'i mtshan ma dang// nga bdag gnyis pa'i mtha' med pas// snang ba thams cad yon tan min// de bas dga' brod 'du shes med// yon tan snyems pa'i nga rgyal gyis// dregs khengs mtho dman sems bskyed
na// nges par bden pa ma mthong ba// de bas bdud kyi spyod yul gsungs// de bas sgyu ma rab shes nas// rlom sems bral bas sangs rgyas yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mthong yang ma chags pa
dang/ srid pa gsum sa le mthong yang rig pa'i gnas su mi 'jigs pa dang/ dus gsum gyi tshe gsum dran yang chos nyid las ma g.yos pa'o// zhes so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa gongam ltar
bsgoms pas 'bras bu ji ltar thob pa lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ dmigs med ting 'dzin rtogs gyur na// chos sku rtogs zhes de la bya// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yang// sgyu ma'i spyod yul dpag tu
med// ces gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de'i 'bras bu thob pa zhig lags sam zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' bzhin te mtha' mnyam zhing// gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma
yin// mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// rangagi mthu yis rig pa las// chos ni gzhan nas 'byung mi 'gyur// rang rig skyes bu dam pa la// bla ma'i sangs rgyas de la gnas// don dam bcos ldan bzhag pa
la// yon tan 'bras bu rang bzhin tshang// bka' gsang thabs kyi 'bras bu ni// re med don dam nga la yod// kye/ rnal 'byor gang du don gcig nyan// ma yengs don la blo 'jog dang// snang med 'bras bu
lag chang ma// mi 'byung mi 'jug bdag med snying rje'i de yis ni// gzhan gyi nor med ma 'ongs ye nas gnas pa yin// byang chub snying por dag 'jug pas// thob pa med pas spangs pa med// sangs rgyas

rnams kyi byang chub ni// tha snyad yin te don dam min// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i 'bras bu thob pa bgyi ba nyid ji lta bu lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ bdag nyid chos sku snying po
byang chub pas// gzhan nas btsal zhing thob pa ma yin yang/ rmi lam sad nas gzugs dang bral ba bzhin// sgrib spangs byang chub thob ces rgyal bas gsungs// rtogs pa'i 'du shes zad gyur na// lhun grub
ye gsal rang las 'char// de la rgyu dang 'bras bu med// de phyir ye shes spros bral yin// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i de la rgyu 'bras dbyer med pa zhes bgyi ba

ji lta bu lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin// 'bras bu lam du gyur na dus gcig mnyam par sbyor// byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i don gong ma de ji ltar dbyer med ce na/

bka' stsal pa/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa ni// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo nyid med// chos nyid chos sku chen po yin// sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo ni// lung chen bzang mo'i nang na
gsal// dngos grub mchog gi snying po dang// dang po'i don rtogs mthar mi gtong// chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin no// spyod yul kun tu tshad dpag med// ces gsungs so// gsol ba/ bcu bzhi pa yi gsang
sngags don// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yi// nges par bzlas pa'i nyams blangs pa// lnga gsum dang po'i yi ge yi// shes rab thabs kyi phur pa gang// gnyis med theg chen phur bu gcig/ thams cad

bgegs kyi don ci lags// de dag bsdus pa gang du bsgral// bka' stsal pa/ dang po dgon par gnas pa'i phyir// lnga drug sems can rang byung ba// gcig mang lnga bshad gang yin dang// rdo rje sku mchog lhun
rdzogs nyid// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yab chen po// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sras// rang las gzhan na yod min pa// mtha' bral ba yang yod ma yin// 'di ltar yin zhes nga mi smra// li sgras shes rab
mchog gi dbyings// chos can mtshan ma kun la thebs// de dag spros dang bral ma bral// phyogs bcu thug pa ga la yod// bsam pa'i dbyings las yul med par// rig pa rang shar thabs kyi mchog/ spyod yul
dag pas bzang po ni// la sgras mtshon pa'i theg chen po// ya sgras mtshon pas dbyings la thebs// gnyis med phur bu mthar phyin no// ye shes spros bral phur ba'i mchog/ 'thob dbang kun gyi mchog yin
te// gza' gtad med par thag chod na// re bzhin dogs pa ga la yod// de rjes mngon du gang byed pa// dgon pa gnyis po rnam bral ba'i// dgon pa mchog la gnas pa ste// re dogs med par rang bzhin

'dug/ dbyings nyid rang snang rgya che la// 'dug na mtshon dang rlabs tshul las// dang po sngags su don nyid snang// phyogs nas ldang pa ga la yod// de tshe drug gis mtshon bsgribs pa// rtsa ba rang bzhin rkyen

blang ste// nyams myong ched byed shugs snang bgegs// thams cad gsum la ji ltar bsgrib// zin nas nyam nga dang po la// 'byung tshe bcom pa'i yi ge gcig/ dbang ste rtogs pas dbang gyur na// bying rmugs
lhag mthong rgod zhi nas// tha dad zung 'brel rang bzhin las// sgrib rtsal rtsol ba ga la yod// thugs kyi yi ge rang gnas na// nyams lnga'i drod rtags rang byung bas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
sgrol ba// yi ge 'bru dgu drang ba'i don yin te// ming tsam gzhan la rten 'dra yang// mngon sum smin pa rang nyid yin// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// gdab pa'i gnas ni gang ltar
lags// bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// gzhan du 'debs pa'i gnas med de// dngos po phyin ci log la gdab// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos la gdab// thabs kyi phur bu shes rab ngang du
gdab// ye shes phur pa dbyings la gdab// dngos po kun bral phur bu yis// rang rig byang chub sems la gdab// de ltar rtogs na thebs pa yin// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// de
ltar thebs pa'i 'bras bu gang// bka' stsal pa/ dngos po chos nyid chen por snang bar 'gyur// gzung 'dzin 'khrul snang rang bzhin dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// dbyings la btab pas don
rnams rtogs// sems la gdab pas rig pa shar// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gdab// de yi don gyis thebs gyur na// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// dmyal ba'i gnas nyid bla med gnas// sdug

bsngal nyid na byang chub lam// rnam rtog nyid na ye shes skyes// ma lus phur pas thebs shes bya'o// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de ngo bo ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ phur pa bla ma chen po

yin// phur pa rgyud kyi rgyal po yin// phur pa lung gi bla ma yin// phur pa man ngag nges pa yin// lhangs kyi rtogs na lta ba'i phur pa yin// mngon du gyur pa dkyil 'khor phur pa yin// nyams su lon pas
ting 'dzin phur pa yin// gnas su son pas mchod pa'i phur pa yin// gdeng du gyur bas dbang mchog phur pa yin// thugs rjes zin pas dam tshig phur pa yin// lhun gyis grub pas 'phrin las phur pa

yin// bya bral rdzogs pas spyod pa'i phur pa yin// lhangs kyis rtogs pas sgrol ba'i phur pa yin// thams cad byang chub sems kyi phur par lhun gyis grub par gyur to// gsol ba/ de ltar byang chub sems kyi

phur pa las su rung ba'i dus na ni 'khor ba'i chos 'di dag mtha' gang du bcing zhe na// bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten 'di na brtan g.yo ci yod pa// ming dang tha dad 'dzin pa dag/ so so'i mtshan nyid gzhig

byas na// rang bzhin med de yang dag sems kyi phur pa nyid// ye shes spros bral chen po ste// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis sems nyid phur par gsal// 'khor ba myang 'das
gnyis med de// gud na yod pa ma yin te// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid// de nyid mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa 'bras bu lhun gyis
grub pa'o// zhes bya ba ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ stong dang mi stong byang sems phur pa la// 'bras bu dpag med ye gnas pa// sus kyang ma byas byas pa med// de bas gsang
mchog lus spyod pa'i// bsod nams mchog ldan gzugs kyi sku// rnam smin tshul gyis grub pa'i lha// btsal nas thob par mi byed de// rgyu'i dus na byang sems phur pa 'bras bu'i mchog/ gzhan nas btsal

nas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// byang chub phur pa kun la khyab gnas pa// byang sems phur pa spros bral bcom ldan 'das// rtsol bas btsal du med de snying po'i don// ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog na// gzugs sku
phur pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te// lhun gyis gnas pas byang sems phur pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur bu thams cad mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ji ltar gsal zhe na/
bka' stsal pa/ mya ngan 'das pa'i byang sems phur pa'i mchog ni/ chos nyid phyogs bcur brdal ba dang// rig pa mtha' dbus med pa dang/ kun gzhi bzang ngan med pa dang/ shes pa phyogs ris med pa

dang// mya ngan 'das pa'i dgongs pa kun// mi g.yo sems la rig pa'i phur pa shar// sangs rgyas sems ni mya ngan 'das// yul ni chos su mya ngan 'das// rtag pa ye shes mya ngan 'das// snod bcud chos skur
mya ngan 'das// sems can sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa'i don rtogs na// 'khor ba ngan song ming yang med// ces gsungs so// gsol pa/ thams cad byang

chub sems kyi phur par mya ngan 'das te gzugs kyi sku ru byung nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa tshad ma lags sam ma lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas pas kyang sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas ston
pas ming du btags pas nor// sems nyid chos pas sems nyid sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pas sgra nyid ye shes te// zhi ba 'di gang la gdod nas lhun gyis grub// mtshan ma 'jil ba'i sku med rags pas
na// byang chub sems kyi phur pa la// bza' ba'i yul med btsal ba'i dngos po stong// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa la// sku zhes gang la gdags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ sku yi
dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub sems la yod// gsung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub sems la yod// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag nga// chos nyid byang chub sems la
yod// byang chub sems kyi phur pa la// yon tan 'phrin las de bzhin pas// zhing khams dag tu sku ru snang// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sesam kyi phur pa gzugs kyi skur bstan

nas zhing khams 'dul ba ji lta bu lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de// rdzu 'phrul sgra 'dra 'khrul la snang// ji srid mtshan ma yod kyi bar// de bzhin sangs rgyas sku yang yod// ji

srid mtshan ma med na ni// de bzhin sangs rgyas sku yang med// ji srid rnam grangs yod kyi bar// de bzhin lha yi grangs kyang yod// ji srid rnam grangs med na ni// de bzhin lha yi grangs kyang med// ma rig
'khrul ba'i sgo tsam du// grangs la rtags kyi mtshan pa zad// don dam bcos pa med pa la// byang sems phur pa'i sku gcig bsdus pa la// ris dang rtags su ga la bstan// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang
chub sems kyi mthar phyin pa'i dus na ji lta phur pa bu zhig gnas pa lags zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du byang chub sems kyi phur pa nyid las ma yengs pa ni chos kyi
sku'o// stobs su gyur nas 'jig rten rang bzhin med// ces gsungs so// gsol pa/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa de stong zhing phyal chad pa gcig lags sam zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye
shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// mthar phyin snang ba med pa'i klong// mu mtha' med pa'i chos dbyings la// sgrib spangs ye shes klong brdal bas// yon tan dpag med lhun gyis grub// dus
gsum 'gyur med snang ba'o// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ byang chub sems kyi phur par thams cad sangs rgyas na sems can ye mi gzigs lags sam zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa sngon gyi smon lam
dang// kun mkhyen ye shes che bas ni// 'gro drug dus gnas sdug bsngal yang// rmi lam tshul du med par snang// yin bzhin nor ltar rtog med pas// sna gsum 'phrin las lhun gyis grub// log par rtogs
brtags rnam dag cing// ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel bar ni// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang// zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi phung pa rdzogs pa chen po'i theg

pa'i yang zhun rgyun kyi rgyal po las// byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i don ston pa dang sdud pa po'i zhus lan bstan pa ste gsum pa'o//// de ltar byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i don ston pa dang/ sdud pa pos zhus

lan du bstan na/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i phyag mngon par mdzad de/ sems nyid ma chags pa'i mchod pas mchod de 'di skad bstod do// byang sems phur pa'i mdzad ni mig gi sgron mar snang// bka' lung
bdud rtsi yang dag ston byed pa// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid chos rnams gnas pa ste// sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rgyu 'bras chos rnams 'khor// sems nyid chos dbyings thams cad 'dus

par sdud pas e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o// zhes bstod pa med pa'i tshul gyis bstod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi phur pas bka' stsal pa/ byang sems phur pa'i yid bzhin rin po che// theg pa'i nang na

yang zhun bla na med// tshigs chung bgrod sla rdzogs pa che// tshig don lam rgyud nges pa'i don// khyod la gtad kyi mi nub gyur ta re// zhes gdams so// bcom ldan 'das sdud pa po rdo rje 'dus pa 'di skad ces khas
blangs so// don dam byang chub sems kyi phur pa gter chen 'di// bdag la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don 'dod cing// mi nub sems kyi phur pa gdab par bya// byang chub sems kyi

phur pa'i chos kyi srog shing mngon par gzugs// byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun du bskor// byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i chos kyi dung yongs su 'bud// byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i char rgyun du

dbab// ces khas blangs shing dam bcas so// 'jig rten chos kyis 'brel ba'i gtam nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis de lta bu'i nges pa'i don tshig tu gsungs pas/ chos nyid la ye shes kyi rtsal mnga' ste/ gnyis su

med pa'i byang chub sems kyi phur pa'i don thugs su chud par gyur to// byang chub sems kyi phur pa rdzogs pa chen po'i theg pa'i yang zhun rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ byang chub sems kyi phur pa yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o//// de ltar bde gshegs bka' yi rgyud pa de// lha gnas gsum du rigs 'dzin rigs pas brgyud// lha sras khri srong don gyi phyir// slob dpon pad+mas bsnams nas gshegs// gang zag snyan khungs
rim pas brgyud// slob dpon dz+nya nas snums chung yang dbang gtor la bshad// byang chub sems kyi phur pa don rtogs nas// tshom bu'i gzugs la ma chags par// byang chub lam la smin par 'gyur//
rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya khaM shud di phroM ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed

chen po rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas gdug pa sgrol ba'i pho brang/ dur khrod kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing/ b+ha ga

gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang gru gsum zla kham mu khyud 'khor lo 'bar ba na/ mnyam pa chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nu de rigs dang ye shes thams cad kyi
ngo bo/ sprul pa'i mdzad pa gang la yang ma 'gags par bzhugs so// yum rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug rgyas 'debs ma dang gnyis su med pa las byung ba ni/ ye shes rigs kyi khro bo/ dbyings kyi khro
mo/ thabs shes rab las dral dang lcam du bcas pa dang/ ki sing gnas yul phyag brnyan dbang phyug ma dang bcas par bzhugs so// gzhan yang gdug cing dbang che bar mi bzad pa/ nad dang chu 'khyags cho

'phrul gtong ba dpag tu med pa ni/ pha srin dang ma klu las sprul pa'i sras// dregs pa gza' bdud kyi tshogs srin mo'i gzugs can 'byung po'i mnga' bdag chen mo bzhi 'di lta ste/ pho nya rnams kyi gtso mo stag

srin zor ba gdong zhes bya ba dang/ bdud mo kun gyi gtso mo bam srin dred mo gdong zhes bya ba dang/ sman phran kun gyi gtso mo skong srin ba glang gdong dang/ nyul le kun gyi gtso mo 'brog srin chu srin gdong zhes

bya ba rnams gling bzhi dbus ri rab kyi zom dang phyogs bzhi na gnas te/ gling bzhi ri rab tu 'tshe/ kun tu 'khrug/ thams cad gsod cing gling bzhi phung la khad nas gnas so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab

pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de'i tshe de'i dus na thugs rje dang mthu stobs su ldan pa'i rdo rje gzhon nu gsang ba zhes bya bas sems can rnams dregs pa pho mos 'tshe ba de dag gzigs
nas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las gsang ba las/ ye shes kyi 'od zer bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin spros pas/ dregs pa pho mo rang bzhin du zil gyis mnan

te srog gi dbang pos ma bzod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste dbang du bsdus/ 'khod nas 'dar zhung bred nas gnas so// de nas 'jigs byed chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba rang gi stan las
langs nas 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// he he bcom ldan dpa' bo thugs rje'i bdag/ klu srin pho mo ming sring 'jig rten phung la rag/ don chen smon lam thugs rjes dgongs mdzad la// mi bzad
dregs pa pho mo tshar gcod bka' la thogs// 'jig rten 'di yang bde ba'i lam la 'khod// ma thub nges la bka' yi chad pas chod// mngon ci mi nad chu 'khyags thob// ho zhes gsol nas phyag g.yas pa'i rdo

rje srid pa'i rtse mo la thug par gsor bas/ de'i tshe 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad 'dar zhing g.yos so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nus gdug pa can sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i brdas bskul nas yum dang gnyis su med

par gyur to// de'i tshe yum gyi b+ha ga nas khro bo dang khro mo'i tshogs ye shes las sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku tha dad cing ngo bo nyid gcig pa dang/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM hUM ha he ha he phaT b+h+yo

ru lu ste/ brjod kyis mi lang ba'i gsung gi sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs shing thugs ye shes kyi 'od zer 'jig rten gyi byams po glog stong 'phro ba bzhin spros so// de'i yon tan gyi khyad par las/ 'jig rten drug gi
phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ de bzhin du 'gul/ ldeg/ tshig/ 'thor/ 'ur chem du gyur pas/ ye shes rol ba'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu 'jigs skrag dngangs te/

nya bye tshan la bzhag pa bzhin du gyur to// 'jigs byed dregs pa'i 'khor rnams skrag cing brgyal nas gan rkyal du 'gyel to// khrag skyugs so// de dag kyang rang rang gi mtshon cha shor te bkrag mdangs nyams

nas/ lus la dri nga ba dag kyang langs so// yid kyi shes pa nyams nas ngag gi sgra yang lkugs par gyur to// de nas ye shes rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams slar 'dus te/ yab yum la lan stong du brkyang phyag
'tshal zhing bskor ba byas nas/ gsang ba yum gyi mkhar zhugs so// de nas yang ke'u ri la sogs pa gsang ba rol ba'i 'khor rnams kyang/ gtso bo'i sku la rang gi thad du 'khril te dges pa dang bcas nas

'khod// de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje lta bu'i chos nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang gsang bdag phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pa'i
bdag nyid can/ dregs pa'i tshogs rnams slar gso bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar mkhyen te/ thugs rje'i dbugs dbyungs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te/ thugs rje byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis dregs pa'i tshogs rnams slar gsos so// de nas dregs pa rnams 'jigs bzhin du langs te khro bo chen po'i thad du 'ongs so// de nas sems kyi dran pa
cung zad tsam skyes nas/ lam brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te/ bag gzhi sa la brdabs zhing phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol ba btab
bo// e ma'o rab 'jigs dpa' bo khyod// chos sku byang chub sems kyi byin brlabs pas// mthu stobs mi bzad khro bo 'bar ba yis// dregs pa kun 'dul mthu stobs ngo mtshar che// khyed kyis bdag cag
skyabs mdzod byin brlabs bka' gsal bskos pa nyan// dbang bskur dam thob ci bgyi zhes ni lung yang nos// zhes gsol zhing khas blangs nas rang rang gi gnas ga la ba ru dong ngo// de lta bu'i 'phrin las
lhun gyis grub par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ dregs pa can btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nus dkyil 'khor

bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// e ma'o rgya khyon med pa'i gnas chen ni// rdo rje thod rus 'bar ba'i gzhal yas

khang// zla kham gru gsum lte bar ldan pa la// shes rab 'bar ba'i 'khor lo bzhi// mu khyud thod par ldan pa la// gru bzhi blo 'bur sgo khyud ldan// zhing gi ka gdung nyi zla'i ka gzhu can// rta babs phyi brgyan dur
khrod brgyad// lhun gyis grub ste rdo rje me ri lag chu'o// rin chen mchog gi khri rkang dang// dregs pa nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// 'jigs byed chen po yab yum bzhugs// de yi byin rlabs 'od zer
la// bka' las btags pa'i gza' bdud ni// spyan snga nyid du 'khod par 'gyur// pha ni g.yas la ma ni g.yon// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs gzhi la// las kyi gdong mo sring bzhi gnas// gru chad blo 'bur

brgyad dag tu// lha srin sde brgyad tshogs bcas 'khod// de tshe phyi yi dkyil 'khor de// pha ma ming sring tshogs bcas kyis// rang gi rdzas dang srog snying yang// mgrin gcig tu ni mthun par phul// de bzhin
dregs pa yongs kyis kyang// de bzhin du ni rim par mdzad// de nas rdo rje gzhon nu yis// srin po 'bar ba'i thod pa ru// mi bzad pha ma ming sring rnams// dbang du bsdus shing bcug nas ni// gsang ba'i

gnas su byin gyis brlab// mi bzad nang gi dkyil 'khor der// sku bskyed rtsa ba'i snying po phul/ khri rkang bzhi la dbus su ni// dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// zhabs bzhi rdo rje'i 'og tu sbas// rbad pa

gsang ba'i snying po phul// de nas gdan la bkye nas ni// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po phul/ sku la sbrul ltar 'khril nas ni// yon tan 'phrin las snying po phul// ma chags sbyor ba mdzad pa yi// gnad la dbab
pa'i snying po bstabs// gsang ba'i don ni rtogs byas pas// drag sngags zor thabs snying po phul// dam tshig lung ni phog pa yis// gzer sngags sur sngags gnad la dbab pa phul// khas blangs dam tshig

gnos pa yis// nye bar bya ba'i bsnyen pa dang// bod dang dmod pa'i sngags rnams bstabs// tha tshig bcas nas don byed phyir// mgo nas bsngags shing sham bu bstan// de bzhin snying po phul nas ni// gtso
bo la ni bskor nas su// mgrin gcig tu ni 'di skad gsol// bdag cag skyabs mdzad sdug bsngal mgon// 'jig rten las rgyal mthu stobs can// bdag gis ci bgyi lung ston mdzad// ces
gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das chen gyis// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// kye kye kye ma'o gsang ba'i yum// khyed la kho bos bsgo ba ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa dang// nyams pa
bdun po tshar bcad phyir// 'gal ba cham la phab nas kyang// srog ser gnyis la ki kang phob// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bka' 'khor bsrung bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// don de dag ji ltar mdzad kyang/

don chos nyid las mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes gsungs so// thugs ye shes dgongs pa chos nyid du gyur to// 'khor rnams kyang dpal gyi dam la gnas nas 'khod do// rdo rje phur
pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor du snying po phul zhing dbang bskur nas dam la btags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// e ma'o ngo mtshar thams cad dbang sdud bdag/ gdug ba'i tshogs rnams gdul phyir dam la btags pa ngo mtshar che'o// gong du 'jigs byed dpal la bstab cing phul ba'i snying po
dang// sngags rnams phyi rabs rnal 'byor pa rnams la sman pa'i slad du// mi bzad zab mo'i sngags rnams ma lus kun// dpa' bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
sku mnyam pa'i ngang las byams mgon thugs kyis bzhengs nas/ man pra chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma'o thams cad mnyam nyid don gyi gsung// thugs rje

brtan g.yo sgra ru grags pa ngo bo nyid// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i gsung ste sngags kyi tshig/ gsung gi don nyid bshad kyi nyon// ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor bskyed cing mchod pa'i snying po 'di dag sku gsung thugs

rdo rje las 'thon to// shU n+ya ta d+hA rma d+hA tu oM AHhUM/ e yaM khaM su keM raM bruM b+han d+ha dz+nyA na e baM ya tsakra maN+Dal/ hUM kroM badzra gnad/ badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ dib sta tsakra krod+ha krod+ha ha he ha he phaT b+h+yo/ badzra sa ma ya dza/

dza hUM baM ho/ e a ra li hring/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta tiSh+Tha badzra/ ma hA su kha sid+d+hi na ma a ra li ho/ kha raM yo gi ni/ kha raM DA ki ni/ kha kha le le hUM b+h+yo hUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ba ling rak+ta kha kha/ khA hi khA hi ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/

bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen du rig par bya'o// de nas yang rtsa ba'i snying po 'di rnams 'thon te/ hUM [(]nyasha [)]ma tsa ra sha/ de nas yang sku bskyed pa'i snying po gsungs pa/ oM badzra kI li

kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM pu tse pu tse da na pu tse sa ma ta a ka ra hUM phaT/ rag mo da ro ru tsam mo sham mo/ snyan gsan gsol ba'i snying po ni/ ma ra tsa sha sa ma ya dza dza/ spyan drang ba'i snying po ni/ rag mo

snying rtsa la ru ro ru/ tsab mo tsab mo tsab mo/ khrag la mu sha ma snying kha rag ma b+h+yo dza hU~M baM ho/ bstan par bzhugs su gsol ba'i snying po ni/ rag mo rag mo snying rtsa la/ rug ru tsab mo/ tsab mo tsab

mo khrag la mu sha/ snying kha rag snying kha rag/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ phyag btsal ba'i snying po ni/ ma ra tsa sha na mo sid+hi ku ru hUM/ mchod pa dbul ba'i snying po ni/ mahA pU dza ba ling ta a mr-i te sa ma ya khA hi/ 'dzab

'das pa'i snying po ni/ badzra ma ti pra li ma pra ma dzra hUM sa ha/ ba lo ag shu meg badzra du phri hUM dza sa ha/ ga tra ma dzrA badzra yak+Sha kri kring ra ma dza swAhA/ badzra kI li pri ka li ho dza hUM swAhA/ ma mo spyi yi sngags ni/ ma mo snying

kha rag/ ma ma rag sha rag sha/ ma mo snying khrag mo mdun mdun trag rag sha ma snying ste/ khem ma ru lu b+h+yo snying kha rag ma sa ma ya dam dam dza dza/ bod pa'i sngags so// ma ma snying tsit+ta la thun snying kha rag ma thun/

sha ti ta ma thun snying la ya ya b+h+yo thun/ rbad pa'i sngags so// ma ma ra ra ma ma sha sha ma ma sa sa ma ma ya ya dgra bo sod sod ma hA tsit+ta dz+wa la raM/ snying rtsa ta ma la rol/ chum chum thum thum ril ril ma ma las myur du

mdzod cig/ ces pa ni dmod pa'i sngags so// oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li sarba big+ha naM krod+ha ni hUM hUM phaT/ ces pa ni bzlog sngags spyir dril ba'o// yang snying thugs kyi brnag pa ni/ de yang pha srin

po'i yang snying ni/ oM badzra yag sha ke te phroM/ tro trag ru tsa sha tri phroM/ sa man ta a ka ra du ru phroM/ ma klu'i yang snying ni/ oM badzra nA ga shu ga le su ra phroM/ ma ma hril shar phroM/ tsa mu sha sa ma ya phroM/ ming po'i yang snying yang

dag pa ni/ oM pu pu tse sa ma ta a kar du ru du ru hUM phaT/ srin mo bzhi'i yang snying gcig tu dril ba ni/ rag mo khrag la mu sha dza/ snying rtsa la rag mo rag mo/ tsa pa la ma ma b+h+yo ma ma dril shar sha tra hUM phaT/ ma mo'i

sku'i sngags ni/ pa sha sha ni rag sha du dza dza/ gsung gi sngags ni/ ma ra tsa sha gur bi gur bi ta ma la ni ra ya swAhA/ thugs kyi sngags ni/ ting ting gar pa ne ra ya swAhA/ yon tan gyi sngags ni/ rag mo rag mo snying

rtsa sha ma b+h+yo/ rag mo ro ru tsa pa ma b+h+yo/ rag mo tsab mo tsab mo shig shig snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rag mo rag khrag la mu sha la b+h+yo/ 'phrin las kyi sngags ni/ gu su dan ma dgra la b+h+yo/ u tsu sma sha dgra la b+h+yo/ khaM khas

dgra la b+h+yo/ rbad sha ma dgra la b+h+yo/ ma mo mdor bsdus pa'i sngags lung ni/ ma ma ril ma ma ril b+h+yo/ tshal pa tshal pa ma ma hril b+h+yo/ tsab mo tsab mo ma ma hril b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo ma ma hril b+h+yo/ bzhi snying gcig tu

dril ba ni/ badzra la ting mo po a ka tra badzra kI li bi ma ro hri tring hUM dza/ sngags kyi mgo nan ni/ ma ka ye pa ka ye/ sing ka ye/ bya tsa ye/ sgrol byed nye bar bsnyen pa'i sngags ni/ hri sti bi ki ti ma ma snying rtsa la ya

dgra bo ma ra ya hUM phaT/ ngan sngags kyi sham bu ni/ rag mo snying rtsa ru ru tsab/ snying kha rag gu sing dan ma shag mu shag mu b+h+yo/ snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ thig ni gcig med shud ti phroM gnyis trag rgyab

gcod/ dud phroM nam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi ro sod/ rgyang rje btsun mo tsun slu ta phaT/ che ge mo ma ra hril ril shar shel hUM trag tsa ra ga shu ti phroM/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hUM la hril hril shag shag sen

ya b+h+yo/ d+h+ril nA ga shu na ga le dum pa le/ oM pu tse pu tse sa ma ta a ka ra du ru du ru phroM oM hUM phaT/ thun la bkol ba ni/ rag mo rag mo ta ma ke ta/ nA ga nA ga ke tse dus hril phrauM shar b+h+yo/ zor la bkol ba ni/ hUM

tsab tsab snying kha rag kha rag mo shig shig kha rag lam b+h+yo/ thabs la bkol ba ni/ rag sha na ga tri thang gu si dan ma u tsusma sha khams khas rbad shag dgra la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud
gza' gdong bsres pa'i las kyi lung las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// e ma'o/ bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad
dngos grub mtha' yas pa/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ dregs pa pho mo'i gnas dang dkyil 'khor rdzas dang las rnams bshad du gsol/ al la sa ma ya ho/ zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan

'das rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos/ dngos grub kyi thabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa yang// byin can bkra shis yid 'ong
dang// dmar nog ri brag dur khrod dam// bla gab med pa dag kyang rung/ lha klu drag po gnas pa ru// rdo rje khrag 'thung gnas yin no// dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di skad gsungs// bar chad gsal phyir sa chog

bya// yo byad tshogs nas smon bcol te// gdeng ldan rnal 'byor bdag dbang bya'o// dur khrod snying rgal sa dag la// 'dom gang tshad du dkyil 'khor bya'o// bdud rtsi rme khrag gsum gyis ni// maN+Dal spangs te
skam rlon snyoms par bya'o// sbrul shun ba su'am tshon skud la// mkhas pas byin rlabs mchod nas srad bu bri'o// cha chen gsum bgos phyi ma gnyis su bgos// dbus su smug nag gru gsum zla kham mu khyud

bcas// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod 'phreng brgyan// gru bzhi glo 'bur sgo bzhi sgo khyud sgo brgyan phyir// gling bzhi gling phran lcags ri mu khyud la// khyab 'jug mgo dang yan lag rdzogs par bya'o// 'khor lo rigs

kyi kha dog mtshon// dbus su hUM dang sha gnyis bri bar bya'o// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dag la ni// ma ra tsa sha bzhi ni shar nas bri// rdzas kyi rim pa bstan pa ni// stag dang dom dang ba glang nya yi snying// mngal
khrag la sogs khrag sna 'byor tshad dang// ra mchin la sogs sems can sha sna bu// dre'u dang bong bu'i thod par tshil chen dag kyang bsre// rigs kyi dbyibs su ldan pa'i zan// khrag gi thig le

byas la 'khor lo dgod// de la 'ug pa khra dang srin bya skye ka'i sgro// ming rus sngags dang sbrel te bris la gdags// rgyal mtshan bzhi la sogs pa'i rgyan yang dgram// ga bur tsan dan la sogs dri yi tshogs
rnams kun// rog ta'i gnas su bse khab nang du bsogs te sbrul gyi pags pas gtams// sha lnga la sogs pa'i dmar gyi rdzas// lho yi gling la thod pa'i nang du gsog/ dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman sna

tshogs rnams// dung phor nang du nub kyi gling la bsogs// 'bru dang me tog rin chen sna tshogs rnams// rin chen snod du gling gi gling la bzhag/ rabs chad rtsa ki la ni nag po la// nang du dri lnga bdud rtsi lnga

yis byug khrag sna gsum gyis thig gdab 'khor lo bri// gong bzhin snying po bris te rdzas bsags pa// chu yi mi dang sa yi mi dang byi ba'i snying dang dgra cha'i snying dag la// sha sna khrag sna 'byor tshad dag dang

ni// de yi yul dang dgra yi ming rus dang// thun gyi rdzas rnams de ru blugs par bya'o// gsang ba nang gi 'khor lo yin// sbas pa gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// rnal 'byor lus kyi yan lag ste// snying khar yi ge hUM

bkod la// 'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba yi// g.yas g.yon yan lag rtsa chen bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi ste sring bzhi gnas// de yi rdzas te dmar chen yin// yang na seng ldeng phur pa la// sngags dang snying po bcas pa

bri// mchog tu de la sngags pa yin// de ltar dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi rdzas dang bcas pa ru// rnal 'byor dngos grub rnam gnyis thob// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ dregs
pa ming sring gi gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'gyur ba'i gzer 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'khor lo can dang dam rdzas can// sa
bon can gyi thod pa phur par bcas// 'di ni rdzas kyi bar snang gzer// sgrub pa'i mgo 'jug bar gsum du// yul dang ming rus smos pa ni// 'di ni sgrub pa'i gzer gsum mo// lha sngags dregs pa pho mo'i

sngags// las la sbyor ba'i dbu zhabs bar du brnag pa brjod// 'di ni sngags kyi gzer chen gsum// mdung shing rtse dang spyang mo'i rtsed// phag mo'i rdur la rta gsum gzhug/ de ni nges par gdon mi za// 'di

ni rta ma'i gzer gsum zhes bya'o// yang na lha rten chu mig yul dbus su// khung bu gru gsum chag gang bru// zhabs su pho brang dkyil 'khor bri// tsag kro la yi thod pa der// bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang gtor ma
dang// sman gyi phud dang gtor khrag blugs// dregs pa rgyu ba'i dus tshod la// gza' dang ma mo bkug la mchod// der bzhug mnan pa'i 'khor los gdab// dpang rnams btsugs la lha srin

mchod// de ni phyi yi sa gzer yin// bsnol dri mo'am rgyal po'i snying dag la// ngan sngags bris la pho brang dbus la bsgrub// yungs kar yungs nag khrag skams gu gul nag po rdzas// til nag thal chen mi snying

dag dang sbrags// dngos grub thob pas rtag tu lus la bcang// de ni nang ltar bsgrub pa'i gnam gzer yin// ngan sngags yang snying rtag tu gdon pa bya// gsang ba'i dmar chen nang du sku bstim nas// rtag tu
bsgom nas bdag mchod gsang ba'i bar snang gzer// rtag tu yi dam mi 'gyur mi 'bral na// dregs pa ming sring rta ma yin par bzung// rgyun gyi gzen chen ye nas thebs pa yin// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags
dbab pa'i rgyud las/ rog ti nag po 'byung ba'i bdag mo bzhi yi gzer gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi de kho na nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba la
mnyam par gzhag nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma'o/ sems can kun rtog ting 'dzin byin gyis rlobs// chos rnams ting 'dzin spros bral dam pa las// hUM gi mtha' las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor

'bar// bruM las ban d+ha rin chen gnas su bsam// dur khrod rgyan dang dbyibs su ldan pa la// dbus kyi e la nyi zla dregs pa'i gdan// hUM las rdo rje tshon gang bdag nyid khro bo gsal// mthing nag zhal

gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rdzogs// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje me dpung dang// bar ma rtse lnga kha T+wAM tha ma ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku

gsung thugs ldan khro chung ska nan dang// thugs la 'bar ba'i srog kyang bzhugs// 'jigs byed sku la dur khrod chas brgyad gsol// rngam pa'i gsung gi ki li 'brug ltar sgrogs// rdo rje gar gyi dbang mo sku la

'khril// cha lugs sku 'dra chags pa'i bde ba stobs// sku yi gnas bcur khro bo'i 'khor bcas tshom bur bsam// rnam shes brgyad po yul dang bcas pa la// ki ri sing nga'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// dbang po
sras mchog yan lag sgo ma dang// ci bgyi la sogs mdun rgyab zur gnyis thugs kar te// thugs kar brgyad de phyogs bzhir lnga lnga'o// de ltar gsal na mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// sbyor ba'i brda bskul

byang chub sems chu las// yi ge lnga ni 'thon nas su// dbus dang 'khor lo bzhi la dgod// sku bskyed rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas// dbus su khyab 'jug nyid kyi sku// sku stod mi la sku smad sbrul// nyid kyi dbu ni
chu srin te// sprul pa'i dbu brgyad dang yang ldan// mgo lus med par spyan gyis khengs// gdug pa'i phyag cha sna tshogs 'chang// lcags kyi dra ba'i nang na zhugs par bsam// shar du stag srin phyag

gnyis smug nag sku// dbu gnyis steng ma'i dbu ni stag gi dbu// sku zhabs stag gi sham thabs thod 'phreng brgyan// dri za rnams la dbang sgyur 'brug sgra 'byin par bsgom// lho ru bam srin phyag gnyis ser nag
sku// dbu gnyis steng ma'i dbu ni dred kyi dbu// g.yang gzhi stod g.yogs dred kyi sham bu can// glog 'gyur grul bum rnams kyis bskor bar bsgom// nub tu skong srin phyag gnyis dmar nag sku// dbu gnyis

steng ma'i dbu ni ba glang dbu// sku la g.yang gzhi ba glang sham thabs can// klu yi skor ni bu yug 'thor bar bsgom// byang du 'brog srin phyag gnyis ljang nag sku// dbu gnyis steng ma'i dbu ni chu srin te// g.yang
gzhi gsol nas chu srin sham bus brgyan// yag shos bskor nas nad kyi rlangs pa 'thor// ma mo tshogs che rab 'jigs pa// dur khrod rgyan dang gnam lcags zor ba'i dbu brgyan can// thugs la so so'i rang
sngags ldan par bsam// so so'i ma mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba la// 'khor bcas rnal 'byor bka' stsal nyan par bsam// sprul pa rnams ni don gyis shes par bya'o// spyan drangs la sogs mchod cing bzlas
pa yis// rtags byung nas ni thod par de bzhin bskyed// der mchod 'dzab bzlas dngos grub blangs pa dang// rnal 'byor sku yi dkyil 'khor gsang bar bstim// zhabs g.yon shar gyi rtsa de dar dkar

lce'u// gser gyi spu gur stag srin 'khor bcas bsgom// phyag g.yon rtsa chen bai DUr+ya yi mdog/ gser gyi spu gur bam srin 'khor bcas bsgom// phyag g.yas nub kyi rtsa de la brgan mdog/ gser gyi spu gur
skong srin 'khor bcas bsgom// zhabs g.yas byang gi rtsa de g.yu yi mdog/ gser gyi spu gur 'brog srin 'khor bcas bsgom// dbus kyi rtsa chen yan lag bcas pa la// 'jigs byed chen po 'khor dang bcas

pa bsgom// de dag rang rang rigs kyi gdan stengs su// sor bzhi'i tshad du rang rang rigs su bsgom// de ru thod pa dkyil 'khor sngags 'di bsdu// rag sha rag sha rak+Sha rag mo sa ma ya tiSh+Tha hUM dza hUM/ de rtag tu
bsgom zhing las la spros// zhes gsungs so// de skad ces gsungs pa la/ gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces bstod do// e ma'o dpa' bo chen po thugs rje'i bdag/ phyi rabs don du dkyil 'khor rnam
gsum bstan// dngos grub thabs ldan bdag cag ngo mtshar che// e ma a la la ho zhes bstod do// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// kye kye/ kye ma'o bcom ldan bdud kyi bdag/ bdud kun gyi ni bdud
bdag po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud mdzad pa// 'gal byed dam sri gdul zhing chu 'khyags dbab pa'i phyir// dregs pa khyab 'jug chen po bsgrub pa'i 'phrin las gang// bdud kyi rgyal pos bstan pa bsrung

ba'i don du ston// zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags gsang ba'i 'di dag thugs rje las 'thon te/ oM badzra pa ti hUM la/ su badzra yag sha ke te ke te/ badzra rag sha dz+wa la ti swAhA/ zhes pa ni bod

pa'o// oM pu tse pu tse da na pu tse sa man+ta a kar ra du ru du ru phroM/ zhes pa ni rbad pa dang kun la 'jug pa'o// hUM dza ti ra hUM ka li la ya/ phob ta shar/ shal ta shal ta hUM phaT/ yon tan gyi snying po'o// tsa ra mu ne phroM

ag nA ga rag mo krod+ha re swAhA/ pha ma bu'i snying po bsdus pa'o// rgyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru ta phaT/ ho ho phroM mu ra mu sha du ru phroM/ 'phrin las la bskul ba'o// de nas yang dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di skad ces 'thon
to// gru bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor la// dri yi rgyal po byugs nas ni// rtsibs brgyad pa yi thig btab ste// sgo dang ging bzhi de bzhin no// dbus kyi gru gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar dang mu khyud

dkar// 'khor lo ser la rtsibs mchan gnag/ mtshams byed thams cad 'phreng gru chad ljang// ga ling bzhi sgo rnams rigs dang sbyar/ de nas yang las kyi stong thebs par bya ba'i phyir// mthun pa dam rdzas
bsag pa 'di skad ces gsungs so// bse khab thod pa kha sbyar dang// dri dang sman dang mngar gsum la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'byor tshad de// dmar ser ba yi 'o mar bcas// gzhan yang sha sna thal chen

dang// gu gul nag dang gdug pa'i 'bru/ khrag sna dang ni sbyar nas ni// sbrul shun dag gis rgya gram bcing// pho brang dbus kyi e la'o// yul dang bsgrub bya'i ming byang dang// rang dang ling ga de bzhin

no// gzhan yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// sprul pa brgyad kyi mchod rdzas dang// mthun pa'i sgrub rdzas sna brgyad kyang// de bzhin du ni dgod par bya'o// spyan drang mchod cing bzlas pa dang// bsgrub
cing thugs dam gnad nas bskul// phyogs mtshams rim gyis ma nor bar// rgyu dang ldog pa'i dus bzung ste// dus brgyad du ni drag sngags brdeg/ tshes bzhi brgyad dang bcu gcig dang// bco lnga bco brgyad

nyi shu gnyis// nyer lnga nyi shu dgu la bya// gdong tshugs su ni byed gyur na// 'ong ba'i sngon du ling ga bzhag/ gting thogs su ni byed gyur na// phyi bzhin sngags thun phur pas gdab// de yang ting 'dzin nyams
dang sbyar// nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel gyur na// bsregs nas brdeg cing lha srungs dbye// de yis 'gal byed rlag par 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa gza' gdong bcas pa'i rgyud kyi chu 'khyags dbab

pa'i rgyud las/ khyab 'jug sprul pa dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya/ zor thabs thun gyi las 'di rnams nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'thon
to// e ma'o bde gshegs thugs byin bsam mi khyab// srin po srin mo'i dam tshig bskul nas kyang// 'gal byed tshogs la zor phur thabs kyi bsad cing bzlog par bya'o// bdun zur gshed kyi dus la

dbab pa dang// dkyil 'khor sgrub rdzas gong bzhin las// zor thun thabs kyi gzhi bsgrub rdzas bsag pa// yul gyi sngo rga phu chu ser pa'i chu// thod par blug la byang gi zla kham la// ra dkar khyi dkar dmar

ser ba yi zho// gu gul dkar po 'bres chen sman dang sbyar// thod par blug la nub kyi zla gam la'o// sha sna khrag sna ban da hril po blug/ shar gyi zla kham stengs su bzhag par bya'o// dgra dang yul sa dgra bla bon

chos bsrungs ma'i ming byang bri// ra yi skyer gdags shes bstim la// dus drug bskang zhing zhal du bstab// seng ldeng phur snying sngags ldan pas// ri rab ltar du bsgom la byin brlabs la// tshil chen thal chen

khrag chen byugs nas kyang// gu gul la sogs sme ba'i dud btang nas// khro bdag chen po gzas pa lha dang bcas pa la btab la// las kyi phur thun brgyad kyang dus dang sbyar zhing gdab// thod pa gsum pos

las kyi thun yang gdab// srog dang ser ba byed pa don gyi man ngag sbyar// ra bsgral sha rus khrag rnams zor thun rdzas su sbyar// g.yang gzhi brdab cing drod pa bud// zor du byed na khrag 'phang thod pa skyil// de

nas thab tu byed 'gyur na// mi rkang sgyed gzugs ban du phru bar bya// dur khrod shing la me btang khol nas khram shing nag po skyel// sngo dang bsres thab lho ru ste// 'o ma dang bsres thab ni shar du yin// dmar

dang sbyar ba'i thab ni byang du'o// gnam sa bar snang gsum gyi thab ces bya// mi sogs khyim byas thal 'jim phyogs su dor// rang la 'khris na rab tu dgra la bzlog/ sdigs mdzub bsgreng ste dmigs pas lam

yang bstan// de ltar las rnams ci byed kyang// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang las la so sor sbyar// sngags rnams go rims don gyi ma nor man ngag sbyar// bsngags bsgo pa srungs dbang gis rgyal pos dbang du bsdu

ba ni// oM badzra kI la ya ha ya gri ba hri dbang/ phaT man+ti hri gab/ tsan dar ga sha hri gab/ las kyi gzhung du gdags pa ni/ oM tista baM dza ti bam/ u tista ku ru dza ti sta rbad/ sa ma ya tista rbad/ dza la mu ga ti sa
rbad/ de ltar las rnams byas gyur na// ngan byed mtshams med srog can rab tu 'joms par byed// srog ser gnyis la gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'khor rnams kyis mgrin

gcig tu 'di skad ces rmad du byung ba'i tshig gis bstod do// hUM/ dus gsum mnga' mdzad dpal chen rol ba'i sku// bzhad pa'i sgra skad kI la ya'i srid gsum 'brug sgra sgrogs// thugs kyi dgongs pa ma g.yos

dbu ma'i ngang// spyan mig bzlog pas thog bdag las la gtong// shangs nas rlung byung srid gsum 'thor zhing g.yo// sbrul gyi chun pos klu rgyal gdan la bebs// snyan gyi sgra mas srin po dam la sdud// ral pa
gsigs bas ma mo ser chen 'bebs// ljags kyi rkan brdabs bar snang glog gis 'gengs// mche ba gtsigs pa'i sprul pas ki kang 'bebs// zhabs kyi stang stabs dgra bgeg gnad la 'bebs// rdo rje
gshog pas khams gsum zil gyis gnon// dur khrod chas kyis sangs rgyas dam la sdud// rab 'jigs khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhing

bcu gnas nas len la phyag 'tshal bstod// yal gam dngos grub gsol la phyag 'tshal bstod// tsakra kI la ya/ a si kI la ya/ pa sha kI la ya/ sid+d+hi kI la ya/ rdo rje phur pa gza' gdong chu 'khyags dbab
pa'i rgyud las/ zor thab thun gyis dbab pa dang 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur pa'i bdag po la// lha'i lcam mos 'di skad ces
gsol to// he he dpa' bo thugs rje'i bdag/ bdag gi las dang 'tshal ba gang// bdag la dmigs pa bdag la gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas rdo rje phur pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ khyed

cag 'khor la gtad pa ni// lus 'phags gling gi lo thog dang// zhi ba dang ni pho log nad/ khyed kyis las dang zas skal gyis// zhes lung nos shing phog go/ de yi 'phrin las bshad bya ba// maN+Dal 'dom gang

zla kham dbyibs// dri sna lnga yi chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum zla kham gsum// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas pa bri// dbus su ma dang hUM bkod la// rtsibs la lha chen brgyad kyang bri// stag gi

snying dang dmar gtor dang// ra khrag ban d+ha dbus su bzhag/ dre'u lam rta yi thod pa ru// dgra yi ming dang thun rdzas blugs// dri dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang// 'khor lo brgyad kyi rtsibs la bzhag/ dbus

su khro bdag chen po dang// stag srin zor ba gdong yang bskyed// bos la rbad de drag sngags brdeg/ oM badzra ma ti pra li pra ma dza hUM swAhA/ rag mo rag mo snying tsa sha ma la b+h+yo/ oM trag rag sha snying ke taM ku si la sha
hri da ya nri dgra snying la gshogs/ dang po bdun 'bum nyi khri la// gnyis pa brgya ni rtsa brgyad yin// gsum pa stong gi las byed 'gyur// las ni 'di skad bcom bar bya'o// hUM/ shar phyogs rdo

rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sring cig stag srin zor ba gdong// tshangs dang brgya byin kun gyi lcam mo ste// 'khor du lha dang dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor// srid pa'i chu 'babs pho lhog nad kyi bdag mo
khyod// lcags kyi thog ser 'bebs shing 'brug sgrogs ma// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ces bskul nas khrag thun dang sbyin sreg byas nas mdangs dang bral/ khyim la gtor na pho log
'ong// yul la gtor na thog ser 'bab// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ stag srin sgrub cing las bcol ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang gshin rje'i lcam mos
'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye dpa' bo chen po yon tan bdag/ thams cad rgyas par thugs kyis rab gzigs pas/ khyod kyis bdag la las dang 'tshal ma gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dzam bu gling gi lo thog 'bru bcud dang/ 'gal byed srog chod glang thabs bkrug pa thong// dkar po phyogs kyi 'chi bdag khyod kyis bzlog/ ces lung nos shing phog
go/ de nas yang dag 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang sog kha la/ khrag dang bdud rtsi'i chag chag gdab// rtsibs brgyad e dang ldan pa la// dbus su hUM dang ra bkod nas// rtsibs brgyad ya ma

brgyad kyang dgod// mon gyi snying dang dmar gtor dang/ khyi khrag ban da gang yang bzhag/ stag gam spyang khu'i thod pa ru// thun rdzas dgra bo'i ming rus gzhug/ sha khrag spyan gzigs ldan pa yi// gtor ma

brgyad kyang rtsibs brgyad la// gshin rje gshed dang dred gdong bskyed// bod dang rbad dang gsang sngags bzlas// oM ba lo ag shug me badzra dum phring hUM dza/ oM rag mo rag mo ru ro ru tsa pa la a shu me dgra bo'i

snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ oM sha ti sta ma snying la ya u tsus sme shas khrag snying las gshog rbad/ de nas 'phrin las 'di skad bcol// hUM lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sring cig bam srin dred mo
gdong// gshin rje 'bar ma rnams kyi lcam mo ste// 'khor du gshin rje grul bum rnams kyis bskor// srid pa'i chu 'bebs rlung nag 'khrug pa'i bdag/ gser gyi thog ser 'bebs shing glog 'gyur ma// rnal
'byor bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// de skad bskul zhing drag po'i rdzas// dur du mnan na srog dang bral/ khyim la gtor na klad nad 'khrug pa 'ong// yul du gtor na gser thog ser ba'o// rdo rje
phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ bam srin dred mo gdong bsgrub cing las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang klu'i lcam mos 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// rang
rang dpa' bo thugs rje chags pa'i bdag/ dbang sdud khyod kyis thugs rjes rab gzigs la// bdag la khyod kyis las dang 'tshal skal zhu// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal badzra ku ma
ras 'di skad ces gsol to// ba glang spyod kyi lo thog 'bru bcud dang// 'gal byed srog phrogs mdze dang khrag gzer thong// dam la gnas pa'i chung srid 'phel par gyis// zhes lung nos shing phog go/ de

nas yang de yi 'phrin las 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor zlum po khru de'i tshad du ste// 'o ma sman gyi chag chag btab nas kyang// rtsibs brgyad e dang ldan pa bris nas ni// dbus su hUM dang sha bris te// rtsibs

brgyad la ni klu brgyad bri// glang chen snying dang dmar chen dbus su bzhag/ bya khrag ban d+ha gang yang zla gam dag la bzhag/ sbrul nag mdzo to dag gi thod pa ru// thun dang dgra bo'i yul ming bcug la
bzhag/ dkar gsum klu sman la sogs brgyan ldan dgram// ba glang gdong dang rta mchog dbus su bskyed// spyan drangs mchod cing bsnyen pa'i don rdzogs nas// bod rbad bsad pa'i sngags kyis brdeg par

bya'o// oM ga trag ma ta dza badzra yag sha kring kring raM ma dza/ oM rag mo rag mo tsa ba tsa ba mo khrag mu sha dgra snying b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM snying tsit+ta ma la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ graM ma ta ma ta khaM kham khas rbad du phob dgra la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de nas 'di

skad las bcol/ hUM/ nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sring cig rkong srin ba glang gdong// klu rgyal kun gyi lcam mo ste// 'khor du klu bdud bye ba 'bum gyis bskor// srid pa'i chu 'bebs khrag
gzer rgyal mo khyod// zangs thog khrag gi gzer nad 'bebs rnal 'byor bcom las rnams grub par mdzod// de skad bstod de las bcol nas/ rdzas de chu mig dag tu mnan na mdze ru 'gyur/ de dag dgra la

brgyab na khrag gzer 'ong/ de dag yul du gtor na ser ba dmar po 'bab/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ rkong srin ba glang gdong bsgrub cing las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bcu
gsum pa'o//// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sring mos 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// e ma'o dpa' bo thams cad rdo rje las kyi sgrol// thams cad rgyal ba'i lus su dgongs mdzod la// bdag gi las dang

tshal ma khyod la zhu// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sgra mo snyanagyi 'bras bu'i lo thog dang// smyo 'bog lhog rgal gag pa'i nad thong
la// dam chos spyod pa'i 'khor bzhi 'phel bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// de yi las su bstan pa ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad ldan la// spos dang rin chen chag chag gdab// de dbus gru
gsum zla kham gsum// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// dbus su hUM dang sha bkod nas// rtsibs la gnod sbyin srin po gdong// rta yi snying dang dmar gtor dang// mi khrag ban da gang yang

bzhag/ dom mam phag pa'i thod pa ru// dgra bo'i yul dang ming byang gzhug/ de la thun gyi rdzas kyis brab// rtsibs las 'bru dang rin chen dang// rgyan dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dgram// bdag nyid bdud rtsi

'khyil ba dang// chu srin gdong yang dbus su bsgom// de tshe bod rbad bsad pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra kI li pring ka ling ho pa ya hUM dza/ oM badzra rag mo rag mo trag mo shig shig/ dgra bo'i snying kha rag la

b+h+yo/ oM thum ri li li pra tsar pra ma ya gshogs/ thums rbad shag ma dgra la b+h+yo/ de yi dus su 'di skad bskul/ hUM/ byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// byang gi 'brog srin chu srin gdong/ khyod
ni gnod sbyin rnams kyi sring mo ste// 'khor ni gnod sbyin pho mo stong gis bskor// srid pa'i chu 'bebs lhog rgal gag pa'i bdag/ mthing shing g.yu yi thog ser 'bebs// rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las rnams
grub par gyis// de skad bstod nas mchod de las bcol nas// shing gcig drung du sbas nas smyo zhing 'bog/ dgra bo'i snyingal gtor na lhog rgal 'ong// yul dang lo la gtor na lcags thog ser ba

'ong// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ 'brog srin bsgrub cing las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje gdug pa
'dul ba'i rgyal po la ngo mtshar gyi tshig 'di skad ces gsol lo// e ma'o bde gshegs rdo rje gdug pa 'dul pa'i gtso// dregs pa lcam dral bcas pa yi// ma ni klu las byung bas na// drag po klu yi ser ba
rnams ni ji ltar dbab// rnal 'byor don du rgyal ba gdab bos bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas rdo rje drag po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas/ drag po gnam lcags kyu klu ser dbab pa 'di dag sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// klu yi gnas su 'dug nas ni// dkyil 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// dkyil du b+ha ga e yis mtshan// rdo rje sbrul
gyi chun pos brgyan// dbus su hUM dang nA ga bri// 'dab brgyad klu brgyad snying por bcas// mchod rdzas dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman dang// gtor ma la sogs mdzes par dgram// bdag nyid gsang ba'i
khro bor bsam// klu brgyad pho mo bkug bstim mchod// me thab dkar po zlum po la// rdo rje 'od zer 'phros pas brgyan// rgyal rigs khyim nas blang ba'i me// u dum 'ba' ra'i shing la spar// me

yi lha nyid mchod nas su// me lha'i lto bar klu rnams bsam// dkar la mngar ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// zhi ba'i tshul du sbyin sreg bya// oM kI la ya ag+ne de ba nA ga de ba rA dza ma hA pU dza sa ma ya mahA shIn+tiM ku ru hUM
swAhA/ brgya ni rtsa brgyad dag tu dbul// gtor ma byin brlabs 'khor la sbyin// bden pa'i tshig gis las la bskul// des ni klu yi gdug pa zhi bar 'gyur// de nas yang ni las la sbyar// ban da mtshan med

bkra mi shis// de ru khrag sna dug sna dang// rgya tshil 'u zu dkar po dang// yungs kar gu gul thal chen dang// gsang sngags 'di yis bzlas shing bsgrub// oM spyi ri tra shon shon bi li zer khrol/ shu shu raM she na raM/

zhes ni thod par rab tu bsngags// gzhan yang seng ldeng phur pa la// sngags 'di dag ni stong du bzlas// oM badzra kI li kI li ya mi li mi li tsan tri badzra da ya swAhA/ zhabs mas phur bu thod pa dril// klu nag

gnas pa'i chu ru gzhug/ bdag nyid rdo rje gzhon nur bsgom// byin brlabs dbang bskur tshul bzhin bya// che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed nas ni// klu gzugs brdung zhing sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra ma ti sa ma ni dza/
krugs krugs ma ma ni sri sod/ drag por sod phob/ na ma sa ma ta bing bing hUM phaT/ nA ga nA ga de ba gan drag por sod phob/ gu gul gnag dang 'ba' dud btang// ming rus bcug nas mdze yis
'dzin// yul ming bcug na klu ser 'bab// re dogs med par gdon mi za'o// gzhan yang thun byung char 'bebs na// mchod cing bsgrub pa gong bzhin du// las la sbyar ba 'di skad gsungs// mtshan ma ngan

pa'i thod pa la// badzra ma ti'i sngags kyang bri// sme khrag gsum dang gar ti sbreng// lkugs pa'i chu dang sngo khu dang// gzhan yang yungs kar thal chen la// gsang sngags 'bum phrag gsum du 'don// de la til
mar thal chen sku/ khro bo byin brlabs dud pas bdug/ klu yi dmigs su btab ste gzhug/ khyab 'jug sgyu ba'i dus su mnan// de yis char chen gdon mi za// char chen rang yang gcod par bya// srog la ming

rus ling khar bcas// klu yi gnas su mnan gzir ni// ya nga ba yi nad rnams 'byung// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// rdo rje chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ klu ser dang klu char dbab pa'i le'u
ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// kye kye/ kye ma'o dpa' bo chen po mi ldog sgrol// dregs pa'i gsang sngags mi bzad pa// phyi
rabs don du bdag la bshad par 'tshal// zhes zhus so// de nas yang rgyal ba dpa' bos 'di skad ces gsungs so// he he srid pa'i 'jig rten dregs pa skyong ba'i dregs pa rnams// gsang

sngags 'di yi sgo nas mnyes par gyis// oM ru/ oM i/ oM aM/ oM a/ oM ga/ oM d+hi/ oM bri/ oM k+Sha/ oM ha na ha na b+hin+t+ra badzra hUM/ i tra ye swAhA/ lha rnams kyi'o// hUM ya ma/ hUM sa to/ hUM ya ma ye/ hUM na yo/ hUM ya to

hUM ra ya/ hUM yak+Sha she/ hUM ni ra/ badzra kA la b+han d+ha b+han d+han ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ya ma ye swAhA/ gshin rje'i 'o// oM phu/ oM pho/ oM phuM/ oM phe/ oM pha/ oM phaM/ oM pho'u/ oM nA' ga badzra ya na ya sarba da na da na da ru pa rna

ye swAhA/ klu rnams kyi'o// oM dza/ oM ba/ oM ka/ oM ga/ oM bri/ oM gru/ oM maM/ oM ma/ oM karma ku bi ra/ yak+sha hUM phaT/ a ti pa ta ye swAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi'o// dza hUM baM ho/ A gats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ spyan drang

ba'o// phu dza me kha raM kha hi/ mchod pa'i 'o// zhes gsungs pas dregs pa rnams 'dar zhing skrag ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te/ bag gzhi sa la brdabs nas brkyang phyag 'tshal

te/ rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der 'khod do// phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis bstan pa bsrung bar lung nos shing bka'i lung phog nas dam la gnas par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i

rgyud las/ dregs pa can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ dregs pa pho mo'i yab gyur pa'i// srin po'i rgyal po ji ltar sgrub// bka' stsal

pa/ khang stong grog po gting zab par// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs la// nag po rtsang thod rgyan gyis brgyan// mi chen thod pa kha sbyor du// mi sha khrag rus la sogs dang// ra snying mchin pa dug rnams
dang// 'da' 'ur dang zir dang// smyo ba'i khu ba nyings par sbyar/ khang ral ma yi zhabs mas dril// dbyar zla gsum la bsnyen bsgrub bya// ston zla gsum la las la sbyar// bdag nyid dpal chen 'bar ba
ste// de yi byin rlabs cho 'phrul las// yi ger las sku bskyed la// srin po rag sha 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bka' nyan gsung sdod bsam byas la// ming rus khram shing gnas la gdags// bsnyen pa bgrang

zhing dus drug gtang// sha khrag gtor ma de bzhin sbyin// bsnyen bsgrub rdzogs nas las la sbyar// oM badzra krod+ha kI li kI la ya/ rag sha ha li karma sa ma ya dza 'du 'du dza dza/ badzra rak+sha krod+ha nri nri ga shu ti phob sa

ma ya phob/ oM rag sha krod+ha te tso ni ra srog la chum ha sti ba la rag sha kham ga shu ti phob ya/ ya rbad phaT/ ces bod cing rbad nas las la sbyar/ 'phrin las bskul ba 'di skad do// hUM/ mthing nag gru gsum
'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mi ro rta re 'bum gyi gdan stengs na// rnag khrag chu ser rba klong 'khyil ba'i nang shed na// srin po'i tshogs kyi rgya?l po ni// gcer bu skrag sig sdang mig

bgrad// lag dang mdung dang ral gri 'khor lo gri khug thogs// sha dang khrag dang thal ba'i thig les brgyan// gsod la brtson zhing sha khrag dmar la dga'// dam la rub bcing don la 'phreng// rag sha ru
lu'i sgra yis bos tsam na// pha bas byams shing khu bas gdung// las bcol 'phrin las myur du sgrubs// srog ser gang byed las gnyer gtad// gang la dmigs pa gdon mi za'o// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags

dbab pa'i rgyud las/ pha srin po bsgrub cing las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang badzra kI la yas mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// mi sgom mi rung ba yi lha// bcom ldan

dpal chen 'bar ba nyid// spyan lam bcu drug gnas pa ni// sku yi sa ma ya zhes bya'o// mi bzlar mi rung ba'i ba yi sngags// rab kyis chu bo rgyun bzhin nam// 'bring gis nyin gsum mtshan gsum dang// tha
mas nyin gcig mtshan gcig bzlas// gsung gi sa ma ya yin no// gzhan la bstan par mi rung ba'i// man ngag gsang ba'i 'bras bu ni// snod ngan phal la mi ston pa// thugs kyi sa ma ya yin no// mi bcang

mi rung ba yi rdzas// lus sam mgul du btags pa las// g.yel bar byas na mi rung bas// 'di ni yon tan sa ma ya// sgrub pa'i don la gnas pa dang// zhi rgyas dbang drag sbyor dang sgrol// ming gi mi byar mi
rung bas// 'di ni 'phrin las sa ma ya// de ltar dam la gnas gyur na// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la// ma rten bzhin du dam can 'go/ srog ser gang yang gdon mi za'o// dam tshig de la mi gnas
na// ming gi rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig gis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de bas dam tshig rnam lnga po// bsgrub pa'i don ldan rnal 'byor bas// lus dang

srog gi phyir yang mi gtong bas// 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin rtag tu bsrung bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kun sems dang snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// thams cad yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas su bya ba'i phyir na/ chos thams cad

kyi rtsa ba dbyings kyi lha 'di dag bka' stsal to// ma g.yos rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// de la sems rol ye shes mchog/ rang bzhin lhun grub ngang gis gsal// gnyis med chos sku bde ba che// che ba'i yon
tan bsam yas pas// snying rje chen po'i byang chub sems// ma bcos thig le nyid kyi ngang// longs spyod rdzogs sku mi zad gter// g.yo ba med pa'i chos nyid la// rang snang ye shes lhun gyis
rdzogs// bcom med sems nyid ye shes chen por snang// mngon par byang chub skur bstan pa'o// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i sems// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i ste// rang bzhin med pas 'dus ma

byas// dmigs med bstan pas rdo rje'i sku// rdzu 'phrul thabs kyi 'od zer yang// yongs la khyab cing dogs med sems// bye brag sna tshogs cir yang ston// sprul pa'i sku de kun khyab pa'o+i// thabs dang shes
rab gnyis med pa'o// lhag pa'i byang chub sems chen po// skal med rnams la rang bzhin gsang// gsang ba rol ba'i sku zhes bya// gang la ci 'dul de la de bstan yang// byang chub sems kyi ngo

bo nyid// gdul bya'i ngo ltar snang ba'i sku// mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid kyi sku// de nyid chos nyid byang chub sems// las kyi phyag rgya zhes su bya'o// ngo bo nyid gsung 'dul ba'i ngo la snang// chos kyi phyag rgya sems nyid

yin// thugs nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes kyang// dam tshig phyag rgya byang chub sems// dngos snang sku ru snang mod kyang// sems nyid sku yi phyag rgyar snang// mtho dman gnyis su med pas theg pa mnyam nyid byang

chub sems so// skye shi gnyis su med pas lta ba byang chub kyi sems// bzang ngan gnyis su med pa spyod pa byang chub kyi sems// 'du 'bral gnyis su med pa dam tshig byang chub sems// spong len gnyis su med

pa 'phrin las byang chub kyi sems// mtha' dbus gnyis su med pa dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi sems// rtag chad gnyis su med pa ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems// che chung gnyis su med pa mchod pa byang chub

kyi sems// yod med gnyis su med pa sgrub pa byang chub kyi sems// dngos po dang mtshan ma gnyis su med pa ni sku byang chub gyi sems// gzung 'dzin gnyis su med pa gsung byang chub kyi sems// yangs dog

gnyis su med pa thugs byang chub kyi sems// thob dang ma thob med pa yon tan byang chub kyi sems// grub dang ma grub med pa 'phrin las byang chub kyi sems// phyi nang gnyis su med pa zhing khams byang chub kyi
sems// de ltar gnyis med byang sems lta ba de rtogs na// srog ser las la sbyor ba de mi 'grib ste// sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes 'bar// me la shing gis mnan pa 'dra// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams bla

na med pa'i byang chub la re dog med par gyur te/ don dam pa byang chub sems kyi phur pa thebs par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud chen po las/ don dam pa byang chub kyi sems kyi lta ba
bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas rgyal po yo byad 'dzin// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sku yi sgrub pa byed gyur na// sgra sbar btags pa'i sku gzugs la// zhi gnas las su

rung bar bya'o// sngags kyi rim pa rdzogs gsal na// gsung gi sgrub pa yin par 'dod// phur pa rtsa gzir las bstan pa// thugs kyi sgrub pa zhes su bya// mthun pa'i dam rdzas gtso bzhag la// yon tan bsgrub
par bstan pa'o// zor thab thun gzer las la sbyar// 'phrin las bsgrub par rgyal bas gsungs// gsung ba pos ni yang gsol ba// de bsgrub dus dang rtags ni gang// 'jigs byed chen pos bstan du
gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje nyon// rab kyis zla ba gcig gis grub// 'bring gis zla ba gsum gyis so// tha mas lo gcig tshun chad kyis// grub 'gyur 'di la the

tshom med// lo zla zhag grangs brgyad la yang// gsum gsum dag tu shes par bya'o// phur bu 'phar 'tsheg 'khol 'phyong 'od dang du ba 'byung// thod pa 'phag cing thun khol dang// sgro 'gul yungs kar sbom pa

dang// chu chen brub dang rlung chen 'tshub// 'brug grags glog ni 'gyu ba dang// sa g.yo ba dang rung chad cing// nam mkha' 'ja' tshon gang ba dang// chu bo chen po nag pa dang// gnam lcags zor ba lag tu

babs// de lta bu yi ltas rnams ni// rab kyis mngon du 'byung ba dang// 'bring gis nyams dang rtags 'ong ste// tha mas rmi lam ston par 'gyur// de ltar grub na las la sbyar// rtags de mngon du ma byung

na// las kyi sbyor ba ci byas kyang// ngal ba tshi chad don med 'gyur// de las btan la phebs pa gces// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyun chen po las/ bsgrub pa'i shan dbye zhing
dus dang rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// 'khu zhing dam las ldog 'gyur
ram// shing dbang bskur ji ltar bgyi// kI la ya yis bstan du gsol// zhes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// dregs pa 'khu ldog dam las 'da' gyur na// dbang sdud shi sa 'di

ltar bstan// gong du bsgrub pa'i dregs pa rnams// oM sa ma ya rag sha ma ra tsa sha/ ru lu ru lu hUM dza nan/ zhes pas/ dregs pa rnams kyis mnan te ma bzhi zhabs kyis mardzis/ oM badzra ban+d+ha tra tha/ zhes ni sgrib

pa bral/ oM bi d+hi tsit+ta hUM a/ zhes pa ni/ gdan gyi snying khrag zhal du rdub// bdag nyid yab yum sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// dregs pa'i lce la gsal bar gzhag/ oM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha haM/ zhes dam tshig dbog/ oM
sa ma ya i tan ti na ra kan/ zhes pas dam bsgrags nas/ sa ma ya pra be sha phaT kyis gdan la bkye/ de nas bzod cing las la bskul// de ni khyad par dbang du bsdu ba'i shi sa yin// ting nge

'dzin gyi bya bar gsungs// yang na ban d+ha mtshan ldan du// rdo rje dri chu bdud rtsis brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi dam yang bsre// rdo rje dri chu bdud rtsi mchog/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta dang sbyar// dam tshig snying gi khrag chen

po// bsregs pa'i mchog ste srog gi snying// snying dang snying gi grogs su bya'o// a mahA ku pany+tsa sa ma ya/ hUMm hA a mr-i ta sa ma ya/ zhes ni rdzas kyi dam yang bsre'o// hUM/ nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// khams
