gsum snying khrag dang dngas ma'i bdag/ khyed kyi snying khrag nga la yod// nga yi las rnams khyed kyis gyis// zhes che ba'i nga rgyal gyis dbang du bsdu ba'o// shi sa dbang bskur bka' stsal pa// blo ldan gsol btab

dbang thob nas// cho ga lnga yi sbyor ba yis// shi sa rgyal ba'i skur bskyed la// sme ba can dang mthu chen gyis// khang gcig ma yi gzungs ma la// phyag rgya gsol bar bkod nas ni// rnam gsum tshul gyis nan
tan bya'o// sbyor thabs sems chus dbang bskur nas// gong bzhin dregs pa dbang bsdu mnan dam bya// des ni dregs pa dbang du bsdu// de yi yon tan dpag las 'das// de ltar dbang rnams ma thob

par// drag shul spyad kyang mi 'grub pas// khrag 'thung rol bas 'di skad gsungs// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ dregs pa dbang du bsdu zhing slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab ste/ e e ma rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyugs thugs rje'i bdag/ bdag dang 'gro ba bstan la phan gdags phyir// chu 'khyags bsrung

ba'i rim pa gang// phan pa'i slad du bshad du gsol// zhes pa dang/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ 'gro bstan la phan gdags na// sa la spyod pa'i rnal
'byor bas// yid 'ong ba yi gnas dag tu// dpyid zla gsum gyi zla ba la// gza' skar nyi ma bkra shis la// yo byad ma lus ldan byas na// stegs bu khru gang dal mnyam thig btab ste// dbus su las bzhi gru
gsum brgyad dang sgo bzhir bcas// phur pa bcu gcig yang dag ldan// yungs kar khrag chen thal chen gu gul bcas// bsgrub rdzas mchod rdzas yang dag ldan// dbus su dgod pa'i phur pa la// sngags 'di

bris te dgod par bya// oM badzra kI li kI la yA ya hUM/ dza la dza la a mu ka badzra tsaN+Da li a ra li hUM dza phaT/ de bzhin steng du dgod pa'i phur pa la// oM badzra kI la ya hUM/ ka ra khaM raM yaM hUM phaT/ shar du dgod pa'i

phur pa la/ oM badzra kI la ya bi dza ya/ a ni da la ni la swAhA/ shar lhor dgod pa'i phur pa la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya ni lan dan tra ni tri a tri nan hUM swAhA/ lho yi phyogs kyi phur pa la/ oM badzra kI

li kI la ya/ ya man+ta hUM/ a shu tri na hUM swAhA/ lho nub phyogs kyi phur pa la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ Ar+ya a tsa le hUM/ a tri su tri nan hUM swAhA/ nub kyi phyogs kyi phur pa la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ ha ya gri ba hUM/

na ga a li nan hUM swAhA/ nub byang gi phur pa la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ shu li shu li nan swAhA/ byang phyogs kyi phur pa la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ shu lo b+h+yo du nan hUM swAhA/

byang shar gyi phur pa la ya/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ trA+ai lokya bi dza ya hUM/ ti li nan hUM swAhA/ 'og gi phyogs kyi phur pa la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya mahA ba la/ be a tra na gra ti li nan hUM swAhA/ zhes ni bris la dgod
par bya// de nas ting 'dzin rim pa ni// rdo rje khro bo bcu gcig bskyed// spyan drangs bstim ste mchod pas mchod// 'dod don gsol te 'phrin las bcol// gong gi sngags kyi rim pa bzhin// bsnyen bsgrub

yan lag don sbyar te// de la khri phrag dag tu bzlas// byug brdeg bdug pa dus drug bya// bstod cing bskul ba dus drug bya// de nas kham phor dag tu bsdu// dam brjod yi dam thun mtshams sbyar// dbyar ston
gnyis kyi zla mtshams su// gang bsrungs pa yi phyogs mtshams su// steng 'og dbus dang bcu gcig dag tu gdab// gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs dag gi/ gong gi sngags bzlas sdigs mdzub bsgreng// yungs
kar thal chen la sogs gtor// de bzhin byas na bsrung bya thub// than pa byung na'ang char 'bebs shing// char chen rang yang gcod par nus// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud
gza' gdong gi lung las/ gzhan la phan gdags bsrung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rjes/ 'jigs byed chen po gsang ba la 'di skad ces gsol

to// kye kye kye ma phyi rabs don gyi phyir khyab 'jug rgyu dus dang las la sbyar ba'i grub rtags gang// zhes zhus pas/ 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ tshes bzhi srod nas lag pa g.yon// ma mor sprul nas
nub nas shar du rgyu// yul ming shar gzhag mo'i drag sngags nub nas shar du brdaig/ gdon mi za bar grub pa'i rtags// spr-in nag 'khrug cing ser ba dum bur 'ong// gang la dmigs pa 'phang ba'i

sngags// yungs nag mchog phur dag la bzlas// trag rag sha rbad ser hril shar/ zhes gsungs so// tshes brgyad snga dro lag pa g.yas pa dgra bla'i rgyal mor sprul// shar lho mtshams nas nub byang mtshams su
rgyu// dmigs pa nub byang mtshams su bzhag/ shar lho mtshams nas yungs kar bya phur dag gis gdab// ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha shar b+h+yo/ grub rtags sprin ni lug gi lto tshal ltar// shar lho

mtshams nas nub byang mtshams// sna yang 'dren cing ser ba nya mig 'ong// bcu gcig dag ni nam 'jing la// mchu so bdud du sprul nas ni// byang nas lho ru rgyu ba ste// de dus bsgrub bya lho ru bzhag/ byang
nas yungs kar lcags phur gdab// oM pa sha mi ki ra hUM la shar hri b+h+yo/ srog ser gang yang 'joms par byed// grub rtags sprin yang long long gshig pa'am// sems can tha dad gzugs su ston// ser pa'i

dbyibs kyang zur gsum pa'o// bco lnga nyi ma phyed dus na// lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su ni// mgo bo srin po sprul nas rgyu// gzas pa byang shar mtshams su bzhag/ lho nub mtshams nas sha rul

khrag rul dang// seng ldeng phur pas sngags 'di brdeg/ oM ser khrag la mu sha smugs swAhA/ bzlas pa tsam gyis grub par 'gyur// nges par grub pa'i rtags nyid kyang// sprin ni kham nag mdung shing shar ba 'dra

ba dang// g.yag rgod 'khrig pa lta bur 'ong// ser pa'i chu yang sbad kha dag tu mchong zhing 'ong// bco brgyad nam gyi phyed yol nas// mjug ma dmu ru sprul nas ni// shar nas nub tu rgyu ba ste// de dus ling ga

nub tu bzhag/ shar nas til dang gzugs mo byi dur gdab// oM raM traM thun shag hril raM b+h+yo/ grub pa'i rtags kyang sprin ni phying pa brkyang pa 'dra// ser ba'i tshad kyang bya ni phur pa bzhin du 'ong//

nyi shu gnyis kyi nyi ma phyed yol la// mche ba g.yas g.yon gshin rjer sprul// nub byang mtshams nas shar lhor rgyu ba dang/ de tshe dmigs pa shar lhor bzhag/ ske tshe be con phur pa brdeg/ oM ya ma rA dza raM hril shar raM raM/ grub

rtags sprin ni hral po dang// ser ba 'ong sar mdzub ris byas pa'o// nyi shu lnga yi skya rings shar tsam na// snying dang nang khrol klu btsan dag tu sprul// lho nas byang du rgyu ba ste// de tshe bsgrub bya byang du

bzhag/ yungs kar yungs nag gser gyi phur bas gdab// oM nA ga hril ser shag tu sa ma ya hril b+h+yo/ de yi grub pa'i rtags dag kyang// sprin dang phyar sgye btsugs pa 'dra// ser pa'i dbyibs kyang spra tshugs
dril ba 'dra// nyi shu dgu yi nyi ma nur tsam na// rkang gnyis gza' bdud nyid sprul nas// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub dag tu rgyu// de dus nyin mtshan gnyis ka ru/ gzugs brnyan lho nub mtshams su

bzhag/ yungs kar khro chu'i phur pas gdab// oM sa ma snying ya ma khrag ra hUM la hril hril shag shag se na ya b+h+yo/ de yi grub pa'i rtags nyid kyang// sprin dud ka mgo ser du 'byung ba dang// ser ba yang gang la

dmigs pa gdon mi za ba 'ong ngo// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud las/ rog tu sring bzhi'i lung las las brgyad bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po'i
bdag pos 'khor du ma dang bcas pas// bcom ldan 'das la rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa du mas mchod nas/ ngo mtshar gyi tshig 'dis mngon par bstod do// e ma'o bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba'i
mtha' las 'das// bdag gzhan gnyis su med pa'i dpal mnga' zhing// rtag chad mthar mi 'gyur ba rdo rje ste// dus gsum bgres rgud med pas gzhon nu'o// don dam nges pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal

bstod// dus gsum rnam thar sku gsum zhal// 'gro drug sgrol mdzad pha rol phyin pa'i phyag/ skye shi tshar chod zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul bzhi// 'jigs pa'i sku la dur khrod chas brgyad gsol// dpa' bo chen po'i sku

la phyag 'tshal bstod// ljags gsum theg gsum dam chos kyis// 'gro ba'i skad rnams ji tsam par// de snyed sgra skad tha dad ston// tshin don ngo bo nyid kyi gsung snyems pa// bzhad pa'i gad rgyangs gsungs
la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma g.yos thugs mchog dbu ma'i don snyems pas// sku dang ye shes rigs kyi ngo bo nyid// mthar thug spros dang bral ba'i mchog/ mi dmigs chos nyid rang snang ba// dges pa chen
po'i thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi bzad sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las// tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan ni// chu yi nang na gnas pa yang// zla ba la ni g.yo med bzhin// yon tan zad mi shes la phyag
'tshal bstod// zhi rgyas dbang gis 'dul bar ma gyur la// drag shul btsan thabs gdul dka' 'dul ba'i gtso// bstan pa bsrung zhing rnam 'byor bde la 'khod// rtags dang mtshan ma mngon du ston pa
ste// 'phrin las lhun gyis grub la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma dges pa chen po yum gyi mkha' glong nas// dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa rtag tu sbyor// thugs rjes sprul pa sna tshogs bsam yas spros// gdug
pa tshar gcod bde chen dbyings la dgod// dregs pa rog ti nag po mi sring thabs kyis 'dul// gsang ba snyoms par 'jug phyag 'tshal bstod// stong gsum 'jig rten zhing khams rnam par dag/ 'dul

dbang thugs rje'i gsod kyis snyoms mdzad cing// mi 'dul bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa la// rtag pa'i las kyis thog ser las mdzad de// hag sngangs skrag pa'i don rnams cir yang ston// zhing khams khyab

par che la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces pas mngon par rdo rje tshig gis bstod do// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rog ti nag po'i lung las rgyud bshad pa rdzogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi mtshan dang sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las gsang ba zhing khams la bstod pa'i le'i ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// thugs rje thabs la mkhas

pa'i bdag nyid rgyud kyi don de dag bsdus te bstan par gsol zhes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i thugs su chud de/ rgyud kyi don bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyon cig gsang

bdag lag na rdo rje nga yis bstan pa'i rgyud 'di yang// lta spyod dkyil 'khor 'phrin las dang// ting 'dzin bsgrub cing mchod pa dang// dbang dang dam tshig ngo bo nyid// srog ser zor thab thun nyid dang// phan
gnod las kyi don bsdus pas// drang don bstan pa'i rim pa'i tshig/ nges don rgyud kyi ngo bor bsdus pa 'di// 'gro ba'i lam du khyod la gtad// rjes 'jug don du nub pa re// bstan pa bsrung phyir dar bar
gyis// shes gdams shing gnyer nges par gtad do// de nas lag na rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dzum pa'i mdangs phyung ste/ ngo mtshar gyi mdangs kyis 'di skad ces dam bcas so// e ma yang dag don
dam bsdus don rgyud 'di dag/ phyi mtha' mu yi bar du gnas par gyis// mi nub bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan yongs su gzugs// mi 'da' bstan pa'i char chen po mngon par dbab// mi 'dul bstan pa sgro skur

la// skrag cing rgyal ba'i las kyis bka' dang bstan pa bsrung bar gyis// zhes khas blangs te gtsug gi mdud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi tshul du byas so// de nas 'jig rten chos kyis 'brel ba'i 'khor rnams
rjes su yi rang ste// gsang ba nges pa'i don nges par 'byung ngo// a la la ho zhes mngon par bsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid la dgongs nas cad mi gsung bar gyur
to// rdo rje phur pa chu 'khyags dbab pa'i rgyud chen po rog ti sring bzhi dang bcas pa'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ nI la tsakra

na ma/ bod skad du/ 'khor lo nag po zhes bya ba/ dpal karma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i bstan pa la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems

can thams cad kun// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// hUM/ khro la khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi

mdzad pa// khro zhi che la phyag 'tshal te// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang// dam tshig la sdang dgra bgegs rnams// bsgral phyir 'khor lo nag po ni// lung rgyud kun nas rab bsdus bshad// sngon tshe bya ba sngon byung
ste// sngon byung 'dus pa nag po ni// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// bstan pa byung ba'i bskal ba ni// bde ba chen po zhes bya la// 'gro ba'i tshul du byung ba ni// gsang sngags don rnams

la spyad de// nges don ma rtogs dor nas ni// ji bzhin bsgral bzung nyon mongs dang// mi dge bcu po spyad pa yis// rnam smin mnar med dmyal bar ltung// de las rims kyis thar nas kyang// rgyu mthun rgyu
dang 'dra ba ste// dpal ldan he ru gsal bsgom nas// rnam dag mi shes dngos po bzung// de yi stobs kyis srin po ni// 'da' sha gri ba la sogs te// gshin rje ma mo dbang bsdus te// srid pa gsum na

dbang re che// brgya byin gshin rje chu lha dang// gnod sbyin 'khor du gtogs pa ni// shwa na bzhi dang re'u tri dang// bse mo dbang phyug brgyad la sogs// 'khor du bsdus te gnas pa ni// lus ni gtum bag
ldan pa ste// dbu dgu dbu gsum la sogs pa// ji srid dbu mtha' yas pa'i bar// las kyi srin po gtum par snang// gnod pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba dang// drag po'i sngags ni bzlas pa yis// rgyu mthun gnod
bsam srid gsum 'joms// ngag gis sod sgrogs gtogs chom sogs// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// brag phug byang du bltas pa la// nyi ma 'char ba'i skabs med ltar// zhi
ba'i thugs rjes 'byung mi srid// sngon tshe log bltas dad skyes pas// dbang gi 'bras bu 'byung bas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus kun// 'dres 'dres 'dra la ma 'dres pa// shes rab stong pa'i bdag nyid

las// snying rje ngang gis skyes pa yis// bcom ldan karma he ru ka/ khro bo tshul du kun mnga' bas// srin po 'jigs par byas pa las// srin po khro zhing gtum par snang// de gdul don du khams gsum rgyal// khro
bo brgya byin 'khor bcas btul// gshin rje gshed po sprul pa yis// lho phyogs gshin rje 'khor bcas btul// khro bo rta mgrin bton pas ni// nub phyogs chu lha 'khor bcas btul// khro rgyal stobs chen

bton pas ni// byang phyogs gnod sbyin 'khor bcas btul// ye shes lnga la rtog med du// smon lam stobs kyis snang ba yi// gtso bo phyogs skyong bzhi po dang// shwa na bse mo re ma ti// dbang phyug rtsa brgyad

dbang bsdus nas// khas blangs gtsigs la bor ba'o// 'khor rnams kun la btul nas kyang// gtso bo de dag gdul don du/ thugs ka nas kyang hUM byung ste// khro bo las kyi srin po la// khros pa'i rgyal po sras
mchog ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs sur gsum// khros pas ru tra btul nas kyang// khro bo'i sems ni zhi bya'i phyir// lcags kyus blang nas zhags pas bcings// lcags sgrog bcings nas dril bu
yis// zhal du bstabs te phul ba yin// sku klong spros bral chos sku rtogs// nyon mongs sems ni zhi bar 'gyur// lus ni dpal gyi gdan du phul// gus pas phyag 'tshal de dad yin// mnyam
nyid ngang gi dbang gis khro bo bstan// ye shes shugs khro ltar bcas bcos pa yis// sku gsum bco lnga'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal nas// thugs kyi man ngag nying ku bdag zags pas// bla ma'i zhabs la gtums
te bdag gis bshad//// bsham pa 'khor lo nag po ni// dang po sa phyogs dben pa ru// sa gzhi chag chag byi dor bya// gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams// dam rdzas rag ta bdud rtsi bshams// rgyu dang
'bras bu dbyibs ldan pa'i// phur pa nag po bcu bdun bsham// sgom pa 'khor lo nag po ni// dang por stan bder rab gnas nas// bcud kyi snang ba rab tu bsgom// skad cig ma la las kyi lhar dmigs
nas// nyi ma'i steng gi hUM las ni// 'od 'phros dkon mchog gsum spyan drangs// yan lag phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul dang// sdig bshags yi rang skyabs gsol nas// tshad med bzhi bsgom bsod nams
tshogs// mahA shun+ya ta dz+nya rab brjod nas// phur pa'i hUM ni nyi ma dmigs// rim gyis 'od gyur bdag 'dus zhu// rim 'phros bcud nas snod bcud rim// thams cad zhu ste 'od sems yin// rim pa bsdus te

hUM gi 'od// de yang rim gyis thig le ste// thig le chos kyi dbyings su thim// de ni chos skur byin brlabs pa'o// skad cig tsam las lhar dmigs te// phyag na rdo rje mig g.yas nyi// hUM las khro dpung 'bar ba
yis// bgegs bskrad thams cad bsregs par bsam// shangs khung rlung nag 'tshubs pa yis// thal bar gyur bas gtor bar bsam// spyan g.yon zla ba'i dkyil na a// de las khro mo chu kyin
gnas// bgegs rnams thams cad bkrus par bsam// hUM oM A// hUM hUM khaM/ rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang// phur bu mda' gzhu tho ba yis// bgegs bskrad tshur 'dus go rims bzhin// 'og 'khor rtsibs

bcu mthar thug gsam// gnod mdzes de nas rab sprul te// oM suM b+ha la sogs bsgo bar bya// bgegs kyi bdag po mnan pa ni// hUM bcu phur ba'i ngo bo bya// sngags bcu khra bcu stong du ste// smad ni phur pa

zur gsum rtse// gnod mdzes bsgo bsngags gdab par bya// de nas sgom byed 'od zhu la// zla gam ba dan mtshan mas bskyod// zur gsum rdo rje zlum pa ni// bum mtshan gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan// ri rab sna bzhi

sogs snang ba// thams cad dag pa yin par brjod// hUM/ sdud dang 'phro 'du gzhal yas khang// gru bzhi sogs pas mtshan mar bsgom// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi nyi zla sogs// ye shes chos nyid hUM sgril lnga// so
so'i sngags brjod thabs shes bcu'o// rtsibs mchan bzhi po dag la ni// gtor ma rag ta bdud rtsi sogs// byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni// a hUM thod phur lnga lnga gnyis// phaT phaT/ oM AHhUM/

rlung mes sbyar bar rtogs pa las// byang chub sems bzhis dmigs pa yin// dza hUM baM ho tshad med bzhi// sgo ma bzhi yi ngo bor bskyed// hUM las 'od 'phros spyan drangs nas// mdun du byon nas gcig 'dres
la// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yin// phyi yi mchod pas mchod par bya// dug gsung bkug ste mchod 'bul ste// sgo ma bzhi yi bdud rtsis mchod// de dngos gyis ni rab bstod de// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba

sogs pa'o// de nas 'phrin las rab bcol te// nang du spyan drangs rang la bstim// yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa las// 'dres par gyur las hUM phyung ste// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ zhes brjod sras mchog dag
gyur nas// rigs lnga so so'i yig 'bru phyung// gnas lngar bkod pas byin brlabs pa'o// sku gsung thugs su bdag gnas spro// las gsum byas pa gsum dag rtse// gcig par rigs so khro bo las// 'chol
ba mang po phar 'phros nas// sku la thim ste thugs bcud bsdus// de nas phyung ste 'gro ba bsgral// slar 'dus ma 'dres so sor bsdus// dbang nus byin brlabs dngos gyur pa'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum bde

gshegs kyang// 'di la byin gyis brlab par mdzad// lag pa nyi shu zla thabs shes rab/ sor mo lnga yang lnga lnga gnyis// hUM a chos sku mtha' thabs shes// 'bru lnga lnga gnyis sa bon te// sbyor sngags skur bskyed

snyoms par bzhugs// 'dod chags bskyed sbyor a dza li// badzra b+han d+has 'od du 'khyil// de dus ting 'dzin sbyor kun zhugs// rtse gsum 'dab brgyad rab rgyud de// ye shes ting 'dzin thim dbang bskur// a

ni spros te 'od thim bskul// zhe sdang rjes dran til 'bru tsam// grangs med dag ni sku la thim// bdag dang khro bo yab yum las// sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub sems// sku gsung thugs su gyur pa ni// bdag
dang gnyis su med par ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas gyur pa bya// des ni bdag nyid chen po ste// las byed nus dang bzhugs gsol nas// phyi nang mchod pa gzhung bzhin dbul// lha mos bstod pa byas rjes

su// las ni de la bcol bar byed// bzlas brjod nye bar bya ba ni// phra mo'i ting 'dzin sgom pa dang// bzlas brjod 'phro 'dus bsnyen cing bsgral// dkyil 'khor lus bsdu dngos grub don// tsit+ta rin chen

srog rtsar 'dud// ye shes sems snying rdo rje ste// lte ba nyi zla kha sbyar nas// sngags brjod bug nas dbugs 'od steng// bug nas srog rtsa'i nang du byung// bad dbus srog rtsa'i nang du byung// bad dbus srog
rtsa'i ya dbugs bkag/ rwa dbus phyung ste du ma las// oM badzra kI la kI la ya che ge mo zhig mar ya phaT/ ces brjod pas/ phur bu 'dra ba'i khro bo phyogs bcur spros// don byas gza' ba bsgral
nas 'dus// khams gsum rnam rgyal de bzhin gshegs// rigs dang sbyar te 'khor lo'i steng// kha dog dkar po bud d+har sbyar// gshin rje gshed po rin chen rigs// sbyar te rin chen zur brgyad lta'i// kha

dog mthing kar da nar sbyar// ha ya gri ba pad+ma'i rigs// sbyar te pad+ma 'dab brgyad lta'i// kha dog dmar po pad+mar sbyar// khro bo stobs chen las kyi rigs// sbyar te rdo rje rgya gram lta'i// kha dog ljang khu dkar

dmar sbyar// 'phros pas nyon mongs lnga bsgral phyir// gnas lngar brgyab ste bsgral bar bya// tshul 'dus sras mchog gnas lngar 'dus// phur pa dag la thim pas grub// skyo bar gyur na rab bsdu ste// sgo ma khro

bo khro mo la// de ni yab yum gnyis med thim// yab kyi spyod pa thams cad bya'o// de nas nyams len rim pa ni// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa byed dus su// thun gcig spyod pa thu gcig bsgom// thun gcig bzlas te

mtshan mo ni// thun gnyis nyal te gnyis de bzhin// bsnyen pa gnyis pa'i dus su ni// nyi phyed mtshan phyed thun dus su// bzhir phye gci bsgom gcig bzlas so// rtags dang dus grangs thim par bya// dbang

phyug ma dang gnod sbyin mo// sha za srin mo skabs su mchod// las kyi he ru kar gnas pas// snying kha'i hUM las 'od phyung ste// TAk+ki rA dza'i sngags brjod pas// mdun du sprin bzhin gtibs par bsgom// rang

rang sngags la dang po ni// btags pa brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod// ma nu rag sha si b+h+yo/ pra ma ni b+h+yo/ ra tri ma b+h+yo/ b+he na b+he b+h+yo/ ko ma ri b+h+yo/ in+t+ra ma b+h+yo/ ping la b+h+yo/ a mr-i ta b+h+yo/ s+ye mya s+ye b+h+yo/ dan da s+ye b+h+yo/ rag+sha si

b+h+yo/ bag sha si b+h+yo/ pra ma ni b+h+yo/ ra ti badzra b+h+yo/ ra ti re ma ti b+h+yo/ e kA rA dza ma b+h+yo/ ma no ha ra ma b+h+yo/ si ti ka b+h+yo/ mahA karma badzra b+h+yo/ ag+ne ma b+h+yo/ ba ra hi b+h+yo/ tsu mu ti b+h+yo/ u ta na b+h+yo/ mahA kA la badzra b+h+yo/ tsa ka

la b+h+yo/ kuM pa ka ran b+h+yo/ badzra laM po da ra b+h+yo/ tad+ya thA/ trag rag sha ta bi ru nan/ mug ti baM ru lu ru lu dza/ dza hUM baM ho/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn bi ta sha ya k+Shi dzra b+h+yo b+h+yo ru lu hUM/ zhes pas spyan drangs de/ mdun du bya

nag gtibs pa tsam bsgom/ de nas zil gyis mnan cing bsdigs par bya ste/ dza hUM baM ho/ shri he ru ka mahA badzra sarba dang sta a bi dang sh+ta/ a bi staM ka ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod do// mche pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas za

ba'i tshul bstan te bsgom pas bsdigs so// dza hUM baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma mahA badzra a ka ta ya a ka ta ya/ pra be sha ya bra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ bi tang sa ye bu ta gshe tri pra ri a b+hi staM pa ka ya hUM phaT/ ces
brjod pas/ gshog pa'i phyag rgya bcas pa'i rdo rje gshogs pas zil gyi mnan par bsgom mo// de nas rtsa sngags la/ ar+g+ha pra tI ts+tsha ho btags pas zhal dbye'o// rtsa sngags la/ oM sa ma ya mahA

pany+tsa a mr-i ta ar+g+ha pra tI ts+tsha ho/ brjod pas gtor ma 'bul/ rtsa sngags la/ mA ra ya zhes pa dang spel bas las bcol lo// ya hi ga dza zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo// bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo nag po ni// snod

rab la yang gsum phye nas// rab kyi mtha' la bstan par bya'o// 'bring rnams man chad bstan mi bya// a+thi+-i::// hUM/ khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni// ye shes rtse mo mchog nyid la// rtogs pa'i tshul gyis rab
btud de// bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo nag po bstan// bdag dang dus dang gnas gzugs nyid// byin brlabs bzlas brjod 'phrin las ni// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i nag po ste// 'dis btab ci 'dod byin no
zhes// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// 'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir// rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'// 'di rgyud mang du thos pa yis// las la mkhas shing yid ches pa'i// dad thob gzhan gyis

ma zlogs shing// dbang tshig las la gnas pa dang// brtson 'gris drag cing 'bras bu ni// maM sa stong byung rnam pa lnga// de rtags byung na phrag dog med// bsgrub pa chen po 'di nyid kyis// bar chad bsal nas

byang chub la// blo bzhag nyid dus nag pa ni// bsgrub bzhi yin pas sngon du bstan// bcu bdun yan chad yar ngo ni// bsnyen pa'i dus yin zla rgyas ltar// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rgyas pas// bdag gi don

gyi dus yin bshad// de phyir bsnyen pa tshang ba dang// rtags byung gzhan gyi don bya'i phyir// bcu bdun man chad mar ngo dang// phur bu mig dmar la sogs pa// zla 'bring bsod nams 'bring po dang// thebs
dang bkri mi shis pa'i phyir// dus 'dir bstun bsgrub la 'jug/ dus kyi 'khor lo nag po'o// de yis rjes su rab tu bstan// dur khrod ma mo shing rkang gcig/ gnod sbyin yod par nges pa'i gnas// der byas
ma mo gnod sbyin gdon// dbang bsdus dam la le lan gyis// gza' ba pho ni bsgral phyir ro// gnas kyi 'khor lo nag po'o// mtshams kyi 'khor lo nag po ni// gtor ma nag po bcu bzhi bsham// mtho nag
bcu bzhi phyogs skyong dang// rgyal chen bzhi ru mnga' gsol te// gtor ma byin brlab de la dbul// phyi mtshams bsrung ba de la bcol// nang mtshams gong du bshad bzhin no// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo nag po
ni// 'dom gang mda' gang gru bzhi la// sgo bzhi grwa bzhir bskor ba'i dkyil// thig bzhi dkyil nas 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bzhi lte ba zlum po'i dkyil// zur gsum sum brtsegs bskor ba la// sa tshon byin
gyis brlabs te dbye// gzugs kyi 'khor lo nag po ni// lcags sam lcags lnga tsher ma can// shing las rgyu dang tshad dang byibs// ldan pa bcu bdun bsham nas ni// bdun ni gru gsum dbus

su gzugs// bsham pa 'khor lo nag po ni// maM sa stong byung rnam pa lnga// glang po rta dom khyi la sogs// sha rnams khrag ni sna tshogs las// gtor ma nag po cha gcig bsham// de rkyen mchod yon rag ta

ni// gong la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// myos byed sna tshogs sbyar ba ni// rag+ta mchod pa'i rdzas su bsham// ra sa ya na tshogs pa la// myos byed du ma sbyar ba bsham// dgra bgegs myur ru bsgral ba'i phyir// dug

gtor nag po cha gcig dang// phye ma gsum dang ra khrag sbyar// gnyis pa gdon la btab rdzas bshams// zhing chen bla re chen po dang// sha chen lhug dum bkram pa dang// gsur chen dud pa bkram pa dang// the

tshom med par 'di rnams bsam// sngon bya 'khor lo nag po ni// 'bol zhing 'jam pa'i stan bting nas// de stengs rnal 'byor bdag gnas te// snying po nang nyid dkyil 'khor steng// hUM las 'od zer sna lnga

ni// 'phros pas dkon mchog gsum spyan drang// lus ni bco lngar rab sprul te// tshigs bcad 'dis kyang bstod pa ni// lce bco lnga ni dbyangs bco lnga// shin tu khros shing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi

'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// hUM/ khro la khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa// khro zhing che la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod spyi zhabs la
bzhugs// hUM las 'od 'phros phyi nang gi/ mchod pas nye bar mchod par bya// thog med dus nas sdig byas bshags// 'od 'phros sdig pa tshig par bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// dge la
rjes su yi rang ngo// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song bas// 'khor lo rtse la gnas par bya'o// don bya sdug bsngal gyis gsungs dang// dga' dgod dmigs med tshad med bzhi// mahA shu ne dz+nyA na brjod
nas// stong nyid byang chub sems la gzhol ba// sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin no// yang mtshams 'khor lo nag po ni/ skad cig ma las bgegs gdab bo// phyag na rdo rje gsal bar rab dmigs// sku mdog

ljang khu phyag g.yas na// rdo rje g.yon pa sku la rten// spyan g.yas nyi ma'i dkyil steng du// hUM las khro bo me dpung 'bar// bgegs bskrad thams cad bsregs par bsam// g.yon pa'i bar gyi shangs khungs
nas// bgegs gtor g.yon du a las zla// chu nang gnas pa'i khro mo yis// bgegs bskrad chu yis khyer bar bsam// hUM oM ha hUM hUM khaM/ rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang// phur ba mda' gzhu tho ba
yis// bgegs bskrad tshur 'dus go rims bzhin// 'og 'khor rtsibs bcu mthar thugs bsam// thugs kha'i hUM las hUM byung la// de nas gnod mdzes rab sprul te// oM suM b+ha la sogs bsgo
bar bya// bcu'am gcig gis rims kyis bsam// gcig par bgegs kyi bdag po kun// de rjes mnan pa mtshams phur bcu// hUM 'phros 'od zhu chos sku yin// hUM bcur gyur pa longs spyod rdzogs// de las

skur bskyed phyir brjod pas// bi dza ya badzra mahA krod+ha hUM phaT/ nI la daN+Da badzra mahA krA+o d+ha hUM phaT/ ya mAn+ta ka badzra ma hA kro ta hUM phaT/ Ar+ya a tsa la badzra mahA krod+ha hUM phaT/ ha ya gri ba badzra mahA krod+ha hUM phaT/ a pa rA

ji ta badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ a mr-i ta kun+Da li badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ tre lo kya ba'i sha ya badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ hU~M ka ra hU~M badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ ma hA pa la badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ dkar mthing sngo nag sngo skya
dmar ljang ser sngo skya// dud kha zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa phur pa g.yon pa tho// smad ni phur pa zur gsum rtse// oM g+ha la sogs bsgo bas gdab// ci tsam 'dod pas mtshams bcad do// byin
brlab 'khor lo nag po ni// phur pa bdun pa dag la ste// phur pa'i hUM ni nyid la dmigs// rims kyis 'od 'dus bdag 'dus zhu// rims 'phros mched nas snod bcud rim// thams cad zhu ste 'od sems

yin// rim par bsdus te hUM gi 'od// de yang rims kyis thig le ste// thig le chos kyi dbyings su thim// de ni chos skur byin brlabs pa'o// de rjes 'khor lo'i nang du hUM// 'phro 'du zla kham ba dan dang// zur
gsum rdo rje zlum po ni// bum mtshan gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan// ri rab sna bzhi sogs snang ba// thams cad dag pa yin par brjod// hUM sdud 'phro 'du'i gzhal yas khang// gru chad sogs pa mtshan mar
bsgom// dkyil 'khor thog rims 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bzhi shar lho nub byang rnams// dkar ser dmar ljang go rims bzhin// ru tra brgya byin gshin rje dang// chu lha gnod sbyin rgyal chen bzhi// dbus nas

byang du byi chings bsam// nyi dkyil ye shes chos nyid ni// hUM bsgril lnga yi kha dog bzhin// sngon gyi smon lam rkyen gyis langs// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las// de las rang sgra byung ba ni// oM karma shrI he ru

ka/ karma kI li ki ya mahA caN+Da sarba duSh+taM/ ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ka raM kro d+hi shwa ri hUM/ zhes brjod pa/ kar ma he ru ka ni yab yum dmigs// sku mdog ljang khu dkar dang dmar// zhabs bgrad spyan
dgu sdang mig 'gyur// g.yas phyag dang po 'khor lo ni// nam mkhar 'phyar zhing gdeng ba dang// tri shul dgra sta g.yas gnyis la// rgya gram thugs lar bstan pa dang// ban+d+ha dmar bkang phur pa

'gril// g.yon gyi phyag ni rim pa bzhin// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gyad dor thabs/ rnam thar ye shes tshad med rnams// me long lta bur dag pa'o// oM trai lo kya bi dza badzra mahA krod+ha hUM phaT/ kro

d+hishwa ri hUM/ zhes brjod/ shar du hU~M bsgril ma las bskyed/ khra bo rna rgya yab yum ni/ zhal gsum dkar dang sngo dmar po/ oM ya man+ta ka badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M/ mnyam nyid ye shes chen po'i

rtags// lho ru hUM bsgril las bskyed pa// gshin rje gshed po yab yum ni// sngo nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// oM h+ya gri ba badzra mahA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ kro d+hi shwa ri hUM/ so sor kun rtogs ye shes rtags/ nub

phyogs hUM bsgril las bzhengs pa// khro rgyal rta mgrin yab yum ni// dmar po dkar sngo rta yi dbu// oM mahA ba la badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ kro d+hi shwa ri hUM/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtags// byang gi hUM bsgril las 'thon

pa// khro bo stobs chen yab yum ni// ljang khu dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// ban+d+ha dmar bkang thod dbyug dang// rdo rje dbyug pa rgya gram rtse// bzhi po g.yas kyi dang po ste// nyon mongs phung po lha 'chi

bdag/ bdud bzhi 'joms phyir go rims bzhin// glang chen zhing lpags stag dang sbrul// thod pa zhag dang khrag thal bas// gcer bu'i dbu la brgyan pa yi// g.yon pa'i phyag gis rang rig 'khyud// tri shu dgra
sta bar bar ste// thabs dang shes rab mtha' phur 'dril// dmo 'og zer 'og 'jigs pa'i 'og/ sha ba 'ug pa 'gying ba'i 'og/ byi la pu shud mdzes pas mgyogs// dred dang byi ba rtsal 'og mang// kun kyang
mi lus gong ma'i 'og/ gtso 'dra rang gi 'og 'dra'o// g.yas pa'i phyag gis lcags kyu 'dzin// g.yon pa'i phyag ni phur pa 'dril// zhabs ni rgyug pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rtsibs mchan bzhi po dag la

yang// gtor ma rag ta bdud rtsi dang// sha chen mang po dum bur gtor/ khyad par dgra bgegs skyo ba btang// a hUM oM las grub pa ni// thod pa mi 'chi dpa' bo lnga// phur pa bzhi yang dmigs pa yin// yaM

raM oM AHhUM 'bru yi// rlung mes sbyar 'bar rtogs pa las// byang chub sems bzhi dmigs pa yin// dza hUM baM ho tshad med bzhi// sgo ma bzhi yi ngo bor bskyed// hUM las 'od 'phros spyan drangs nas// mdun du byon
nas gcig 'dres la// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yis// phyi yi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// dug gsum bkug ste mchod 'bul te// sgo ma bzhi yis mchod par bya'o// de dngos kyis ni rab bstod de// bskal

pa me ltar 'bar sogs pa'o// de nas 'phrin las rab bcol te// rang 'dod las la bsgo bar bya// thugs ka'i hUM dza 'phros// lcags kyu thogs pa lha drang spro// phyogs bzhi lha ni phyogs mthun bsgo// dbus kyi
lha tshogs lho sgo nas// spyan drangs rang rang mdun du dmigs// rang rang gi ni phyogs kyi yang// bdud rtsi mchod pa'i rjes su ni// rang rang hUM zhags thogs nas// grangs dang mnyam par rang la

bstim// hUM las baM 'phros lcags sgrog can// grangs mnyam zhabs dang bcing bar bya// hUM las ho 'phros dril bu can// grangs mnyam rang rang dgyes pa bskyed// yab yum sbyor mdzad byang chub sems// 'dres
par gyur las hUM phyung ste// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ zhes brjod sras mchog dag gyur pa// dbu skyes kham nag zur gsum gyen// ka ba la dang ltos 'gros bcings// lte ba yan chad mthing nag ste// chos

brgyad spyan gsum ldan pa la// lte ba man chad lcags phur ni// zur gsum g.yas kyi dang po ni// sta re gyen bstan bsdeg pa dang// rdo rje rab gnon thabs ni mkha'// g.yon gyi phyag na go rims bzhin// kha

T+wAM 'khor rdung phur pa 'dril// khro rgyal 'dus pa thams cad pas// mthu chen gru gsum la bzhugs bsam// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga stengs su// rigs lnga so so'i yig 'bru phyung// oM AHhUM traM phaT/ gnas lnga'i

kha dog so sor dgod// sku gsung thugs su dag nas spros// zla pad nyi ma'i dkyil stengs su// oM hri phaT/ phaT phaT phaT hUM hUM hUM/ lan gsum byas pas gsum dag rtse// gcig par byin gyis brlab pa'o// sku

ltas ting 'dzin gsal ba dang// rigs lnga'i khro bo 'khor bcas las// ting 'dzin rgyu las 'phros gsal ba// rang rang 'dra ba'i so sor 'phros// ye shes lnga yi bcud bsdus te// nyon mongs lnga po rab bcom

nas// gnas lngar bsgral ba'i tshul byas nas// zhal nas phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing// slar 'dus hUM gi sgra brjod nas// dbang byin so sor 'dus pas thob// de ltar dbang thob byin brlabs stobs// 'gro ba'i
don du rab gshegs nas// phyogs bcur bde gshegs thams cad kyang// byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad spyod dus// stong grogs mdzad par zhal bzhes pa// 'di yi stong grogs mdzad du gsol// til 'bru

tsam 'dus bde gshegs 'dus// lag pa nyi zla thabs shes rab// sen mo lnga la lnga lnga gnyis// hUM a chos sku mtha' thabs shes// gung mo sdig pa mthe 'ong dang// tha ltag dang yang tha chung la// oM AHhUM hri ha

las byung// 'bru lnga lnga gnyis sa bon te// sbyar sngags skur bskyed mnyam par bzhugs// thal sbyar su ra ta s+t+waM pa yis// ser po dkar po mthing ka dang// dmar po ljang khu zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis 'khor

lo rdo rje dang// rin chen pad+ma ral gri dang// dril bu g.yon na 'dzin par byed// 'dod chags bskyed sbyor thal mnyam sbyar// oM badzra a dza li hUM/ sor mo cung zad bsnol ba ni// phrad pa'i bde ba yang dag
'byung// oM dzra ban d+ha hUM/ rgyab tu bsnol de bsdams pa yis// yab yum bcu po 'od du zhu// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ phur blangs chang ba'i nang bcug nas// lag mthil phye la mthe bong gnyis// srin lag
mthe chung bar du gzhug/ mthe bong cung zad bsgul zhing drud// oM badzra A be sha a a a/ phyogs bcu dus gsum bde gshegs kyi// yab yum sras dang bcas pa kun// zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku// yungs

'bru'i tshad tsam bar mtshams med// grangs med dag ni bsdu zhing thim// sor mo rgyab bsnol gung mo gnyis// bsgreng ba'i bar du phur pa bzung// oM badzra sa twa rA dza hUM/ thugs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yi// byang
chub sems mchog phaT la bsdu// sor mo pug pug bar byas te// lag pa'i rting pas phur pa bzung// oM hri phur bu phaT/ gsung gi bdag nyid snyoms zhugs pas// byang chub sems mchog hri la bsdu// sor mo
rgyab bsnol mthe bong gshibs// chang par phur pa rab bcug nas// oM ha na ha na tib ta tsakra hUM phaT/ sku yi bdag nyid chen po kun// snyoms 'jug byas pa'i byang chub sems// oM la 'du zhing bstim pa
ste// bcu gcig gnas las khro chung ni// stong khams gang bar me tog 'phro// dmigs pa thams cad nges 'grub pa'i// dbang byin chen po ldan par 'gyur// e yi gdan la bzhugs gsol nas// lag g.yas
nyi ma'i dkyil stengs su// hUM las khro bcur gyur pa bstim// gu gul sbyar ba'i dud pa yis// bdugs te me dpung nag por gyur// phyi nang mchod pa ci 'byor dbul// bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dbul bar bya// yid
la brnag pa'i 'phrin las bcol// bzlas brjod 'khor lo nag po ni// phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa dang// bzlas brjod 'phro 'dus bsgral zhing bsnyen// dkyil 'khor lus bsdu dngos grub don// tsit+ta rin
chen gzhal yas khang// ye shes sems snying rin po che// zur brgyad lte bar nyi zla ni/ kha sbyar gnas dkyil hUM mthing kha// sngags brjod bug nas dbugs 'od steng// spyi gtsug srog rtsa'i nang du

byung// pad thugs srog rtsa yang dbugs bkag/ ra dbus phyung ste du ma las// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo zhig mA ra ya phaT/ phur pa'i khro bo phyogs bcur spros// don byas slar 'dus bsgral nas su// phur

pa dag la thim pas 'grub// skyo bar gyur na rab bsdus te// sgo ma khra thabs pho mo la// de yang khro bo khro mo la// de yang yab yum gnyis med thim// yab kyi spyad pa thams cad bya'o// rdo rjes gong dang 'drar

bskyar ba// bcu bdun brtsams shing nyi shu dgu'i bar du rab tu bya'o//// sbyor ka'i 'khor lo nag po ni// rus pa rnams dang byang sems dang// khrag dang rkang dang nang khrol dang// bshang dang gci ba rnams

su// thal chen ske tshe lan tshwa khrag/ srub mo khre dang ju tse'i phub// bris nas snying khar glan pa ni// grog mkhar sa dang mgar dang bapa'i// bdud rtsi la spru bya ba'am// ri mo smug nas bris pa'ang

rung// shud pa la sogs nri rag+tas// hUM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o// mgo ni lho phyogs gshin rjer gtad// chos 'byung rtse mo gshin rje'i gnas// steng du gan rkyal gnas rnams

bsam// las byed lha 'dis bskyed pa yang// nyi shu'i gnas las mi 'gyur ba// tha dad phyung ste lho phyogs sgor// 'dus la kI la kI brjod pas// zhal gcig phyag bzhi phur zhabs kyis// nyams pa'i mgon byed

brdzis par bsgom// byin rlabs dbang bskur tshul bzhin bya// dgug pa 'khor lo nag po ni// rang gi snying kha'i hUM nyid las// Tak+ki rA dza zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis tho ba lcags kyu thogs// mdun na bka'

sdod la bsgom pa// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gri h+na grih+na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ grih+na pa ya grih+na pa ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn bid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces brjod khros tshul nas phyin pas// shangs
khung nang rlung byung 'og zla gam// spyan nas me ni gru gsum la// sha drung de na gnas par bsam// lcags kyus snying bzung tho bas mos// 'og 'degs bkug nas khugs pa ni// ma gsal bar du yang yang
dmigs// cung zad byin chung ma khugs na// mngag gzhug bdag pos dgug pa'i phyir// so so'i sngags la dza brjod spro// karma he ru ka la sogs pa'i// so so'i thugs la sprul pa 'phro// dgra bgegs la ni

bskor te gnas// de rjes bskul bar bya ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i steng// mi bskyod dbyings las ma g.yos kyang/ khrag 'thung pa yi sku bzhengs pa// 'jigs byed tshogs la phyag 'tshal te// dgra
bgegs gnas nas dgug pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed chen po he ru ka/ ljang nag 'jigs byed chen po ni// khro gtum sems can btul ba bzhin// dam nyams dgra bgegs gnas nas drongs// rnam shes phung
po rdul du lhogs// gong ma'i tshig sbyar de rjes su// khro rgyal rnam gsum rnam rgyal dpal// dkar ba 'jigs byed chen po ni// nyams pa'i mgo gcod rab tu brtson// de yi thugs dam rgyud bskul ba// mi
gnas dbyings su rab sgrol mdzad// rdo rje gsod ma chen po ste// dgra bgegs spyi bo'i gtsug nas drongs// gzugs kyi phung po rdul du lhogs// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po ni// 'chi bdag tshogs la dbang

sgyur ba'i// mthing nag 'jigs byed chen po ste/ de yi thugs dam rgyud bskul ba// rdo rje gtum mo chen mo ste// btang snyoms mi bshol las la brtson// ngag gi gnas nas dgra bgegs drongs// 'du byed phung
bu rdul du lhogs/ khro rgyal stobs po che nyid ni// bla med gnas su stobs mdzad ma// ljang nag 'jigs pa gnod sbyin 'dul// de yi thugs dam rgyud bskul ba/ rdo rje skul byed chen po

ste// dbyings kyi don ni ye shes bskul// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// yan lag gnas nas sdus la shog/ 'du shes phung po rdul du lhogs// de yi bka' nyan gsung stod pa// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlab
las// mos byed chen mo'i ting 'dzin ldan// dom gyi mgo can dus la bab// g.yo med ting 'dzin nus ldan pa// sha ba'i mgo can dus la bab// mkhas brtson ting 'dzin nus ldan pa// byi la'i mgo can dus
la bab// stobs ldan ting 'dzing nus ldan pa// dred kyi mgo can dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod pa// mgyogs ma yang rtsal ldan pa mo/ sre mo'i mgo can dus la bab// mun mthong dbu ma nus ldan
pa// 'ug pa'i mgo can dus la bab// 'od byed chen mo gsal bkra ldan// pu shud mgo can dus la bab// 'phra men sku mkhan sgo mangs la// byi ba'i mgo can dus la bab// lcags kyus snying nas rab tu
drongs// zhags pas yan lag rab tu chings// lcags sgrog dbang po bsdams nas kyang// dril bus ma 'khrugs dga' bar gyis// ma mo brgyad kyi dus la bab// sing ha brgyad kyi dus la bab// shwa na mu kha'i
dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// so so'i gnas nas drangs nas kyang// gzugs la gnyis su med par bstim// cung

zad byin chung ma khugs na// phyag rgya bzhi yis dgug pa'i phyir// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'am// rang gi snying kar zla dkyil 'khor// dz+dza brtsegs dmar po gcig bzhag la// dza hUM baM ho che ge mo badzra aM ku

sha che ge mo zhig hUM dz+dza/ lha mo dmar mo lcags kyu can// grangs med brgyud dmar byung nas kyang// snying nas bzung ste der 'ongs pas// dza hUM baM ho/ che ge mo zhig pra be sha hUM/ ting 'dzin gsal bar brjod nas

kyang// gzugs su ri mo la bab ste// dza hUM baM ho brjod nas kyang// lcags kyu zhags pas lcags sgrog dang dang// dril bu'i phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// hUM 'byung yig bsams de nyid bsgyur// bcing dang bsdam

dang de yi sems// ma 'khrugs dga' ba bya ba'i phyir// yang dang yang du gsal bar bya'o// gdug pa'i 'khor lo nag po ni// dgra bo lha lnga dbye ba'i phyir// gu gul sbyar mas bdug pa dang// bud med zhabs ma

la sogs pas// de la yang yang bdug ba'o// brdeg pa'i 'khor lo nag po ni// brdeg pa'i dang po gsal gsum ldan bya'i phyir// de nas phur pa rab blangs te// las kyi lha yi snying po la// rdo rje rder mo btab
ste brjod// lha dang sras mchog gnas bdun ni// dbye bas gsal bar gsum ldan bya// thal mo sbyar thabs rab gsol te// ting 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs par// yang rig sngags bzlas
bslang bar bsgom// ting 'dzin gsal bar zhugs pa dang// ling ga snying gi steng dag tu// rtse mo nas gang ma reg gzas// khro bo'i ske na lag g.yon bzung// lag g.yas rdo rje tho ba'am// sta re pags pas

brdeg cing sngags// rdo rje sder mo brjod cing gdab// na ma sa ma na ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha/ g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+ta che ge mo zhig phaT phaT/ kI li kI la sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/

badzra d+ha rod Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces drag tu brjod do// gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ ji tsam gsal gsal rab tu bzlas// shes pa kun gyi rten yin phyir// dang

por snying la rab tu gdab// dpral ba che yi gnas rten dang// srog rtsa'i las gyes dpung mgo gnyis// 'og gi srog rtsa las gyes pa// brla yi nang rol gnyis na gnas// de kun 'dus pa'i gyes pa ni// lte ba

la yang rab tu gnas// rtsa la srog ni rab brten cing// de kun gcad phyir sdong po ni// srog rtsa bye brag dag la dbab// nges pa'i lung bzhi'i gong ltar gdab// mnan pa'i 'khor lo nag po ni// phur pa de

rnams btab nas kyang// lcags kyu zhags pas bkug bcings nas// lag gnyis sor mo bsnol ba la// mthe'u chung ngos sprad nas rkyang// drang por bsrang ste de sngags la// oM badzra karma kro d+ha hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu bzlas// bdun phogs g.yas phyogs phogs gsum btub// rtsal phrogs sku gsung thugs mnan phyir// g.yas mtha' rdo rje ri rab kyis// de steng du gnas pa brjid// phur pa mi
'byung mi phyin phyir// lhag par zung cig thal phyin bsam// bskyar ba'i 'khor lo nag po ni// sras mchog nyid kyi sprul pas bya// de nas dam tshig phyag rgyas bstan// sor rnams rgyab bsnol bcangs pa

las// gung mo gnyis sbyar rtse rnon byas// phur bu'i klad du gnan byas te// phur pa'i lha dang bgegs khyod kyang// dam tshig las ni ma 'da' zhig/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ rang snying thugs ka'i rdo rje yi// hUM

las 'phros te thugs nyid hUM// dkar po'i 'od zer brgyud mnyes tshim// bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam// sor mo nang bsnol mthe bong dang// mthe'u chung ngos sbyar sgreng ba la// sor mo phyir bkyed phur

stengs mnan// oM badzra krod+ha ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ rba na rba na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// dbu brgyan khro rgyal dang bcas kyis// 'debs pa'i dbang bsdus
bka' nan te// bgegs dbang bsdus te rims nyan bsam// yungs kar rgyal pos rab brdegs te// lag mthil nyi ma'i steng du hUM// khro bo rgyal po bzlas pa yis// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar
'khrug/ phur pa thim pas gzi byin ldan// bgegs la brgyab pas btul bar bsam// gu gul sbyar mas bdugs pa yis// phur pa dbal bskyed bgegs subs dang// dgra bo'i lha lnga dbye bar
bsam// lag gnyis rgyab sbyar mthe'u chung gnyis// gcig la gcig 'khyud mdzub mo yang// kha 'gram g.yas g.yon yid dgur bsgreng// lha rnams nang bcangs mdzub mo gnyis// mche bar bsams te las

kyi lhas// mche ba las ==ki9:lapakyang khro tshogs g.yos// bza' zhing g.yon brkyang snying mnan mos// badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha kha kha ha ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bsnol// mthe bong
g.yas pa g.yon steng bzhag/ mjub gnyis ngos sbyar bsgreng nas brdeg/ sdang mig bgrad pa'i nang byung ba'i// khro bo khro mo du ma ni// lag pa mdung rtse rnon po yis// gnad pa'i gnas su phug bsams

te// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad rim gsal rim bsgom// oM badzra krod+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ tsit+ta laM bo da ra u tsus sma krod+ha hUM phaT/ yungs kar brdeg cing gu gul
bdug/ gong dang 'dra phyir 'dir ma bshad// las 'di bstan zhing grub par ni// sras mchog de la bcol bar bya// mnan pa'i 'khor lo nag po ni// nges pa'i don du bshad phyir ro// cung zad byin chung mi
dga' na// rdo rjes brjid cing mnan pa yis// bsam gtan dag gis mnan pa'i phyir// dza hUM gong gi 'phro 'du yis// lcags kyus mgrin bkug zhags pas bcing// sras mchog spyi bo bsdus pa'i steng// hUM

mthing nag las rdo rje ni// rgya gram me lce'i 'phreng bskor dkyil// su ni gser btso'o kha dog 'dra// oM badzra sU me raM hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod gser gyi ri rab ni// pad+ma bye ba gru bzhi pa// de stengs bruM
las gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dkyil stengs su// bsgrib ma las ni bcom ldan 'das// don yod grub pa ljang khu ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ khro bo yab yum khra thabs
brgyad// sgo ma bzhi 'khor bcas pa bsgom// spyan drangs byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// mchod bstod bzlas brjod tshul bzhin bya// 'od zer 'phro du ri rab brjid// ri rab kyis kyang 'khor lo

mnan// 'khor lo 'khor bas rgya gram yang// brjid pas hUM 'phros hUMM rdo rjes/ khro bos gzir cing mi g.yo bar// bskal ba'i mtha' ru mnan pa dang// hUM las sras mchog 'phro 'du yis// gza' ba bsgral zhing
nan par bsam// 'phrin las de bzhin bcol ba'i phyir// tshig dang dbyangs kyis bskul ba ni// khro bos mi btang gzir ba'i phyir// rgya gram rdo rje gzir bar mdzod// 'khor los rdo rje gzir

bar mdzod// 'khor los rdo rje gzir ba dang// ri rab kyis kyang 'khor lo yi// byin bskyed don du gzi ldan mdzod// ri rab gzi byin ldan pa'i phyir// khro rgyal tshogs kyis mnan par mdzod// nyin zhag gcig

ni de la bsgom// gal te des kyang ma grub na// bstan pa'i 'khor lo nag po ni// dug gtor nag po cha gcig la// hUM nag gzi byin ldan pa yis// 'phro 'du dug gi rlangs pa dang// mtshon cha'i char du gyur pa

yin// nag po nag mo drag mo ni// dug gis phyag tshang yin pa'i phyir// de yi bsgom pa 'di ltar bya// nag po chen po ral pa can// gseb nas dug sbrul mgo gsum pas// kha nas dug skyug spyi gtsug nas// rtsa
'gram thams cad 'gengs par byed// dpral nas dug mig lhang tser nas/ khro rgyal dug gis dud 'dra bas// mig nas zhugs te lus kun brlag/ rna ba dug gi sgra sgrogs pas// sna ni dug gi dud pa dang/

kha nas dug gi ma chu dang// snying ni dug gi 'phro 'du can// shangs ni dug gi dud pa dang/ 'joms pa dug gi chu rgyun dag/ ldan pa'i du ma byung ba yi// bug dgur zhugs pas las byas te// gdon ni de la blud

pa'i phyir// oM badzra kro d+ha ha la ha la hUM phaT/ stong phrag gcig tu nges par bzlas// mahA de ba dbang bsdus pas// phyag tshang yin par bshad// dpal ldan re tri dbang bsdus phyir// nag mo skra gcig mig gcig

las// bug dgu mtshon cha spros pa'o// bgegs kyi tshogs la brgyab par dmigs// oM badzra kro d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ stong phrag gcig ni nye bar bzlas// ya stabs 'khor lo nag po ni/ bsgrub pa'i gtor ma
nag po de// dbul phyir 'di ltar bsgom par bya// ye shes lha dang 'jig rten pa// he ru yab yum khro bo la// yab yum khra thabs yab dang yum// sgo ma bzhir dmigs ma mo dang// sing ha gnod sbyin srin mo

dmigs// hUM las 'od 'phros spyan drangs phyir// dza hUM baM ho e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ bid da ya sha dza b+h+yo b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM/ lan bdun brjod par spyan drang ngo// thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros te// sku gsung thugs
kyis byin gyis brlab// 'od zer 'phro 'dus dbang bskur rjes// gtor ma la hUM 'phros pa las// 'od zer 'dod yon lnga ru dmigs// mchod par dmigs te sngags 'di brjod// oM pra ti dza/ lan bdun

gtor ma dbul ba'o// bdud rtsi de la dbul ba ni// rigs mthun rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+ma ral gri lce de yis// bdud rtsi la ni gsol bar dmigs// oM sa ma ya a mr-i ta a mr-i ta pra ti dza hUM swAhA/ lan
bdun bzlas te a mr-i ta// phul nas ci 'dod las bcol ba// zhi rgyas dbang drag las rnams kyang// ci dga' bzhin du byed par dmigs// khyad par drag po nyid byed dmigs// rjes bstab
'khor lo nag po ni// gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams// phyag na rdo rje rgyal dmigs te// 'od 'phros spyan drang dmigs pa ni// mgon byed bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// dam tshig can 'khor dang bcas pa

dang// 'jig rten nang na mthu che ba// kun tu rab tu spyan drangs te// hUM las 'od 'phros thams cad kyang// 'od du zhu ste chos sku yin// dag pa'i las su bskyed pa la// gtor ma 'od zhu 'od zer las// 'dod
yon gyur pa dbul bar dmigs// sras mchog thugs ka'i hUM las kyang// bdud rtsir gyur pas snod bkang ste// phul ba'i dus su las bcol bas// gsod pa'i las la brtson par dmigs// gshegs
gsol ting 'dzin bsdu ba ni// rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo nag po ni// bcud du gyur pa'i man ngag ste// rab kyi 'bring la bstan par byu'o// rab mtha' man chad bstan mi
bya// bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo nag po'o// rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya pa ra gu h+ya e ka tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du// rdo rje phur pa phur gcig ma don gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gi thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min na sras mchog dang// ma mo dang/ ging las byed dang bcas pa rnams bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje 'dus pa rang gi stan las langs te/ ye shes kyi phur pa
gtso bo'i thugs khar gtad de dril nas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma gsang bdag bcom ldan 'das// phur gcig zab mo'i don ldan pa// phyi rabs pa la sman slad du// dpa' bo chen pos bshad
pa'i rigs// zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te dbyer med par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka'i 'od

zer gyis 'khor thams cad la khyab ste snod dang ldan par byas nas/ sems can thams cad bde ba la bkod do/ rdo rje phur pa phur gcig ma don gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang
po'o//// de nas khros pa'i rgyal po yis// gsang ba'i don dag bka' stsal pa// bsnyen phur gyis ni las kun byed// dkyil 'khor byi dor legs byas la// mchod rdzas la sogs bsags par bya'o// lta ba
rdo rje dbyer med shes// khros pas khro bcu'i zhe sdang gcod// ye shes mtshon chen hUM sngon las// 'od 'bar yo byad byin gyi brlabs// de bzhin nam mkha'i dkyil nyid nas/ khyab pa'i snying rjes
mtshams sbyar nas// thigs pa lta bur hUM shor ro// snying gi gor skyed hUM las ni// dbang chen gzhal yas gdan bcas bsgom// gdan thog hUM las 'od 'phros te// snying rjes sems can kun bsgral

nas// 'phags mchod sngags mchod sngags kyi skur bskyed pa// tha mal lta bu ma yin te// rang gi phur pa rdo rje'i sku// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rdo rje rtse lnga rtse dgu dang// me dpung kha T+wAM phur

pa 'dril// rgyan rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// sku smad phur pa zur gsum gyis// dregs pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// rnam shes rten ma snying dkyil du// ye shes sems thugs nyi rdo rje// de la sngags kyis bskor

bar bsgom// stong pa'i dam tshig chen po ste// g.yon du yum ni bsgom par bya'o// de nas yum gyi brda bskal te// rdo rje'i gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i

lha// ye shes khro bo grub mdzod cig/ ces pas gsang ba'i sbyor mtshams nas// yig 'bru lnga las sngags kyis bskul// sras mchog lnga po bsgom bya ba// mthing nag gcer bu phur pa 'dril// sku smad phur pa sha

stag la// sgro dang gtso bo dag la thim// de nas dpal gyi thugs ka nas// d+ha ha ma tri k+Sha las ni// ma khyams phyogs bzhir bse mo bzhi// ya phyin zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// mthing nag 'brug zhon rgyun gyis
brgyan// de phyin ser mo chu srin zhon// zhags pa phur pa thogs pa'o// bse phyin dmar mo glog la chibs// lcags sgrog phur pa thogs pa'o// phag phyin ljang nag ru sbal zhon// dril bu phur pa thogs

pa'o// mkhyams stod bzhir bdag nyid bzhi// ri ti nag mo dre rta zhon// khram shing phur pa thogs pa'o// re 'du ljang nag rnga mong zhon// mtshon gyi gru bu phur pa thogs// ma khyams smad bzhi sho na bzhi// shwa na

mthing ka lcags spyang zhon// tho dbyug phur pa thogs pa'o// kri ta ser mo 'phar ba zhon// lcags kyu phur pa thogs pa'o// sri la dmar mo wa la zhon// rdo rje phur pa thogs pa'o// ku ku ljang nag khyi la zhon// zhing

chung phur pa thogs pa'o// mkhyams mtha' bzhir ming po dang// shan pa pho mo bskyed pa ni// shel skyes dkar po seng ge zhon// bse skyes dmar mo stag la zhon// bse yi za gri phur pa thogs// shan pa dkar

dmar mche ba can// gri khug phur pa thogs pa'o// mo ni sngo dmar gcer bu ste// gri khug phur pa thogs pa ste// stag dang spyang khu'u+i mgo can no// zor la de ltar skyed dus su// ming sring drug dang shan pa'o// de
rnams ngang nyid chos dbyings las// sangs rgyas kun mthun ye shes sku// gong gi khro bo mi bzad pa// chos sku dbyig gi rgyas gdab bo// rdo rje phur pa phur gcig ma don gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ting

nge 'dzin kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// dpa' bos sngags rnams bka' stsal pa// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+hAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ d+ha hi ma ma

shi krang karma ma ka ra ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya/ ha sa ya ra ha daM na ya/ bi da ya bi da ya/ shi krin a na ya/ dz+wa lA pa ya dz+wa la pa ya/ A be sha ya a be sha ya/ ta thA ya ta thA ya/ ma ra sa na pra marta na ya hUM phaT/ 'phreng

ba'i sngags so// oM badzra krod+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ ga rdza ga rdza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ni la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa phaT/ oM badzra

#kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa le hUM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha ha ya gri ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra tsit+ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha

trai lokya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ bgegs tshar bcad pa'o// hUM pa ra bi tan hUM phaT/ bin da bin da hUM phaT/ grih+na grih+na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ sras

mchog gi rim pa'o// ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang ka te ya/ dza ye bi dza ye ya/ a tsi te ya/ a pa ra tsi te ya/ ma ma pa shi ku ru/ ma tang nya ka ra i nan ta ki// ma

ma karma d+ha ti mA ma/ shi krang karma ka ra re ya/ dam can gyi sngags zor dang thun la bzlas so// oM laM hUM laM// dza hUM baM ho staM pa nan/ mnan pa'o// oM badzra yag sha krod+ha bi da ya/ khA hi khA hi/ sbyin sreg gi'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas rab tu grags pa'i 'od 'phros te/ gdug pa pho mo'i srog nas bkug ste mdun na bi bka' stsol ces 'dor ro// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phyi rabs pa ni bskyang bar

byos// bse bdug pho mos sngags bzhin smras// oM du du trag rag sha sha la kyi la khyang rol mug ti snying kha rag ma hA de ba tsit+ta dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM su kri ba ra ya ba ra tsit+ta ya/ yo gi shwa ra ya/ ya ma tsit+ta ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/

de ni bdag gi srog lags so// oM baM hraM ha che ge staM b+ha raM sruM hra hUM badzra ha na ha na che ge a bi tsa ra hUM phaT/ des ni bdag gis dgra bo 'gug par byed do// ma ma dun b+h+yo che ge nri b-i rol gzer mu tri ma he da nag

mo thuM ri li li/ snying 'byin trig don phyung/ ni sha'u ru kha so ba ti yam/ sen man sen yaM/ dgra bo pra be sha ya/ du tri yaM/ snying rtse chod srog srig phrig shaM khyer b+h+yo/ khu le za khung za snying la rbud/ lce dang ma sod lce dur

ma sod// des ni bdag gis gzas pa brdeg par byed do// de nas shan pa pho mos smras/ b+h+yo badzra shwa na mu kha aM ku sha dza/ shal kyi khye breng thal shaM shaM ya ma ga ri la snying la ya snying gong chod tsit+ta

rbad thu ba ril khA hi/ oM de i a dmar du tse ni/ ra ya dza rbad si di sa ma ya thibs dza/ de ni bdag cag gi srog/ mkha' la yi zan yugs mi 'bar ti rbad/ thum ril ya shal kyi spyang kang ka sha la ya 'du srugs

shig/ snying la ya rbad pu rbad pu rtsa rgyud drungs nas phyung cig ni mA ra ya dza dza/ dza du srog la myos myos dmar du ce srog la myos myos/ ma ra ya sod 'du 'du/ de ni bdag cag gi brnag pa rdeg par

byed pa'o// dpa' bos drag sngags bka' stsal pa// trag rag sha snying la trag sha/ tsit+ta srog tung hu/ srog la 'du 'du/ thu liM sa du du/ srog brig srig/ sha khrer ma ma ni'i srog la dza la rag ra ya hUM phaT/ dar pa wa

yi thod pa ru// bla rdo bcug la gdug pa bod// drod la phebs na spyang thod du// ling ga bcug la bla tshe dgug/ rtags byung nas gsad par bya// gnad ma shes na rang la ldog/ rdo rje phur pa phur gcig ma don
gsang ba'i rgyus las/ sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// dbang bskur byin brlabs bstan pa ni// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// thugs kha'i 'od zer 'phros pa yis// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul
btul// mi 'dul drag po rdzogs pas btul// thams cad 'dus te dbang bskur zhing// de las 'phros pas bsnyen phur brgyab// de nas spyan drang mchod pa ni// srid pa phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang

dngos grub bslang ba'i phyir// thugs ka'i hUM las dza 'phros pas// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// bzhugs shing phyag kyang btsal bar bya// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang// mtshon pa rnam gsum sngags
kyi dbul// dgos pa rtags dang mtshan ma ston// kI la ya yi dngos grub ster// de rnams lha ru gsal byas la// phur pa sras su gsal ba ni// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po dus la
bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus bab// shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la

bab// gcig ni spyir btang gzhan dngos so// rdo rje phur pa phur gcig ma don gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur byin brlab dang phur pa sras su gsal ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// dpa' pos bsgral zhing mchod

pa gsungs// dur khrod ro tshas sbyang byas la// bris mkhan dam tshig yod pa yis// dpal gyi sku bris me ri yi// phyi rol twa ra Na dag dang// rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// rab gnas byas la dngos grub
rten// 'brub khung nang du ling kha gzhug/ dgug gzhug byas la gzas par gsal// rgyud lnga'i shes pa bkug la bstim// bdud rtsi dag la brten la mchod// dam tshin chen po'i dus la
bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab/ khyed kyi 'phrin las dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la
bab// mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang
bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas/ mngon spyod tshul du bsgral ba dang// lus ngag

rdul du bshig nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM laM hUM laM staM pa nan/ mo ha ga/ b+ha ga wan/ shi kri bi kri badzra hU~M ka ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI li/ kI la ya kI la ya/ dza hUM baM ho/ sarba

big+ha nan/ badzra kI la ya hUM phaT phaT/ badzra hUM ka ra hUM phaT/ badzra hUM ka ra hUM a/ gzas pa'i tsit+ta'i dkyil nyid na/ khrag gi sbal pa nri trir bcas// btab pas sems bsten dag par byas// phul bas lha yi
'jig rten bsgral// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig chings shig rnam par sdoms// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la

smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar bgyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// hUM pa ra bid tan/ ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM

phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thAya hUM phaT/ ha sa ra na ha ta na hUM phaT/ shi krin a na ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bi da ya bi da ya hUM

phaT/ lus rten lte ba bsdom brdzis 'dra// btab pas lus kyi sgrib pa dag/ phul bas byol song 'jig rten stongs// bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam

bcas pa'i// mngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang ka te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a tsi te/

a ra pA rA tsi ti/ ma ra sa na/ pra marta nri ye hUM phaT/ ngag rten mgrin pa pad+ma 'dra// btab pas ngag gi sgrib pa dag/ phul pas yi dwags 'jig rten bsgral// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig
'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// hUM ma ma bi sham ku ru/ ma tang nya ka ra

i nan/ 'da' ti ma karma shi krang kar kang kar nye ya/ tshe rten dpral ba zla tshes 'dra// btab pas tshe yi rgyud skad chad// phul bas mi yi 'jig rten bsgral// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha'am 'on te

bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med pa ru byos// sarba a na ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ta hUM phaT/ mthu rten rkang mthil 'khor lo 'dra// btab pas mthu dang rdzu 'phrul
dag/ phul bas dmyal ba'i 'jig rten bsgral// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlog/ khro mo

'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o// kha thaM kha thaM kha thaM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra yag sha kro d+ha khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/
mkha' gsang lha yi rang bzhin du// phung po gdos bcas dag byas la// drug gi ling ro thod par blug/ rdo rje gnod sbyin sngags kyis btab// ha ha sa zhal dbye ru gsol// sangs rgyas mnyes shing smon lam

gdab// de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// de nas zor thun las la sbyar// tha ma rgyun gyi spyod lam bya// gang la bya ba brdeg bar nus// rdo rje phur pa phur gcig ma don gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gzas pa gsal ba
dang mchod cing bsgral ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// dpa' bos gtad pa bka' stsal pa// zab mo don gyi snying po 'di// dgos 'dod kun 'byung rin chen 'dra// gtad do gtad do ma nub par// dam par gzung
la rab tu chongs// de nas 'khor 'dus pa thams cad yi rangs te/ rnal 'byor gyi gral du 'khod do// rdo rje phur pa phur gcig ma don gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// phur gcig ma don gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ ma ma karma tan tra lo ka u pa de nA ma/ bod skad du/ ma mo las thams cad srid pa'i rgyud lung
zhes bya ba/ yum chen mo mu kha le la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum chen mo kha le/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang thugs kyi

byin rlabs las byung ba'i rdo rje dang b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yab mngon rdzogs lha'i yul gzhan pa'i 'khor thams cad dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ ma mo dang gnod sbyin mo dang/ srin mo dang/ lha mo la
sogs pa'i skye gnas mo yi bsdus pa nyi tshes bskor zhing gnas par gyur te/ de nas yab mngon rdzogs lha yis yum chen mo mu kha le la gsol ba dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang// lha dang// de
bzhin lha mo dang/ srin mo srin po la sogs pa yab dang yum gyis 'dul ba las// ji ltar yab kyi 'dul ba yi/ 'jig rten chags 'jig ngas gsung na// ji ltar yum gyis 'dul ba yi// 'jig rten chags
'jig khyod kyis gsungs// khe le yum gyis bka' stsal pa// gson cig mngon rdzogs rgyal po yab// shes rab nga yis bshad pa'i rgyud// mi 'jigs seng ge'i nga ro ste// ltas ngan wa sogs zil gyis
gnon// rang bzhin 'od gsal sgron ma ste// ma rig mun pa ngang gis sel// nad rnams sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// 'dod chags las log dug rnams sel// 'di nyid nga yis bshad kyis nyon// shes rab stong pa
nam mkha' 'dra// nam mkha' sems can kun 'dul bas// nga nyid 'jig rten chags pas bstan// bde chen nam mkha'i thig le 'dra// phra rab rdul ni srin dang 'dra// phra rab rdul ni mu kha le// sems can

rnams ni de ltar bstan// phra rab bdun la rdul phran gcig// de nyid dbyings kyi yum drung ste// rdul phran bdun la lcags rdul gcig// ye shes ma mo dang po la// lcags rdul bdun la chu rdul gcig// ye shes
ma mo 'og ma bdun// chu rdul bdun la bong rdul gcig// dang po sman mo bdun du 'dod// bong rdul bdun la lug rdul gcig// bdun pa gnyis pa yin par 'dod// lug rdul bdun la glang rdul
gcig// bdun pa gsum pa yin par nges// glang rdul bdun la me rdul gcig// bdun pa bzhi pa de bzhin nges// me rdul bdun la nyi rdul gcig// bdun pa lnga pa shes par bya// nyi rdul bdun la srom
gcig// sman mo drug pa yin// sro ma bdun la shig gcig ste// bdun pa'o bdun du shes par bya// shig gi bdun la nas gcig ste// nas kyi 'gyur las sor tshigs te// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi// bdun

brgyad pa'i ngo bor bstan// sor tshigs nyi shu rtsa gcig la// khru gang du ni gyur pa ste// mu kha le ni rang bzhin yin// khru bzhi la ni gzhu bdun te// dbyings kyi yum drug rang bzhin yin// gzhu lnga brgya rgyang grags
gcig// ye shes ma mo bcu bzhir gsungs rgyang grags brgya la de yi tshad// dpag tshad dag ru gyur pa ste// sman mo lnga bcu'i rang bzhin yis// de ltar phra rab rdul nas ni// ri rab dang ni gling bzhi

sogs// gzugs kyi dngos po de ltar 'phel// grib ma de las ldog pa'o// de ltar gling bzhi ri rab 'di// ma mo rab tu mkhas pas brtag// sgra yi mtha' ni ma yin te// ma ni skye med mu kha le// mo ni dbyings
kyi yum drug ste// bde chen g.yung drung thig ler 'khyil// ye shes ma mo bcu bzhi yin// rgyud dang 'jigarten tha snyad la// ka ba rtsig pa la sogs kun// sman mo rnams kyi rang bzhin te// 'di ni sgra

yi 'phel ba ste// 'grib ba de las zlog pa ste// ming dang sgra yi 'phel 'grib 'di// mkhas pas ma mo'i ngang du brtag// skad cig ma ni mu kha le// thang cig dbyings kyi yum drug ste// yud tsam ye shes ma mo
brgyad// thun ni ye shes ma mo gzhan// nyin zhag sman mo'i tshogs yin te// zla ba bcu gnyis mu kha le// lo gcig dbyings kyi yum drug ste// bar gyi g.yog mo brgyad brgya ni// ye shes ma mo bcu bzhir
'dod// ya thog ma thog ring thung gnyis// sman mo lnga bcu'i rang bzhin te// sred ltar bskal pa'o nyi shu brgyad// ma mo'i rang bzhin yin par bshad// de ltar gzugs dang ming dang rus// ma mo'i sku
gsung thugs su 'dod// de ltar gzugs ni phra rags dang// ma mo sku yi rang bzhin te// de ltar ma shes snying re rdze// de ltar ming gi bsdus rgyas kyang// ma mo'i gsung gi rang bzhin lags// de ltar ma

shes thang re chad// ma mo rten pa spre'u 'dra// dus kyi 'phel 'grib mnga' mo'i thugs// sems ni mi rtag thugs su bstan// de ltar ma shes gol sgrib che// ma mo smra ba kha re ngal// ma mo sgom pa snying re

nyams// ma mo sgrub thang re chad// rtag dang zer mo ji bzhin no// nam mkha' mtshan nyid de// de la dus bzhi'i ma mo rtsal// dgun gyi rgyal mor 'khyag 'bebs ma// 'byung ba rlung la mnga' mdzad ma// 'khyag pa

khrag khrol sbrul pa'i sku// dpyid kyi rgyal mo drod 'bebs ma// 'byung ba me la mdzad ma// zhun chu chal chol sprul pa'i sku// dbyar gyi rgyal mo skyed mdzad ma// 'byung ba chu la mnga' mdzad ma// dmu chu kham lcags
yal ga can// me tog sna tshogs sprul skur bstan// ston gyi rgyal mor bcud len ma// 'byung ba me la mnga' mdzad cing// lo thog 'bras bcud sbrul skur ston// sebs can rtag par 'dzin pa la// dus ni bzhi

yis ming rtag bstan// de ltar bstan kyang mi 'dul ba// sems can rmongs pa snying re rje// sdug bsngal spyod pa thang re chad// de ltar ston pa'i thabs chen ni// gzhan la med cing rang la med// theg chung

nyan thos la med cing// theg chung la med// rig pa 'dzin la 'di med phyir// de ltar sems can 'dul thabs dang// lta ba rmad du byung bas ni// 'di ni theg pa'i snying por gsungs// nga yi thugs rje sprul pa
dang// sems can las kyi dge sdig gis// srid pa'i 'di ltar chags pa yin// bshad kyi mngon rdzogs yab khyod nyin// de yang 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi// khams 'di kun rdzob mos pa sna tshogs pa'i// sems
can bsam pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi// khams ni sosor snang ba'o// de dag sems can rnams kyi bsod nams dang// sdig pa'i dbang gis so sor snang ba 'o// don dam bar sbags pa dang

gzhal bar ni 'jig rteg gyi khams yin te dpes ma gang du phug/ khru lnga'i tshad du'adod chags dang bral ba 'am/ byang chub sebs dpa' yang dag pa'i rigs 'dzin rnams kyi phug der/ de'i tshogs dang ye shes

kyi stobs kyi rang bzhin yang dag par 'gyur te// de'i bde tshan 'khor lo sgyur ba'i 'gyur bar bzhugs te// de la cung zad yang pa yang med la// de la cung zad dog pa yang med pa'i phyir ro// de ltar kun rdzob

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ don dam pa las shes par bya'o// de yang phyi rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji lta ba bzhin du// lus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'dra ste/ phyi rol 'jig rten khams kyi tshad de

'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don no// nang du lus kyi tshad ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs te/ ji ltar phyi ru 'jig rten pa yi tshad ma ri rab lhun po la dpag tshad 'bum mo// de bzhin du lus kyi

sgal tshigs la dpangs su khru gang ste/ de nas lus la khru'i tshad kyi bzhi'o// ri rab lhun po la dpag tshad 'bum tshad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams las dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhi/ gzhan du phyi ji lta ba bzhin nang ba
yin na mi mthun par 'gyur ro// de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad ni kun rdzob la ji lta ba bzhin no// bcos ldan 'das kyi bsreg pa dang bcas pa'i las la sogs pa'i dam bcas pa ni 'di la ma yin te/

gang du dam bcas pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi yul lo// gang du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi che dag yul gyi tshad brdzod pa las/ 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs smra ste/ rig byed grub pa'i mtha' bsam pas smra na/

tshangs pa gcig gi gnas la yang phar tshur dpag tshad byed po yod// ces gol bar smra ba dang/ nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ tshangs pa'i sgo lnga'i tshad de bzhin pa'i phyir gza'i rtsis

dang/ phung po'i 'khor lo ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad rab tu bzhag go/ de yang tshad 'di las sangs rgyas pa tshad gzhan mthong bas 'khrul par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug lhagag par gsungs po dang/ gang du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad 'bum bzhi tsam mo zer ba'i phyir bcos ldan 'das rdzun smra ba zhes pa dang// gang gis 'dod pa yin zhes
tshig de khams rnams kyis mi bsam ste/ sems can rnams kyis bsam pa'i dbang gis zhes bya'o// de bzhin du yang ngas gsungs pa// sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa// sna tshogs grub pa'i mtha' rig
pa// snatshogs lam ni mnyam gnon pa// mi shes rgyal khams rta rnams rang bzhin du grub pa'i mtha'// ji srid rigs pa ma bstan pa// de srid dbang du mi 'gyur te// kun mkhyen la yang khengs pa
rnams/ sems cad phan pa mi bden te/ bsod nams tshogs kyi rgyu can dang// gzhan la gnod pa'i bden pa ste// man ma sems la sogs ster ba'o// khyim na gnas pa'i ser sna can// yi dgas kyi ni rang

mthong ste// khams kyi rtse mo nag po ri// sa la srig pa byed pa rnams// bu btsas bzhin du snga ba yis// grub rnams kyi ni ri mthong na// rkang mgyogs dngos grub thob pa rnams// lha mo'i khang du rtseg mar
'gro// de nas 'jig rten gyi tshad la// sems can rnams kyi rang rang gi bag chags kyi dbang gis des gsungs pa so sor snang ste// la la rangs mngon par shes pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams la mthong

ba dang/ gzung ba nang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor dngos po'i tshad zin pa ma yin no// de ltar na mu kha le ngas ma mos 'dul ba'i sems can dang/ sgrub pa po smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ lus kyi
dkyil 'khor gyis tshad gsungs so// 'di la rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su ni/ sa dag chu dang me'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni/ 'og gi rlung gi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' na gnas so// de'i phyir rlung gi

mtha' nas lhun po'i bar na/ dmyal ba bdun dang brgyad pa rlung gi grong khyer zhes bya ste/ dmyal ba dang rlung gi grong khyer la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis yin no// rlug gi dkyil 'khor la stong phrag lnga bcud

yin no// der ma rung ba chen po'i rlung dang/ mun pa chen po dmyal ba chen po gnyis te/ de'i tshad ni steng dang/ 'og dang/ rgyar dpag tshad nyid shu rtsa lnga rnam par dbye bas sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad do// de ltar
me'i dkyil 'khor du dmyal ba gnyis te/ de yang me'i dmyal ba dang gcig// de'i steng du bzod par dka' ba chu'i dmyal ba dang gcig go// de bzhin du chu'i dkyil 'khor du dmyal ba gnyis te/ bye ma'i 'dam

dang/ bye ma'i 'dam gyi chur yang dag par ldan pa dang/ bye ma bye mar chur yang dag par ldan pa bgrang ba chen po'i/ sa'i dkyil du gseg ma'i chu'i dmyal ste/ dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// de'i steng du

rlung gi grong khyer steng dang 'og tu dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// de gnyis kyi tshad la gnyis te/ phyed ni lha ma yin gyi gnas so// phyed ni klu'i gnas so// phyi'i de ltar lus la rkang ba'i mthil nas skyed pa'i bar

du'o// khru do yin la/ de gnyis dbye bas la du dbye bas phye ste/ cha re re'i rigs pa ji lta bas dmyal ba dang klu'i grong khyer rig par bya'o// de nas ri rab lhun po'i bum gyi tshad ni/ de'i phyi rim sa'i dkyil
'khor nas lhun po'i steng dang 'og tu dpag tshad 'bum zhes bya'o// nang du yang lus khra gcig ste rkang ba nas rked pa'i bar du'o// de nyid gza'i tshogs rnams bskor bste// de'iphyir gza'i tshogs

rnams kyi gnas lhun po yis bskor ba las stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// skye nas dpral ba'i bar du sor bcu gnyis so// dpral ba nas spyi bor sor drug ste// ji ltar 'jig rten khams la 'bum phrag bzhi'i tshad

ni lus la khru bzhi ste// khru gang sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid do// de ni zheng gi tshad bshad de/ rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams la 'bum phrag bzhi ste/ rlung dang nam mkha'i mtha' ru shar dang nub kyi

mtha' rnams kyi bar du'o// de bzhin lho dang byang mtha'i bar du'o// zhes bya'o// de nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor ro// me'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chu'i dkyil 'khor ro// chu'i dkyil

'khor gyi dbus su sa'i dkyil 'khor te// de nyid bstan par 'dzin pa ste// steng de rnams su gling drug dang// ri drug dang// rgya mtsho drug dang chu'i dkyil 'khor bdun pas lhan cig pa'i rgya mtsho bdun

dang// 'dzam bu'i gling bdun pas lhan cig gi gling bdun/ rdo rdze'i ri yis lhan cig pa'i ri bzhin no// rdo rdze'i/ ban da ba a ni la dang// tsha'i rgya mtsho ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar 'og gi rgyar rnam par

dbye bas gnas so/ 'dzam bu gling chen po'i mtha' ni sa ste phyogs thams cad dang 'og gi rgya mtsho'i gnas so// tsha'i rgya mtsho nas rgya mtsho'i mthar ni 'bum phrag gnyis so// ri rab lhun po'i dbus nas g.yas
nas g.yon dang mtsho mthar 'bum phrag gnyis te/ yang g.yang su 'bum phrag gcig dang g.yon du 'bum phrag gcig go// de bzhin du shar dang// nub dang// me dang// bden bral dang/ dbang ldan no// me

dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis te/ de yang tsha rang chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas dang g.yon du me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor g.yas su 'bum phrag gcig dang g.yon du 'bum phrag

gcig go/ de ltar phyogs thams cad du'o// de ltar gyur pa'i dbus kyi ri rab lhun po ji lta bur 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ ri rab gang gi steng phung po'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu gnyis sgrol bar bcas pa/ mtha' yas

par sgrol ba/ dbang thang dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sgrol par bcas te/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo 'khor lo zhes bya'o// 'dir ji ltar tshog 'di rig pa yin/ ci'i phyir gzhan yang ri rab lhun po yod dam/ 'di'i

tshig gang zhig ces bya ba brdzod par bya ste/ mu stegs can dag man da ra yang ri rab kyi ming du smos te/ den na man d+ha ra las bye brag tu phye ba las tshig gong ma dang ni rigs so// drug gi cha la 'bum phrag gnyis
gnyis te/ de yang 'di ltar brdzod de/ 'og dang/ steng dang/ shar dang/ nub dang/ lho dang/ byang la sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis yod do// de ltag gnas pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang sems can gyi gnas te/ mtho rim dang/ mo yul dang/ sa'i 'og gi srid pa ni srid pa gsum mo// de dag ma lus pa ni mtha' dag ste/ dus su sbyor ba las rab tu skye ba dang/

gnas ba dang/ rgas pa dang// 'jig pa'o// de yang skye ba'i dbang las yang dag par 'dzin pa dang/ srub pa dang/ dbyibs rlung gi dus su yang ba'i sbyor ba'i skye ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge

ba'i las kyi 'bras bu las so sor longs spyod pa'i don no// da ni mtha' skor gy-i tshad ni 'di ltar brjod par bya ste/ de yang 'jig rten gy-i khams thams can kyi zheng gi tshad kyi sum 'gyur ni/ de dag gi mtha'

skor la yod pa yin no// ri rab lhun po la sogs rlung gi steng gi mtha' rnams kyi rlung dang/ brag dang/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyi zheng las sum 'gyur gyi mtha' skor yod do// de bzhin du sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi

zheng la tshad 'bum phrag gcig go/ mtha' skor gyi tshad dang 'bum phrag gsum gsum mo// de bzhin du chu dang/ me dang// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rang rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mtha' nas/ rang rang

gi dkyil 'khor kyi mtha'i bar du 'bum phrag gnyis so// 'bum phrag gsum dang 'bum phrag bzhi ni rang rang gi zheng gi tshad do// mtha' skor gy-i tshad ni chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'bum phrag drug go// me'i

dkyil 'khor gyi dgu'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'bum phrag bcu gnyis so// de'i yang phyi rim gyi 'jig rten gyi khams la dpag tshad rnams kyi 'bum phrag gcig go// de bzhin du rang gi lus la yang rang gi

khru bzhi tshad du gyur te// snga ma smras pa'i rim bzhin no// de nas rgya mtsho rnams dbye ste/ tsha dang/ chang chung dang/ 'o ma dang/ zho mar sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtshos te/ de tsha ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na'o// chang la

sogs pa ni sa'i steng du'o// phrag bdun ni 'od sngon po dang/ man d+ha ra'i ba ri dang/ rdul bral dang/ nor 'od dang/ dro na dang/ grang ba dang/ rdo rje'o// rdo rje ni tsha'i rgya mtsho'i phyi rol tu'o// kha dang ldan pa la

sogs pa ni// chang la sogs pa'i rgya mtsho'i phyi rol tu rigs so so'i ri rnams chu skyor bar byed do// gling bdun ni zla ba dang/ 'od dkar rab mchog dang/ ku sha ni 'am ci dang/ longs spyod dang// krung krung

dang/ drag po dang/ 'dzam gling bdun pa las gyi sa'o// de yang bdun pa ni 'dzam gling ste/ zla ba'i rnam pa chu ru dpag tshad 'bum pa la mtha' skor dpag tshad 'bum gsum pa ste/ gdan gnas pa'i mi de ni
las kyi sa rig par bya'o// longs spyod drug pa'i sa ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi tshad rgya mtsho'i lho'i me'i dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gru gsum// byang du chu'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor zla gam

mo// nub tu sa'-i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin grum bzhi/ dbus su lhun po'i ma mo thig le stong pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor te/ bum pa thig le'i rnam pa ste/ de yang gling drug la sogs pa ni ra ba lta bur
gnas pa la/ lhun po ni bang rim gsum ste/ gzugs bzang ba seng ges bteg pa bang rim ni sku'o// stobs chen glang po ches bteg pa'i bang rim ni thugs so// mdzes sdug rma byas bteg pa ni bang rim gsung

ngo// ya mtshan khyung gis mtshan pa'i bum pa ni sku gsung thugs bya bral rdzogs pa ste/ ber stong pa ni thig le chos kyi sku'o// lhun po de yang rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// de

la dkyil 'khor bzhi bo des/ lcung po'i sgo nas gnas so// dkyil 'khor bzhi po 'di rnams kyi tshad ni/ dpag tshad ky-i grangs ji lta ba bzhin du/ stong phrag bdun dang/ stong phrag dgu dang/ stong phrag bcu

ste// dpag tshad rnams kyi tshad ni/ gling bzhi ji lta ba bzhin gyi rnga bzhin no// de yang 'dir shar zlam po dang nub gru bzhi pa ni/ de rang bzhin lus kyi rang bzhin gyis/ shar dang nub dang rlung dang sa'i dkyil

'khor bzhin no// de bzhin du g.yas dang g.yon// gru gsum dang zla khams lus ni me dang chu'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de lta bas na dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rnam pas gling bzhin rnams kyi mtshan nyid do// da ni

lhun po la sogs pa'i rgya'i tshad bshad de/ lhun po steng gi rgya shar dang/ nub dang/ byang dang// lho'i cha'i bar lnga bcu'i/ sa'i steng gnam gyi rgyar stong phrag drug cu'o// khor yug ni stong phrag gcig ste// brgya nges

pa'o// steng du rtsa lnga'o// phyi rol tu gling bzhi nang na 'dug pa'i gnas na gling drug ste// de rnams la kha ba can la rba can zhes bya'o// de la rgya mtsho drug la so sor stong gi bcu gcig gis ma las pa yin no// de
