ye shes don ma nor bar shes pa ste 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo nyid gsal ba'o// nam ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin la/ mkha' ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no// nam ni mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa yin la/ mkha' ni

gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// nam ni byang chub sems ma bcos pa'i thig le yin la/ mkha' ni ma mo rnams kyi sku bskyed pa'o// nam ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa yin la/ mkha' ni ye shes kyi
dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba'o// de dag ni ye shes las grub pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nam mkha' bstan pa'o// da ni 'jig rten pa'i nam mkha' bstan par bya ste/ de la yang rgyu 'byung ba lnga

las grub par shes par bya'o// de la nam mkha' bri ba'i thabs ni/ dang po la tshon dang smyug la byin gyis brlabs// tshon lnga phyogs bzhi dbus dang/ lnga ru gzhag la ye shes lnga ru byin gyis brlab po// de nas

'thun rdzas bri ba ni/ phyogs kyi smyug tshal bzhi la ni/ dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba/ rnam par yar pa gsum dang ldan/ che mchog zhal gyi rang bzhin no// phyogs kyi smyug ma bzhi la ni/ mthing nag

drag po 'khor lo ris// phyogs bzhir rigs kyi 'khor lo mdzes// kha le nag mo'i zhal yin no// de stengs che mchog rdo rje rigs// gsang ba'i mkha' la phyed nub tsam// yab yum zhal gyi rang bzhin no// phog
brang nag po de nas dkar// ser dang dmar gyi mdangs dang ldan// sngon po 'od dang bcas pa ni// kha le nyid kyi mthun rdzas so// dkar po'i pho brang ser pos brgyan// dmar po sngon po'i mdangs dang
ldan// nag po 'do dang bcas pa ni// rnam snang gsal gyi mthun rdzas so// sngon po'i pho brang dkar pos brgyan// ser po dmar po'i mdangs dang ldan// nag po'i 'od dang bcas pa ni// 'od gsal 'bar gyi

mthun rdzas so// dmar po'i pho brang sngon pos brgyan// dkar po ser po'i mdangs dang ldan// nag po'i 'do dang ldan pa ni// gnyen gsal 'bar gyi mthun rdzas so// ser po'o pho brang dmar pos brgyan// sngon
po dkar po mdangs dang ldan// nag po'i 'od dang bcas pa ni// yang gsal g.yos kyi mthun rdzas so// ser po'i pho brang dkar pos byas// sngon po dmar po'i 'od dang ldan// nag po'i 'od dang bcas pa
ni// bkrag gsal 'bar gyi mthu rdzas so// dkar dang nag po'i rim pa la// ser dar dmar po'i mdangs dang ldan// sngon po 'od dang bcas pa ni// srid pa bde 'gro'i mthun rdzas so// dkyil dmar dkar

ser sngon po nag// nyi zla thod 'phreng mthun rdzas so// sngo dang dmar du rnam par spras// za 'og ris su bris pa bzhi// khros pa'i ma bzhi'i mthun rdzas so// ser pos dbu byas de nas dmar// dkar dang sngo dang

mtha' bzhi nag// sbas pa'i ma bzhi'i mthun rdzas so/ phyogs bzhi tshon gyi pho brang la// rim pa gsum gyi bskor ba ni// dges sde bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// dkar mo g.yu yi chud 'khor can// zangs kyi 'od dang

ldan pa ni// shel 'phreng can gyi 'thun rdzas so// dmar mo lcags kyi chud 'khor can// dung gi 'od dang ldan pa ni// mug ti rgyal mo'i mthun rdzas so// nag mo gser gyi chud 'khor can// zangs kyi 'od dang ldan
pa ni// re ma ti yi mthun rdzas so// dkar la 'od bcas rim pa la// nag pos mtha' bskor bzhi byas pa// srid pa chags byed cha snyoms dang// nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis rdzas// ser po
dbu byas rin pa bzhi// sngon pos mtha' yi 'od bcas pa// bdag nyid ma yi mthun rdzas so// de 'dra ma nor gsum byas pa/ srin mo gsum gyi mthun rdzas so// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang sngo// dbus byas

rim pa bzhi bskor ba// srin mo bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// nag pos dbu byas so so yi// rim pa lnga yis byas pa gnyis// 'dod khams gtso mo sbun gnyis rdzas// lcags mig zangs kyi brgyan pa la// dung gi 'od

dang bcas pa gnyis// dza ra dza ta'i mthun rdzas so// phyogs bzhi'i tshon gyi pho brang la// tshon sna gsum gyis brgyan pa bzhi// glu 'degs bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// dung gi nam mkha'i dung sham can// gser gyis
nam mkha' g.yu sham can// g.yu yi nam mkha' gser sham can// dmag dpon bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// dkar la sogs pa bzhi dang ni// tshon gsum mdangs kyis brgyan pa la// so so'i mtha' dang ldan pa

ni// las kyi sring bzhi'i mthun rdzas so// dkar la byas pa drug dang ni// dkar mthar dmar gyis brgyan pa bdun// rdo rje rigs kyi ma bdun rdzas// sngo la byas pa drug dang ni// sngo mtha' gser gyis brgyan pa
bdun// rin chen rigs kyi ma bdun rdzas// dmar la byas pa drug dang ni// dmar mtha' dkar gyis brgyan pa bdun// pad+ma rigs kyi ma bdun rdzas// ser la byas pa drug dang ni// ser mtha' sngon pos
brgyan pa bdun// las kyi rigs kyi ma bdun rdzas// lcags kyi nam mkha' g.yu mig bzhi// bdud mo bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// zangs kyi nam mkha' g.yu sham bzhi// gnod sbyin bzhi yi 'thu rdzas so// dung gi
nam mkha' gser mig bzhi// sman btsun bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// phyogs kyi nam mkha' zangs ma bzhi// bse mo bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// las kyi ma mo'i mthun rdzas ni// lcags kyi nam mkha' nag po
dag// gser gyi 'dod dang ldan pa ni// bdud mo dgu yi mthun rdzas so// dung gi nam mkha' g.yu sham dgu// phugs bdag dgu yi mthun rdzas so// lcags kyi g.yu mig bcu gsum ni// bdud mo bcu yi

mthun rdzas so// 'bri yi nam mkha' zangs sham bzhi// mi sring bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// rtsod pa'i nam mkha' dung sham bzhi// chu srin bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// rtsid pa'i mkha'i gser sham can bzhi// g.yu yi

'od dang ldan pa ni// shing srin bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// ra bar nam mkha' zangs mig bzhi// sa srin bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// ro yi nam mkha' rjid sham bzhi// phug bdag bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// nam mkha'
nag po g.yu mig ni// ra bal dkar po'i sham bu can// bdud mo nyag gcig mthun rdzas so// lcags kyi nam mkha' g.yu sham lnga// bdud mo dbang mo che lnga'i rdzas// 'bri yin nam mkha' dung
sham lnga// kha yi bud med lnga yi rdzas// nam mkha' nag mo zangasam ni// dam sri bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// ra bal dmar po'i nam mkha' la// 'bri yi 'od dang ldan pa la// khyi bal dkar po'i mtha' can

bzhi// bdud mo khyo med 'dod bzhi rdzas// dung gi nam mkha' 'bri sham bzhi// bdud mo khyo med bzhi yi rdzas// lcags kyi nam mkha' zangs mig bzhi// bdud mo khyo rkun ma bzhi rdzas// khol bu nam mkha' 'bri

sham can// med chol ris su bris pa ni// dam srid bzhi yi 'thun rdzas so// 'bri yi nam 'kha' zangs mig ma// dung gi 'do dang ldan pa ni// klu srin chen mo'i mthun rdzas so// lcags kyi nam mkha' zangs mig
ma// gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa ni// klu bdud chen po'i mthun rdzas so// lcags kyi nam mkha' zangs mig bzhi// gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa ni// gting bdud che mo'i mthun rdzas so// ra bal dmar po'i nam
mkha' la// 'bri yi sham bu rab tu brgyan// g.yu yi 'od dang ldan pa ni// klu bdud chen mo'i mthun rdzas so// 'bri yin nam mkha' zangs ma lnga// 'brog mo rnams kyi mthun rdzas so// ri'u g.yu mig lho
'brog pa// 'bri sbu zangs mig byang 'brog la// srin bal gser mig byang sman la// dkar gsal re dang bsres pa'o// sngo gsal 'bri dang bsres pa'o// dmar gsal khol bu dang bsres pa'o// ser gsal

rtsid pa dang bsres pa'o// sral mo sde bzhi mthun rdzas so// dung gi nam mkha' 'bri sham can// zhag ris su ni bris pa bzhi// phung sri bzhi yi mthun rdzas so// 'bri yi nam mkha' zangs mig ma// byung sri chen

mo'i mthun rdzas so// phyogs bzhi'i gling du bris pa ni// ma sangs gnas bzhi'i mthun rdzas so// 'di dag nam mkha'i rim pa ste// las kyi ma mo rnams kyi rdzas so// dpag bsam shing dang rgyan gzugs mi'i

rim pa ni// bum pa la dpag bsam gyi shing bu// smyug ma tshig dgu pa gzugs so// sngon la 'od dang chas par bya'o// za 'od khug ma dgu ru mda' dang// 'bru dang// rin po ches bkang pa dgu tshig dgu ru re

re gdags par bya'o// dbyings kyi yum lnga mthun pa'i rdzas so// shing lo yal ga lnga la ni// kha dog rigs dang mthun pa yi// gro gshing shun dag la bri// dus bzhi'i rgyal mo'i gzugs bris la// yal ga re la
gdags par bya'o// ser pos dbus byas rim pa bzhi// za 'og rig kyi rna bar spras// dkar dang dmar dang nag mtha' can// shing lo'i dbus su gdan du gding// de stengs ras la byas pa'i gzugs// rtse
mor nam mkha' zung gnyis gzugs// gcig ni dbus zhal nam mkha' la// shar du kha stan bzhag pa ni// dbyings kyi yum gyi mthun pa'i rdzas so// de stengs gdan 'dra'i nam mkha'

yis// steng nas gdugs su dbub par bya'o// zur bzhi dbus kyi steng dang lngar// rma bya bya rgod dar gyi gdugs// bco lnga dag gis dgab par bya'o// skyogs pa ni// dbus su bse yi bya ste// ban d+ha dum bu

gcig gi nang du snying sna tshogs dang/ rag ta sna tshogs bsres pa'i gtor ma bzhag/ shar du dung skyogs/ lho ru skyogs/ nub tu zangs skyogs rnams kyi nang du phud mnyams pa blug la bzhag/ shar du mda' bya

rgod ma// lho ru bya rog ma// nub tu 'ug pa ma// byang du khra sgro ma gzhag go/ de nas ri rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du phur pa bzhi gru 'degs ma bzhi ru byin gyis brlabs la gzugs/ mdos bzhi phur bzhi'i
steng du spyan drangs/ mda' bzhi/ ral gri bzhi/ me long bzhi/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum du mnga' gsol la gzugs/ steng nam mthing nag gi gur dbus/ de'i phyi rim rigs kyi dar sham bzhi yis yol ba bri/
de'i mtha' mar spyan gzigs dkor byas bskor/ de nas phyi rol tu cha gsum gtang/ phud kyi nang nam mkha'i rgyal mo dang bsrung ma la gtang las bsgo/ gser skyems gtang/ ma mo 'kha' 'gro'i mdun du ban

d+ha bdud rtsis bkang la rag ta thigs gcig blugs la gzhag khrag zangs gang yang bzhag go de'i shar sgo ma zad tsam du dbang gi dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bris la/ de'i grwa bzhir mda' bzhi gzhag phur pa

bzhi gzugs so// ba su d+ha ras mtha' bris la/ dbus su dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma la rag ta 'dza' gad bcas cig gzhag go/ nub kyi sgo ru tshe'i bum pa'i nang du tshe'i snying po lnga dang/ 'brang rgyas dang/

skyems kyis dgang ngo// mda' bya rgod ma gcig la dar le brgan gcig gdags so// de'i phyi rim du phyogs mtshams brgyad du man+Dal brgyad byas la/ shar gyis man+Dal steng du gdon byas pa'i cho ga bya'o// lho'i

man+Dal gyi steng du dam tshig dpog cing sdaum pa bzung ngo// nub kyi man+Dal gyi steng du tshe srung cho ga bya'o// byang gi man+Dal gyi steng du tshogs kyi cho ga rgyas par bya'o// shar lho'i man+Dal gyi steng du khrus kyi cho ga bya'o// lho

nub kyi ma n+Dal gyi ste/ du sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// byang nub kyi man+Dal gyi steng du rdzas brgyad bsogs la bkra shis kyi cho ga bya'o// byang shar gyi man+Dal steng du bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsams la srung skud gdags
so// de ni bskang mdos kyi rim pa'o// bzlog mdos dang gsad mdos ni/ dgug pa dang/ bcing ba dang// gsad pa la sogs pa bya/ phyogs mtshams brgyad mgo bsreg la bya'o// de ni mnyes bya mchod pa'i
yo byad do// mdzes pa brgyan gyi yo byad pa sngags pa'i chas gos dar nag gi ber dbu rgyan dar dmar pos bya/ skra mtshams su me long gdags/ dbu thod bcings/ stod g.yogs dang smad dkris

phyag rgya'i phur bu ltag bar rgya long gdags/ mkhur ba g.yas g.yon du kha gser dang kha g.yu gser mis ma phog pa dang g.yu nyi ma ris gzhug/ rin po che 'bar ba snying khar gdags so/ gsur chen gyi dud pa/

tshil chen gyi mar me/ sbos kyi dud ba/ rus chen gyi 'phreng ba/ dri chen gyi dri/ sna tshogs dbang po'i me tog mchod pa'i zhal zas/ sgra dang rol mo sna tshogs pa'o/ 'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad ni/ rgya la sogs pa tshogs

kyi yo byad do/ tha ma bskang pa'i rim pa la gnyis te/ bdag don du nang ma mo'i mdos su bskang ba dang/ gzhan don du phyi srin mo'i mdos su bskang ba gnyis so// nang cha gnyis te/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa

gnyis/ spyi bsgrub dang ni spyi gsal shes par bya'o/ phyi srin mo'i mdos su bskang ba la gnyis te// sngon 'gro bya ba dang bskang ba gnyis so/ de ni bskang rim pa'o zhes gsungs so/ bdud mo bkol byang nam

mkha'i rgyud chen po las// bskang bzlog mchod pa'i yo byad sarba ru pa zhes pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// srid pa rgya yis ji ltar gdab// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan
'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yig tso// phyi yi srid pa rgyas 'debs ni// dkyil 'khor
'dra ba cha lnga la// rtse me kha dog rigs kyis bsgyur// dkyil 'khor lha yi gnas su dgod// zhag gsum bar du bsnyen par bya// bskul dang bskang so rigs su bskul// sngags dang so so'i// rigs su
bzlas// skongs dang de dang 'dra bar gdab// sgyub pa tha ma bskang bar bya// dkyil 'khor lha yis mkha' rnams// ri rab gling la dgod par bya// spyan drangs bskul te btab nas kyang// ri rab de la gzugs

par bya// tha ma ri rab cha lnga la// gcig ni chu bo'i gzhung la bskyol// gcig ni dur khrod gling du sba/ gcig ni ri rab rtse la bskyal/ gcig ni lam chen rgya gram bskyal/ gcig ni chu mig chad pa la// gang rung

de la bskyal par bya// de ltar byas la dngos grub blang// de ni phyi yi rgyas 'debs so// nang gi srid pa rgyas 'debs ni// rten rdzas bsgrub rdzas bskang rdzas bsog// rdzas gsum bsog pa'i tha ma la// ma ha shan

ting rgyas bar bsog/ srid pa pho la rgyas par bsngo// pho yi las kha rdzogs par ba// sarba ru ba rgyas pa bsog// mo rigs rnams la rgyas par bskang// mo yi las ka rdzogs par bya/ de ni nang gi rgyas 'debs
so// gsang ba srid pa rgyas 'debs ni// rdzas rnams gsum po tshang ba la// rigs kyi nad ngo gzung nas ni// de dang 'dra ba'i bskor btab la// khyad par brgya dang bco brgyad mdos/ gtso mo gang
gnod gcig la bskang// de ni rgyas 'debs rim pa'o// zhes gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud chen po las// srid pa rgyas 'debs kyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol
pa// zhen bzlog dgra mdos ji ltar bya// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig// de skad gsol pa gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// zhen

bzlog dgra la bya ba ni// nam mkha' re la ngar glud re// kha dog ma mo lta bur shes// ri rab gling la dgod par bya// bsnyen pa ring thung lcogs tshad bya// khram shing g.yas la shod sdog g.yon// bskul te btab

la thun re brdeg/ chu bo chen po'i gzhung la gtang// khrag sna sna tshogs 'byor tshad dang// thun dgu dmod dgu zor dang bcas// gang rung de la 'phang bar bya// mdos phur drug gis gsad bar bya'o// zhes
gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// zhen bzlog mdos kyi le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rkyen bzlog zug pa ji ltar 'byung// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan

'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// rkyon bzlog zug pa dbyung ba ni/ ma mo'i nad kyis zin pa la// khrag gi zhal bu lnga bshams la// rigs kyi nad ngo bzung
nas ni// rigs mthun pa yi bskong btab la// gang gnod de la bskang bzlog bya// khyad par brgyad cu rtsa brgyad mdos// gtso mo gang gnod de yis bya'o// sngags dang de ltar bzlas par bya'o// zhes gsungs

so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// rkyen bzlog zug pa 'byung ba'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ dbang can mo rnams bskang byas na/ dbang byed pho la mi 'tshal lam/ rdzogs
sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal/ yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang/ yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa/ pho yi bskang ba ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang

dag pa/ dregs pa pho rnams bskang 'dod na/ 'bru sna bcu gsum ngar phye la// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga brdar/ ri rab gling bzhi gling phran bya/ de la dgod par bya ba ni/ dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo la/ bdud nag

po skrag med kyi mkhar nag po sgo dgu pa la gzhag go/ de yi ya gad la bdud bya nag po dgod/ nam mkha' nag po lnga dgod/ zur bzhi la bal tshon sna lnga la byas pa'i mdung tshoms bzhi bzhi gzugs/ ri rab
kha khyer shar phyogs su bdud mkhar gcig brtsig/ lho ru gcig brtsig/ nub tu gcig brtsig// byang du gcig brtsig/ kha dog ni rigs bzhi'i kha dog go/ so so'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i nam
mkha' lnga lnga gzugs so// mdung mtshoms bzhi bzhi gzugs so/// lug nag po mkhal dkar dang/ nag po zangs ma dang/ nag po spyi tshigs dang/ nag po mkha' rgya dang/ chu kha dang// smug po 'bras bu can

rnams dgod do// rta nag po dang// khyi nag po sgo'i g.yas g.yon du dgod/ mon pa nag po lag na bdud rta thogs pa sgo ru bzhag/ de ni bdud kyi bya thabs so// ri rab kyi mtshams bzhi ru dmu'i mkhar sngon po

la ya khad la dmu bya gong sngon gzhag go/ sgo g.yas su dmu rta gro bo gzhag/ sgo g.yon du dmu lug gro mo gzhag/ dmu'i nam mkha' sngon pa'o lnga lnga gzugs// dmu thag legs pa lnga lnga gzhag go/ de ni dmu'i
bya thabs so// de'i 'og ma'i bang rim la/ shar du btsan gyi mkhar dmar po la nam mkha' dmar po lnga/ bal dmar gyi mdud tshoms lnga bya/ se bo sgo g.yas su lug dmar/ sa bo sgo g.yon du gzhag

go/ lho phyogs su sa btsan gyi mkhar ser po la nam mkha' ser khra lnga/ ba dan smug po lnga/ lug ser khra sgo ru gzhag go// nub tu klu btsan gyi mkhar sngon dmar la nam mkha' sngon dmar lnga/ ba dan sngon dmar
dang/ lug nag ser dang/ dmar ser gzhag go/ byang du btsan gyi mkhar smug po la nam mkha' za 'og rigs lnga/ ba dan smug po lnga/ lug gur khra gzhag go/ de ni btsan gyi bya thabs so// de 'og ma la shar

phyogs su tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can gyi mkhar dkar po la nam mkha' dkar po lnga/ bal gyi mdung tshogs lnga/ lug bya sgo g.yas su bya/ se dmar sgo g.yon du'o// shar phyogs su blon po nyi phag sad kyi
mkhar dmar po la g.yu'i kha bad can// nam mkha' smu po lnga/ smug se'i mdung lnga/ lug smug se sgo ru gzhag go/ byang shar mtshams su btsan rgod dmar po'i mkhar dmar po la nam mkha' dmar po lnga/ bal

dmar gyi mdung lnga bya'o// glang rgya bo sgo g.yas su// dmar po g.yon du/ mkhar gyi rtse mo la brag bya 'ug pa dgod do// shar phyogs su rdo rje legs pa'i mkha' rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa/ sgo g.yas nas stag

smad rol bas/ g.yon na spyang khu sngon po 'dur ba// rgyab na zangs kyi 'phar pa rgyug pa/ mkhar gyi rtse la ltas ngan gyi byi bzhi gzhag go/ nam mkha' rin po che sna lnga byas pa gzugs so// rin po che lnga'i mdung
tshogs lnga zur la gzugs so// bshos bu khru gang ba gcig la/ mda' bya rgod ma gcig gzugs so// dar dmar po yug gcig gdags/ sgo'i thad kar ra rgya bo bzhi dkar gcig go/ de'i rwa la dar tshon sna lnga
gdags so// de ni shar kha bde bzhi'i bya thabs so// bang rim tha ma la shar lho mtshams su gnam te dkar po'i mkhar la/ dung mkhar po la nam mkha' dkar po lnga/ bal gyi mdung lnga// shul bu

rgyal mtshan lnga/ sgo g.yas su rta dkar po phug dmar/ g.yon du ra dkar po dung ru gzhag go/ lho nub mtshams su spyi rings lan to re'i mkhar zangs mkhar dmar po la/ ya khad sngon po can/ nam mkha' khra bo

lnga dang ra pags khra bo'i rgyal mtshan lnga gzugs so// sgo ru ra khra bo gzhag go/ byang shar mtshams su shel gyi mkhar dkar po la ya khad ser po// nam mkha' dkar ser lnga// ba dan dkar po bzhi/ shog bu'i

rgyal mtshan gcig gzugs so// byang nub mtshams su brgya byin gyi mkhar/ sre long dang glong mong las tshogs pa// ya kha gla ba'i mor gyi byas pa'o// ra khra bo nam mkha' lnga// ra dkar gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi

gzugs so// de'i mtha' ma la snang srid sems can gyi gzugs gzhag go/ de'i phyi rim du 'bru sna lnga la byas pa'i dar gyi mi bo che gcig la/ mu tig gi klad pa/ sho sha'i snying// lung tang gi mig/ 'gron bu'i

so// byi ru'i lce/ tshal gyi gdong pa dar sna tshogs sna lnga brgyan la/ yan lag bzhi la ban da bzhi// rnam shes brgyad la me mar brgyad/ nor bu rin po che skye ru gdags/ stag ral g.yas la gzig shug g.yon/
lug nag lcags ru mdun du gzhag go/ rwa g.yas pa la dar mthing nag gis dkri/ bya nag po dang/ lug nag se dang/ smug po dang/ pags pu dkar po dang/ bya phod dang zangs ras la sogs pa ci mang du
btags la/ lag pa g.yas par gser dang g.yu/ g.yon par byi ru dang mtshal dang pos/ lha'i zhal zas sna tshogs gzhag/ shing thig sna tshogs dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzhag go// ma trang

gi snying khar sa'i lha mo'i snying po su mun tri zhes bri ste/ steng du kling gzhag go/ ngar gyi bshos bu bcu gsum byas la mtha' ma bskor ro// mda' bcu gsum gzugs so// mda' la bri ba ni// bdud mda' ltong

nag tu bri/ dmu mda' dmog ltong bri btsan gyi za 'og ris su bri/ brgya byin nyi ma ris su bri/ shel ge mkhar thabs nyi zla yis brgyan pa'o// byang btsan gyi dmar po gri thabs su bri// brag srin dmar skya za 'og

ris su zi/ ma bdud kyi smug mo gur mgo ris su bri/ sa bdag klu srin la/ mda' khre dang 'phang khre bri// so so'i sbu thog dang/ bya phod dang/ bzang ras la sogs dang/ bal tshon la sogs pas brgyan la gzhag
go/ skyogs bcu gsum du gser skyems gyis bkang la bshos bu re re'i mdun du dgram mo/ shar du dngul skyogs/ lho ru lcags/ nub tu zangs// byang du bse 'am gser skyogs/ ma 'byor na kham skyogs
so// zangs phye lcags phye nyungs nag 'bru nag po skyogs bzhi khas bzlog la nang du blugs so// mda' bzhi la shar du bya rgod ma/ lhor bya rog ma// nub tu 'ug pa ma/ byang du srin bya ma gzugs
so// sgra'i bar du hUM phaT bris la skyer pa 'am se ba la mde'u zur gsum pa byas la gzugs so// gro ga la yid la dgyes pa'i ming rus ra ri khrag gam khyi khrag gis bris la mda' la gdags so// yungs kar

dang/ yungs nag dang// dug sna tshogs dang/ shing gdug pa can gyi sol che la/ gdug pa'i snying po dang/ zlog byed kyi snying po bzlas la mda'i ltong dang skyogs kyi kha na mar brlus so// zor du 'phang ngo/ gzhu
stod za 'og gis dkris/ smad dar zab kyis dkri// sngags pa'i chas la dmar po 'am nag po mgo thod mthing nag bcings la/ dar dkar g.yang mo dang za 'og sleb mo bya/ kha ru gser mas ma phog pa dang/
g.yu nyi ma ris gzhug/ smin mtshams su g.yu za rig ma dang/ me long dang btags pa la skyer ro// bud med la la'u dkar po gon pa gcig gis me long dang gser thogs la// thal chen gyi mtshan mas btab

la/ g.yab dar nag pos g.yab/ sngags chen gyis ma dang gying rnga brdung zhing srid pa thams cad bskul lo// de ltar byas la pho rgyud rnams bskang bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud chen
po las/ ma ha shan ting rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ srid pa pho rgyud 'di rnams kyi/ mdos kyis bskang ba ji ltar lags/ yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan
'tshal/ yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang/ yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa/ pho yi bskang bangs bstan gyis/ legs par nyon la
yid la gzung/ hUM/ spau ri spau mthon rtse mo nas/ bdud mkhar sgo dgu bstsigs pa ni/ bram bzhi lcags la bgyis// nag po khrigs se khrigs// zur bzhi g.yu la bgyis// sngon po zangs se zangs/ logs bzhi

mthing la bgyis// mthing logs lhag ge lhag/ mkhar gyi rtse mo na// bdud bya pho rig gsum// gsung snyan stongs se stongs// sgo yi sgo srungs pa// sgo zur g.yas pa na// shin rje thang bzang ris/ sgo btsas

bzhes// 'phrang bas 'phrang btsas bzhes/ sgo pa chen po la// yar la glud 'bul lo// zhes pa nas nyi ma shar phyogs ma gi na// shar phyogs nam mkha' ra phyed bdag/ ya mtshan srid pa'i mi bo che// rdo rje
legs pa'i ming nas byung/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ces bya ba'i bar gyis bsngo ba bya'o// zhes gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud chen po las//
pho rigs bskang pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ srid pa'i dbang can mo rnams ni// sems can kun la gnod byed pas/ so so'i bskang ba ji ltar
lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang/ yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi tshogs// snang

srid ma mo bskang ba yi// so so'i bskang ba 'di rnams so// ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// sha sna stong gis bskor ba ni// mkha' 'gro gti mug sha yi mdos// mdze shu phol 'bras byung na bskang// ri rab gling

bzhi bzhengs pa la// khrag sna stong gis bskor ba ni// mkha' 'gro 'dod chags khrag gi mdos// dgra la khrag zor byed na shis// ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// snying sna stong gis bskor ba ni// mkha' 'gro

tsit+ta thugs kyi mdos// rnal 'byor ma mo bsgrubs na shis// ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// thod pa stong gis bskor ba ni// mkha' 'gro ban da thod pa'i mdos// dgra la thod zer byed na shis// ri rab gling
bzhi bzhengs pa la// gtor ma gtong ba'i bskor ba ni// mkha' 'gro'i lam gtor ma yi mdos// chags nyams 'gal 'khrugs byung na shis// ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// sman sna stong gis bskor ba

ni// mkha' 'gro 'tsho byed sman gyi mdos// rims nad sna tshogs byung na shis// ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// spos dang mar mes bskor ba ni// mkha' 'gro chos skyong mchod pa'i mdos// rnal 'byor dam
tshig nyams na gtang// ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// phur pa stong gis bskor ba ni// mkha' 'gro ki la'i phur pa'i mdos// sdang dgra gnod bgegs sgrol na bya// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang
nam mkha'i rgyud las// thun mong ma yin pa'i bskong brgyad// bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bskang pa mdos kyi chad lhag ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la

bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig// de skad gsol ba gsan kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag lha// bskang ba mdos kyi cha lag ni// spyi dang

sgos ni gnyis su bstan// spyi la cha lag bcu gnyis te// sgos la brgyad dang bco brgyad do// de las sdud ni rnam pa brgyad// de las rtsa ba gnyis su bstan// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// cha lag bcu
gnyis ji ltar lags// mtha' sdud brgyad rnams ji ltar lags// rtsa ba gnyis ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yug drung yang dag pa// cha lag bcu gnyis 'di ltar ro// pho
rigs cha mnyam pa// lang 'ga' gser mdos dang// yon tan tshe sring zhing dbang thang skyed pa tshe'i mdos// sa gzhi bkra shis pa dang bar chad bzlog pa'i phyir mda' bzhi phur bzhi'i mdos

dang// brod pa skyed pa mkhyen pa gsol ba'i mdos dang// yas gong du spya na drangs pa gur dbye ba'i mdos dang// glud btsal ba lo rgyus kyi mdos dang// spyan drang ba rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir thugs dam
bskang zhing bskul pa'i mdos dang// rigs so so nas rang gi lag cha gtad pa'i mdos dang// dngos grub stsol ba tshogs kyi mdos dang// yon bdag gis bsham pa'i rdzas chud mi gson pa dang// sngags pa

rang la mi bsgrib par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gdab pa dang// lha 'dre la 'khrug mi ldang// bar bya ba'i phyir sgo dbye 'phrang bsal pa'i mdos dang// dmigs pa gnas su bskyal bar bya ba'i phyir ro// ri rab gru
'degs shing chags pa dang bral pa'i mdos de ni chags lugs bcu gnyis so// mtha' sdud brgyad ni 'di ltar ro// zhi ba'i mtha' sdud dkar po lce'i mdos dang// dbang gi mtha' sdud smug mo sha rus kyi mdos
dang// drag po'i mtha' sdud rem ti lcags sgrol ma'i mdos dang// bzlog pa'i mtha' sdud dbang phyug ma'i zor mdos dang// bdud mo mtha' sdud stong bskor gyi mdos dang// gsad pa'i mtha' sdud 'brub khung

khra mo brgyad bdud bsad pa'i mdos dang// bskang pa'i mtha' sdud sarba ru pa'i mdos dang// sgrol pa'i mtha' sdud bdud mo lcags sgrog ma'i mdos dang rnam pa brgyad do// rtsa ba gnyis ni 'di lta ste// srid

pa'i pho mdos so// phol yang nig nyis yin te// bskang ba dang ni bzlog pa'o// mo la rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi ru srin mo'i mdos dang ni// nang du yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal/ ma mo'i mdos nyid
do// zhes bka' stsal to// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// bskang ba mdos kyi cha lag bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang can mo rnams

kyi// bskang ba'i cho ga gang lags pa// yang dag rdzogs lakyis bka' stsal pa// de la rnam pa gnyis yin te// sngon du bya ba dang bskang ba'o// de la sngon du bya ba ni// cho ga yan lag rnam pa bdun// gnod
'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// yan lag bdun po ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bsha du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang
dag pa// cho ga bdun gyi rkang grangs ni// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya'o// dang por zhub gsol zhing mazhen pa gsol ba dang// srid pa khog dbub pa dang// cha mnyam pa dang// mdos mkhyen cha ba
dang// mdos bzhengs su gsol ba dang// mdos spyan drangs shing bzhugs su gsol ba dang// dpang po spyan drangs shing mda' bzhi phur bzhi bya'o// de la zhu ba gsol zhing mkhyen pa gsol ba
ni// yul rgya yul bstan bzangs su// rgyal po mgo sha ma bdun mo babs nas gnam sa bar gsum gyis pra ltas mkhan gyis gzigs nas// rgya gar 'dzam gling shar phyogs nas ston pa dga' rab rdo rje sbyan
drangs nas zhu ba gus par phul te// ston pas yas dang thabs bsher ba// bud med bu 'di chags pa che bas rdzas bsogs na blu rung// yas dang thags bsogs nas// ri rab gling bzhi shoms
sam// bal tshon sna lnga mchis sam// nam mkha' gzha' tshon ris bris sam// gnam la 'phur dgu'i phos mchis sam// thig le lnga'i thod mchis sam// sgo ba'i btsas mchis sam// 'ogatu ga dan mchis
sam// zhal du skyems mchis sam// phyag tu g.yon mchis sam// kha gser dang kha g.yu mchis sam// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro mchis sam// logs la 'grim dgu'i ras mchis sam// sa la skye dgu'i
rdzas mchis sam// mchis na brlu ru rung gsung gsung bas// rgyal po ston pas ji ltar gsungs pa stsal nas// rgyal po bdud mo'i kha nas bslus so// de ni zhu ba gsol zhing mkhyen pa gsol ba'i rim pa zhes

gsungs so// de nas srid pa khog dbub pa ni// hUM/ srid pa gang zhig lnga// dang po ci yang med pa las// srid pa yel yel ser ser po// ji med stong pa'i dus tsam na// bde gshegs thugs rdze'i byin brlabs
dang// sems can spyi mthun las dbang gis// dang po srid pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor chags// de stengs chu yi dkyil 'khor chags// de stengs med yi dkyil 'khor chags// rlung gis chu gzhig me yis smin// de
stengs gser gyi sa gzhir chags// de stengs ri rab lhun por chags// ri bdun rol mtsho gling rnams dang// tha ma lcags ri nag por chags// de ltar srid pa chags so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud
las// srid pa khog dbub pa'i le'u ste sum cu tham pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa cha mnyam ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal
pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// de ltar srid pa chags pa las// ru tra bka' bsgo log pa yis/ ri rab ngos la gnas pa'i tshe// gdug pa'i bud med dam la btags// rang rgyud ma mo dbang du

bsdus// ma mo nyi zla thod 'phreng mas// nyi zla stong gi rtsa gcig gis// snang srid phud la khad pa las// bcon ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// bcom ldan che mchog he ru la// srid pa cha mnyam zhu ba phul// shar ri mtho
ste nub ri dma'// nub ri mtho ste sha ri dma'// lho ri mtho ste byang ri dma'// byang ri mtho ste lho ri dma'// mtshams bzhi mtho ste phyogs bzhi dma'// phyogs bzhi mtho ste mtshams bzhi

dma'// shar gyi ri 'u dpangs mtho na// nub gyis klu bdag nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// nub kyi ri bo dpangs mtho na// shar gyi dri za nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// lho

yi ri bo dpangs mtho na// byang gis gnod sbyin nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam bya// byang gi ri bo dpangs mtho na// lho yi gshin rdze nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam bya// shar lho'i ri bo

dpangs mtho na// byang nub rlung lha nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// byang nub ri bo dpangs mtho na// shar lho me lha nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// lho nub ri rab dpangs

mtho na// byang shar dbang ldan nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// byang shar ri bo dpangs mtho na// lho nub srin po nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// steng phyogs mtho ba'i dus

tsam na// 'og gis bdag nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// 'og phyogs mtho ba'i dus tsam na// steng gi tshangs pa nyon re mongs// de phyir srid pa cha mnyam 'tshal// bcom ldan mchog he ru

kas// sku la srid pa bzhi 'dzin sprul// srid pa zhig pa 'dzin du bcug/ thugs las ma mo bcu bzhi byung// gsung las sman mo lnga bcur sprul// srid pa cha byed cha snyoms kyis// snang srid thams cad bde la
bkod// srid pa bde la gnas so skad// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// srid pa cha mnyam pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// mdos mkhan mdos la ji ltar

cha// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// mdos mkhan mdos la cha ba ni// mdos mkhan rgya mtsho mer ba 'dra// mdos mo gyur sram dmar mo 'dra// gyur bsam mi yi glud du chos// gyum sram rdza yi khams su
chos// mdos mkhan mdos la cha ba ni// mdos mkhan nam mkha' yangs pa 'dra// mdos mo nyi zla gza' skar 'dra// nyi zla mi yi glud du chos// gza' skar rdza yi khams su chos// mdos mkhan mdos la cha ba
ni// mdos mkhan ri rgyal lhun po 'dra// mdos mo rtsi shing nags tshal 'dra/ rtsi shing mi yi glud du chos// nags tshal dza yi khams su chos// mdos mkhan mdos la cha ba ni// mdos mkhan sa gzhi gro bo

'dra// mdos mo lo thog snar mo 'dra// lo thog mi yi glud du chos// lo thog rdza yi khams su chos// phyag lnga mdos la cha ba ni// snang srid ma mo thams cad kyang// gong gong chum chum las la spyon// sti ra'i rnga chen
'di brdungs pas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// srid gsum ma lus zil gyis mnan// sti ra'i chen 'di brdungs pas// ma mo mkha' 'gro las la
bskul// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// dgra bgegs mgo lus dum bur gtubs// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams bran du khol sti ra'i rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// stong
gsum chos sgra chen pos bkang// tsan dan dkar po'i rnga shing la// ban glang dkar po'i pags pas g.yogs// gnod pa'i dgra bgegs zhi pa'i rnga// dmar mo gdangs snyan rnga shing la// ser mo stag gi pags

pas g.yogs// tshe dang bsod nams rgyas pa'i rnga// ser ldeng dmar po'i rnga shing la// drod mo mo zin pags pas g.yogs// thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rnga// gram chen smug po'i rnga shing la// mi lpags gzhi'i

pags pas g.yogs// gnod pa'i dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i rnga// thod pa ltag spyad rnga shing la// zheng chen g.yang mazhi lpags pa g.yogs// dbyings nas ma mo spyan 'dren rnga// zhes bka' stsal to// bkol byang

nam mkha'i rgyud chen po las// mdos mkhan mdos la cha ba dang phyag rngamados la cha ba'i le'u ste so gnyos pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gling mazhi mdos chen ji ltar bzhengs/ yang dag rdzogs

kyis bka' stsal pa// bskal pa dang po'i dus tsam na// mar me mdzad ni 'das 'og tu// shwakya thum pa ma byung dus// ru tras ma mo dam la bsdus// ma mo srid pa'i bde 'gro des// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba

na// rgya mtsho mer pa'i nang shed na// rin chen g.yu yi gur phub bas// byu ru'i tshugs shing rongs se rongs// gser gyi gur thag sha ra ra// ma mo srid pa'i bde 'gro ma/ 'khor du sna srid mang pos bskor// shin

tu bzang sdug mdangs dang ldan// de ka si yis mthong ste gzigs// rgyal po lha yi bu yis gzigs// rgyal po lha yi bu de yang// chags pa skyes nas zhu ba phul// srid pa'i rgyal mo yas nyid dang// bdag nyid

srid pa bde 'gro zer// srid pi bde 'gro'i zhal na re// rgyal po lha yi bu nyid dang// nga gnyis brdeb tu cang mi 'tshal// 'khor gyi ma mos yas ra sod// de skad zer nas ma gnang ste// rgyal po lha yi bu de

yis// nan tan bskyed de yang zhus pas// srid pa bde 'gro'i zhal na re// rgyal po lha y-i bu khyod dang// nga yi gan du 'ong 'dod na// do nub nam gyi gung smad la// g.yu gur sngon mo rdib pa re// byu ru'i tshugs

shing 'gyel la re// gser gyi gur thag chad da re// mu men chon phur byung nga re// 'khor gyi ma mo tshor ra re// sus kyang mtshor zhog la spyon// de skad nyid du gsungs pa las// rgyal po lha yi bu de yis// dal
'bul bzhag nas ma byon par// 'ur 'ur thog thog byon pa las// 'khor gyi ma mo 'kha' 'gros tshor// ma mo zhe sdang phrag dog skyes// gser gyi zangs gri rnon po yis// rgyal po lha yi bu la

brgyab// rgyal po lha yi bu de bsad// ma mo phyogs bzhir bros de thal// srid pa bde 'gro mya ngan bskyes// yum cig srid pa bde 'gro mas// snang srid ma mo dbang du bsdus// 'bru sna nyi shu rtsa gcig la// ri rab
gling bzhi mdos chen bzhengs// 'byung ba lnga yis nam mkha' brgyan// shar phyogs dpag bsam yal ga las// ma mo rus nad gtong ba bkug// lho phyogs dpag bsam yal ga las// ma mo mkhris nad
gtong ba bkug// nub phyogs dpag bsam yal ga las// ma mo khrag nad gtong ba bkug// byang phyogs dpag bsam yal ga las// ma mo rlung nad gtong ba bkug/// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo las// ma
mo rims nad gtong ba bkug// ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa yang// ma mo rnams kyi rten du byas// shar gyi dkar mo 'bum tshoms la// lug dkar bya dkar sna drangs nas// 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam

bskang// lho yi sngon mo 'bum sdel// lug nag bya nag sna drangs nas// 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// nub kyi dmar mo 'bum sde la// bya smug lug smug sna drangs nas// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs

dam bskang// byang gi ser mo 'bum sde la// lug nag mkhal skye ri bya yi// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// der 'khor gyi ma mos tshe srog gtang// lha yi bu de shi bslong// skye shing med pa'i dngos
grub thob// mdos bzhengs srid pa bde 'gros bzhengs// mdos byung lha yi don du byung// mdos kyi dgos ched shi bslong// bskal pa bar ma'i dus de ru// mdos bzhengs dpal chen he rus bzhengs// ru tra
bka' bsgo zlog pa dang// rnal 'byor grong bsnyen dar ba yis// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// srid pa'i ma mo thams cad 'khrugs// ma mo kha rlangs sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can la// nad
mtshon mu ge'i bskal pa byung// 'gro drug sems can rlag pa khad// dpal chen thugs rdzes ma bzod nas// sprul sku ji ltar 'dul ba'i lhas// las kyi ma mo dbang du bsdus// mthun pa'i yas dang glud
bshams te// snang srid sems can bde la bkod// mdos kyi dgos ched de ltar che// mdos bzhengs dpa' chen nyid kyis bzhengs// mdos byung sems can don du byung// mdos kyi dgos ched phan yon

gyis// nad mtshon mu ge'i bskal pa bzlog// bskal pa tha ma'i dus tsam na// rnal 'byor grong bsnyen dar dus du// snang srid ma mo mkha' 'gro 'khrugs// rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po 'di// sngon gyi las dang
'phral gyi rkyain 'dom nas// rgyu sbyor yon bdag 'khor bcas la// snang srid ma mo thams cad ni// tshe dang srog la bar chad byed// de la mdos cig bzhengs kyang 'tshal// 'bru yi pha dang ma smos

pa// pha ni gnam la ma ni sa// gnam sa gnyis kyi byin rlabs la// gnam las ba mo zil tsam srid/ sa la sa zil pa phrol tsam chags// 'byung ba lnga ni cha bsnyams te// 'bru sna nyi shu rtsa gcig smin// sngon mo
srang phyed chab nas ston// skyes pa gzhon pas sbrus su btsugs// na chung gzhon pa'i yos su btsugs// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa'i phyir// kha gsum dag tu bcad nas ni// sum gnyis rgyu las ri rab
bzhengs// gser gyi ri bdun dag gis bskor// mtsho chen rol mtsho bdun rnams dang// gling chen bzhi dang gling phran brgyad// tha ma lcags ri 'bar bas bskor// yon bdag yul dang mkhar gyi glud// sum
cha'i rgyu sems can bzhengs// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo nas// ri rab 'gram gzhi yan chad du// skye 'gro 'dul pa'i srog chags kyis// ri rab gling gi rgyan du byas// yon bdag nor dang phyugs kyis

glud// smug ma'i pha dang ma mos pa// pha ni sba dkar ldem pa la// ma ni u pa'i khog stong ma// bu ni lho smyug ldem pa dang// skyes pa lho brag ngos las skyes// mon bu spyi bzlums kha 'phra yis// rgya zor khug pas

smyug ma brngas// sha 'breng mnyen la drags// smyug ma khru tshad gang du byas// mdzub tshad lag tu byas// tshon gyi pha dang yab// srid pa pho mo'i byin brlabs las// 'byung ba lnga yi lu gu la// bal tshon sna lngas
brgyan pa cig// snang srid ma mo'i rdzas su byung// 'byung pa'i lug rdzis bal tshon bregs// na chung gzhon pa'i lag gis bkal// sngags 'chad rgya sa pa'i lag gis blangs// nam mkha' gdan dang gur du

byas// rin chen sna lnga nam mkha'i rgyan du byas// gnam la 'phur dgu'i phod kyis brgyan// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo nas// ri rab 'gram gzhi yan chod du// nam mkha' sngon dmar sna tshogs kyi// ri rab
gling bzhi sbugs su bcug// snang srid ma mo'i thugs dam bskang// rgyu sbyor yon gyis bdag pi yi// tshe srog gnyis kyi bar chad bzlog// mdos bzhengs sngags 'chang rgyal pos bzhengs// mdos byung yon
bdag don du byung// mdos kyi dgos chen phan yon gyis// tshe srog gnyis kyi bar chad bzlog// mdos kyis phan yon de ltar che// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// mdos
bzhengs lugs kyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// mdos chen spyan drangs gang nas drang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gling bzhi'i mdos chen spyan drangs pa// gdan
bcas khri med sa nas drangs// rma snam gtsang ma'i gdan stengs su// sngon mo srang phyed gcal du bkram// ma traM chen po'i gzugs su bris// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar
mtshams su bstan// lag g.yas lho la lag g.yon byang// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan pa ni// srin po zil gyis mnan pa'i rtags// rkang pa byang shar bstan zhes gsungs pa ni// dbang ldan zil gyis

mnan pa'i rtags// lag g.yas lho ru bstan pa ni// gshin rdze zil gyis mnan pa'i rtags// lag g.yon byang du bstan pa na// gnod sbyin zil gyis mnan pa'i rtags// ma trang de yi snying kha ru// ri rab gling
bzhi bzhengs pa yis// 'dre srin zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// ma tram de yi phyogs bzhi ru// gser gyis drang shing lan phur bzhi// gru 'degs bzhi ru mnga' gsol te// gru 'degs bzhi yi gdan stengs

su// gling bzhi'i mdos chen spyan 'dren na// snang srid ma mo spyan lam na// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// dgos dgu 'byung pa'i ngo bor gnas// dpal dang ma mo mkha' 'gro la// gling bzhi mdos chen mchod

par 'bul// snang srid las kyi ma mo rnams// chags sdang dbral pa'i phyir// 'gro drug sems can thams cad kyi// nad mtshon mu ge bzlog pa dang// rgyu sbyor yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// tshe srog nyams pa slu
ba dang// gru 'degs bzhi yi gdan stengs su// gling bzhi'i mdos chen spyan 'dren ni// mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i yon du bzhugs// ma mo bskang ba'i rdzas su bzhugs su// yon bdag 'khor bcas glud du
bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ mdos spyan drang zhing bzhugs su gsol pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang po spyan drangs ji ltar
lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// mdos kyi dbang po sbyan drangs pa// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya// legs par nyon la yid la zung// nyi ma shar phyogs ma gi na// gnas yang dkar te zla gam

po// sa yang dkar te zla gam po// ri yang dag dkar te zla kham po// mkhar yang dkar te zla kham po// mi yang dkar te zla kham po// rta yang dkar te zla kham po// 'dzam gling de yi mnga' bdag ni// rgyal po

chen po yul 'khor srung// btsun mo sras dang blon por bcas// de ring mdos la spyan 'dren gyis// mdos kyi dbang por bzhugs su gsol// nyi ma lho phyog pha gi na// gnam yang sngo ste sogs ka'o// ri yang sdo

ste sogs kha'o// mkhar yang sngo ste sogs ka'o// mi yang sngo ste sogs ka'o// rta yang sngo ste sogs ka'o// 'dzam gling de yi mnga' bdag po// grul bum rgyal po 'phags skyes po// btsun mo sras dang blon por
bcas// de ring mdos la spyan 'dren gyis// mdos kyi dpang por bzhugs su gsol// nyi ma nub phyogs ya gi na// gnam yang dmar te zlum po la// sa yang dmar te zlum po la// ri yang dmar

te zlum po la// mkhar yang dmar te zlum po la// mi yang dag te zlum po la// rta yang dmar te zlum po la// 'dzam gling de yi mnga' bdag ni// klu bdud rgyal po spyan mi bzang// btsun mo sras dang blon por

bcas// de ring mdos la spyan 'dren gyis// mdos kyi dpang por bzhugs su gsol// nyi ma byang phyogs pha gi na// gnam yang ljang ste gru bzhi po// sa yang ljang ste gru bzhi'o// ri yang ljang ste gru bzhi

pa'o// mkha' yang ljang ste gru bzhi 'o// mi yang ljang ste gru bzhi 'o// rta yang ljang ste gru bzhi 'o// 'dzam gling de yi mnga' bdag po// gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam thos sras// btsun mo sras dang blon por bcas// de
ring mdos la spyan 'dren gyis// mdos kyi dpang por bzhugs su gsol// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// mdos kyi dpang po spyan drang ba'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o// gnod 'dul
lha yis yang gsol pa// mda' bzhi phur bzhi ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// hUM/ mda' bzhi dag mnga' gsol ba// yes shes 'bar pa'i khro bo bzhi// shar nas khro bo rnam par

rgyal// shar phyogs dri za'i dpung tshoms la// shar gyi bgegs rnams thub par mdzod// lho yi khro bo gshin rdze gshed// lho phyogs gshin rdze'i dpung tshoms la// lho yi bgegs rnams thub par mdzod// nub
nas khro bo rta mchog dpal// nub phyogs klu dbang dpung choms la// nub kyi bgegs rnams thub par badzod// byang nas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// byang phyogs gnod sbyin dpung tshoms la// byang gis bgegs
rnams thub par mdzod// ye shes khro rgyal khyed bzhi yis// mda' bzhi dag la mnga' gsol ba// phyogs bzhi'i bgegs rnams thub par bsrungs// hUM// ral gri bzhi la mnga' gsol pa// chos skyong rgyal po

chen po bzhi// shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung// lho phyogs nas ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs nas ni spyan mi bzang// byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sras// chos skyong rgyal po khyed bzhi yis// ral gri
bzhi la mnga' gsol la// phyogs bzhi'i bgegs rnams thub par mdzod// me long bzhi la mnga' gsol pa// gzhal yas sgo ma chen mo bzhi// shar nas stag gdong lcags kyu ma// lho nas phag gdong zhags pa

ma// nub nas nyi zla lcags sgrog ma// byang nas thal byed dri bu ma// gzhal yas sgo ma khyed bzhi yis// me long bzhi la mnga' gsol la// gzhal yas sgo bzhi thub par bsrungs// hUM/ gur dang yol la mnga'
gsol ba// ma traM dngas ma lnga po las// srid pa'i las mkhan bu med la// shar nas dkar mo las mkhan mo// dar dkar gur phub skongs se skongs// dar dkar yol dri me re re// lho nas sngon
mo las mkhan mo// dar sngon gur 'bum skongs se skongs// dar sngon yol dri me re re// nub nas dmar mo las mkhan mo// dar dmar gur 'bub skongs se skongs// dar dmar yol dri me re re// byang nas
ser mo las mkhan mo// dar ser gur 'bub skongs se skongs// der ser yol 'bri me re re// mas nas mi 'gyur las mkhan mo// dar nag gur 'bub skongs se skongs// dar nag yol bris me re re// srid

pa'i bud med las mkhan lnga// ma trang thugs kyi dkyil du thim// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// mda' bzhi phur bzhi'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// gnod 'dul lha

yis yang gsol pa// rgyan gyi cho ga ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// hUM rin chen sna lnga'i snod chen du// bdud rtsi bcud ldan dza gad sbyar// snang
srid ma mo bskang pa'i phyir// ri rab phyogs bzhi dbus dar lngar// mi 'gyur brtan par bzhugs su gsol// hUM thugs rdzes rtogs pa'i smyug ma la// rtogs 'jom che ba'i rgod sgros bskyon// 'khor pa'i gnas
su gcig pa'i mda'// ri rab gling bzhi'i rgyan du dgod// hUM/ thugs rjes rno mtshon ral gri 'di// che bar mtshon gyi rgyal po ste// dug gsum rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir// ri rab gling bzhi'i rgyan du

dgod// hUM/ snang srid sgron ma gsal pa'i me long 'di// ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin pas// snang srid ma mo bsal pa'i phyir// ri rab gling bzhi'i rgyan du bkod// hUM/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i don rtogs ni// skye shi
med pa'i don gyi rang bzhin las// mthing nag 'bar ba'i yol chen 'dis// gling bzhi 'di la legs par bskor// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// rgyan gyi cho ga bstan pa'i
le'u ste so bdun pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dang por zor skyogs ji ltar byung// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// zor skyogs cho ga 'di ltar

ro// hUM/ dang po sridapa ji ltar chags// gnas yang ma mchis sa yang mchis// shar phyogs lho nub byang ma mchis so// cing med stong pa'i dus tsam na// rang 'byung rgyal po srid pa bkod// bdud ma traM bya ba sdig

can gyis// snang srid thams cad stongs su cha// khams gsum thams cad brlag tu cha// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// ma trang bya ba'i sdig can de// byang shar mtshams nas tsir gyis bzung// mgo ni lho nub
mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// ma traM chen po bshas te btang// ma traM chen po'i klad gshegs pas// dum bu gcig la gyo tshal bzhi// gcig ni dpal he ru'i

rdzas// gcig ni ma mo mkha' 'gro'i rdzas// gcig ni mkha' 'gro brten pa'i rdzas// gcig ni rnal 'byor bzlog pa'i rdzas// dngul skyogs dkar po de nas byung// ma traM chen po'i tshul bshas pas// bse skyogs

khra bo de nas byung// ma traM chen po'i lce bshas pas// zangs skyogs dmar po de nas byung// ma traM chen po'i snyan bshas pas// ras skyogs nag po de nas byung// dang po skyogs byung de nas kyang// da ni gzhu byung

gang nas byung// ma traM rtsi bas las gzhu gcig byung// ma traM rgyus pas nargyud cig byung// chang pa brngang pas rtsad pa'i tshul// rnam pa thabs dang shes rab tshul// mchog ma dang bzang nyi ma rang// ma nor brtan
par rgyud kyis bsrengs// dang po mda' byung gang nas byung// ma traM thur ma g.yas pa las// skyogs mda' bya rgod dang// mda' nag pho rogs byung// ma haM mchog phur g.yon pa las// mda' dmur 'ug pa

dang// mda' gser khra sgro byung// ltong ni thabs dang shes rab ste// sgro ni ye shes bzhi yis sgron// smyug ma byang chub sems kyi dang// mde 'u sku gsung thugs kyi dang// dang po mda' chung de nas phyung// dang po
skyogs la srog ma mo mchis// mtshe mo srog tu mchis// skyogs la snying ma mchis/ yungs nag snying du bcug dang po skyogs la dbugs ma mchis/ ya la dbugs su gsal/ dang po skyogs sa khrag ma mchis/

dmar po khrag dang gsal/ da ni skyogs 'phang gang du 'phang/ mda' mo bya rgod shar du 'phang/ mda' nag pho rog lho ru 'phang/ mda' dmar 'ug pa nub tu 'phang/ mda' ser khra sgro byang du 'phang/ shar gyi
phyogs cig 'phen/ shar gyi dri za 'bum gyi rgyal/ dri za lcam cig ma la skyogs mi 'phang/ mu stegs a 'bras yul du 'phen/ lho yi phyogs su skyogs cigapha 'phen// lhogs phyogs gshin rje 'bum gyi
rgyal// gshin rje lcam cig ma la skyogs mi 'phen// mu stegs gnyen pa'i yul la 'phen// nub kyi phyogs su skyogs cig 'phen// nub phyogs klu bdud 'bum gyi rgyal// klu bdud lcam cig ma la skyogs mi

'phen// bal po spyi cings yul du 'phen// byang gi phyogs su skyogs cig 'phen// byang phyogs gnod sbyin yul gyi rgyal// gnod sbyin lcam cig ma la skyogs mi 'phen// byang gi dgra dang bgegs la 'phen// da

ni skyogs bgrong ste// mi bgrang ba'i rnam pa la// chos kyi bsrung ma la mi bgrang ngo// bon gyi lha gsal la mi bgrang ngo// skyes pa'i lha la mi bgrang ngo// bud med kyi dpal mi bgrang ngo// zas kyi bcud mi
bgrang ngo// nor gyi dbyig mi bgrang ngo// zas kyi bcud nor gyi dbyig yang mi bgrang ngo// mi khyim gang mi bgrang ngo// phyugs ra gang mi bgrang ngo// rta 'og rte mi bgrang ngo// bran khol mi bgrang
ngo// byas la nas dang tshe phugs su gtor ro// da ni bra po dang// yungs nag thogs la bgrang ba ni// lta ngan gyi pha mos pas// 'gog po mgo gsum la// gzig ngan gyi phyi mo gnyis// de gnyis tshogs kyi

bu// bdud kyi than byung ba// g.yag mo ru 'dzings yin te bgrang// dmu yi than ngan pa// dmu sgo thig yar yin te bzang// btsan gyi than ngan pa// sha ba ru 'dzings yin te bgrang// ya chos than ngan pa// kyi la

drug phrom yin te bgrang// shar phyogs than ngan pa// lug la ro khal yin te bgrang// ma bdun than ngan pa// zhing la shul ba yin te bgrang// dur sri'i than ngan pa// khang thog srin byang yin te bgrang// srod

la bya 'tsher bgrang// tho rang khyi ngu bgrang// sa la lba brgyal bgrang// kha phrad mdza' 'o ni// lhag phrad 'cha' ba bgrang// bla ru ma 'bud bgrang ngo// 'og tu chu skol bgrang// mi kha ngan kha bgrang// lta ngan sdig

bcu bgrang// rus la sogs ngan 'grang// snag la 'chil ngan bgrang// mo ngan thun ngan bgrang// ltas ngan sdig can bgrang ngo// de ni sgyur zhing byol te staM// hUM/ shar gyi phyogs nas bsgyur mdzad ma// che zhe dri

za'i lcam cig ma// chebs su sbal bu kha dkar chibs// rang rtags dung gi rdo rje gsor// bran du dri za pho mo 'khol// las su bdud dang khram bzlog ma// don du sgyur la dga' ba mo// shar nas myos pa'i dgra

dang bgegs// zlog cig sgyur cig shar du bsgyur/ lho yi phyogs nas bsgyur mdzad ma// che zhe gshin rje'i lcam cig ma// chibs su chu glang sngon po chibs// rang rtags lcags kyi rdo rje gsor// bran du gshin rje
pho mo 'khol// las su bdud dang khram bzlog ma// don du bsgyur la dga' ba mo// lho nas nyes pa'i dgra dang bgegs 'gugs ma// zlog cig sgyur cig lho ru bsgyur// nub kyi phyogs nas bsgyur mdzad ma// che

zhe klu bdud lcam cig ma// chibs su chu srin dmar po chibs// rang rtags byu ru'i rdo rje gsor// bran du klu bdud pho mos bskor// las su bsgyur la dga' ba mo// nub nas nye sa pa'i dgra dang bgegs// zlog

cig sgyur cig nub tu bsgyur cig/ byang gi phyogs nas bsgyur mdzad ma// che zhe gnod sbyin lcam gcig ma// chibs su shing rta gsar rnying chibs// rang rtags gser gyi rdo rje gsor// bran du gnod sbyin pho

mos bskor// las su bdud dang khram bzlog ma// don du bsgyur la dga' ba mo// byang nas nyes pa'i dgra dang bgegs// zlog cig sgyur cig byang du bsgyur// steng gi phyogs nas sgyur byed ma// nam mkha'i rgyal
mo sgyur byed ma// chibs su skar chen dmar po chibs// rang rtags mu tig rdo rje gsor// bran du lha bdud pho mos bskor// las su bdud dang khram bzlog ma// don du bsgyur la dga' ba

mo// steng nas nyes pa'i dgra dang bgegs// zlog cig sgyur cig steng du bsgyur// 'og gi phyogs nas bsgyur mdzad ma// e ka dzA Ti mthu mo che// chibs su sa bdag chen mo chibs// rang rtags gser gyi rdo rje
gsor// bran du sa bdag pho mos bskor// las su bdud dang khram bzlog ma// don du bsgyur la dga' ba mo// 'og nas nyes pa'i dgra dang bgegs// zlog cig sgyur cig 'og tu bsgyur// phyogs bzhir bsgyur

la mtshams bzhir bzlog// de nas mda' dang skyogs thang la khyer la 'di skad do// stag gdong chen mo lcags kyu ma// ri rab shar gyi sgo phye la// mda' lam sha ra ra// skyogs lam 'brengs se brengs// phag

gdong nag mo zhags pa ma// ri rab lho yi sgo phye la// mda' lam sha ra ra// skyogs lam brengs se brengs// nyid ma zla ba mar mo lcags sgrog ma// ri rab nub kyi sgo phye la// mda' lam sha ra ra// skyogs lam

brengs se brengs// thal byed ljang nag dril bu ma// ri rab byang gi sgo phye la// mda' lam sha ra ra// skyogs lam brengs se brengs// zhes brjod la sna la mda' 'phang// de nas skyogs 'phang ngo// ma hA shan ting

dang sarba ru pa'i mda' bzhi skyogs bzhi'i cho ga'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// zor skyon pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o// de nas bdag gi don du nang ma mo'i mdos su bskang

ba zhes bya ste// ma mo spyi yi 'phrin las gzhung bsrang la tshogs dbul// 'dzab bstod bya zhing bzlas pa zhes bya ba dang// dngos grub slang ba bzhin byas// ma mo spyi yi bskul ba ring nas so so'i gnas nas
bskul// dbang phyug ma dang bstan ma yan chad rdzogs par bya'o// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// nang ma mo mdos su bskang ba'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// de nas dpal

chen lhag ma la// phyi srin mo'i mdos su bskang ba gang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// de nas srin mo'i mdos bskang ba// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya'o// dang la gur sgo dbye ba ni// hUM/ stong gsum
stong gi 'jig rten na// dbus phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// gser mtsho ser mo mtsho// gser mtsho de yi dkyil shed na// gser brag gnas du zangs se zangs// gser brag de yi kha shed na// gser gyi sku

mkhar ldems se ldems// sku mkhar de yi kha shed na// nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo bzhugs// do nub gur gyi sgo phye la// do nod yas kyi sgo phye zhig// do nod las dang don du spraud// mkhar ba'i me long gsal
gong du// nas ser mo 'bru bdun la// rma'u thanadang 'phrin mtho yis// than gyi gong du sha ra ra// yas kyi gong du si li li// yas la dbang ba yas la spyan// thags la dbang ba thags la

sbyon// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// dung mtsho dkar ma mo re re// dung mtsho de yi dkyil shed na// dung brag gnam du zengs se zengs// dung brag de yi kha shed na// dung

gi sku mkhar ldems se ldems// sku mkhar de yi nang shed na// rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo bzhugs// de nub gur gyi sgo phye la// do nod yas kyi sgo phye zhig// do nod yas dang gdon du sprod// mkha ra ba'i me long

gsal gong du// nas dkar lamo 'bru bdun la// rma bu than dang 'phrin mtho yis// than gyi gong du sha ra ra// yas kyo gong du si li li// yas la dbang ba yas la spyon// thags la dbang ba thags la spyon// stong

gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// g.yu tsho sngon mo me rere// g.yu mtsho de yi nang shed na// g.yu brag gnam du zangs se zengs// g.yu brag de yi kha shed na// g.yu yi sku mkhar ldems

se ldems// sku mkhar de yi nang shed na// rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo bzhugs// do nod gur gyi sgo phye la// do nod yas kyi sgo phye zhig// do nod yas dang gdon du sprod// mkhar ba'i me long gsal gong du// nas

sngon de ni 'bru bdub la// rma bu than dang 'phrin mtho yis// than gyi gong du sha ra ra// yas kyi gong du si li li// yas la dbang ba yas la spyaun// thags la dbang ba thags la spyaun// stong gsum stong gi 'jig

rten na// nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// zangs mtsho dmar po me re// zangs mtsho mer ba'i nang shed na// zangs brag gnam du zengs se zengs// zangs brag de yi kha shed na// zangs kyi sku mkhar ldems se

ldems// sku mkhar de yi nang shed na// pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo bzhugs// do nod gur gyi sgo phye la// do nod yas kya sgo phye zhig// do nod yas dang gdon du sprod// mkhar ba'i me long gsal gong du// nas dmar

mo 'bru bdun la// rma bu than dang 'phrin mtho yis// than gyi gong du sha ra ra// yas kyi gong du si li li// yas la dbang ba yas la spyaun// thags la dbang ba thags la spyaun// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten
na// byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// dug mtsho nag po me re re// dug mtsho de yi dkyil shed na// lcags brag gnam du zangs se zangs// lcags brag de yi kha shed na// lcags kyi sku mkhar ldems se

ldems// sku mkhar de yi nang shed na// las kyi rigs kyi rgyal mo bzhugs// do nod gur gyi sgo phye la// do nod yas kyi sgo phye zhig// do nod yas dang gdon du sprod// mkhar ba'i me long gsal gong du// nas
nag mo 'bru bdud la// rma bu than dang 'phrin mtho yis// than gyi gong du sha ra ra// yas kyi gong du si li li// yas la dbang ba yas la spyaun// glud la dbang ba glud la spyon// zhes gsungs

so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// gur sgo dbye ba'i ste bzhi bcu pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma mo'i kha rlangs ji lta dbyung// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo gdug

pa'i kha rlangs la// dal nad byung ba bsda ba ni// gnam thar bshus la 'di skad do// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// shar phyogs gur gyi sgo phye la// gdug pa'i bud med dkar mo 'bum// dkar mo 'bum gyi kha

rlangs las// dal nad rims nad sna tshogs byung// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// thugs rdze sprul pa'i 'do zer gyis// bsda bsda rul nad rgya nad bsda// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// lho phyogs gur gyi sgo

phye la// gdug pa'i bud med sngon mo 'bum// sngon mo 'bum gyi kha rlangs las// dal nad rims nad sna tshogs 'byung// bsda ba mdze nad bco brgyad bsda// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// nub phyogs gur gyi

sgo phye bas// gdug pa'i bud med dmar mo 'bum// dmar mo 'bum gyi kha rlangs las// phrag nang rnam pa sna tshogs byung// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis// bsda ba khrag nad sna tshogs bsda// bcom ldan

phyag na rdo rje yis// byang phyogs gur gyi sgo phye la// gdug pa'i bud med ser mo 'bum// ser mo 'bum gyi kha rlangs las// dal nad rims nad sna tshogs 'byung// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis// bsda ba
mkhris nad sna tshogs bsda// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// steng phyogs gur gyi sgo phye las// gdug pa'i bud med nag mo 'bum// nag mo 'bum gyi kha rlangs las// dal nad rims nad sna tshogs

'byung// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis// bsda bo yams nad sna tshogs bsda// bsda 'o smyon nad sna tshogs bsda// yas kyi bdud g.yos 'di yis bsda// mas kyi sri langs 'di
yis bsda// mdze nad bco brgyad 'di yis bsda// mi nad sna dgu 'di yis bsda// rta nad 'tsher bcu 'di yis bsda// gnag nad lhog yor 'di yis bsda// lug nad rtal pa 'di yis bsda// khyi nad khrag pa 'di
yis bsda// rta nad kar phyags 'di yis bsda// bsdas pas mi 'gro gcig kyang med// shar phyogs dri za'i lag tu bsdas te cha la la// lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag tu bsdas te cha la la// nub phyogs klu bdud

lag tu bsdas te cha la la// byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag tu bsdas te cha la la// shar lho me lha'i lag tu bsdas te cha la la// lho nub srin po'i lag tu bsdas te cha la la// nub byang rlung lha'i lag tu bsdas te cha
la la// de nas bcu pa'i cho ga la// yol ba'i dar sham bshus la// da ni bcu bcu na// gling bzhi mdos chen nang du ni// chos kyi srung ma mi bcu'o// bon gyi lha gsal mi bcu'o// skye bo'i dgra bla

mi bcu'o// skyes pa'i lha mi bcu'o// mgo ba yi sman mi bcu'o// byas la 'bru phyugs su gtor ro// da ni bcu pa'i cho ga la// yas kyi bdud g.yos 'di ru bcu// mas kyi sri langs 'di ru bcu// rus la srog ngan

'di ru bcu// snag la mchin ngan 'di ru bcu// ltas ngan cho dgu 'di ru bcu// ngan 'gyur sdig bcu 'di ru bcu// bcu bcu de ni bsda bsda nas// sbrul nag bzhin du chus kyi bcus// sngags chen rgyal ba'i dbu
la bcings// sham bu g.yas kyi cod pan gyis// ya bdud gyen du bsgyur// g.yon gyi cod pan gyis// ma bdud thur du sgyur// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// nad bsdas pa dang
kha rlangs dbyung ba'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// klu btsal rim pa ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// glud btsal

cho ga ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// dang po gnam yang ma mchis so// sa yang de ni ma mchis so// shar yang de ni ma mchis so// lho yang de ni ma mchis so// nub yang de ni ma mchis

so// byang yang de ni ma mchis so// gling bzhi de ni ma mchis so// gling phran de ni ma mchis so// gser gyi ri bdun ma mchis so// rol mtsho bdun yang ma mchis so// 'gro drug de ni ma mchis te// sems can de
ni ma mchis so// ma mo de na ma mchis te// mkha' 'gro de ni ma mchis so// dpag bsan de ni ma mchis te// shing bu de ni ma mchis so// bgegs rigs de ni ma mchis so// stong phrag de ni ma mchis

so// sems can spyi mthun las dbang gis// sa chu de ni me rlung gis// 'byung ba chen po cha bsnyams nas// dang po gnam yang ma mchis de nas byung// sa yang ma mchis de nas byung shar yang ma mchis de nas

byung// lho yang ma mchis de nas byung// nub yang ma mchis de nas byung// byang yang ma mchis de nas byung// ri rab ma mchis de nas byung/ gling bzhi ma mchis de nas byung// gling phran ma mchis de nas
byung// gser gyi ri bdun de nas byung// rol mtsho bdun yang de nas byung// 'gro drug sems can de nas byung// ma mo mkha' 'gro de nas byung// dpag bsam shing bu de nas byung// bgegs rigs stong phrag

de nas byung// sems can spyi mthun las dbang gis// sa chu de ni me rlung gis// 'byung ba chen po cha bsnyams nas// 'bru sna lnga ni dus su smin// 'bru sna nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phye bre srang phyed gcal nas ni// rin
chen sna tshogs phye bdar te// bzhi cha gcig la ri rab gzugs// rigs dang bstun pa'i kha dog dbye// gser gyi ri bdun rnams kyis bskor// rol mtshos bdun gyis bskor ba 'di// ston pa
dga' rab rde rje yis// mi yi glud du byin gyis brlabs// rdza yi khabs su byin gyis brlabs// de na ngar phye bzhi cha la// gcan gzan rgyal po drug gi gzugs// dkar la mdzes dang ldan par bya// 'dod

chags gtso mo drug kying bskyon// ri rab bang rim dang po bskor// gtso mo rnams la 'bul par bya// ston pa dga' rab rdo rje yis// mi yi glud du byin gyis brlabs// rdza yi khams su byin gyis brlabs// de

nas ngar phye bzhi che la// shugs kyis rgyal po drug po la// 'dod chags gtsod bo dag kyang bskyon// kha dog rgyan chas rnam par mdzes// rin chen gyis ni rab tu brgyan// sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan pa'o// ri

rab bang rim dang po bskor// de yang gtso mo rnams la 'bul// ston pa dga' rab rdo rje yis// mi yi glud du byin gyis brlabs// rdza yi khams su byin gyis brlabs// de nas ngar phye bzhi cha la// glang chen
gzugs ni bcu bzhi dang// stag gzig la sogs bcu bzhi dang// mdangs ldan byad gzugs bcu bzhi dang// dkar po ku ku ra tsa bcu bzhi dang// gser g.yu dkor dang nor bur bcas// ri rab bang rim

bar ma bskor// ston pa dga' rab rdo rje yis// mi yi glud du byin gyis brlangs// rdza yi khabs su byin gyis brlabs// de nas ngar phye bzhi cha la// snang srid sems can gzugs su byas// kha dog sna tshogs
yang dag ldan// sha sna dag ni sna tshogs dang// khrag sna dag ni sna tshogs dang// gser g.yu dkor dang nor bur bcas// ri rab bang rim mtha' mar bskor// srid pa cha byed la sogs te// ma mor grags pa

kun gyis rdzas ston pa// dang po glud phul su yi ring la phul// rgyal po 'khor lo drug pa nad tsi tsi dzo las zin pa las// phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang nang bcud kyi sems can bcas te 'phul// gnam gyis de ni

bya nag dang// sa yi de ni lug nag dang// shing gra de ni sna tshogs dang// 'phang khra de ni sna tshogs dang// rgyang bu de ni sna tshogs dang/ gser 'phang de ni g.yu 'phang dang// rgyal po'i glud du 'bul// de nas

glud du phul su yi ring la 'phul// rgyal po khri khri snyung ba las// glud kyi dpe ni 'khor lodrug pa'i dpe la blangs te phul// de nas glud 'phul su yi ring la phul// 'bal yul grong brgyad na// 'bal 'khor rtse
dgu na// 'bal lce ma re tri bya ba de// 'dug 'dug 'dug ma mkhas// rgyags rgyags rgyags ma mkhas// me btang chen po phyogs bzhir bstang// rta skad chen po phyogs bzhir skad// 'di su yi thugs su
bsnyud// ma bdud kyi thugs su bsnyud// rgyal mo yi thugs su bsnyud// ma bdud rgyal mo de// mi che nyal chung nya la na// ma bdud mi nyal lo// rlung nyal ngad nyal dang// ma bdud mi nyal lo// me

nyal drod nyal dang// ma bdud mi nyal lo// chu nyal rlabs nyal dang// ma bdud mi nyal lo// sems nyal mdangs nyal dang// ma bdud mi nyal lo// ma bdud rgyal mo de// nam phar phyed tshur phyed nas// srod

dang dbugs la nyab// 'byal lce rma hri ti dang 'byal// lce ma hri ti la// ma bdud thugs khros nas// lcags kyi sdig pa kha dgu mig// dgu pa cig sbad de gtang ba las// lce rma hri ti nad kyis zin// rgya nag
gtsug lag rgyal po la// rtog dang spyad bgyis pas// ma bdud thugs khros nas// sprul pa skyes nas 'dug go zer// de la glud du ci 'phul na// gnam gyi bya nag dang// sa yi lug nag dang// shing bkra sna

tshogs dang// 'phang phra sna tshogs dang// rgyang bu sna tshogs dang// gser 'phang g.yu 'phang dang// glud du 'tshal lo skad// mdos 'di su yis byas// rgya nag mdos mkhan nag po hal gyis byas// dang po nam

mkha' gang nas byung// nam mkha'i pha dang yab// 'o rgyad stong gi 'bras phyug po// ci phyir zhes te 'bras phyug po// 'bras sa le byang lba nya re la// 'bras khal stong du 'phel// de phyir zhes te 'bras phyug
po// nam mkha'i ma dang yum// g.yu za g.yu phyug sman// ci phyir zhes te g.yu phyug sman// ra ma sa g.yu lnga dkor du mang ba las// ran 'tshal gser gyis yar bor 'tshal// chab 'tshal g.yu yi lu mar

'tshal// rol ma de ni g.yu ru 'brul// de phyir zhes te g.yu phyug sman// dang po ba 'byung gang nas byung// ra ma sa g.yu lnga dkor du mang ba las// ra mas g.yu gcig la// gser gyis lu gu gse ru la// dbral

na g.yu'i mdos cha khyi li li// bal ser nam mchis te de nas byung// dngul gyi lu gu dkar ru la// zangs kyi mdos cha khyi li li// bal dkar ma mchis de nas byung// ra ma sa g.yu gcig la// zangs kyi lu gu
dmar po la// dbral na gser mdos bya khyi li li// bal dmar ma mchis de nas byung// ra ma sa g.yu cig la// lcags kyi lu gu nag po la// dbral na zangs kyi mdos bya khyi li li// bal sngon ma mchis de nas
byung// dang po bal byung ste// bal la rmel ba'i mi ma mchis// bal rmel su yi rmal// nam mkha'i bu mo skar mig ma yis rmal// rmel ba'i mi mchis kyis// gru bu su yis btul// mgon bzangs phya bu mos
btul// gru bu thul ba'i mi mchis kyang// nam mkha' su yis bri// rgya nag mdos mkhan nag po ha kyi bris// nam mkha' bri ba'i mi mchis kyang// nam mkha' 'bri ba'i dpe ma mchis// nam mkha' bri pa'i dpe
btsal ba// phyug pa'i gzha' yul du byon// nam mkha' dpe ni gzha' las blangs// gzha' ris sar na nam mkha' ser// gzha' ris sngo na nam mkha' sngo// gzha' ris ljang na nam mkha'
ljang// gzha' ris dmar na nam mkha' dmar// gser gyi nam mkha' g.yu'i chun bskor nas// dngul gyi nam mkha' la lcags kyi chun bskor can// lcags kyi nam mkha' gser gyi chun bskor can// gser
gyi nam mkha' la// g.yu'i re kha can// zangs kyi nam mkha' la// dngul gyi re kha can// gser gyi nam mkha' la// g.yu yi chun skor can// g.yu yi nam mkha' la// zangs kyi re mkha' can// dngul gyi nam
mkha' can// nam mkha' des byung ste// nam mkha' phur gyi gshog ma mchis// nam mkha' phur ba'i gshog mchis kying// rma bya mdongs ldan lha yis bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i gshog ma mchis so// zer mo
'phan bzang klu yi bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i bya gshog tu byas// re sde nag po bdud kyi bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i gshog tu bgyis// kang ka mchu rings nam mkha' bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i gshog tu
bgyis// krung krung skya mo gnam gyi bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i gshog tu bgyis// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i ba'i gshog mchis kyang// nam mkha' khong gi snying ma mchis// nam mkha' khong gi snying btsal
ba// ston pa dga' rab rdo rje yis// rgya yul snying du byon// zongs du gser phye ser mo snams// khal par mdzo mo bre mo de dang// ya zam 'das pa las// ting zam rgyal ba las// mdzo mo bre mo chab kyis

khyer// gser phye ser mo chab tu pho// nam mkha' khong gi snying med nas// yungs kar ser mo de yis bgyis// gser long ser mo de yis bgyis// nam mkha'i khong gi snying mchis kyang// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i

rgyan ma mchis// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan btsal ba// dar sna dkar po che ba'i rgyan// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan du bgyis// dar sna sngon po yon tan brgyan// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan du bgyis// dar
sna dmar po chags pa'i rgyan// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan du bgyis/ dar sna sair po las rab brgyan/ nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan du bgyis/ mdzes pa'i rgyan mchis kyang// nam mkha' mgul gyi rgyan ma
mchis// nam mkha' mgul gyi rgyan 'tshal// skar gyi rgyal po 'phra med 'dis// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang// sngo dang nag tu 'khyil ba 'dis// dang po stag gzig yul nas byung// bris pa stag gzig

rgyal pos bris// nam mkha' mgul gyi rgyan med nas// nam mkha' mgul gyi rgyan du bgyis// mgul rgyan mchis kyang// stong du lhag pa'i bya ma mchis// byang chub gang nas byung// srid pa la byang ste// ye med

stong pa las// mi srid pa'i chos byung ste// rgya mtsho gting med bya ba nas// rtsa rtsa med bya bskyes// rtsa rtsa med kyi rtsa ba ru// drod dang rlan gshog bos// ya mtshan 'phrul gyi tshang gcig btsas// ya

mtshan 'phrul gyi tshang nang du// sprul pa'i sgong lnga tsam byung// gser sgong ser po dang// g.yu sgong sngon po dang ma// dngul sgong dkar po dang// zangs sgong dmar po dang// lcags sgong nag po dang/ gser sgong

ser po la// rtol ba'i mi ma mchis// sgo nga rang rdol bas// gser byang ser du byung// g.yu sgong sngon po la// rtol ba'i mi ma mchis// sgo nga rang rdol bas// g.yu bya sngon po byung// zangs sgong dmar po de// rtol

gyi mi ma mchis// sgo nga rang rtol bas// zangs bya dmar po byung// lcags sgong nag po la// rtol gyi mi ma mchis// sgo nga rang rdol bas// lcags bya nag po byung// nag mo gser mig 'di// che yang mi che
ste// 'jig rten mdos dang mnyam// chung yang mi chung ste// sa gzhi mdos dang mnyam// nag mo gser mig 'di// bya mig mas yang 'gebs pa ni// srid pa mas yang chags pa yin// bya mig dmar la gdangs

pa ni// srid pa khrag las chags pa yin// nag mo gser mig 'di// 'gro na stobs dang ldan// smra na ngag kyang snyan// gsung snyan kyu ru ru// ma bdud bskang ba'i bya// ma bdud kun bskang ngo// byang byung der

byung ngo// shing khra'i cho ma ston// shing khra'i brang ma gdon// yo rgye dkar po lha'i shing// shing khra'i rgyu ru byas// mu la shing glu shing// smon shing mkhal ma 'dis// shing khra'i rgyu ru byas// gser shing skyer pa gdug

pa'i shing// shing khra'i rgyu ru bgyis// g.yu shing 'phang ma 'di// shing khra'i rgyu ru bgyis// lho smyug ldem pa 'di// shing khra'i rgyu ru bgyis// shing khra'i cho bton te// lug gi cho ma bton// lug gi cho ga

bton// lug gi 'brang ma btang// lug byung gang nas byung// g.yung byung gang nas byung// mtshe'i snying po brag tu byung// brag gi snying po mtshe ru byung// tshe'i snying po nas su byung// nas kyi snying ngo lug gi snying po
de// gnam lug nag po spyi tshigs nga// sa lug nag po skog gnyis// de gnyis 'tshogs kyi bu// nag po sna bkur de nas byung// nag po mkhal dkar de nas byung// nag po mkhal skya de nas byung// mkhal rgya

stong gser de nas byung// mkhal rgya mchi ris de nas byung// srol po mkhal rgya de nas byung// nag po lcags ru de nas byung// nag mo mon mgo de nas byung// dkar mo shad mgo de nas byung// dkar mo yangs

de nas byung// srid pa'i lug 'byung de nas byung// lug byung de ltar byung ste// 'phrang gi cho ma bton// 'phang gi 'phrang ma bton// 'phang byung gang nas byung// gser 'phang ser mo la// g.yu yi mo lo dgu
brtsegs la// g.yu 'phang sngon mo la// zangs kyi mo lo dgu brtsegs la// zangs 'phang dmar po la// dngul gyi mo lo dgu brtsegs gsal// lcags 'phang nag mo la// gser gyi mo lo dgu
brtsegs gsal// dngul 'phang dkar po la// g.yu yi mo lo dgu brtsegs gsal// mdzo lug sngon pos bzlog// dang po glud byung de nas byung// sku glud dang po de ltar phul// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo
bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// glud btsal ba lo rgyus kyi mdos bstan pa'i le'u ste zhes gnyis pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// srid pa'i dbang can ma mo rnams// sems can kun la gnod

byed pa'i// de yi bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// srid pa'i ma mo bskang ba ni// rnam pa gnyis su ngas bstan na// gnyis kyi rim pa 'di

lta ste// de yang rgyus bskang ba dang// mdangs kyis bskang ba'o// de la rnal 'byor ba dam tshig nyams pa la sogs pa rnams ni rgyu chen pos bskang ngo// sems can phal pa'i ched du rgyu chung ngun gyis bskang

ngo// rang bzhin ni mdos kyis bskang ngo// de la bskang bar bya ba'i dus// sngon la bsgrub par bya ba'i dkyis 'khor gsal bar bya ste 'di skad do// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi ni rgyan gsal ba// dbus nas dpag
bsam shing gcig 'khrungs// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba ni// 'dod chags khrag go rgya mtsho khyi li li// dpag bsam shing gi shun pa la// zhe sdang me 'bar lams se lams// dpag bsam shing gi lo ma
la// gti mug mun pa thibs se thibs// dpag bsam shing gi khong srog la// nga rgyal khrag chen thabs se thabs// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo na// phrag dog chud pa'i shing gcig gda'// dpa' bsam shing gi

rtse mo na// phrag dog tshub nag khyi li li// tshag snang rnam lnga tshad ma'i nang shed na// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal po zhes kyang bya// skos rdze brang dkar zhes kyang bya// srid pa'i skos mkhan zhes kyang bya// dpag bsam

shing gi rtse la bzhugs// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// 'dod chags khrag gi mtsho'i dkyil shed na// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mo bzhugs// bdud mo rgya byin kun dga' mos kyang bya// srid pa'i skos

'dings rgyal mo bzhugs// pha gu khri stong gi rgyal po des// thugs kyi yig 'phrin rgya mtsho'i gting du bskyal// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mo des// thugs kyis yig 'phrin ri rab rtse la bskyal// 'dod chags

srid le'i bya ru ltas// bar snang khams la sbyor ba mdzad pa las// yid kyi stong thal gyi skyes// dpag bsam shar phyogs yal ga la// dung sgong dkar po'i tshang cig bcas// phyi yi sgo nga yang ni bcas// bar gyi
bdar bcad nang gi bri brtol bas// dung gi gur gcig khyi li li// dar dkar yol bres me re re// dung gi phyir dkar khrigs se khrigs// bse yi nang mkhar krongs se krongs// dung 'dra dgu
yol nang shed na// bud med dkar mo dung gi ral pa can// phyag na dung gi ga 'u bsnams// sems can kun la 'tshe bar byed// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal pos ming btags pa// mkha' la 'gro zhing sems can
rus bdag mdzad// mkha' 'gro rnam snang sems can rus kyi bdag// de phyir rnam snang rus bdag chen pos bya'o// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mos ming btags ba// snang srid 'byung ba sa yi bdag mos

bya'o// 'byung ba sa la dbang sgyur zhing// skye 'gro ma rung ba la mnga' mdzad ma// las su rus nad chen mo gtong// rus bdag chen mo'i thugs dam bskang// lho phyogs dpag bsam yal ga la// g.yu sgong sngon

po'i tshang cig bcas// phyi yi sgo nga ya ni bcag// bar gyi bdar bcad nang gi bri brtol bas// g.yu yi gur cig skongs se skongs// byu ru'i bying dkar khrigs se khrigs// de 'dra'i gur yol nang shed na// bud

med sngon mo g.yu yi ral pa can// phyag na g.yu yi ga'u bsnams// sems can kun la 'tshe bar byed// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal po' ming btags pa// mkha' la 'gro zhing sems can drod kyi bdag// phyir 'od

gsal sems can drod kyi bdag// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mos ming btags pa// snang srid 'byung ba me yi mnga' 'bag mo// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing// skye 'gro'i drid la mnga' mdzad ma// las su
rims nad rnam lnga gtong// drod bdag chen mo'i thugs dam bskang// nub phyogs dpag bsam yal ga la// zangs sgong dmar po'i tshang cig bcas// phyi yi sgo nga bcag par gyi bdag bcad// nang gi srid yang
brtol// zangs gur cig skangs se skangs// dar dmar yol bres me re re// g.yu nad 'khor khrigs se khrigs// sre yi phying dkar zangs se zangs// de 'dra'i gur yol nad shes na// bud med dmar mo byu ru'i
ral pa can// phyag na zangs kyi ga 'u bsnams// nang na sems can mnga' khrag blugs// sems can kun la 'tshe bar mdzad// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal pos ming btags pas// mkha' la 'gro zhing sems can

khrag bdag mdzad// de phyir mkha' 'gro gnyen bsal ma yis byas// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mos ming btags pas// snang srid 'byung ba chu la mnga' mdzad ma// skye 'gro'i khrag la mnga' mdzad ma// las su

khrag nad chen mo gtong// khrag bdag chen po'i thugs dam bskang// byang phyogs dpag bsam yal ga la// phra stong phrag pa'i tshang bcas nas// phyi yi sgong bcag bar gyi sri brtol bas// 'phra gur khra bo skong se
skongs// 'phra yol khra bo khyud de khyud// zangs kyi nam mkha' khrigs se khrigs// dung gi phying dkar khrigs se khrigs// de 'dra'i gur yol gyi nang shed na// bud med phra mo bse yi ral pa
can// phyag na bse yi ga 'u bsnams// sems can kun la 'tshe bar byed// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal pos ming btags pa// mkha' la 'gro zhing sems can dbugs mdzad mo// de phyir mkha' 'gro yang gsal
g.yos// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi ming btags pas// snang srid 'byung ba rlung gi mnga' bdag mo// zhes gsungs la mnga' mdzad ma// las su rlung nad skya lgangs gtong// dbugs bdag chen mo'i thugs dam

bskang// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo na// lcags sgong nag po'i tshang cig bcas// phyi yi sgong bcag bar gyi bdar bcad// nang gi pri brtol bas// lcags kyi gur cig skongs se skongs// mthing nag yol bre me
re re// rin chen sna lnga'i phying dkar khrigs se khrigs// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal pos ming btags pas// mkha' la 'gro zhing sems can bkrag bdag mdzad// de phyir mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal ma// ma phya
sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mos ming btags pa// snang srid 'byung ba nam mkha'i mnga' bdag mo// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur zhing// skye 'gro'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// las su yams nad sna lnga

gtong// bkrag bdag chen cho'i thugs dam bskang// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal po dang// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mo gnyis// ri rab bum ba'i nad du sbyor ba mdzadapa las// rdzu 'phrul mnga' ba'i mi mo cig

tu byung// mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// mi nad sna tshogs 'bebs// dbu dang spyan ni ji ltar ston// dbu la rin chen ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na khrag 'thor ma// mi nad phyugs nad sna tshogs
'bebs// g.yon nas bdud rtsi'i mchil ma 'thor// nad rnams thams cad bsilabar mdzad// zhal nas 'bras bu'i bcud 'dzag pas// skye 'gro kun gyi gsol mdzad ma// g.yas kyi phyag gi srid rtse

bzung// srid pa gsum yang thal bar rlog// g.yon pas 'og gi sa gzhi bzung// klu rnams kun kyang bred cing sngangs// khyod kyi gsang ba'i lha gang las// snang srid thams can 'phel 'grib mdzad// rin chen
ral pa'i gseb nas ni// khrag gi 'od zer 'phros pa las// srid pa'i bud med dbang du sdud// nad dang rims nad thams cad bdag// ri rab bum pa'i nang na bzhugs// snang srid bdag mo'i thugs dam
bskang// pha dgu khri stong gis ming btangs pa// snang srid kun la dbang mdzad ma// de phyir dbang rabyed rgyal mos bya'o// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi ming btags pa// thog med srid pa gsum du mchi mdzad
ma// srid pa bde 'gro ma shes ming yang btags// bde 'gro ma yi thugs dam bskang// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal po dang// phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mo gnyis// chags pa g.yos nas bar snang
mkha' la sbyor ba mdzad pa las// 'byung ba me las sprul pa'i bud med gcig// dkar mo dung mdog g.yu yi ral pa can gcig 'khrungs// dpral na mig gcig snang srid star// g.yas na lcags zangs dril
zhags 'phen// snang srid thams can dbang du sdud// g.yon pa'i snying gi zhags pa bkra// tsit+ta kun gyi bdag mo ni// nyi ma stong gi dbu rgyan can// snang srid thams can bde la bkod// pha yis ming

btags srog gcod 'khor lo sgyur bas na// srig gi bdag mo zhes kyang bya// ma yis ming btags pa// dkar mo nyi zla stong gi thod du bcings pas na// de phyir nyid zla stong gi thod 'phreng can zhes bya// 'tshe
ba'i nad kyi dbang bdag mo bskang// yum chen nyi zla'i thod 'phreng can// mu stegs ka la nag po gnyis// yid kyi sbyor ba mdzad pa las// gdug pa'i bu mo spun bzhi mchis// ka la nag pos ming btags
pa// srid pa phung bar byed pa'i nag mo gnyis// yid kyi 'bum gyis ming btags pa// dkar mo thod bzang mngal dbang// de phyir dbyings phyug chen mos bya'o// nag mo mi bzad pa yi rgyan// mdog bzang

nad rnams rnams sna tshogs gtong// de phyir rgyan gyi rgyal mos bya'o// dmar mo bzang bzhin mi sdug// skug pa'i nad rnams 'bebs par byed// de phyir bdag nyid ma zhes bya'o// ljang nag stod khams brgyad
par mdzad// 'bras nad thams cad stong bar byed// de phyir gcig dgrar btags// g.yas pa khrag 'thor g.yon pa snying yang 'byin// nad gtong mi zad nagadug pa'i bud med bzhi// bskang ngo bskal
pa'i thugs dam bskang// phung byed nag mo sbas pa'i ma bzhi dang// nag mo mi zad sbyor ba byas pa las// dbang byed las mkhan ma mo bzhi zhig 'khrungs// pha yis ming btags khros pa'i dbang mo can bzhi
zhes// ma yis ming btags nad gtong gdug pa'i tsha ba 'bebs mdzad ma// khros shing dbang du sdud nyi mas brgyan// de phyir nyi ma 'gros pa'i dbang mo che// mnga' khrag mnga' mdzad nad sna tshogs

'bebs// pad+mo stong gis sku la legs par brgyan// khros nas dbang du ma yang sdud// de phyir bde sbyor 'phros pa'i dbang mo che// srog la mnga' mdzad bdud rtsi sbyor// phyag na ga 'u bsnams shing stong gsum

gsos mdzad ma// khros nas yang dbang du sdud// de phyir bdud sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che// b+ha ga yongs kyi mkha' la mnga' mdzad cing// skye ba'i rgyud rnams rtsad nas gcod par mdzad// khros nas ma yang
