dbang du sdud// de phyir b+ha ga khros pa'i dbang mor btags// khros pa'i dbang can g.yang gzhi khrag 'thor zhing// bde ba kun lam thams cad rdzogs mdzad ma// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi

yi thugs dam skangs// khros pa'i dbang chen ma mo bzhi rnams dang// 'byung ba bzhi yi bdag mo rtse sa pa las// mu stegs ka la nag pos tshor// mu stegs gdug pas dmod pa bor ba las// mtsha' sna byed pa'i

bud med khyed rnams kyi// nal bu lto ru bsrel nas kyang// ngo tsha bu yang sbed par shog// gdug pa'i dmod pa de btsan nas// bu mo spun bzhi skyes pa las// 'a ma bzhi yi ngo tsha nas// ngo rab gling bzhir bskus
nas bzhag// bud med bzang sdug la 'dod chags pa bzhi 'khrungs// pha yis ming btags pa// gling bzhi'i rgyal mo bya'o// 'a ma nyi ma khros pas ming btags pa// dkar mo mig gcig bya rgod thul pa
can// tshe la dbang byed sems can dbang sdud ma// de phyir dkar mo stong khams rgyas 'debs ma ru btags// 'a ma pad+ma khros bas ming btags pa// nag mo ral ba can zhing gi g.yang gzhi gsol// dbang po

kun la dbang byed pas// de phyir nag mo snang srid rmongs byed mar btags// 'a ma bde sbyor khros pa'i ming btags pa// dmar mo mi zad chu srin ga yang gzhi gsol// sha khrag kun la dbang byed pas// de phyir

dmar mo snang srid za byed ma ru btags// 'a ma ca ga khros pas ming btags pa// ser mo las mkhan rma bya'i thul pa can// tshe dbang sdud cing snang srid 'phel mdzad ma// de phyir ser mo las mkhan ma ru
btags// g.yasapa khrag 'thor bal nad 'bebs// g.yon pa gab 'thor ma mo 'bod// gling bzhi'i ngos la dbang gnas pas// sbas bdag gling gi bdag mos bya'o// bskang ngo gling bzhi'i rgyal mo'i thugs

dam bskang// bskang yang bskang ste mchod kyang mchod// bskang mchod bya'i dus la 'bab// srid pa skos rje brang dkar yang// ri rab kha la gnas bcal nas// dpag bsam shing skyes pa nas// srid pa cha byed
cha snyoms bzhugs// de gnyid sbyor ba mdzad las// gdug pa'i ma mo spun drug skyes// pha yis ming btags pas// phung byed nag mo ral pa can drug ces ming btags// 'a ma srid pa cha byed ma yis ming

btags pa// ri rab byang shar mtshams la dbang byed ma// na bzar spr-in dkar rgyan gsol ma// e ka dza ti ma ru ming yang btags// de yi nub mo tha chungs ni// nu nges stengs kyis nang shed na// nag mo mi
bzad mi thod can// g.yas nas bdud kyi khram bam bsnams// sems can thams cad khram la 'debs// khram bdag kun gyi khad dbon ma// g.yon na shod rde dkar nag 'grems// sems cad thams cad
shod la 'debs// shos la 'debs pa'i khad dbon mdzad// mtshan ni nad kyi rkyal pa 'debs// nad dar rims kyi bdag mo lags// bu mo yin te dbang yang che// ma bdud mo yis dbang byas
nas// phung byed nad dang dal 'debs ma// ya bdud nag mo dbang byas nas// ya bdud gnam nas 'debs par byed// mthing gi gur nag nang na bzhugs// nag mo 'dod khams gtso ru btags// phung byed

nag mo'i thugs dam bskang// bzhi ni ri rab zung bzhir bzhag// ri rab gru yang 'debs su bcug// rgyal chen bzhi yi chung mar byin// srid pa'i gru 'debs chen mo ste// shan ting dkar mo chen mo dang// dun
ting nag mo chen mo dang// har ting dmar mo chen mo dang// gru ting ser ljang zhes su btags// bu mo yin te dbang yang chung// de phyir ri rab gru yang 'debs par byed// gru 'degs chen mo'i thugs dam
bskang// srid pa'i gru 'degs bzhi rnams dang// rgyal chen bzhi rnams dang 'tshogs pa'i sras// mi mo bzhi rnams skyes pa las// pha yul 'khor srung gis ming btags pa// lag na dar dkar ba dan
bsnams// khrag 'thung kun la dbang sgyur mas// dmag gi rgyal mor ming yang btags// 'a ma shan ting dkar mos ming btags pa// snang srid skye 'gro thams cad kyi// yan lag dbang sdud mche ba
gtsigs// de phyir dkar mo mche gtsigs ma ru ming yang btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// pha 'phags skyes po yis ming btags pa// gshin rdze khams kyi dbang sdud btags// de phyir
dmag gi rgyal mor btags// 'a ma dun ting nag mos ming btags pa// snang srid 'bum la rag ta'i bdag// nag mo kha rlan nad 'bebs ma// de phyir nag mo kha g.yal ma// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma
bzhi bskang// pha mig mi bzang gis ming btags pa// klu yi dbang sdud phyag na dar dmar ba dan bsnams// de phyir dmag gi rgyal mor btags// 'a ma shan ting dmar mos ming btags pa// dmar mo klu
nad rnam pa sna tshogs 'bebs// rtsa nad 'ching zhing zha grum nad 'ching ma// de phyir dmar mo mchu 'jib ma ru btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// pha rnam thos sras kyis ming btags

pa// gnod sbyin dbang sdud dar ser phyag na bsnams// de phyir dmag gi rgyal mo zhes kyang bya// 'a ma grub ting ser ljang ming btags pa// ser mo snang srid dbugs la mnga' badzad ma// rkang dang bcud len

za byed chen mo ste// de phyir ser mo rkang ldag ma zhes btags/ bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// dmu dang srin por 'tshogs pa'i sras// mi bzad ral can bdun 'khrungs te// nags kyi bu mo chen mo
ni// lha chen tshogs kyi bdag la byin// nag mo rgya mtsho gting skems ma// sems can khrag thang dbang mo che// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa// nag mo dbang sdud ces su btags// 'a ma srin mo
mgo 'phyangs ma yis ming btags pa// dbang chen sems can kun bsgral bas// de phyir dpal ldan shugs 'grol ma zhes bya ba// bskang ngo dmag gi dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// de 'og dga' byed chung
ma yin// mdzes pa'i cha byad bzung nas ni// 'chi bdag kun gyi gzi 'phrog ma// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa// gzi 'phrog bdag mo chen mos bya'o// ma srin mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// rgyan bzang

srid pa dbang sdud ma// dkar mo kun bzang zhes su btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyan mo ma bzhi bskang// de 'og byed snu'i chung ma yin// nam mkha'i dkyil nas nad gtong ma// srid gsum rtse la dbang mdzad
ma// dregs pa kun gyi kha lo sgyur// a pha dmu yis ming btags pas// tshe bdag chen mor ming yang btags// 'a ma srin mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// dkar mo za byed kun grags ma zhes
btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// de 'og khyab 'jug chung ma yin// rnal 'byor dam tshig nyul byed ma// de phyir ye shes chen mor ming btags pa// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi

bskang/ de 'og b+h+ring gi ri rab sting chung ma yin// khrag gi rgyal mo'i nang na bzhugs// nad kyi dra ba mig dgu thogs// kha rlangs nad gtong za byed ma// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa// lag rings dgug pa
zhes su btags// 'a ma srid mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// rdo rje 'od chags zhes su btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// de 'og ma hA kA la'i chung ma yin// dmar mo sgeg ma lag na
zhags pa thogs// kha gsum ma lus 'ching zhing sgrol bar byed// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa// srid pa thams cad 'ching byed ma// ma srin mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// 'jig rten ma yis 'gengs zhing
gsal mdzad ma// rdo rje gsal 'phros zhes su btags// tha chungs gzhon nu'i chung ma yin// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// lcags kyu thogs shing dbang du sdud// dam las 'das pa'i snying 'byin
ma// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa// 'dren byed chen mos ming yang btags// 'a ma srin mos ming btags pa/ ma/ dbu la g.yu yi ral pa can// ral pa'i gseb nas spul pa 'gyed// 'gyed byed g.yu yi

sgrol mar btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// yar la shod kyi skyes to re// ri rab byang shar 'tshams na gnas// bdag nyid zhes bya ba ni// nub kyi phyogs na gnas pa las// de gnyis ying
kyis 'tshogs pa las// dbu mnga' ral pa 'bar gzigs// spyan mig snang srid bya ra byed// gdug pa'i las mkhan chen mo ste// a pha skyel to re yis ming btags pas// sprul pas 'jig rten

bsgral bar mdzad// ma bdag nyid ma nyid ma yis ming btags pa// rdzu 'phrul che zhing las la brtson// de phyir gar gyi rgyal mos btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// yar la shod kyis skyes
to dang// dbyings phyugs ma zhes bya ba ni// yid kyis sbyor ba byas pa las// nad gtong chen mo 'khrugs pa las// dmar nag 'jigs byed ral pa can// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang// grong las thor zhing
nad 'bebs na// pha yis ming btags nad gtong yin// ma dbyings phyug ma yis ming btags pa// khrag 'thor klu rnams dbang byed pa// sa bdag pad+ma 'phreng du btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi
bskang// ri rab kha khyer shar phyogs nas// bdud nag gsol byed chen mo gnas// ri rab bang rim shar phyogs na// e ka dzA ti gnas pa las// de gnyis sbyor ba byas pa'i bu// za byed bud med gnyis cig
'khrungs// a pha bdud kyis ming btags pa// phung byed nam mkha' rgyal mos bya'o// e ka dzA tis ming btags pa// sngon mo ral gcig gsair sha bcibs// lag na tshe yis bum pa rnams// tshe dang g.yang gi
bdag mo yin// rin chen srid 'debs ma zhes btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// dkar mo g.yu yi go cog can// chibs su dung sha g.yu chung chubs// lag na gser gyi lcags kyu
bsnams// khams gsum thams can thal bar rlog// gling bzhi kun la dbang sgyur ma// de phyir 'jig rten dbang phyug ma ru btags// lha chen rgyal po grags mchog dang// dkar mo mig gcig tshogs pa'i

sras// las la mkhas pa'i bud med 'khrungs// gling bzhir sgrub cing las la brtson// brgya byin mi zad srin mo yin// de phyir gling bzhi rgyal mo lha yi sring// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang/ gshin

rje dag po chen po dang/ nag po ral can tshogs pa'i sras/ mi yi lus la gcan gzan sdir/ gdug pa'i brjid med nag mo 'khrungs// mkha' la rgyug cing srog 'phrog cing// de phyir mkha' la khyung lcing gshin

rje'i snying// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// klu yi rgyal mo a ldan dang// dmar mo dbang sdud 'tshogs pa'i sras// gdug byed bud med lus po la// dbu yang 'phra med dbu can 'khrungs// dmar
chen khrag la rol mdzad cing// klu yi las rnams kun la 'khas// klu yi khams las kun las bskul// dga' bo 'jog po'i sring mo yin// de phyir dkar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo
ma bzhi bskang// gnod sbyin rag sha byed dang// ser mo las ma'atshogs pa'i bu// nag mo sder can gnod sbyin sring// gnod sbyin dkar mo'i sr-ing mo yin// gling bzhir rgyug cing las la

brtson// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring// 'jig rten rnams kyis sring mo ste// gdug byed nad gtong 'phra men bu// lag na glo snying nang grol thogs// mkhal la khrag glang snyim par 'debs// bskang ngo
dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang// dkar nag dmar ljang zhal ma'i// gdug pa'i ma mo khyed bskang ngo// bdud mo bkol byang las// bskang le nag mo ri rab la gnas pa'i ma mo bskangaba'i le'u ste zhe gsum
pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten las grub pa'i ma mo yi// 'khor na nag mo 'bum sde dang// bdud mo rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs// 'jig rten mi la gnod byed pas// de yi
bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten pa yi bdud mo ni// sems cam kun la gnod byed pas// de yi bskang ba ngas bshad

kyis// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// hUM/ chos nyid kun tu bzang mo las// kro d+hi shwo ru mu kha le// bdal ba chen po'i mkha' klong dbyings// sku gcig zhal lnga dbang sgyur ma// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char

ma// dbyings lnga ye shes lda 'char ma// klong lnga rgyal mo rus 'gyur ma// dpyid kyi rgyal mo rus 'gyur ma// gting gi drod na kha ru 'don// kha yi khyag pa gting du sdud// snang srid 'bras bu'i bcud skyed ma// na

bza' lha gur mthing skya gsol// sku mdog mon kha thal mdog ma// dpyid zla gsum gyi rgyal mo yang// me dang drod la mnga' mdzad ma// dpyid kyi rgyal mo rus sgyur ma// sngo la gdang ba'i zhal 'char ma// skye
'gro gso ba'i las mdzad ma// do nod dpyid kyi rgyal mo bskang// dbyar gyi rgyal mo dus sgyur ma// snang srid mkhar la thon rgyas ma// sku mdog sngo ljang g.yu 'od 'bar// dbyar zla gsum gyis rgyal mo

las// gsher dang rlan la mnga' mdzad ma// dbyar zla rta pa'i zhal 'char ma// mi las 'khor ba'i b+ha ga can// thugs rje skye 'gro gso ba'i phyir// do nod dbyar gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// ston gyi rgyal
mo dus sgyur ma// rtsi bcud 'bras bu smin par mdzad// sku mdog gser gyi 'do 'bar ma// ston zla gsum gy-i rgyal mo yi// gsal 'dod pa'i dbang chen gyis// bkrag dang mdangs la mnga' mdzad ma// ston gyi
rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// dgun gyi rgyal mo dus sgyur ma// gting gi 'khyag pa kha ru 'don// kha ru gton cing rgyal 'debs ma// sku mdog shel gyi 'do 'bar ma// dgun zla gsum gyi rgyal mo yi// lcags
dang rlung la mnga' mdzad ma// dgun gyi rgyal mo dbang sgyur ma// grang la 'den pa'i zhal 'char ma// thugs rdze skye 'gro gso ba'i phyir// do nod dgun gyi rgyal mo bskang// dus bzhir ba'i rgyal mo

bzhi// zhal sngar bskyod pa'i yum lngar bskang// gleng lngar sdud pa'i kha lngar bskang// dbyings lngar gsal ba'i thud sngar bskang/ rgyud dang 'bras bu sman dang rdzas// phu dang gling dang rin po che// rgyal mo bzhi

yi thugs dam bskang// kro ng+hi shwa ri bzhi bskangs pas// kro ng+hi shwa ri mu kha le// srid pa'i rgyal mo bskang nas kyang// kun tu bzang mo bde gyur cig// rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum du bskang// sems can skyed pa'i ma

rung bskang// 'byung ba gnod pa'i dbyings su bskang// snang srid 'char ba'i klong du bskang// 'khorab brgyud pa'i b+ha gar bskang// chos rnams rdzogs pa'i dbyings su bskang// dus gsum 'jin pa'i snying por
bskang// khams gsum rgyal ba rol par bskang// srid gsum rdzogs pa'i ma mo bskang// dbang thang bskyed pa'i rgyal mor bskang// chung srid bskyed pa'i rgyal mor bskang// tshe srog bskyed pa'i rgyal mor

bskang// skye 'gro bskyed pa'i rgyal mor bskang// de nas srid pa'i rgyal mo bzhi'i blon mo bzhi bskang la// srid pa'i sgo dbye ba ni 'di skad do// srid pa'i 'gram bzhi zur bzhi nas// rgyal mo bzhi yi dbang sgo
can// blon mo bzhi yis phyag brnyan pa// mkhar bzhi yi ni gur bzhi nas// brtan bzhin phur bzhir gur bshing bzhi// ri ram grA bzhi 'byung ba ni// shar lho ri rab 'gram zur nas// dung gi rol mtsho'i

gling thogs nas// shel mkhar dung gi kha bad can// shel gyi gtan pa thabs se thabs// dung gi g.yag shing khrol te khrol// dung gi sgo mo khrigs se khrigs// de 'dra blon mo'i dbyar sa nas// dung gi me tog ha
li ni// dar dkar gur phub skongs se skongs// dkar mo'i// dung gi tshugs shings rongs se rongs// dung gi re thag brengs se brengs// dar dkar yol bres me re re// de 'dra'i gur gi nad shed na dpying kyi

rgyal mo'i phyag brnyan ma// blon mo dung gi sku zhal la// dar dkar ral gyi sku la gsol// bya rgod dkar mo'i thul pa can// dung gi lde mig phyag na bsnams// g.yas na nag mo spyi dkar thogs// g.yon na bya
nag gshog khra thogs// khyod ni srid pa'i sgo 'byed ma// yon bdag khyim bu 'di sgo ru// shi ba gshin gyi ma dbye// gson po spel ba'i 'gags ma bcad// bya lug 'di yis thugs dam bskang// lho nub ri rab

'gram zur nas// g.yu yi rol mtsho'i gling thogs nas// g.yu mkhar mthing gi kha bad can// g.yu yi sgo mo khrigs se khrigs// g.yu yi gtan pa thams se thams// g.yu yi ya shing khrol te khrol// de 'dra'i blon
mo'i dbyar san// g.yu yi me tog ha ling na// dar snod gur phub skongs se skongs// g.yu yi tshugs shing rengs se rengs// g.yu yi gur thag brengs se brengs// mthing gi yol brel me re re// de

'dra'i gur gyir nang shed na// dbyar gyi rgyal mo'i phyag brnyan mo// blon mo g.yu yi sku zhal la// bai DUr+Ya 'od kyi zangs ral can// rma bya'i thul pa sku la gsol// g.yu yi lde mig phyag na bsnams// g.yas na nag

mo 'khar brgya thogs// dbyar gyi blon mo'i thugs dam bskang// byang nub ri rab 'gram zur na// khrag gi rol mtsho'i rol mtsho'i gling thog na// mchong gi me tog ha ling na// zangs gur dmar po skongs se

skongs// byung ru'i tshugs shing rengs se rengs// mkhar dang gur gyi nang shed na// ston gyi rgyal mo'i phyag brnyan ma// bla ma zangs kyi sku zhal la// le brgan dmar po'i zangs ral can// sku la bya thul sngon po

gsol// byu ru'i lde mig phyag na bsnams// g.yas na nag mo chag thogs// ston gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// byang shar ri rab 'gram zur nas// zhal gi rol mtsho'i gling thog nas// gser mkhar gling gi

kha bad can// gser gyi sgo mo khrigs se khrigs// ra gan yan shing khrol te khrol// gser gyi me tog ha ling na// gser gyi gur phub skongs se skongs// gser gyi g.yag shing khrol te khrol// ra gan tshugs

shing rengs se rengs// mkhar dang gur gyi nang shed na// dgun gyi rgyal mo phyag brnyan ni// blon po gser gyi sku zhal la// shang shang bya yi thul pa can// gser gyi lde mig phyag na bsnams// g.yon na bya nag
gser mig thogs// dgun gyi blon mo'i thugs dam bskang// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// bdud mi'i rgyal blon brgyad bskang ba'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol

pa// nag mo lcags rus ji ltar bskang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// de yi bskang zlog 'di ltar ro// nyi ma byang shar pha gi na// dpal ldan gnyin gyi re ma ste// lha mo nag mor bzhugs tsam na// rma
bya'i thul pa sku la gsol// mchan na sngon dmar gru bu skyed// chibs su dre rta rkang gsum chibs// nad kyi rkyal pa khal du 'gel// rlung nag tshub ma'i nang na gnas// 'dod khams gtso mo'i thugs dam

bskang// lha mo nag grur bzhugs tsam na// sku la zhing chen thul pa gsol// mthing gi gtso mo chibs su chibs// khrag gi rkyal pa khal du bkal// grib so nag po'i nang du bzhugs// nam gru 'bum gyi bdud mo

bskang// rma thebs rgyal mor bzhugs tsam na// dred mo kham nag thul pa gsol// chibs su rnga mo gA pa chibs// lcags kyi dra ba kha la du 'gel// 'dzam gling bzhi yi grwa bzhi nas// lcags khang chen mo bzhi
gnas pa// de yang lcags kyi dra bar 'dzud// dmag dang rmug pa'i nang na rgyug// rma thebs bdud mo'i thugs dam bskang// gshin rje'i yum cig mdzad tsam na// nag mo hral hral khrag skyug

ma// khrag gi thul pa sku la gsol// skar chen dmar mo'i 'od la zhon// skya ring 'od kyi nang na rgyug// nag mo khrag 'dzag ma yang bskang// khyod kyi snyan cha g.yas g.yon na// gser gyi rnge chung di ri ri// lha rgyal

tshang pa zhu ba 'bul// khyod kyi zhabs kyi g.yas g.yon no// lha srin sde brgyad bskor phyag 'tshal// nya smad mang po rgyab nas mchong// sbrul smad mang po mdud nas rgyug// khyod kyi dbu yi gtsug rum nas// rgyu skar

mang po phungs se phungs// 'khor ni bong zhon 'bum gyis bskor// rtse ni khram dang shod pa rtse// rol ni skye 'gro yongs la rol// skom du de ni rag ta 'thung// dgun la mkhar na bzhugs tsam na// khro chu'i bang
rim sku mkhar na// ma ru ci yi grong gis bskor// ma bdud dbyar sar bzhur pa'i tshe// gur nag mang po skongs se skongs// yol nag mang po khyud de khyud// gnam lcags phur pa thams se thams// glog gi

'phreng ba brengs se brengs// gur nag nang na bzhugs tsam na// bdud kyi bu mo sa mtsho sman// nag mo spyad bdud mo mo bskang ma mo khyod kyi 'khor g.yog tu// sgrol ging las kyi shugs sgrol bcu// sku mdog sna

tshogs rang chas la// phyag na sgrol byas mtshon cha thogs// sgrol ging bcu yi thugs dam bskang// bdud mo bkol byang gi rgyud las// nag mo rem ti bskul ba'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang
gsol pa// smug ting rgyal mo ji ltar bskang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal ba// smug mo bskang ba ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// yul dang yul ni dmu yi yul// jo bo dmu rdze

legs pa la// sras ni lcam dral gnyis mnga' ste// ral pa dmu rjai btsan pa lags// mkhar ni dmu mkhar ljong na bzhugs// de yi sring mo lcam mo ni// nyim nub byang mtshams shed na// mchong ri mchong brag
mkhar ldem na// ri smug de ni lung du smug// srid pa'i gting khams ma gi na// gnam sa smug 'thibs nang shed na// dmu bdud rgyal mo de na bzhugs// srid pa'i gting khams ma gi na// dmu mkhar bse yi

logs bzhi na// mchong gi kha bad ban skor can// seng ldeng sgo bzhi thams se thams// sku mkhar de yi nang shed na// za 'og gur cig skangs se skangs// mchong gi tshugs shing rengs rengs// rma bya'i rgyal

mtshan ye re re// de 'dra'i gur gyi nang shed na// smug ting rgyal mo bzhi zur ma// mchong gi bud med dmu yi lcam// dmu za bdud kyi lcam cig can// sku la mchong gi zang ral gsol// rma bya stong gi phud khad
can// bse yi thub pa ya ba bskor/ mtshan ni dmu lcam bral ma nyan/ smug po 'bras bu can du bskang/ de yi bu mo gcung mo ni// dmu mkhar lcags kyi sta zur la// gong sngon dmu bya 'phur zhing

'chags// gur dang yol gyi ru zur la// mthing gi mdzo mo 'brug ltar ngur// smug mi dmu yi mdun zur ma// rma bya spungs pa'i thul pa gsol// phyag na mchong gi gyid dkar bsnams// smug mo 'bum gyi rgyal mo

bzhugs// dmu sman bdud zur srid pa'i las// dmu bdud 'did chags nga yi bskang// de yi g.yog mo bskang ba ni// ri rab zad pa'i rmang sna na// jo mo sri bdud rgyal mo ni// phung sri lnga mo rta ru zhon// ra nag

ral kha gos su gon// phung sri rnga mog pa la// lcags kyi dra ba khal du 'gel// kha dgu 'o dod gnam du 'bod// mig dgu bya ra srid la gtong// phung sri rnga mo zhen pa bskang// gling bzhi 'gras pa'i tha ma

na// lcags kyi gur zlum nag po na// zhing srid rgyal mo mig gcig ma// rta ru phag pa lto zhan zhon// zhing sri rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa bgrangs pa'i mar gzhug na// dur sri mjo mo ru yon zhon// wa

mi gzhug rings rol du khrid// lus la lcags kyi slog pa gsol// bskang ngo ma mo khyid kyang bskang// khu le shangs ma gi na// rta ru rtol mo ru yon zhon// khyi mo dmar mo rol du khrid// khrim sri nag mo'i thugs

dam bskang// khu le shad smad ma gi na// rta ru brum pa rag pa chibs// rol du zangs kyi bred mo khrid// khrim sri nag mo'i thugs dam bskang/ zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// smug
ting rgyal mo bskang ba'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// yul gdon ma mo ji ltar bskang// yang dgardzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// yul gdon ma mo bskang ba ni// nga yis khyod la

bshad kyis nyon// gnam srid 'ol ma chen mo ni// rta ru klong rta dmar mo zhon// gos su smag gi smug pa gon// gnam sri'o la ma'i thugs dam bskang// de nas sa sri mer ba bskang// bzhugs ni sa yi gting na

bzhugs// rnga mo nag mo rta ru zhon// grum ma skya bo rol du khrid// ral lcags grum ka'i rol pa gsol// sa srid mer ma'i thugs dam bskang// dam sri mchod ma chen mo ni// ban de mo ni chen mo la// 'phreng ba

dkar nag skyel 'chang// long gor skya ma rkang la gyon/ kyi sra'i slog pa sku la gsol// mchod rten hrul po'i gseb nas ldang/ khang pa hrul po'i nang na gnas// sdongs ni the rang 'byung po de dang sdongs// dur

khrod shin ngog sdongs zla mdzad// dbang ni phag pa khyi sde dbang// dam sri mtshon pa'i thugs dam bskang// de nas chung srin myug ma ni// bzhugs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// ldang ni rgya mtsho'i gting nas
ldang// chu gzhung sngon mo rta ru zhon/ nya sram mang po rol du rol// me bzhur mang po'i 'od la lta/ 'debs ni dar dang 'khag par 'debs// chu yi kha ni thur du 'bab// lce yi kha ni

gyen la 'khyil// rgyu na mtsho rgyu gsum la rgyu// dbang ni phag pa chu kha dbang// chu lag sngon mo'i thugs dam bskang// de 'og phug sri na// dkar sral can dang sngo sral can// dmar sral ma dang gser sral
ma// se skyer mang po yangs se yangs// lcug phran mang po ldems se ltems/ bya bran mang po pu ru ru/ gcan gzan mang po zal ma zul/ mdzo rtol mang po ngar ma ngur// smug mo mchong mdog 'di yis bskang/
zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ yul gdon ma mo bskang ba'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i bdud mo ji ltar bskang// yang dag rdzogs
kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud mo bskang ba 'di lta ste// nyon cig gnod 'dul mos pa khyod// le shod bdud yul rtse 'byam na// mthong gur snar gur mthong yol na// nag mo 'od kyi phod ka can// bu yug nag po
sku la gsol// sbrul nag 'khrigs pa'i zhags pa 'phen// rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyis nam mkha' gnon// phyag gis bdud kyi sgo rdo 'dril// rma bya zhon nas rlung lcags rdeg// srid pa gsum mthong mig rtsa
bsgrib// g.yung drung mun pa'i ral pa can// me ri brtsegs pa'i phod ka can// rgyal mo dbyar na bzhugs pa'i tshe// sngon dmar 'thibs pa'i gur na bzhugs// rgyal mo ston na bzhugs pa'i tshe// snang srid

gsol ba'i snying po can// rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// lcags mkhar sngon mo rtsa 'dral ma// rgyal mo dpyid na bzhugs pa'i tshe// rlangs pa drod kyi snying thibs nang// khyod ni rin chen mgo yag
lcam// nag mo khyod kyi 'khor g.yog ni// nag mo khram thogs bcu yis bskor// gling bzhi khram khra'i nang du bcug// snang srid sems can khram la 'debs// nam mkha' nag mo bcu yis bskor// bdud la

dbang 'dul mthu mo che// rin chen 'gong yag kha sgyur la// ya bdud lag tu sho ra re// yu lung gser gyi ye khyud na// srid ma mer gyi gur yol na// nag mo 'bum gyi phod ka bsgyur// gos su grin so nag po
gon// lcags thag dgu yi zhags pa 'phen// zhabs kyis dpag bsam shing bu non// phyag gis bdud rta yam pa 'debs// skyung mo zhon nas me lcags rdeg/ sems can mthing na mig rtsa bsgrib// shing lo thibs

pa'i rol pa can// khro bcu brtsegs pa'i mche ba ga/ tsigs// rgyal mo dbyar na 'grogs pa'i tshe// khrag gi rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// rgyal mo ston dang 'grogs pa'i tshe// gser gyi mching bar 'bras bu
'gems// rgyal mo dgun dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/// rlung tshub glong ba'i ded dpon mdzad// lho rgyal mo dpyid dang 'grogs pa'i tshe// lha gur 'thibs pa'i nang na gzims// 'khor ni srin mo stong
gis bskor// brtul zhugs bcu yis las byed ma// khyod ni bkrag med lcam mo yin// bdud la dbang sgyur mthu mo che// khyod la nag mo'i mdos bskang gis// nag po bkrag med lcam mo khyod// nag po bkrag
med kha sgyur la// bdud kyi lag tu sho ra re// nam mkha'i bcu yis thugs dam skong// bdud yul lu gu gur shod na// dgun gyi dgun sa nas// bdud mkhar sgo dgu'i rdzong na bzhugs// skya mo gdong dgu rlung

gi ral pa can// tshub ma dgu 'khyil rang ral can// zangs kyi dre rta dgu la zhon// bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang// yul dang mang yung yang stengs na// yel yel yel kha na// g.yung drung gzi 'bar mdun

sa nas// nag mo me yi phod ka can// mun pa'i bzang ral sku la gsol// sngon dmar gzha' yi zhags pa 'phen// zhabs kyis ri rab rtse mo gnon// phyag gis spr-in dang khu rlangs sdud// 'brug lnga zhon nas grog

lcag rdeg// tsha grang 'bar ba'i ral pa can// gza' skar 'od kyi lcags skyad nas// rgyal mo dbyar na bzhugs pa'i tshe// ha lo me tog gur gling na// mthing nag g.yu gur nang na bzhugs// blon mo bcu gsum
'khor gyis bskor// rgyal mo srid pa rdzogs pa'i ston sa nas// ka sha 'bras bu bcu gsum bdag// bud med bcu gsum sbyi bdud ma// rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// snang srid gting du btsud nas

ni// snang srid kha la rgyas 'debs ma// rgyal mo dbyid na bzhugs pa'i tshe// skyed pa'i ma mo bcu gsum bdag// khyod ni phya bdud lcam mo yin// bdud la dbang sgyur mthu mo che// bdud ye le khyab pas kha sgyur
la// nag mo shel sgong 'di yis bskang// nam mkha' gsum gyis thugs dam bskang// yul dag na yul yang rtse na// nam mkha' 'thongs kyi gur yul na// khyung gshog nyi ma'i phod ka can// 'od zer 'bar

ba'i zang ral can// nyi zer dkar po'i zhags pa 'phen// zhabs kyis srid ba'i rtse mo gnon// phyag gis srid pa'i tshe brag sdud// khyung ka zhon nas gzha' lcag rdeg// skye 'gro yongs la mig rtsa sgrib// rlung dang
bu yug ral pa can// gnam lcags khros pa'i mche ba gtsigs// dar nag 'od kyi lcags bskyong ma// rgyal mo dbyar nas 'grogs pa'i tshe// g.yu lu 'od kyi mar shod na// mthing ni gur ba gur yon
tan// shugs sgrol bcu yi 'khor du bskor// rgyal mo ston na bzhugs pa'i tshe// gser mdog bcu gnyis rang skyegs ma// rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// srid pa'i dpal skyed dgun yul na// 'phra med
gser gur mnga' bdag mo// ye shes kar lung khong ser nas// rgyal mo dbyid na bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' la drod 'bebs bcu gnyis bsnan// khyod no sgos mkhan lcam mo yin// nam mkha'
bcu gnyis thugs dam bskang// bdud la dbang sgyur mthu mo che// skong rje brang dkar bka' sgyur la// bya nag lug nag 'di yis bskang// rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// bu yug gangs kyi phod ka

can// nam mkha' skya mo'i mnga' bdag mo// rgyal mo dpyid na bzhugs pa'i tshe// gting ra drod lung khyud 'khor nas// ma khyim tshen mo kha dgu ma// lho gur skya mo na bza' gsol// lcags kyi dre rta dgu la
zhom// gting khams 'khrug cing dod glong ma// rgyal mo srid kyi las mkhan mo// nam mkha' dmar mo'i mnga' bdag mo// rgyal mo dbyar na 'grogs tsam na// rgya mtsho ru yi dgu ling na// mthing nag

gur phub skongs se skongs// chu dar yol ba khyud de khyud// g.yu yi tshugs shing rengs se rengs// gur dang yul gyi nang shed na// g.yu char zam zim kha chu la// nam mkha' sngon mo'i mnga' bdag mo// rgyal mo
ston dang 'grogs pa'i tshe// gangs kyi ri rab gser mtsho na// gser gur mang po skongs se skongs// bud med gser gyi phod ka can// phod mkhar 'bras bu bcud chags ma// chibs su bdud kyi rta la
zhon// rgyal mo ston gyi las byed ma// nam mkha' gser mig mnga' bdag ma// 'khor ni nag mo bzhi yis bskor// shar nas bskong ba'i nag mo ni// nag mo srid par nyal byed ma// shel sgong nag mo spyi dkar
bdag// nag mo lcags skad la 'bebs na// nam mkha' nag mo'i mnga' bdag mo// lho nas bskyod pa'i nag mo ni// nag mo dud kha sham thabs can// shel sgong nag mo'i mnga' bdag mo// lho nas srid pa

dbang la 'debs// lag na bdud kyi khram thogs ma// khyod ni nam mkha' mthing ging bdag// nub nas bskor ba'i nag mo la// nag mo cha ri rgya mtsho'i bdag// shel sgong nag mo chu kha'i bdag// lag na khrag
gi rkyal pa thogs// khyod ni nam mkha' dmar mo'i bdag// byang nas bskor ba'i nag mo na// nag mo gser gyi zangs dal can// lag na gling thogs// shel sgong nag mo lta ser bdag// dus bzhu las byed
sbun dgu byed// mche ba dgu gcigs srid pa za// nyi ma dgu yi mig zur lta// spun dgu zhag gi phod ka can// zhabs kyis gser gyi ri bdun gnon// phyag gis snang srid tshe bkrag sdud// cho 'phrul zhags pa
dgu 'phen ma// dal nad 'bebs pas khrag lus ma// nag mo ral pa dgu thibs ma// khyaud ni nam mkha' klog gi bdag// 'dzam bu gling bzhir nyal ba'i tshe// na bza' smug nag sku la gsol// chibs su mdzo
dang rtol la chibs// khrag gi ril ba khal du bkal// nag mo nam gru sbun dgu ma// nam mkha' rgyu yi mkha' bdag mo// khyod la ming po dgu yod de// jo bo dgu yi ming dgu ni// kha tshig lce tshig

jo bo ming// skye shi mdzad yag jo bo'i ming// bdud rje smang khrag jo bo'i ming// bdud she ru gcig jo bo'i ming// lto ba sha zan jo bo'i ming// nag po bam pa jo bo'i ming// 'thom po snying zan jo bo'i
ming// nag po phud med jo bo'i ming// ming dgu lcam dgu glud kyi bdag// ming dgu lug la kha bstan nas// bdud lug nag po spyi kar gyis// srid pa'i ming gi glud du 'bul// bdud la dbang sgyur mthu bo
che// khyod la nag po 'di yis bskang// ya bdud lag tu sho ra re// gling bzhi mtshams kyi gur bzhin// dregs pa lcam dral brgyad bzhugs pa// lho nub mtshams kyi mthing gur nas// mi nag rta nag lcam mo
gcig/ lag na srin po'i bdung thogs ma// na bza' dar nag sgogs ma la// dmar smug me yi phod ka can// shod rje dkar nag lag na thogs// ming nag rta nag bka' bsgyur la// bdud kyi phyag brnyan da ra
re// nub byang mtshams kyi g.yu gur nas// mi sngon rta sngon lcam mo gcig/ lag na khram shing dkar nag thogs// mtshan ni sngon mo g.yu 'thungs ma// na bza' g.yu yi na bza' la// ha lo me tog cha ga

can// mi sngon rta sngon bka' bsgyur cig/ byang shar mtshams kyi gser gur nas// mi ser rta ser lcam mo ni// lag na mtshon tsha sna tshogs thogs// mtsho ni ser mo las byed ma// na bza' gser gyi na bza'
la// ra gan 'bar ba'i cha ga can// mtshan ni ser mo las mkhan mo// mi ser rta ser bka' bsgyur cig// lho shar mtshams kyis gling gur nas// mi dmar rta dmar lcam mo cig// lag na gcod pa'i spu
gri thogs// mtshan ni shan pa gri thogs ma// na bza' zangs kyi na bza' la// byu ru 'bar pa'i cha ga can// mtshan ni dmar mo ral gcig ma// mi dmar rta dmar bka' bsgyur cig// srid pa'i bud med bdud

btsan lcam// gling bzhi mtshams kyi bdud mo bzhi// nam mkha' brgyad kyis thugs dam bskang// bdud btsan khram la thebs sam re// phyag brnyan lag tu sho ra re// srid pa'i gling khams ya ga na// ra smug de

ni lud du smug// mchong gi bud med g.yu yi lcam// mtshan ni dmu lcam bra ma nyan// za 'og gur la g.yu yi yol// gur dang yol gyi sta zur la// dmu bya gong sngon 'chags shing 'phur// dmu nag dmu yi mdud
zur ma// rma bya sbungs pa'i thul pa gsol// ming po dmu bdud bka' sgyur la// dmu khams chen pos bka' pa re// dmu ba tsan lag tu shor ra re// bar snang nam mkha'i mthongs gong nas// srid pa'i bud med
nyi ma 'phreng// na bza' nam mkha'i bza' ral can// sprin dkar brtsegs pa'i phod ka can// gnam sman 'bum gyi gtso mo mdzad// dkar mo dung gi thod rdeng can// shel gyi ser ba yar thabs
'thor// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur ba// nam mkha'i ma mo drug zur ma// khyod ni ya jo dkar po'i lcam// gnam gyi dkar po kha bsgyur la// rgyal mo dmangs la babs sam red// bsnams te lag tu shor ra
re// bai DU nam mkha'i 'od gling nas// srid pa'i pud med glog mda' 'phen// skya rengs 'od kyi bzang ral can// sprin dkar brtsegs pa'i phod ka can// nyi zer khra bo'i ral pa can// phyag na skar mda'

phyogs bcur 'phen// skar chen lus la za zur ma// nam mkha' lnga yi mnga' bdag mo// the brang khra bo kha sgyur cig// the brang phugs su zhu sa re// the brang lag tu sho ra re// srid pa'i bud med mthu mo che// ma shod

gling gi mnga' bdag mo// sku la pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can// sku la ser gyi thul pa gsol// sa theb nag po kha bsgyur la// grong du 'byung po babs sa re// sribs kyi lag tu shor ra re// srid pa'i bud med mi bzad

ma// mdzad pa'i cha lugs thol ma gyur// spyi gtsug ral pa rdo rje 'greng// drag shul tshang rmad srid la byed// bud med dbu la gdong drug mo// dmar mo glog gi gdong rangs ma// sri can lag tu sho ra re// sro
can gdug ba'i drug zur ma// srid de dmar mo kha bsgyur la// blon po'i mang po dar ra re// sri mgo lag tu sho ra re// sngon gyi bdud mo'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa'i bud med ral gcig ma// dpral na
dmar mo gcig zangs kyi zhal// kha nas so gcig gyen la gtsigs// sbyi gtsug ral gcig khrag gi dbu// lag na tshub ma'i snam bu 'greng// na bza' bse yi slag pa la// dmar nag khrag gi phod ka
can// nag mo srid pa'i drug zur ma// nag mo nyams can spun gsum gyis// dmar po spun gsum kha sgyur cig// srog bdag nar ba byung nga re// yam shud dmar po thugs su bcug ga re// brag srin dmar po

yul phyir 'khor ra re// mi reng dmar po'i lag tu sho ra re// gting bdus nag mo'i sprul pa'i lus// srid par 'khyams pa'i khrag 'thung ma// gling bzhi nyul zhing khrag la sgro// chibs su rlung gi 'khor lo
chibs// dpral na mig gcig snang srid gsal// se skyer ral pa yengs se yengs// mdzo dang rtol gyi slag pa la// dred mo bla tshar phod ka can// sku la sbrul gyi ska rags bcing// bud med lus la pho chas

can// shel rtsal lus la lnga zur ma// nam mkha' lnga yi mnga' bdag mo// khyod ni glu btsan lcam mo ste// skyes bu glu btsan lcam mo yin// glu btsan thams cad kha sgyur la// rgyal btsan sgrog la btab pa re// skyi
btsan lag tu sho ra re// srid pa'i bud med ro khyung ma// thabs kyi rdzu 'phyul ye shes can// seng ge dkar po chibs si chibs// na bza' mthing gi slag pa la// g.yu bran brtsegs pa'i phod ka

can// 'jigs pa'i ral pa se ral kha// tshangs pa'i bu mo bzhi zur ma// bzhi zur lhags kyi sras gcig ma// 'khor ni 'dod khams rgyal mo bzhi// gling bzhi 'khrug pa'i khro tshul ma// jo mo gcig dang khol mo

gsum// spyi 'gro legs kyi rgyan zhal ma// ri rab 'grim zhing rgyal mtsho bskor// nam mkha' bzhi yi mnga' bdag mo// khyod ni rje btsan lcam mo yin// rje bdud rje btsan kha bsgyur la// rdze bdud khram la thebs
sa re// srid pa'i bud med dbang gi sku// khyab 'jug nad kyi skar mda' ma// bud med bu yi skar mda' 'phen// dbang mo khyab bdud zhal can// bud med bu la 'pheng rtsal 'phrog ma// phyogs mtshabs med
par skar mda' 'phen// gzha' dang dgung tshigs gzhu thogs ma// srid pa gsum du sbrul pa'i tshe// dbang gi bud med sum rol ma// khams gsum nyul ba'i zhugs can ma// ston gsum thugs la go mdzad

ma// nam mkha' gsum gyi mnga' bdag mo// khyod ni btsan phran jo mo ste// lung gsum mtshob kha bsgyur la// btsam gyi khram la thems sa re// shar ba'i lag tu sho ra re// srid pa'i bud med dri 'dul ma// dri
btsan zer thabs 'dul ba mo// ri rab lhun po'i zom rtse nas// khams gsum rlabs kyis 'dul mdzad ma// sku mdog de ni dmar skya la// phyag na gsor gyi zangs gri thogs// gnas lcags ngar ma'i mche ba

can// phyag na tshon cha'i bal tshon thogs// sbu gri thogs pa'i slag pa la// 'khor lo brtsegs pa'i phod ka can// dus bzhi srid pa'i khyab par nyul// khros nas gling bzhi khrag tu 'gengs// sku gcig zhal drug

gsum zur ma// nam mkha' gsum gyi mnga' bdag mo// mchog tu khrag dang dri la snom// dri bo'i dri thabs kha sgyur la// dri btsan thun du byung nga re// srid pa'i ro langs srid 'dul ma// rta sha za ba'i mo gdong
ma// srid dgu 'dul ba'i dpal gyi yum// sku la 'jigs pa'i ral kha gsol// dred mo ral pa dgu sbul ma// zangs dang bse yi mche ba gtsigs// srid pa dgu gting kha yi 'debs// khros na rang la yang

g.yeng dus na// stong gsum mchi mche khrag gis 'gengs// g.yas na 'jigs pa'i sbar chen rdeng// srid can kha nas bzung ste rdebs// g.yon na dgra sta drang byed ma/ sri can thal bar rlog mdzad ma// zhal kha
sre khung gdengs pa 'dra// shangs nas glog stong bsnol mar 'don// nyin zhing dur khrod gnas nyul ma// mtshan zhing dur khrod khyab par 'gro/ thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ma// srid pa gsol ba'i na
bza' la// sprul pa thabs kyi phod ka can// dur sri nag po kha bsgyur la// sri dgu can langs sa re// sri can lag tu sho ra re/ khyod ni nam mkha' gcig gi bdag/ bskang ngo ma mo khyod bskang
ngo// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// bdud mo phod ka can bcu gsum bskang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bdud mo khyo tshol 'di rnams
kun// nag brgya'i bskang bzlog ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// bskang bzlogs las rnams gong ma bzhin// 'di yi bca' thabs ni// 'bru sna mang po la rin po che brdar la sbru'o// de
tshe gsum du bcad la gcig la bud med nag mo dgu bya'o// gcig la 'brang rgyas dgu bya'o// gcig la ra rab gling bzhi bya'o// 'brang rgyas dgu la 'phang khra dgu gzugs so// bzang ras kyis brgyan
pa'o// nag mkha' bcu gsum bya ste/ gtso mo la nag po khong sngon gcig bya'o// de'i phyi ma la nag po dung mig gcig/ g.yu mig gcig/ zangs mig gcig/ gser mig gcig/ 'bri gnyis/ ra gnyis/ nag
mo zangs ma bzhi ste bcu gsum bya'o// phye gtsang ma gcig la lug po mkha' skya gcig/ lug nag po gcig la bdud mo nag mo gcig bskyon par bya// bya nag po la bud med nag mo gcig bskyon par bya// lug
nag gcig la bya nag gcig bskyon la bzhag// de rnams bca' thabs so// dang po khyo 'tshol ba bcu la glud bsngo ste 'di skad do// lug ni nag po mkhal skya 'dis// bdud mo khyo tshol khyod rnams thugs dam
bskang// rgyab ni nag por 'dug pa 'di// bdud kyi bu mos bris pa yin// rA gnyis lcags rur 'dug pa ni// lha yi bu mos bris pa yin// mig gnyis ser por 'dug pa ni// lha min bu mos bris pa
yin// gdong pa rgya bor 'dug pa ni// dmu yi bu mos bris pa yin// lkog mi dkar mor 'dug pa ni// lha yi bu mos bris pa yin// kho ba ma ser mor 'dug pa ni// khyo tshol bzhi yis bris pa yin// rmig pa

lcags su 'dug pa ni// bran mo khyo tshol bzhi yis bris// lte ba dkar por 'dug pa ni// pad+ma 'phreng gis bris pa yin// de ltar rtags rnams yod pa ni// bdud mo nyi shu rtsa drug mthun pa'i rdzas// de phyir thugs

dam skongs gyur cig// de nas khyo tshol ma bcu'i thugs dam bskang ste// glud bsngo zhing ba skang bzlog bya ste 'di skad do// hUM// lha yi bu mo khyo tshol ma// khyod mthun pa'i rdzas chen ni// mthing gi nam mkha' nag

mol// mthing nag gur phub skongs se skongs// mthing gi yol ba khyud de khyud// de 'dra'i gu gur gyi nang shed na// bud med nag mo hral hral mo// phung bya mang mo gdong la 'ded// pha ni lha ste ma ni bdud// de
phyir shA la dbang ba yin// 'thibs shing lci ba'i nad bdag mo// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur ci/ nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// ma mo de yi

gcing mo ni// lha min bu mo khyo tshol ma// 'bri ya nam mkha' nag mo la// nam mkha' gur nag skongs se skongs// yol nag mang po khyud de khyud// de lta bu yi nang shed na// bud med nag mo hral hral mo// phung
bya mang po gdong la 'ded// kha brgyad mang po tshe re re// bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig/ nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// ma mo de yi 'byung mo

ni// phyogs phyogs de ni pha gi na// nyi ma byang shar mtshams shes na// brag dang chu 'thab pha gi na// byang zang thad ri dmar po bya// zangs mtsho dmar po khyil li li// de lta bu yi nang shi/ na// me med shing med rgyu
zhags dgu// bzar med gtsang med dgung zhags dgu// dgung zhags dgu gsum phar 'das na// ltas ngan srin bya nyin dang sgong// 'grag lcog sngon mo mtshan yang 'gyur// mi skyid de ni sdug yul na// de na
dga' bo dgon pa tsam// de na bskang ba yog pa tsam// de lta bu yi nang shed na// nam mkha' bal bag nam mkha' la// dar nag gur phub skongs se skongs// dar nag yol ba khyud de khyud// de lta bu yi nang
shed na// gshin rdze'i bu mo khyod 'tshal ma// phung bya skyung kha godangal 'ded// pha ni bdud la ma nibatsan// bdud btsan gshog pa'i byang rgyal khyod// pha yis rtags byin lus po gnag/ ma yis rtags

byin rkang pa ser// zhang pos rtags byin bas yi mchu// de phyir bdu kyi thal yi yin// bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig// nag rgyal 'di yis thugs dam bskang//

ma mo de yi gcung mo ni// srin mo'i bu mo khyo tshol ma// re nag gur phub skongs se skongs// re nag yol ba khyud de khyud// de lta bu yi nang shed na/ bud med nag mo hral hral mo// phung bya mang po gdong

la ded// pha ni rgyal te ma ni bdud// rgyal bdud 'tshos pa'i bu mo yin// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig// nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// ma mo de yi gcung

mo ni// gnod sbyin bu mo khyod tshol ma// bud med nag mo hral hral mo// phung bya mang po gdong la ded// bya rog mang po zings se zings// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog

gyur cig// nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// ma mo de yi gcung mo ni// dmu yi bu mo khyo tshol ma// bud med sngon mo hral hral mo// phung bya mang po gdong la ded// dmu bya phug ron gdong la ded// bal sngon de yi nam mkha'
la// de sngon gur phub skongs se skongs// dar sngon yol bya khyud de khyud// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig/ nag rgya 'di yi thugs dam
bskang// ma mo de yi gcung mo ni// bdud kyi bu mo khyo tshol ma// bud med nag mo hral h+la mo// phung bya mang gdong la ded/ khA ta mang mo gdong la ded// nam mkha' bal nag nam mkha' la// dar nag gur

phub skongs se skongs// dar nag la ba khyud de khyud// bskong ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig// nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// ma mo de yi gcung mo ni// btsan gyi

bu mo khyo tshol ma// bud med nag mo hral hral mo// hral hral chen mo khrag mig ma// mu men gur gyi nang shed na/ mi rkang dung du 'bud cing mi rkang gling bu 'bud// phung bya mang po gdong la ded// srin bya mang po

gdong la ded// rkan sgra grags pa chems se chems// khu skad byung byung cig cig zer// bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang/ skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig/ nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// ma

mo de yi gcung mo ni// rgyal po'i bu mo khul tshol ma/ bud med dkar mo hral hral mo// phung bya mang po gdong la ded// chu bya zal mo gdong la ded// mdzed nad sna tshogs gtong ba'i bdag/ bal dkar de yi nam

mkha' la// dar dkar gur phub skongs se skongs// dar dkar ba dan lhabs se lhabs// shel gyi rte'u khrigs se khrigs// dar dkar yol ba khyud de khyud// khyod ni nag rgya'i mnga' bdag mo// bskang ngo khyod

kyi thugs dam bskang// skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig/ nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// ma mo de yi gcung mo ni// sa bdag bu mo khyod tshal ma// med khrag mo hral hral mo// 'og gi nag mo phung
khrol ma// sa bdag chen mo pad+ma 'phreng// phung bya pu shud gdong la ded// nam mkha' de ni khra mo la// ha yi gur phug skongs se skongs// gzi yi stegs bu khrigs se khrigs// ha yi gdan khri stobs se

stobs// ha yi yol ba khyud de khyud// nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang// bskang yang bskang ste bzlog kyang bzlog// bskang bzlog chen po'i las mdzad ma// rim kha bsgyur la dal kha bsgyur// bsgur bdag

chen mo glud la gshegs// yas bdag chen mo yas la gshegs// bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang// bdu da mo bkol byang mas/ bdud mo khyod tshol ma bcu la glud bsngo ba'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o// da ni bran

mo khyo stor ma dgu la glud bsngo ba ni// 'phang re la bzang ral re btags la// lug nag mo la bya nag mo bskyon la gzhag/ g.yu yi 'phang la gser gyi 'phang lo gsal te gzhag/ de nas glud bsngo ba 'di skad
do// sa yi de ni lug nag la// gnam gyi de ni bya nag skyon// dpal ldan dbus kyis khyo stor ma// bdud kyi lcam la gshin rdze'i yum// chu nad thabs cad bzlog tu gsol// glud bdag chen mo glu

'di bzhes// shar gyi phyogs su khyod stor ma// mi bzad rdo rje ral gcig ma// srin mo mang po'i sbyul pa 'gyed// snying chu stong gzen nad 'di bzlog/ glud bdag chen mo glud 'di bzhes// shar lho mtshams kyi

khyod stor ma// drang srong dkar skya mche ba can// gza' dang rgyu skar sbrul ba 'gyed// rgyu gzer bcu pa'i dal 'di bzlog/ glud bdag chen mo glud 'di bzhes// lho yi phyogs kyi khyod stor ma// dpal ldan gnyan

gyi re ma ti// nag gru mang po sprul pa 'gyed// g.yon pa shu ba'i nad 'di bzlog/ glud bdag chen mo glud 'di bzhes// lho nub mtshams kyi khyod stor ma// 'jig rten phung byed nag mo'i 'di// srin po mang po'i

sprul par 'gyed// tsha ba'i nad 'di bzlog tu gsol// glud bdag chen mo glud 'di bzhes// nub kyi phyogs kyi khyod stor ma// glud bdag chen mo 'di ni// 'khor ni glu bran stong gis bskor// mdze nad 'di yang

bzlog tu gsol// glud bdag chen mo glud 'di bzhes// nub byang mtshams kyi khyod stor ma// rgya rgyen lha zhen chen mo ni// rlung lha'i bu mo sprul par 'gyed// rlung bsnyon nad 'di bzlog tu gsol// glud bdag

chen mo glud 'di bzhes// byang gi phyogs kyi khyod stor ma// nag mo chen mo e ka sham// gnod sbyin nag po sbrul par 'gyed// lhog ba skrengs pa'i nad 'di bzlog// glud bdag chen mo glud 'di bzhes/ byang shar
mtshams nas khyod stor ma// glang gzer 'tshe ba'i nad bdag mo// byi na ya ga'i sbrul par 'gyed// tsha ba'i gzer nad bzlog tu gsol// glud bdag chen mo glud 'di bzhes// bdud mo bkol byang las// bran

mo khyod stor ma dgu la glud bsngo ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// de nas bdud mo khyo tshol bzhi la glud bsngo ba 'di skad do// phyogs phyogs de ni pha gi na// nyi ma byang shar mtshams shed na// gling gi ming ni khyi yi

gling// bya yi ming ni gser gyi bya// mtshi yi ming mi g.yu yi mtsho// gser bya g.yu mtsho'i nad shed na// sngon gyi rgyal mo khyo mi 'dod// da lta bdud mo khyo tshol ma// 'bul lo nag mo mkhal rgya 'bul// bzhes shig

gtan gyi grogs su bzhes// 'bul lo yun gyi 'bangs su 'bul// yul dag shar lho'i mtshams shed na// gling gi ming ni ki ta'i gling// bya yi ming ni g.yu yi bya// mtsho yi ming ni gser gyi mtsho// g.yu bya gser
mtsho'i nang shed na// sngon gyi rgyal mo khyo mi 'dod// da lta bdud mo khyo tshol ma// glud du nag mo mkhal rgya 'bul// bzhes shig gtan gyi grogs su bzhes// 'bul lo yun gyi 'bangs su 'bul// bskang

ngo thugs dam gnyan po bskang// rgya gar za hor bar shed na// gling gi ming ni gyin rnga'i gling// bya yi ming ni dngul gyi bya// mtsho yi ming ni gser gyi mtsho// dngul bya gser mtsho'i nang shed na// pho

ru skyes pa sbal pa ste// mo ru skyes pa bud med yin// khyo ga bya ba ming yang med// sngon gyi rgyal mo khyo ma'i 'dod// da lta bdud mo khyo tshol ma// glud du nag mo mkhal rgya 'bul// bzhes shig gtan gyi grogs su

bzhes// 'bul lo yun gyi 'bangs su 'bul// bskang ngo thugs dam gnyan po bskang// yul dag nub byang mtshams shed na// gling gi ming ni srin rta'i ming// bya yi ming ni zangs kyi bya// mtsho yi ming ni dngul

gyi mtsho// zangs bya dngul mtsho'i nang shed na// pho ru skyes pa sbal pa yin// mo ru skyes pa bud med yin// khyo ga bya ba'i ming yang med// sngon gyi rgyal mo khyod mi 'dod// da lta bdud mo khyod tshol ma// glud du nag

mo mkhal rgya 'bul// bzhes shig gtan gyi grogs su bzhes// 'bul lo yun gyi 'bangs su 'bul// bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang// gting bdud rnams kyi thugs dam bskang// ma bdud rnam sa kyi thugs dam bskang// klu bdud rnams
kyi thugs dam bskang// mtsho bdud rnams kyi thugs dam bskang// bdud mo bkol byang las// nag rgya'i skongs bzo bstan pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o// gnod 'dul lha
yis yang gsol pa// bdud mo khyo med 'di rnams la// nag po sril pos ji ltar bskang// yang dag rdzogs kyis stsal pa// bdud mo khyo med 'di rnams la// nag po sril pos bskang ba 'di'o// gting yul ma gi

gting re ring// gting yul gting dag mi zab ste// 'dod chags rgya mtsho gting re zab// ri bo ya gi dpangs re mtho// ri bo dpangs dag mi mtho ste// gti mug ri mi dpangs re mtho// rong khams ma gi rtse re

rtsub// rong khams rtse dag mi rtsu ba ste// zhe sdang dgram bu rtse re rtsub// dug gsum bsgral ba mar 'das nas// 'byung ba chu dag ma lags te// khrag gi rgya mtsho khyil li li// rgya mtsho de yi dkyil shed na// rdo yi

gur phub skongs se skongs// srin rdo'i re thag rgyangs se rgyangs// khro chu'i chun phur thams se thams// de 'dra'i gur sgo g.yos pa na// sog po nag po sbyugs glu len// de 'dra'i gur sgo g.yon pa na// mon mo

nag mo 'greng 'phyar 'dzad// de 'dra'i gur gyi nang shed na// bzhi zur ma cig lhems se lhems// thor tshugs ma cig ye re re// bdud bsgyur ma cig shal la la// sku yi na sdod sdings ma la// mdzed pa'i stabs

ni thos ma gyu// sku la zhing chen g.yang gzhi gsol// thod pa rlon pa'i kha bad can// nad kyi rkyal pa mtshan na sbe// sngon dmar gru gu skyong zhing sdeg// khyod ni bdud mo khyo med ma// dbang ni nag mo srol mi
dbang// skyes pa pho yi srig ma gcod// za ma mo yi skal ma gcod// bskang ngo nag po srol pos bskang// rgya mtsho de yi gting shed na// rus pa'i gur cig skangs se skangs// rul pa'i re thag

rgyangs se rgyangs// khro chu'i chon phur thams se thams// de 'dra'i gur sgo g.yas pa na// sog po nag po sbre slag gon// de 'dra gur sgo g.yon pa na// dom pa nag gu khyi skad zug// de 'dra'i gur gyi mnga' bdag
mo// rus pa'i bud med khrag med ma// rus pa'i slag pa gos su gyon// khrag gi gos lag thibs se thibs// las su mdze nad sna tshogs gtong// khyod dang bdud mo khyo med ma// dbang mi nag mo srol mo

dbang// skyes pa pho yi srog ma bcad// za ma mo yi skal ma bcad// bskang ngo nag po srol pos bskang// de bas bag tsam dma' ba na// mthing nag gur phub skongs se skongs// mthung nag tshon thag rgyangs se

rgyangs// lcags kyi tshon phur sha ra ra// de 'dra'i gur sgo g.yas pa na// lce bye lto dkar 'phur zhing lding// da lta'i gur sgo g.yon pan// gdug pa'i sbrul cig khyugs se khyugs// de 'dra'i gur gyi mnga' bdag

mo// khrag gi bud med ral pa can// gos su khrag gi thul pa gsol// las su dmu chu sna tshogs gtong// khyod dang bdud mi khyo med ma// dbang ni nag po srin po dbang// skyes pa pho yi srog ma gcod// za ma mo

yi skal ma gcod// bskang ngo nag po srol pos bskang// de bas bag tsam dma' ba na// re lde'i gur cig skongs se skongs// re lde'i tshon thag rgyangs se rgyangs// lcags kyi chon phur phral la// de 'dra'i gur sgo

g.yas pa na// gdug pa sbrul cig khyugs se khyugs// de 'dra gur gyi mnga' bdag mo// nag mo chas kyi blun mo 'khrul/ gos su re lde nag po gon/ nad du 'bras dang khol mi gtong/ khyod dang nag po khyo med ma/

dbang ni nag po srol med dbang/ skyes pa kham yi srog ma gcod// za ma mo skal ma gcod// bskang ngo nag po srol pos bskang// bdud mo khyo med sde bzhi yang// gnas ni rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas// rgyu ni
gling bzhi khyab par rgyu// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// gting bdud khyed med ma bzhi bskang ba'i le'u steng gnyis pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang

gsol pa// bdud mo khyo rkun ma bzhi ji ltar bskang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// 'og gi rgya mtsho mar 'das na// rlung nag rdo rje rgya gram chags// shar gyi rdo rje'i rtse mo la// dung gi bud med khrag

med ma// sha khrag ral pa sha ra ra// sha rjen za zhing khrag mngal 'thung// khyod ni bdud mo khyo rkun ma// khyod gyi khyo dag mi rku ste// skye ba de yi gong ma la// pha ni dri za'i rgyal po lags// ma ni lha mo nam chung
'dzin// pha ma gnyis kyi bgro bgro nas// nye dbang nag po'i chung mar byin// bud med zhe sdang che ba yis// nam gyi yar phyed mar phyed na// grogs kyi zla grogs gri ru bsad// de yi la yogs da lta

byung// stong khams bskor kyang khyo ba rnyed// dbang ni smug po srol po dbang// skong ni gling dang zhag gis skong// skyes pa pho yi srog ma gcod// za ma mo yi skal ma bcad// bskang ngo smug po srol pos

bskang// lho yi rdo rje rtse mo la// gser gyi bud med ser po la// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// sha chen za zhing khrag mngal 'thung// khyod dang bdud mo khyo rkun ma// khyod dang khyod dag mi rku ste// skya ba 'di yi gong ma

la// pha ni grul bum sna bo che// ma ni lha mi zur phud can// pha ma gnyis kyis bgro bgro nas// gnod sbyin nag po'i chung mar gtang// bud med zhe sdang che ba yis// nam gyi yar phyed mar phyed na// grogs kyi zlo

grogs gri ru bsad// de yi la yogs da lta langs// stong khams btsal kyang khyo ma rnyed// dbang ni smug nag srol po dbang// skyong ni gling dang mdos kyis skyong// skyes pa pho yi srog ma gcod// za ma mo yi skal

ma gcod// bskang ngo smug po srol pos bskang// nub phyogs rdo rje'i rtse mo la// zangs kyi bud med khrag med ma// sha khrag ral pa sha ra ra// sha rjen za zhing khrag mngal 'thung// khyod dang bdud mo khyo rkun

ma// khyod dang khyo dag mi rku ste// skye ba de yi gong ma la// pha ni sa bdag gdug pa can// ma ni sa bdag pad+mo 'phreng// pha ma gnyis kyis bgro bgro nas// klu bdud chen po'i chung mar gtang// bud med zhe sdang che
ba yis// nam gyi yar phyed nas// grogs kyi zla grogs gro ru bsad// de yi la yogs da lta langs// stong khams bskor kyang khyo ma rnyed// dbang ni smug rgya lto ser dbang// skong ba zhag dang gling gis

skong// skyes pa pho yi srog ma gcad// za ma mo yi skal ma gcad/ smug rgya lto ser 'di yis bskang// byang gi rde rje rtse mo la// g.yu yi bud med khrag mig ma// g.yu yi ral pa sha ra ra// sha rjen za zhing khrag

mngal 'thung// khyod dang bdud mo khyo rkun ma// khyod dang khyo dag mi rku ste// skye ba de yi gong ma la// pha ni gnod sbyin skar ma gdong// ma ni klu mo lce 'byam ma// pha ma gnyis kyis bgro bgro nas// sha tre nag po'i

chung mar gtang// bud med zhe sdang che/ ba yis// nam gyi yar phyed mar phyed na// grogs kyi zla grogs gri ru bsad// de yi la yogs da lta langs// stong khams bskor kyang khyo ma rnyed// dbang ni smug nag mkhal

brgya dbang// skong ni mdos dang gling gis skong// skyes pa pho yi srog ma gcod// za ma mo yi skal ma gcad// bskang ngo mkhal brgya 'di yis bskang// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo khyo rkun ma bzhi bskang ba'i
le'u ste nga gsum pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ bdud mo khyod ma rnyed sde bzhi ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// de yi
bskang thabs 'di ltar ro// 'dzam bu gling bzhi'o phyogs bzhi nas// gling bar mun pa'i phyogs bzhi nas// pha ni gnod sbyin sngon po la// ma ni dus bzhu'i tshod 'dzin ma// de gnyis srid cing sbrul pa

las// bdud kyi bud mo bzhi skyes te// shar phyogs gling bar mun pa nas// gnod sbyin sngon po'i bu mo ni// rus pa'i bud med khrag mig ma// rus pa'i ral pa sha ra ra// 'dod khams lha yul ya gi ru// grogs

kyi zla rogs tshol du phyin// lha yul bskor kyang khyo ma rnyed// des na bud med bson nams chung// rung pa'i slag pa gos su gon// las su rus nad 'brum bu gtong// dbang ba smug nag srol po dbang// bskang

ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang// lho phyogs gling bar mun pa nas// gnod sbyin sngon po'i bu mo ni// me yi bu mo g.yo mig ma// 'dod khams lha yul ya gi na// grogs kyi zla rogs tshal du phyin/ lha yul btsa la

kyang khyod ma rnyed/ des na bud med bsod nams chung/ me yi slag sa gos su gon/ me yi ral sa sha na na/ las su tshad nad snatshogs gtong// dpang ni nag rgya srol po dbang// bskang ngo bskang pa'i thugs

dam bskang// nub phyogs gling bar mun pa nas// gnod sbyin sngon po'i bu mo ni// khrag gi bud med dung mig ma// 'dod khams lha yul ya gi ru// grogs kyi zlo rogs tshol du phyon// lha yul btsal kyi khyod ma

rnyed// des na bud med bsod nams chung// khrag gi slag pa gos su gon// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// las su khrag nad rgyu gzer gtong// dbang ni mkhal rgya srol po dbang// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam

bskang// byang phyogs gling bar mun pa nas// gnod sbyin sngon po'i bu mo ste// gser gyi bud med khrag mig ma// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// 'dod khams lha yul ya gi ru// grogs kyi zla rogs tshol du phyin// lha

yul bskor kyang khyo ma rnyed// des na bud med bsod nams chung// rlung gi slag pa gos su gon// rlung gi ral pa sha ra ra// las su smyo 'bog log rgal gtong// dbang ni mkhal rgya srol po dbang// bskang ngo

bskal ba'i thugs dam bskang// rlung gi gur chen skongs se skongs// rlung gi ba dan thibs se thibs// ser bu'i chon thag na ra ra// de 'dra'i gur sgo g.yas pa na// chu sron rgya mtshan ye re re// de 'dra'i gur sgo

g.yon pa na// rlung gi rgyas mtshan ye re re// de 'dra'i gur gyi mnga' bdag mo// ma btsun dbug chos dbyar mo sil// za ma las kyi dbang mo cho// ting 'dzin drod la mnga' mdzad ma// sman dang phud dang mdangs
kyi bskang// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo na// ri rab lhun po'i bum pa na// yum srid pa'i rgya mo de na bzhugs// thugs la sbrul pa khri dang 'bum// gling bzhi mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// gling
bzhi rgyal pa'i gtor mas bskang// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// smyug rgya sron po'i drug skor bstan pa'i le'u sto nga bzhi pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// de yi yas thabs ji ltar

lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// 'bru sna tshang ba'i gling chung la// smug mo dgu la bud med da// 'brang rgyas dgu la 'phang khra dgu/ mtsho dgu nang du bya dgu 'o// gling chung de la nam mkha'
dgu/ khong sngon gcig dang mig bzhi dang// tshon gsum bzhi dang dgu ru bsog/ sman dang gtor ma cha dgu'o// de ni yas skya rim pa'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// smug rgya'i yas bstan
pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gting khams klu bdud 'di rnams la// nag mo chu khams ji ltar bskang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gting khams klu bdud 'di

rnams la// dkar nag sbrul gyi ral pa can// chu khams bskang ba 'di ltar ro// de 'og srid pa'i ma mo ni// srid pa'i rgya mtsho khu rlangs nas// khram thog klu yis sol gtong ma// chu srin g.yang gzhi lus la

gon// dkar nag sbrul gyi ral pa can// chu glong sngon po'i gdan la bzhugs// nyin zhing glud sman rgya dang rtse// mtshan zhing sa bdag gnyan dang sdengs// zhal nas rgya mtsho'i klong 'khyil na// klu chen brgyad kyi

sring gcig ma// snang srid rtsa ba phyag gis bzung// dgyes na 'jig rten rgyas 'debs ma// khros na klu yi dal 'begs ma// bud med kun gyi ting rgya bcan// klu srin pho mo'i jo mo ste// khyod la ming dang mtshan

btags pa// klu yi rgyal pos ming btags pa// gtsug na rin chen skad du na// klu sman rgyal mo chu 'khrim ma// gshen rabs mi bo'i skad du na// klu bdud rgyal mo sku 'jal ma// dam pa chos kyis ming btags

pa// klu mo yid 'ong bkra shis ma// chu gur 'khyil ba'i nang na bzhugs// stag sgron glang dmar brgya yi khal// gzig sgron glang dmar rgya yi khal// gling dmar nyis brgya'i kh+la 'degs ma// rgyal mo nam mkha'
gcig gi bdag/ klu bdud kun la dbang sgyur ma// gdug pa klu yis zin ta re// klu gnyan lag tu sho ra re// ding ring nag mo chu mdos long// ma bdud bcu gnyis rgyal mo ni// rol mtsho khrag gi gting khams

na// bdud khams chud kyi rgyal mo ni// chu bdud gting gi khrag 'thung ma// dmar mo phya sangs chu bya gdong// chibs su zangs kyi chu bya chibs// rol mtsho'i gting nas mdos lon ma// do nod nag mo'i chu mdos
long// yon bdag khrag gi glud du bzhes// glud bzhes de ni phya sangs cig// rol mtsho g.yu yi gting mtsho nas// ma bdud chud kyi rgyal mo ni// lag na sngon dmar me 'bar ma// sngon mo nya

lcigs g.yu ral mo// chibs su mcho yi rgyur mi chibs// sngon mo ba gdong mtsho sman bdud// khyod ni sngon mi chu kha'i bdag// de ring nag mo mdos kyis bskang// gting gi bdud mo klu bdag mi// de 'og ma yi
mdos bdag mo// rol mtsho gting gi 'o mtsho nas// klu sman ma bdud chud za mo// gting bdud gur bdag phya sangs ma// chibs su chu glang sngon po chibs// de ring nag mo chu mdos long// gting gi bud med

'bre bo gdong// chibs su chu glang sngon po zhon// lag na me yi ba dan 'phyar// na bza' chu dar sngon po gon// nag mo chu mdos sram len ma// de ring nag mo chu mdos long// mun mtsho khrag gi gting bdud
mo// nag mo chu bdud sha zan ma// bzhugs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// kha rlangs nag po gnam du gtong// chibs su chu sram nag po zhon// nag mo mdos bdag sram bdog ma// mtsho bdud rgyal mo glud

kyi bdag// na bza' chu bya'i thul pa gsol// nag mo 'bring mig gting bdud mo// chu mtsho mer nag gting na bzhugs// yar 'gro mar 'gro chu gzhung zhon// rol du chu sram sngon po khrid// me bzhur zhon zhing

rjes rnyog ma// ribs po 'thibs pa'i bdud dang sdong// nag mo'i rjong mdos drod pa long// khyi phag sha zan glud mig lus// lus la chu gri'i mtshan gon no// mtsho bdun gyi gting myul zhing// rgya mtsho kha yi

rlabs gcod ma// chibs su chu srin pir la zhon// do nub rdzing mdos chu mdos long// khyod ni chu bdu rdzing gi bdag/ nag mo chu mdos 'di yis bskang// nag mo chu kha la dbang ba bdun bskang ba'o// bdud mo

bkol byang las// klu bdud bskang ba'i le'u ste nga drug pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// snang srid ma mo mkha' 'gro ni// sha dang khrag la ngad che bas// de yi bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag
rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// hUM/ ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo ni// kun tu bzang mo mu kha le// seng ge dkar po'i sha yis
bskang// chags sdang rnam lnga byang bar mdzad// rten byed shal gyi mkha' ston nas// mnga' bdag mkha' 'gro ser ge gdong// ba glang dkar po'i sha yis bskang// gti mug nad rnams byang bar mdzod// g.yo

byed rlung gi mkha' stong nas// 'degs byed mkha' 'gro yang gsal g.yos// thogs med bya khyung sha yis bskang// phrag dog nad rnams byang bar mdzod// sdud byed chu yi mkha' stong nas// mthu ldan mkha' 'gro
gnyen gsal 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i sha yis bskang// 'dod chags nad rnams byang bar badzod// rtog bral me yi mkha' stong nas// mi gnas mkha' 'gro 'od gsal 'bar// dpa' gtum stag

mo'i sha yis bskang// nga rgyal nad rnams byang bar badzod// mi rtog nam mkha'i mkha' stong nas// rtogs med mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal 'bar// sha tshon tshogs pas thugs dam bskang// zhe sdang nad rnams byang
bar mdzod// khams gsum gsal ba'i yum mchog ma// 'phra men rgya mtsho srid pa'i yum// bar snang shol mo'i mo'i sha yis bskang// dkar mo nyi zla'i thod 'phreng can// bya rgod dkar po'i sha yis

bskang// rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi// lce sbyang nag po'i sha yis bskang// phung byed sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// gtum pa dom gyi sha yis bskang// dpal chen thugs kyi dge sde bzhi// zhe sdang sbrul gyi sha

yis bskang// srid pa cha byed cha snyogs la// gti mug dred kyi sha yis bskang// e ka dzA ti sbun drug la// nga rgyal ra yi sha yis bskang// phung byed dur khrod ma bdun la// phung sri rnga ma'i sha yis bskang// phung

byed nam mkha'i rgyal mo ne mtshan gsum// lcags kyi bya khra sngon po'i sha yis bskang// 'dod khams gtso mo ne mtshan la// lcags kyi dre rta rkang gsum sha yis bskang// dmag dpon rgyal po bzhi po la// 'dod

chags sbyang mo'i sha yis bskang// las kyi sring mo bzhi po la// gsung snyan ne tsho'i sha yis bskang// phung byed nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// lcags bya nag mo'i sha yis bskang// bse yi lha mo bzhi rnams la// dur khrod wa

yi sha yis bskang// gti mug nad rnams byang bar mdzod// bdud mo bkol byang las// sha snas bskang ba'i le'u ste nga bdun po'o//// khrag gis bskang ba 'di lta ste// hUM/ kun tu bzang mo mu kha le// brjid pa

seng ge'i khrag 'bul na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// kun bzhi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// yon bdag khrag nad zhi bar mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// brtan pa glang chen khrag 'bul na// dam

nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// mig gi rnams shes rtsa ba chod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// thogs med khyung gi khrag 'bul na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// lce yi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// rtag
pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i khrag 'bul na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// sna yi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// lhun grub bam gyi khrag 'bul

na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// yid kyi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// 'phra min rgya mtsho srid pa'i yum// bar snang shol mo khrag 'bul na// dgra bo zhes sdang rtsa ba chod// nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can// bya rgod
dkar po'i khrag 'bul gyis// dgra bo'i gti mug rtsa ba chod// rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi// lce spyang nag mo'i khrag 'bul gyis// dgra ba'o 'dod chags rtsa ba chod// phung byedasbas pa'i

ma mo bzhi// gtum pa don gyi khrag 'bul gyis// dgra bo'i nga rgyal rtsa ba chod// dpal chen thugs kyi dges sde bzhi// zhes sdang sbrul gyi khrag 'bul gyis// dgra bo'i khrag dog rtsa ba chod// srid pa chags byed cha

snyoms la// gti mug dred mo'i khrag 'bul gyis// e ka dzA ti sbun drug la// nga rgyal 'bar ba'i khrag gi bskang// phung byed dur khrod ma bdun la// phung byedakhrag gis bskang// phung byed nam mkha' rgyal mo ne

mtshan gsum// lcags kyi bya khra sngon po'i khrag gis bskang// 'dod khams gtso mo ne mtshan la// lcags kyi dre rta rkang gsum khrag gis bskang// dmag dpon rgyal po bzhi po la// 'dod chags sbyang mo'i khrag

gis bskang// las kyi sring mo bzhi po la// gsung snyan ne mtshan la// gsung snyan ne tsho'i khrag gis bskang// phung byed nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// lcags bya nag mo'i khrag gis bskang// bse yi lha mo bzhi rnams
la// dur khrod wa mo'i khrag gis bskang// gti mug bdud =:rnams byang bar mdzod// ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// khrag snas bskang ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu nga brgyad pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha

yis yang gsol ba// tsit+ta sa yi bskang ba ji lta bu// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// hUM/ chos nyid kun bzang mu kha le// seng ge dkar po'i snying gis bskang// bsgrub ni ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgrub// rtag

pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsol// ba glang dkar po'i snying gis bskang// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// rtag pa' rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// thogs med khyung gi snying gis bskang// las kyi rigs kyi mkha'
'gro bsgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i snying gis bskang// pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'do gsal 'bar// dpa' brtul stag mo'i snying gis
bskang// rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// lhun grub mi yi snying gis bskang// de bzhin rags kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// 'phra men rgya mtsho la sogs te// ye shes
ma mo bcu bzhi la// gnan la 'phur dgu'i snying gis bskang// bsgrub ni ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgrub// srid pa che byed la sogs te// dman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad la// logs la 'grim pa'i snying gis

bskang// bsgrub ni las kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// skong ni dam tshig nyams pa skong// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// snang srid snying gis bskang ba'i le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//// gnod
'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo la// seng ge dkar mo'i thod nang du// bam gyi snying khrag blu gsal dbul// gzugs kyi khungs so rtsa ba

chod// 'grim ma mo kha ha b+ho// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsang g.yos// thogs med khyung gi thod pa ru// gnod sbyin snying khrag byug la dbul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// rnam par shes pa'i rte phrog

cig/ nying bzhi mu kha le b+h+yo// rtags pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// ban glang dkar po'i thod pa ru// dri za'i snying khrag blugs la 'bul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// gzugs kyi phung po rtsa ba

chod// 'gros mu kha b+h+yo// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yol// thog med khyung gi thod pa ru// gnod sbyin snying khrag blugs la dbul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// 'du byed phung po'i dkyil du rgyo ba// ba

yang yang te b+h+yo// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i thod pa ru// klu bdud snying khrag blugs pa 'bul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// 'du shes phung po'i dkyil du rgyo ba// bis san ti

b+h+yo// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'do gsal 'bar// dpa' brtul stag mo'i thod pa ru// gshin rje'i snying khrag blugs la dbul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// tshor ba'i phung po'i dkyil du rgyo ba// dza la b+ha ram ha

b+h+yo// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// brgya byin snying khrag blugs la dbul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// rnam shes 'khung mo'i rtsa ba chod/ ma hA yon to hA b+h+yo/ ye

shes bo mo bcu bzhi la/ gnam la 'khur dgu'i thams sa ru/ khrag sna stong gis bskang la 'bul/ dam nyon sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rtsa ba chod// badzra kro d+hi shA ri b+ha ga pad+ma rgya hUM

b+h+yo// srid pa'i sman mo thams cad la// logs la 'grim dgu'i thod pa ru// khrag sna stong gis bkang la 'bul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// lnga phung thal pa bzhin du thong// oM badzra dza khram mu ran

b+h+yo// zhes gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// thod zor gyi le'u ste drug cu pa'o// de nas gtor mas bskang spyi dang mthun no// sman gyis bskang ba ni spyi dang mthun pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid yangs

pa'i kling dkyil nas// kun tu bzang mo mu kha le// g+hi waM sman gyi thugs dam bskang// yams nad sna tshogs zlog tu gsol// me long ye shes klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// ga bur sman
gyis thugs dam bskang// rus pa'i nad rnams zlog tu gsol// mnyam nyid ye shes klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// dza ti sman gyis thugs dam bskang// mkhris pa'i nad rnams zlog tu
gsol// so sor kun rtog klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'bar// li shi sman gyis thugs dam bskang// khrag nad thams cad zlog tu gsol// bya grub ye shes klong dkyil
nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yol// gur kum sman gyis thugs dam bskang// rlung nad thams cad zlog tu gsol// stong nyid ye shes klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// cu
gang sman gyis thugs dam bskang// rims nad sna tshogs zlog tu gsol// mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i klong dkyil nas// ye shes ma mo bcu bzhi la// sman snang sting gis thugs dam bskang// ma mo 'dus pa'i klong
dkyil nas// ma mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad la// sman sna tshogs pa'i thugs dam bskang// rims nad thams cad zlog tu gsol// zhes gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// sman gyis bskang ba'i le'u ste
drug cu re gcig pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams gyur na// de yis bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba
'di'o// hUM// ri rab bum pa'e rnal 'byor mi spong rnam lnga nyam sa byang bar mdzod/ ri rab bum pa'i nub phyogs na// yum gcig mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal bzhu bzhugs// spos dang mar me thugs dam bskang
rtse mo na// yum chen kun tu bzang mo bzhugs// sbos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang// rnal 'byor sku gsung thugs kyi// dam tshig nyams pa bskang du gsol// ri rab bum pa'i shar phyogs na// yum cig
mkha' 'gro rnam snang bzhugs// sbos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang// rnal 'byor sbyad par bya ba yi// dam tshig nyams pa bskang du gsol// ri rab bum pa'i lho phyogs na// yum chen mkha' 'gro 'od gsal
bzhugs// sbos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang/ rnal 'byor dang du blang ba yis// dam tshig nyams pa byang bar mdzod// ri ram bum pa'i byang phyogs na// yub cig mkha' 'gro yang gsal bzhugs// sbos
dar mar mes thugs dam bskang// rnal 'byor shes bya'i dam tshig nyams pa byang bar mdzod// ri rab bum pa'i byang shar nas// yum cig mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal bzhugs// sbos dang mar mes thugs dam

bskang// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i dam tshig nyams pa byang bar mdzod// ri rab bang ri me gnyis pa la// ye shes rje mo bcu bzha bzhugs// sbos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang// yan lag dam tshig stong dang rtsa
brgyad nyams pa byang bar mdzod// ri rab bang rib gsum pa la// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad bzhugs// sbos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa bdag cag gi// sngags kya dam tshig sa ma
ya// 'bum sde nyams pa bskang du gsol// snang srid ma mor bgrangs pa la// sbos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang// skongs gyur dbang dang dngos grub gsol// zhes gsungs so// bkol byang
nam mkha'i rgyud las// dam tshigs nyams pa bskang ba'i le'u ste drug cu re gnyis pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// phur pas bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// hUM/ ri

rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// phur pa stong gis bskong ba ni// snang srid ma mo'i thugs dam bskang// sdang dgra gnod bgegs bsgral du gsol// hUM// lcags sna lnga yis phur pa la// mthing nag dar gyi cod

pan btags// skong ni kun tu bzang mo skong// bskul ni mkha' drug rgyal mo bskul// dgra bgegs rnam shes phung po'i rtsa ba chod// nyid bzhi mu kha le kI li yA mA ra ya rbad// hUM/ tsan dan dkar po'i phur ba
la// dkar po dar gyi cod pan btags// rnam snang gsal gyi thugs dam bskang// rdo rje rigs kyi ma mo bskul// dgra bgegs gzugs phung rtsa ba chod// 'gris mu kha kI la mar ya rbad// hUM/ mdzo mo dag gi
phur pa la/ le brgan dmar po'i cod pan btags// gnyen gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam bskang// pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bskul// dgra bgegs 'du shes phung po'i rtsa ba chod// bsi san ti kI la ya mA ra
ya rbad// hUM/ skyer pa dag gi phur pa la// ser po dag gi cod pan btags// yang gsal g.yos kyi thugs dam bskang// las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bskul// dgra bgegs 'du byed phung po rtsa ba chod// bi
yang yang te kI la ya ma ra ya rbad// hUM/ sher sheng nag po'i phur pa la// za 'og dar gyi cod pan btags// bkrag gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam bskang// de bzhin rigs kyi ma mo bskul// dgra bgegs yid

kyi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// ma hA ya ma te kI la ya mA ra ya rbad// ces gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// mdos phur drug gi bsad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu re gsum pa'o// gnod 'dul lha
yis yang gsol pa// sems can rnams la mi 'tshe'i phyir// gzugs kyi bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gzugs kyis bskang ba ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha
yi gtso// hUM/ dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo na// gser mkhar ser po'i kha che na// yab ni skos rje brang dkar rdze// sku la gser gyi slag pa gsol// g.yas na gser gyi 'gying 'khar bsnams// g.yon na srid
pa'i rtsibs byang bsnams// dbu la rin chen srog zhu gsol// g.yu sngon gsor skyem 'di bzhes la// ma mo'i skos ka mdzad du gsol// snang srid cham la dbab tu gsol// srid pa ri rab lhun po la// bang
rim dang po gser la bgyis// bang rim gnyis pa g.yu la bgyis// tha ma rin chen sna lngas brgyan// srid pa rtse mo man chad nas// na rag dmyal khams yan chad du// skye 'gro 'dus pa'i srog
chags kun// ri rab gling bzhi'i rgyan du bkod// ri rab bang rim dang po la// 'dab chags rgyal po bya khyung drug/ 'dab gshog g.yul bgyis// nas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// lus po gser la bgyis
te khams gsum dbang du sdud// sder mo lcags la bgyis te 'khor ba dbyings nas 'dren// sbyin mig g.yas g.yon nyi zla 'khyil// ya mchu ma mchu zangs la bgyis// khyab pa ye shes sku dang mnyam// yum chen

kun tu bzang mo la// sku ni ming mngon dbyings na bzhugs// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// skye 'gro gsang ba'i mkha' la 'khyil// 'dab chags rgyal po khyung drug
gis// kun tu bzang mo'i thugs dam bskang// yul drug dbang po drug dang bskang// srid pa'i byol kha bzlog tu gsol// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sku ni nam mkha'i mthal dang mnyam// 'byung ba
bzhi yi stongs su che// sder chags rgyal po seng ge drug// 'dab gshog med par mkhal 'gro// rngog ma g.yu 'do sbrin ltar gtibs// lus po dung mdog 'og du 'phro// nga ro'i skad kyis gdug pa zil gyis
non// yul drug dbang po drug dang skong// rnam snang gsal gyi thugs dam bskang// stobs kyi rgyal po gling chen drug/ dmag dpung bzlog pa'i stobs dang ldan// yang gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam bskang// cang
shes rgyal po rta mchog drug/ shugs kyis sems can don mdzad cing// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur ma// 'do gsal 'bar ba'i thugs dam bskang// dbang gi rgyal mo rma bya drug// dbu la rin chen srog zhu
gsol// lus po g.yu 'do skar ltar 'khrug// gzhug ma rin chen thig les brgyan// 'di ltar sems can ya mtshan can// 'byung ba chu la dbang sgyur ma// gnyen gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam bskang// 'dab
chags smra shes shang shang drug// thog med mkha' la 'gro ba'i g.yu yi gshog 'dab can// mi skad smra ba'i rdzu 'phrul lce btags nas// 'byung ba rlung la dbang sgyur ma// yang gsal g.yos kyi thugs dam

bskang// yul drug dbang po drug kyang skong// dbyings kyi yum drug go// ri rab bang rim dang po la// bcu bzhi kun gyi gtso mo ni// dbu gsum rnam mthar gsum gyi dbu// phyag drug rgyud drug drug thugs rdzes
gzung// sku mdog cir yang ma nges te// thugs dam rkyen du dbul pa ni// cang shes rta rgyal bcu bzhi la// 'dod chags gtso mo bcu bzhi bskyen// dkar mo mdzes pa'i na bza' la// 'ja' tshon lnga yi rgyan
gyis brgyan// ma mo thugs dam des skong ngo// srid pa'i byad kha zlog tu gsol// brgyad kyis rnam shes brgyad kyang skong// drug gis yum drug dbyings su skongs gyur cig// rgyud drug kha lo sgyur pa'i
byol zlog mdzod// khams gsum dbang sgyur ma mo kun gyi gtso// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod 'phreng can// stag gzig ris bkra bcu bzhi la// le brgan 'bar ba'i 'phur lce btags// ma mo'i thugs dam
'dis skongs la// stongs gsum mun nag sel ba'i las mdzod cig// rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum pad+ma nyi ma bdu rtsi khros pa'i dbang mo che// ba gling 'bar ba bcu bzhi dang// 'dab

chags rma bya bcu bzhi la// rin chen dbu rgyan gtsug bud bkod// rin chen rnam lnga rgyan gyis brgyan// dbang chen bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// srid pa zil gyis gnon pa'i 'phrin las mdzod// dbyings phyug

rgyan gyi rgyal mo bzhi// sku mdog ljang khu lha yi gos su gsol// 'ja' tshon rnam lnga'i 'od kyi kha chag can// gling bzhi dbang du sdud cing skye 'gro dbugs nyul ma// stong gsum phung bar byed pa'i ma mo la// dkar
mo ku ku tsa ra bcu bzhi la// rin chen gser gyi khol thag btags// ma mo'i thugs dam 'dis skongs la// dgra bgegs phung po rdul du rlog tu gsol// gsang pa thugs kyi dges sde ma// gling bzhi'i rgyal mo

bzhi po la// 'dab chags sme shes shang shang bcu bzhi la// 'phrin las kha dog lja khu la// stong khams 'phyo ba g.yu yi gshog 'dab can// le brgan dmar po dbul bcings// mo rkang smra ba'i rdzu 'phrul lce

btags nas// srid pa'i byos po bzlog pa'i phyir// phung sri dur sri zlog tu gsol// brgyad kyi rnam shes brgyad kyang skongs// drug gi yul drug dbyings su skongs gyur cig// de yan chad ye shes kyi rdze mo bcu
bzhi'o// hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ni// gser gyi sha po rA bcu la// lus po gser la bgyis te gser 'od me ltar 'bar// rmog bzhi lcags la bgyis te bdud bzhi zil gyis gnod// ru bcu dung la
bgyis te dge bcu thar lam ston// mig gnyis shel la bgyis te shes mog nyi zla 'khyil// kha rlangs sprin la bdud rtsi'i char ltar 'bebs// bsam gtan lha yi skor yin 'gro ba mi yi glud// srid pa chags
byed cha snyoms thugs dam bskang// e ka dza ti chen mo la// dung sha dkar mo chen mo bzhi// le brgan 'bar ba'i phur rtse ra btags// der rje dkar po'i sgo yi bstad// rin chen g.yu yi thig les

brgyan// bsam gtan lha yi skor yin 'gro ba mi yi glud// e ka dza ti'i thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ bdud kyi yum cig chen mo la// lcags kyi dre rta rkang gsum la// za 'og gis ni sga stan gtad// shes ni sbyi
dkar la dar gyi phur lce btags// srid pa'i khung gi nor yin yang 'gro ba mi yi glud// bdud kyi yum cig thugs dam skongs gyur cig// gling bzhi sbyid phud ma dang tshe bdag chen mo la// thogs

med mkha' la 'phyo ba ba rgod gsum// lus po dung la g.yu yi gshog pa can// dar kra le brgan phur lce btags// gling bzhi sbyi 'gro chen mo dang// tshe bdag chen mo'i thugs dam bskongs// rdo rje gar gyi
dbang phyug spun gnyis la// thog med sder 'dzing lcags kyi bya khra ni// khams gsum khyab cing srog gcod las la dga'// gser gyi thig les brgyan cing lcags kyi sder chen gdengs// 'dab chags kun gyi
bdud yin kyi 'gro ba mi yi glud// yo ma srog chags nor gyi dbyings mchog ste// rdzu'aphrul rkang bzhi 'gro ba yongs kyi skyabs// ltos 'gro mgyogs byed dung gi mche ba can// srid pa khyung gi sems can

dang// 'gro ba mi yi glud du 'bul// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang// sa bdag chen mo thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ thugs dam skongs nas rkyen bzlog cig/ dur khrod dregs pa'i ma bdun la// phur sri rnga mo
dbung dmar bdun// skyes pa zhig can bdud bskyon nas// tshe dang dpung gi mtshon bskur nas// bdud kyi dmag dpung bzlog pa'i phyir// ma bdud gnyan gyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ skyes pa dar

dkar ral pa can// ne tsho smra mkhan bzhi bskur nas// srid mo bzhi yi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ shar du shel dkar rgyal dang bzhi// skyes pa rgyan can bzhi bskyon nas// dkar mo mchau gtsigs thugs dam

bskang// lho ru don bu snying dkar bzhi// bud med nag mo bzhi bskyon nas// nag mo kha glal ma yi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ nub tu sbre'u thang can bse yi skyes bu bzhi dang chas// dmar mo mchu 'jib ma
yi thugs dam bskang// byang du 'brong bu dar ma bzhi// skyes bu rgyan can bzhi dang chas// ser mo las mkhan yi thugs dam bskang// ri rab chen po'i logs bzhi nas// gsang ba'i skar khung bzhi nas
ni// dkar mo g.yu yi thor tshugs can// sngon mo gser gyi go cag can// dmar mo g.yu yi thor tshugs can// ser mo byung ru'i lan tshar can/ gsang ba thugs kyu dges sde bzhi// gsal ba'i mar me bzhi bskur
nas// zhi khro 'bar ba'i lha tshogs dang// gtso mo yum drug man chod nas// bod khams bstan ma yan chod du// so so'i thugs dam skongs gyur cig// dkar mo bse yi gzhong thogs bdun// sngon mo gser

gyis gzhong thogs bdun// dmar mo zangs kyi gzhing thogs bdun// ljang nag g.yu yi g.yang thogs bdun// so so'i gzhong thogs rdzas kyis bkang// mtshogs dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi thugs dam skongs
gyur cig// bse yis lha mo mched bzhi la// gnod sbyin bdun mo sman mo la// bse yi bya chung nyi shu gcig/ bdun mo'i tshogs la bdun tsho gcig/ gnod sbyin chogs la bdun tshogs
