gcig// dman mo'o tshogs la bdun tsho bdun// so so'i khram kha gzhan du sgyur// ma mo'i khram nad dgra la sgyur// dal kha nad kha dgra la sgyur// ma he ba glang bong bu dang// chu glang sbal ba nya dang sram// chu la rgyu

ba'i srog chags kyis// chu ba'i gzhung la zhon pa dang// rgyal mtsho'i gting na gnas pa dang// sa dang rlan la gnas pa dang// bdud mo dang ni klu mo dang// ma mo dang ni srid mo'i tshogs// so so'i thugs dam

dbyings su bskang// rkyang bu de ni kha dkar dang// bcos bu de ni lag dkar dang// sha ba dgo ba rna ba rnyan sram le kha dkar dang// 'brong bu dar ma dang// gser sgong g.yu sgong mtshal gyi thig phran
dang// gser skyems dang ni mngon dang chas// ma tshogs thugs dam dbyings su skong// ri rab gling bzhi'i rtse mo nas// snang srid ma mo yongs kyi skos btab pas// ma mo yongs kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i

phyir// 'dab chags rgyal po bya khyung man chod du// 'dab chags phye ma leb yan chod du// 'dab chags nyi khri chig stong gis// srid pa'i ma mo yongs kyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig// gcan gzan rgyal po seng ge

man chod nas// bar snang cha gar yan chod du// sder chags nyi khri chig stong gis// srid pa'i rgyal mo yongs kyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen man chad nas// rtol bu mig nag yan chod

du// rmig pa kha brag nyi khri chig stong gis// srid pa'i ma mo yongs kyi thugs dam bskongs gyur cig// rdzu 'phrul rta mchog man chod nas// dre'u dang bong bu man chod nas// rmig zlum nyi khri chig stong gis// srid

pa'i ma mo yongs kyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ sems can rkang gnyis nyi khri chig stong dang// rkang bzhi nyi khri chig stong dang// rkang mangs nyi khri chig stong dang// lto 'phye la sogs gzugs rnams
dang// gzugs rnams ji ltar mi mthun pa'i// srid pa'i ma mo rnams kyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ de ltar skongs pa'i yon tan gyis// yon bdag bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub// rnam 'byor tshe dang dbang thang
rdzogs// mi mthun rkyen ngan bar chad bzlog/ snang srid ma mo'i thugs dam bskang// zhes gsungs so// zhu ba dbul zhing skos gdam pa'o// bdud mo bkol byang las// gzugs kyis bskang ba bstan pa'i le'u
sta drug cu re bzhi pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// de ltar ri rab lhun po'i gling bzhi las// nam mkha'i rim pas brgyan pa yi// snang srid ma mo ji ltar bskang// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan
'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' lcal pa// hUM// dang po nam mkha' gang las byung// bal tshon smyug ma'i gnyis las byung// pha ni sba dkar ldem pa lags// ma ni u ba'i khong mo che// sba dang

u ba'i bshos ba las// lho smyug sdem pa sha ra ra// mon bu sbyi zlum kha sbra yi// lag pa g.yas par 'phar tshab thogs// lag pa g.yon par sba thag thogs// lho brag gting nas khur gyi brag// smyug byung lho brag

gting nas byung// bal tshon pha dang yab smos pa// srid pa pho mo'i byin brlabs las// 'byung ba lnga yi gu la bal tshon sna lngas brgyan pa cig// snang srid ma mo'i rdzas su byung// 'byung ba'i lug gi bal tshon
bregs// na chung gzhon ba'i lag gis bkal// rnal 'byor bdag gi lag tu blangs// yon bdag lus srog glud du 'bul// ri rab glig bzhi bzhengs pa ni// 'gro drug sems can mang pos bskor// rang rang
mthun pa'i sems can rnams// ri rab gling bzhi dpag bsam shing// g.yung drug sku yi rten du btsugs// g.yung drung mthun pa'i gur du 'bul// nam mkha'i lcags mig tshon bzhis sbras// dar dang za 'og

rgyan gyis brgyan// ri rab bum pa'i byang shar du// mkha' 'gro bkrag la gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dung mig tshon bzhis sbras// dar sna lnga yis rtse la brgyan// nam mkha' g.yu mig tshon bzhis sbras// dar

sna sngon pos rtse la brgyan// nam mkha' zangs mig tshon bzhis spras// dar sna dmar pos rtse la brgyan// nam mkha' gser mig tshon bzhis sbras// dar snang ser pos rtse la brgyan// ri rab kha khyer phyogs bzhi
ru// yum bzhi 'thun pa'i gur du 'bul// nam mkha' lcags mig tshon bzhis baspras// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// srid pa bde 'gro'i gur du 'bul// nam mkha' zangs mig tshon bzhis
spras// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gnyis pa'i shar lho ru// nyi zla thod 'phreng gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dmar po za 'og rigs// gnas la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim
gnyis pa'i shar lho ru// khros ba'i ma bzhis gur du 'bul// nam mkha' gser mig tshon bzhis spras// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis sbras// ba rim gnyis pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// sbas pa'i ma bzhis gur du
'bul// dkar sngo dmar ser tshon bzhis spras// gnam la 'phur dgu'o sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gnyis pa'i mtshams bzhi ru// thugs kyi dges sde bzhi yi gur du 'bul// dkar mo g.yu yi chud 'khor
can// zangs kyi 'od dang ldan pa ni// bang rim gsum pa'i shar lho ru// shel 'phreng can gyi gur du 'bul// dmar mo lcags kyi chud 'khor can// dung gi 'do dngaldan pa ni// bang rim gsum pa'i byang nub
tu// smug mthing rgyal mo'i gur du 'bul// nag mo gser gyi chud 'khor can// zangs kyi 'od dang ldan pa yis// bang rim gsum pa'i byang shar du// re ma ti yi gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dung

mig tshon bzhis spras pa bzhi// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// srid pa cha byed cha snyoms dang// nam mkha'i rgyal mo sbun gnyis gur du 'bul// nam mkha' gser
mig tshon bzhis spras// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i byang shar du// bdag nyid ma yi gur du 'bul// de 'dra ma nor gsum byas la// gnam la 'phur dgu'o sgro yis
brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i tshams gsum du// srin mo ma gsum guran du 'bul// dkar mo dmar ser tshon bzhis spras// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i phyogs bzhi
ru// srin mo ma bzhi'i gur du 'bul// nam mkha' lcags mig tshon bzhis sbras// gnam la 'phu dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i shar nub tu// 'dod khams gtso mo spun gnyis gur du
'bul// dkar sngon dmar ser tshon spras bzhi// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i mtshams bzhi ru// gru 'degs bzhi yi gur du 'bul// dung gi nam mkha' zangs sham
can// zangs kyi nam mkha' dung sham can// g.yu yi nam mkha' gser sham can// gser gyi nam mkha' g.yu sham can// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// dmag
gi rgyal mo'i gur du 'bul// dkar sngo dmar ser tshon bzhis spras// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// las kyi gling bzhi'i gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dkar mo
zang ma drug// dung mig zangs kyi sham bu can dang bdun// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// lcags ri tha ma'i shar phyogs su// rdo rje rigs kyi ma bdun gur du 'bul// nam mkha'i sngon mo zangs ma
drug/ g.yu mig gser sham can dang bdun// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// lcags ri tha ma'i lho phyogs// rin chen rigs kyi ma bdun gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dmar mo zangs ma bdun// zangs
mig dung sham can dang bdun// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// lcags ri tha ma'i nub phyogs su// pad+ma rigs kyi ma bdun gur du 'bul// nam mkha' gser mo zangs ma drug/ gser mig g.yu sham
can dang bdun// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// lcags ri tha ma'i byang phyogs na// las kyi rigs kyi ma bdun gur du 'bul// lcags kyi nam mkha' g.yu yi sham bu mig bzhi// dung gi nam mkha'
g.yu sham bzhi// zangs kyi nam mkha' g.yu sham bzhi// brtan ma bcu gnyis gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dag ni zangs ma na bzhi// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i
phyogs bzhi ru// srin mo bzhi yi gur du 'bul// bskang yang bskang ste mchod kyang mchod// bskang mchod gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// khyed kyi thugs dam bdag skong na// bdag gis bcol ba'i 'phrin
las mdzod// lcags kyi nam mkha' mthi nag 'di// gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan pa dgu// bdud mo dgu yi gur du 'bul// 'bri yi nam mkha' zangs sham bzhi// mi srid bzhi yi gur du 'bul// rtsid pa'i nam

mkh-i' dung sham bzhi// chu srin bzhi yi gur du 'bul// rtsid pa'i nam mkha' gser sham ba bzhi// g.yu yi 'od dang ldan pa ni// shing srin bzhi yi gur du 'bul// ra bal nam mkha' zangs mig bzhi// sa srin
bzhi yi gur du 'bul// de yi nam mkha' rtsid sham bzhi// phud bdag bzhi yi gur du 'bul// nam mkha' nag mo g.yu mig ma// ra bal dkar po'i sham bu can// bdud mo nyag gcig gur du 'bul// lcags
kyi nam mkha' g.yu sham lnga// kha yi bud med lnga yi gur du 'bul// nam mkha' nag mo zangs ma bzhi// dam sri bzhi yi thags dam bskang// ra bal nag po'i nam mkha' la// 'bri yi nam mkha' 'od ldan
la// khyi bal dkar po'i mtha' chag bzhi// bdud mo khyo mi 'dod bzhi yi gur du 'bul// dung gi nam mkha' 'gri sham bzhi// bdud mo khyo med bzhi yi gur du 'bul// lcags kyi nam mkha' zang mig

bzhi// bdud mo khyo rkun ma bzhi'i gur du 'bul// khol bu'i nam mkha' bde chod bzhi// dam sri mtshon ma'i gur du 'bul// 'bri yi nam mkha' zang mig ma// dung gi 'od dang ldan pa ni// klu srin chen mo'i gur
du 'bul// lcags kyi nam mkha' zang mig ma// gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa ni// gting bdud chen mo'i gur du 'bul// ra bal dmar po'i nam mkha' la// 'bri yi sham bus rab tu brgyan// g.yu yi 'od dang
ldan pa ni// klu bdud chen mo'i gur du 'bul// re 'bri'i nam mkha' zang ma lnga// 'brog mo rnams kyi gur du 'bul// re lde g.yu mig nam mkha' ni// lho 'brog chen mo'i gur du 'bul/ 'bri bung bu zang mig
nam mkha' ni// byang 'brog chen mo'i gur du 'bul// srin bal gser mig nam mkha' ni// byang sman chen mo'i gur du 'bul// dkar sral ma dang dmar sral na// ser sral ma dang sngo sral ma// sral mo sde
bzhi'i gur du 'bul// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// nam mkha' bskang ba'i le'u ste drug cu re lnga pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// de ltar ri rab gling bzhi
'di// ma mo rnams la ji ltar bsngo// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// so so'i bsngo ba 'di ltar

ro// hUM// ma tshogs ni gnyan mchod phyir// 'bru sna ni sna tshogs la// 'bru chen ni mang po la// rin chen gyi phye bdar te// ri rab ni lhun po'i gzugs// gling bzhi ni gling phran brgyad// lcags ri ni nag pos

bskor// kha dog ni rigs dang bstun// rgya khyon ni dpag tu med// gling bzhi ni gtor ma dang// srog chags ni mang pos bskor// kun kyang ni rin po che// rgyan dang ni cha lugs ldan// 'jig rten ni zas kyis
bskor// dkon pa'i rdzas kyis brgyan// mu men gyi stegs bu la/ rin chen ni gsal bkram ste/ byu ru'i skas btsugs nas/ sbos kyi sa gzhi la// dbang gi dkyil 'khor ldan// dar dkar yol bres te// gsal
ba'i me bus nas// rgyal mtshan ni mang pi btsugs// le brgan ni gdugs kyis bkab/ dud ba ni gnyen 'phyur zhing/ gser kyi ni skyems bdar te// tshe srog gi glud du 'bul/ chung srid kyi glud du
'bul// longs spyod kyi glud du 'bul// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM// ri rab gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo ste// 'jig rten yongs kyi

mnga' bdag mo// srid pa yongs kyi bdag mo la// skye 'gro g.yangs kyi za byed ma// na bza' stong gsum g.yang gzhi la// thod rlon mang po'i 'phreng bas brgyan// lag na snying gi longs spyod ma// 'dir sbyon tshe
srog glu bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig hUM/ rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo ste/ shar phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo sbrin dkar gos zu la// lag na
gser gyi spu gri thogs// srid pa kun gyi rus 'cha' ma/ 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM// rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo
ste// lho phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// nag mo g.yu yi gos zu la// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// bskal pa me yi 'do 'bar zhig/ skye 'gro kun gyi tshe srog bdag/ 'did sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes
la// mdos bdag chen po mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nub phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo khrag gi gos zu la// lag na thod pa khrag

gis bkang// skye 'gro kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// 'dir spyor tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hU~M las kyi rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// byang phyogs
khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// ser mo rlung gi gos zu can// lag na ne la'i rkyal pa thogs// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs 'phrog ma// 'dir sbyon tsher srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos
bzhes la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hU~M/ nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo ste/ 'jig rten yongs ky-i mnga' bdag mo/ mthing nag nam mkha'i gos zu la// gser gyi dril zhags rdeg cing 'phen// skye 'gro
kun gyi bkrag 'phrog ma// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hU~M/ ri rab gling bzhi'i zom rtse nas// snang srid srog gi phud nyul ma// sku
mdog mthing nag chen mo la// dbu dang spyan ni cir yang ston// rin chen ral pa sna tshogs kyi// snang srid kha dog gsal mdzad ma// sbyan gnyis mdzes pa'i mchi ma yis// g.yas pas snang srid dbang du

sdud// g.yon pas skye 'gro gso mdzad ma// lnga bcu rtsa bdun jo mo ste// skye 'gro yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// ma mo chen mo gshegs nas kyang// tshe dang srog gi glud bzhes la// 'di sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes

shig// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ che zhe chen modakar mo ste// nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying gi zhags pa sdog cing

'phen// sprul pa chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ che zhe dkar mo nyi ma'i bdag// srid pa gsum char sgrol

mdzad ma// lag na shel gyi spu gri thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// 'di sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ chen zha nag mo khrag
'thung ma// srid pa gsum char dbang du sdud// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la// glud

bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ che zhe dmar mo bdud rtsi bdag/ srid pa gsum gyi gsos kyi bdag// lag na bdud rtsi bum pa thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas byung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes/
mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ che zhe ljang nag gnas 'phrul ma// srid pa gsum char gnas la sbyor// lag na zhing lbags rgyal mtsho thogs// khros pa'i rgyal
mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM// mtshan ni srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na rgyu ba'i zhags
pa thogs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM// mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen

mo ste// lag na zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag ni bdag bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM// mtshan ni bdag nyid

chen mo ste// lag na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'phen// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyor tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes sheg/ hUM// mtshan ni
gcig pu chen mo la/ ma/ lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi rdebs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyor tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes

shig/ hUM/ gling bzhi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// srogs shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// lag na ban d+ha zlum po thogs// skye bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud
bzhes la// mdos bdasag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chane mo glud bzhes shig// hUM// srid pa lho yi bdag mo ste// nag mo cheran mo ral pa can// lag ma ban d+ha sul mang thogs// srid par byed
pa'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa nub kyi bdag mo ste// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ste// lag
na ban d+ha lcang lo can// 'chi bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa byang gi bdag mo
ste// ser mo chen mo las kyi bdag/ lag na ban d+ha rgya gram thogs// len par byed pa'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud

bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa yongs kyi sha za mo// shan shan ne'u tshogs kyi rdzas// gos su mi lpags rlon pa gon// mtha' ma mi mgo stong gis bskor// srid po kun gyi bdag nyid ma// zangs sri nam mo'i ming nas
phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ ha la ha la gdong brgya mo// srid pa gsum gyi khyim bdag mo// stag lpags g.yang

gzhi gos su gon// he ru ka ni'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhe la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ 'jig rten gsum gyi byan mkha' mo// sbrin
dkar brtsegs pa gos si gon// lag na mi yi pags pa thogs// e ka dzA ti'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo

glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ dngos po cha byad nag mo la// 'jigs su rung ba'i ral pa can// sku stod mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// sku smad zangs kyi sham thabs can// mi phyung gsod pa'i khram bam thogs// khyod ni

'dod khams gtso mo ste// gshin rje'i lcam cig ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// hUM// cha byad sngon mo chen mo
la// mu tig gos phangs gong su gon// lag na bdud rtsi za ma to// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud
bzhes shig/ hUM// cha byad dkar mo chen mo la// lcags kyu 'bar ba lan thogs// gling bzhi nyul byed ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag

chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i gru 'degs ma// cha byad dkar mo sgeg pa la// lag na rdo rje kha TAM thogs// har ting// dkar mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos

bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// hUM// cha byed nag mo sgeg ma la// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes
la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ cha byad dmar mo sgeg ma la// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// sham ting dmar mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe
srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ cha byad ser mo sgeg ma la// lag na rlung gi ba dan thogs// grub ting ser mo'i ming nas
phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// lho yi nag mo
kha dbyal ma// num kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// kha rdze zangs kha'i mnga' bdag mo// dmag dpon rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir
sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// hUM// lho chen brgyad kyi ma chen mo// nag mo chen mo brkam mdang// srin mo chen mo rab tu
brkam// srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// srin mo chen mo drig 'dod ma// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma// srin mo chen mo gsos byed ma// srin mo chen mo sha za ma// 'jig rten khams rnams

'khrug par byed// tshe srog kun la gnod byed ma// mkhal ma snying dang nang khrol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang nas su// za zhing rngam pa kun tu rgyug/ ma bdun chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud
bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ shar phyogs khams nas kun tu rgyug/ mi mgo'i phor pa khrag gi bkang// grong sgor 'thor zhing nad 'bebs
ma// ma bdud chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// hUM// gling bzhi kun tu rgyug 'gro ste// so 'og kun
nas gnyom byed cing// 'jig rten myos byed za ba mo// sa bdag chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir sbyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/
nag mo chen mo hral hral mo// thab dang gzhob kyi sdong la mo// ma sang chen mo'i ming nas phyung// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes

shig/ da ni dbang phyug ma la bsngo bar bya ste// 'di skad do// b+h+yo// ma nu rag sha srin po'i chung ma ste// rgya mtsho'i ngos la gnas pa'i smug nag ral pa can// ban d+ha rag tas bkang nas rdo rjes 'phrug cing

gsol// khyod kyi bu ni srin phrug lnga brgya ste// dpag tshad brgyad khrir 'gro zhing snying khrag dron mo 'thung// dam tshig srung ba'i mchog ste rdo rjes mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha rag dbang du sdud// dam
nyams dgro bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzasamachog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo

glud bzhes shig/ pra ma ni tshangs pa'i chung ma ste// ser mo dbu bzhi 'bar ba'i ral pa can// ser mo dbu bzhi 'bar ba'i ral pa can// khyod kyi bu ni gzugs khams lho tshogs te// tshangs rigs lha tshogs bye

ba 'bum gyis bskor// dam tshig srung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgro bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da'
bar rdzas mchog bdud rtsi'i gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// ri'u tri ma ni lha chen chung ma ste// dkar mo ral pa 'bar bo'i thod
'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na tri shu la thogs pas// gdug pa rdul du rlog pa bdag nyid ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du
sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchosag bdud rtsi gser skyemasa'abul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo

glud bzhes shig// be na be ni khyab 'jug chung ma ste// sngon mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// mthu chen rnams kyi mthu rnams phrogs nas ni// lag na 'khor lo thogs pas bdun bzhi 'jogs// dam tshig

bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi
gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ko ma ri ni dbang phyug gzhon nu'i chung ma ste// dmar po ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng

can// dbang chen rnams kyi dbang ni sdud byed ma// lag na mdung thung thogs pas kun sgrol ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog sterdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams
dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud

bzhes shig// in+t+ra ma ni brgya byin chung ma ste// dkar ser ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// sum cu rtsa gsum lha dang dbang sgyur ma// lag na o thogs pas ni mtshams gcod ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i

mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe sog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems
mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// 'gugs byed ma ni khu byug mgo bo can// khyod kyi lag na lcags kyu thogs pa yin// shar phyogs dri za mang po

gyis gnon// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da'
bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// lho phyogs nas 'adzra bi ka la ni rdo rje'i chung ma ste// dkar ser
ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// ban d+ha rag tas bkang nas 'khrug cing gsol// mtshams kyi bgegs rnams ma lus tshar gcod ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchod ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro

ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// dam rdzas bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos

bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// a mr-i ta ni nyi ma'i chung ma ste// dmar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i tha 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa yi// bdud rtsi

bum pa sngag bsngas sel bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchod ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi
gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ser skya ma ni zla ba'i chung ma ste// dkar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// lag na pad+ma

bsnams pas gza' skar bzlog/ dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchod ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka dang dam
las ma 'ad las bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ban d+ha haM ni be con chung ma ste// sku mdos ljang

nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// khyod kyi lag na be con thogs pa yin// gang la bya ba'i gnod byed rdul du rlog/ dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du
sdud// dam nyams dgro bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud

bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ rag sha sini po'i chung ma ste// smug nag ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// stir ba su drangs te zhal du gsol// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i bdag nyid ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i

mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' par// rdzas mchod bdud rtsi gser skyems
mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ bag sha sa ni sben pa'i chung ma ste// ljang khu ral pa 'bar pa'i thod 'phreng can// rdo rje dbyug pas gdug pa
rdul du rlog/ mi bzad 'jig rten khams la dbang byed ma// g.yas kyi zangs gri rnon po sgrol bar byed// dam tshig bsrud nga ba'i mchod ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag
dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgro bo'i snyinganas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes

la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ tsa ka la ni rdo rje mgo can// 'ching bar byed pa'i lag na zhags pa thogs// lho phyogs gshin rdze'i rigs rnams rdul du rlog/ dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje
mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud/ dam nyams dgro bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma/ sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsigaser skyems mchod par
'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ num phyogs kyi ru ti re ma tin ston bzang chung ma ste// dkar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phring can// phyag na gshog mda'

ban d+ha 'dzin// sdug bsngal ma lus gnas nas 'dren mdzad ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren
mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdo bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ e ka tsa ra khyod

ni bdud kyi chung ma ste// dmar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na zangs gri thogs pa yis// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i bdag nyid ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro

ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdo
bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ma nu ha ra ma khyod ni 'dod pa lha chen chung ma ste// dkar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na mda' gzhu thogs pa

yis// dam las 'da' ba ma lus sgrol bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snyig nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi
bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen po mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ si ti bka' ni nor bsrung chung ma
ste// dmar mo wa mgo 'bar ba'i thod 'phring can// khyod kyi lag na bum pa 'dzin pa yin// gang la bya ba'i thig le nor sbyin ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun
gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo

mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// ba yi be ni rlung lha'i chung ma ste// sngon mo ral pa ba'ar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na ban d+ha thogs pa yis// phyogs mtshams med par mthong

zhing g.yeng bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma
'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ma ha ma ra ni smug nag gsod byed me// mthing nag ral pa

'bar ba'i thod 'phring can// khyod kyi lag na shes ra ba ral gri 'dzin// thams cad rdul du rlog pa'i gsod byed ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ma kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang
du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ u mu ka la

dmar mo lcags sgrog ma// 'bar ba nyi ma'i spyan can glud 'dul ma// nub phyogs klu dang chu gdol 'dul bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang
du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bdag bzhes
shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ byang gi phyogs nas ag ne ma ni me lha'i chung ma ste// dmar ser ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// gsal shing 'dzin pa'i ye shes me dpung gis// 'khor ba'i

sdug bsngal ma lus sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam
las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ bar hi ni sa bdag chung ma ste// nag mo mo bzad
rngam pa phag gi dbu// phyag na zhags pa bsnams pas bdud bzhi 'dul// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgro
bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes

shig/ tsa mu ti ni gshin rdze'i chung ma ste// smug nag ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// lag na zhing chung bsu drangs nas gsol// gshin rdze'i rigs rnams g.yo ba med par sgrol// dam tshig bsrung ba'i

mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems
mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ pu ta ya ni byin ya ga'i chung ma ste// sngon mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// ban d+ha rag tas bkang nas

'khrug cing gsol// stongaphrag brgyad cu'i bgegs la mnga' mdzad ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren
mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// ru ba na

ni chu lha'i chung ma ste// sngon mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// chu lha rgyan gyi brgyan pas mdzad pa ste// lag na chu srid dang ni sbrul zhags 'dzin// gang la bya ba dbang du sdud nas ni// klu yi rigs rnams

g.yo ba med par sgrol// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las
ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ lam po dar ma ni dril 'khrol ma// ljang nag 'jig rten

pas rdul du rlog byed ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snyinganas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma
'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ dbang phyug gi bsngo 'o// de nas bse mo la bsngo ba ste/ hU~M/
grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen po ni/ sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab/ ma mo chen po dam tshig can// tsha ba'i rong nas bzhengs pa ni// mar khu'i mtsho yi gting shes nas// bdud kyi bu mo chen mo

ni// chibs su bdud rta rting dkar chibs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// mthing gi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa re la phur pa re// dar nag cod pan pu ru ru// dbang gi khrab si li li// brda ni mi phrad

lo bal mo// skad ni snyan ldan mi ldab// dri ni mi zhi ma chal ma chil// gzugs ni mi sdug lag brgya mo// g.yas pa brgya ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa brgya ni zhags pa sdog// mdos bag chen mo mdos bzhes

la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ste// bal yul mthil nas bzhengs pa mo// sbrag rtsi ma mo yi gting shes nas// gzi yi bu mo chen mo ste// chibs su zangs rta ser po
chibs// na bza' gser mo'i ber chen gsol// bse yi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa re la phur pa re// dar nag cod pan pu ru ru// dbang gi bse khrab si li li// brda ni mi phrad lho ba la mo// skad ni mi snyan
ldab ma ldib// gzugs ni mi sdug lag brgya mo// g.yas pa brgya ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa brgya ni zhags pa bsnams// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/
grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ni// mang yul gseb nas bzhengs pa ni// khrag gi mtsho yi gting yangs nas// btsan gyi bu mo chen mo ste// chibs su bcan rta dmar po chibs// na bza' dar dmar ber chen

gsol// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa re la phur pa re// dar nag cod pan pu ru ru// dbang gi bse khrab si li li// brda ni mi phrad lho bal mo// skad ni mi snyan ldab ma ldib// gzugs ni mi sdug lag brgya
mo// g.yas pa brgya ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa brgya ni zhags pa bsnams// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ni// snyan nam
'gram nas bzhengs pa ni// 'o ma'i mtsho dkyil yangs pa nas// klu yi bu mo chen mo ni// chibs su rta sngon po chims// na bza' dar ljang ber chen gsol// dung gi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa re la phur pa

re// dar nag cod pan pu ru ru// dbang gi bse khrab si li li// brda ni mi phrad lho bal mo// skad ni mo snyan ldab ma ldib// gzugs ni mi sdug lag brgya mo// g.yas pa brgya ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa brgya ni
zhags pa bsnams// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ces pas bse mo la bsngo ba'o// hUM// dgung sngon mtho yi yar stengs nas// nam mkha'i rgyal mo ting lo
sman// sku ni dra li lo 'bar ba 'dre// zhal ni sku btsun sgrol ma yas// dbu la g.yu yi thod gdeng can// mu tig mdzad pa'i zhugs 'bar can// phyag na gnam lcags snying khrag thogs// skyin gyi
gos lu mdzes brgyan gsol// chibs su sprin dkar yud la chibs// 'khor du gnam sman mang pos bskor// rol du nyi zla gnyan gyi sa rol// gdan du skad ma smin bdud 'dis// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas
drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM// ri rab gnas kyi ngos shes nas// ma bdun ug chos dbyar mo sil// na bza' sbang rgyan gos zul// u chos
mdzes pa'i sug ma gtang// rus sbal dkar po'i thod gdeng can// chibs su snar chung sha mo chibs// 'khor du gnam sman 'bum gyis bskor// phyag na gser kyi dar dmar bsnams// 'khor 'di bsrung la
rkyen 'di bzlog/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ shar gyi phyogs kyi 'khor 'dul ma// de ring nag mo'i lha khang nas// kong btsun de mo bed khams

skyeng// gdong las 'od 'khor nyi zla'i spyan// che zhe sring cig dpal mo bstan// na bza' smug mo me 'bar gsol// gser gyi thod rdengs thor tshugs can// phyag na khrag gi bum pa bsnams// chibs su kong rta
nag chung chibs// 'khor du kong btsun mang pos bskor// rol du bdud byang mang mo mnga'// ya ka dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen momados bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes
shig/ hUM/ shar lho mtshams na 'khor 'dul ma// mdo lung stag gzig 'dam kha nas// che zhe 'dam la sman gcig ma// na bza' ber chen dgu brtsegs gsol// dbu la g.yu yi thod rdengs can// phyag na
gser gyi nya mo bsnams// chibs su kong rta kha dkar chibs// 'khor du ma bdud tshogs kyis bskor// skrang 'bur dkar nag mnga' bdag mo// dgra bo dam nyams gting nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo
mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hU~M/ lho phyogs ngos kyi 'khor 'dul ma// spang snang mthon po'i ljongs dag nas// legs sbyor gser dang 'brog mgrin che// sku la mun pa'i gos zu
la// gser gyi 'od la 'des brgyan gsol// rin chen mang po'i thod rdengs can// lag na mi khrag bsngal mo khyer// chibs su sras mo shar la chibs// 'khor du sbangs sman 'bum gyis bskor// rol du brag
srin mang po khrid// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ lho nub mtshams kyi 'khor 'dul ma// gsang ri sngon po'i rtse ri
nas// lho yi skyen mthing g.ya' ma skyong// g.yu bun dan sa bya bun 'thul// na bza' sprin dkar me ba gsol// shes gyi thod rdeng thor tshugs can// phyag na dung gi 'phreng ba bsnams// chibs su
ser mo mdos long chibs// 'khor du glog char srin glog 'gyu/ rol du khu 'phangs skya mo rol// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes
shig/ hUM/ nub phyogs ngos kyi 'khor 'dul ma// mnga' la spyi bdud gangs rtse nas// mkha' la spyi bdud dpal gyi yum// na bza' btsos dang mu men gsol// gser g.yu spras pa'i thogs 'phreng can// phyag na
mda' bzang g.yab dar thogs// chibs su byed chen lcag mo chibs// 'khor du rgyu skar mang pos bskor// rol du gza' chen brgyad dang bcas// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo
mdos bzhes shig// glu bdag chem mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ nub byang mtshams kyi 'khor 'dul ma// gangs dkar mthon po'i rtse nas kyang// gangs kyi yum chen g.yu 'bum ma// che zhe gangs dkar sha med
ma// na bza' btsos dang ral dkar gsol// dar chen yug gis brgyan pa gsol// dbu la g.yu yi thod rdeng can// phyag na gser gyi sman sha bsnams// chibs su rkyang bu kha dkar chibs 'khor du gnas sman
'bul gyis bskor// rol du glog dang me lce khrid// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes la/ hUM/ byang phyogs ngos nas 'khor 'dul

ma// byang gi gser thang yi ge ma// byang gi sman ting ting mo btsun// na bza' btsos dang g.yag lpags gsol// lcags kyi thod rdeng thor tshugs can// phyag na gser gyi cha lang thogs// chibs su don bu smin
nag chibs// 'khor du byang sman 'bum gyis bskyor// rol du skar mda' glog ltar 'phen// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor 'dul

ma// g.ya' ri sngon mo'i ljang dag nas// khrag 'thung mon mo g.yu dril ma// na bza' sbrin dkar brtsegs ma la// mu tig g.yu dril mang pos brgyan// mthing nag go chos yol ba bskon// phyag na mu tig tshar
gsum bsnams// 'khor du g.ya' sman 'bum gyis bskor// rol du bu yug dud ltar 'thul// mdos bdag cheran mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// lho phyog spang snar mthon po
nas// dan ting shes chags sman cig ma// mi g.yo brtan pa'i sa 'dzin ma// na bza' btsos kyi gos zul// gser kyi byang bu 'bum gyis brgyan// gser gyi thod rdeng thor tshugs na// phyag na zangs kyi ral
gri bsnams// chibs su mdzo mo dkar mo chibs// 'khor du brag btsan mang pos bskor// rol du sha kyang mang po khrid// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes

shig// hUM// nub phyogs sbang snar mthon po nas// skyin mthing gangs kyi pha rol sman// kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// mi sha khrag la longs spyod cing// na bza' bya rgod thul pa gsol// dkar mo mig
gcig lcags kyi mche ba can// lag na mi mgo rlon pa thogs// chibs su chu srin dmar po chibs// 'khor du klu srin mang pos bskor// rol du nya mo 'bum dang bcas// bka' yi gtor ma 'di long
la// bcolam ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig// ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// gling bzhi la che

ba'i yon tan gyis sgo nas bstod pa dang ma mo rnams la mdos so so bsngo ba bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu re drug pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// snang srid ma mo mkha' 'gro la// rdzong brdab cho ga ji
ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig// de skad gsolo pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul sems dpa'

khyod// hUM// ri rab gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di la ma tshang dgu cig tshang// snod kyi 'jig rten 'di la tshang// bcud kyi sems can 'di la tshang// snang srid ma mo mkha' 'gro la// mthun pa'i rdzas su

'bul lags na// thugs dam gnas su skor bar mdzod// hUM// ri rab bang rim dang po ni// chos kyi sku yi don dang ldan// rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge drug// ma mo rnams la rdzaungs 'debs// stobs gyi rgyal po

glang chen drug// ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// shugs kyi rgyal po rta mchog drug// ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// dbang gi rgyal mo rma bya drug// ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// 'dab chags rgyal

po shang shang drug// ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// mkha' lding rgyal po bya khyung drug/ ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// ri rab bang rim bar pa la// shugs kyi rgyal rta bcu bzhi yang// ma mo rnams la
rdzongs su 'debs// 'dod chags gtso mo bcu bzhi ni// ma mo rnams la rdzongs 'debs// stag gzig 'bar ba bcu bzhi yang// ma mo rnams rdzongs su 'debs// ba glang 'bar ba bcu bzhi yang// ma mo
rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// ku kur tsa bcu bzhi yang// ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// 'dab chags shang shang bcu bzhi yang// ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// mdos ldan sman byang bcu bzhi yang//
ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// ri rab bang rim tha ma la// 'gro drug sems can rnams kyi bskor// sman mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// gnam la 'phur dang sa la skye// chu la 'phyo ba'i rdzas
rnams ni// sman mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// 'di na sman mo dgu zhig mchis// yang tshangs pa'i bu mo yis// mang yul la gtab nas// rgyas skyegs lce le dang// sma rams rtog chen dang// mthing rams
sngon mo dang// rgyal mo khyed la dkor du 'bul// blon mo khyed la rdzongs su 'bul// yal yal bzhad kyin gshegs// phud phud dgyes kyin gshegs// pa rol la brnyan nas// btsod mo yu rug \u0f84dang// zhu

mkhan lhebs chen dang// sga mo lhob chen dang// dbyer ma kha che dang// 'bras chen gar ma rnams// rgyal mo khyed la dkor du 'bul// smin ba dus su smin// blon mo khyed la rdzogs su 'bul// yal yal bzhad

kyi na gshegs// phud phud dgye sa kyi na gshe gas// yang bcud sa'i bu mo yis// 'bru drug sa la btab/ 'bru sna nyi shu rtsa gcig mchis// 'bru'i rgyal po rgya sran dang// sran ma zlum dang// yungs kar yungs
nag dang// 'bras dkar dmar dang// rgya bra bre dang cu tshe dang// sob dkar mo bzhin bzang dang// nas dang sbang mtha' ram bu ni// rgyal mo khyed la dkon du 'bul// blon mo rnams la rdzongs su
'debs// yal yal bzhad kyi na gshegs// phud phud dges kyin gshegs// yang skyes pa dar ma yis// byang sna brgyad nas// sha blan nya blan nas// sha rgod nya rgod dang// rgo yi sha bal dang// ba tsha

bul thogs dang// sgung khrod su pa dang/ ka/ rtsang khrod nyi shing dang// za mo g.yu rgyal dang// lo ma sbang ma dang rnams// rgyal mo khyed dkor du 'bul// blon mo khyed rnams la rdzas su bsngo// yal yal bzhad kyin
gshegs// phud phud dges kyin gshegs// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang gi rgyud las// rdzongs gdab pa'i le'u ste drug cu re bdun pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gdon dang mi ru

dbye ba gang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// dbye ba'i cho ga ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// dbye ba la ni 'di nyid do// sngon su dang su yi glud// rgyal mo bcu gnyis na se khri

legs pa dang bcu gsum gyi glud// slob dpon bcu gnyis dang smra blin zings dang bcu gsum gyi glud// rje bcu gnyis na pha rje yag pa dang gsum gyi glud// 'bangs bcu gnyis na rgyu sbyor yon bdasag dang bcu
gsum gyi glud// de ring su yi glud// yon bdag bcu gnyis sngags 'chang rgyal po dngabacu gsum gyi glud// da ni mi dang gdon dbye 'tshal// mi dang gdon dbye ba// yas dang thags kyis dbye// gnam dang sa
dbye ba// skyem ser ngad dkyil dbye// shar dang nub dbye ba// nya zla dros kyis dbye// lho dang byang dbye ba// rdzi dang ngad kyis dbye// pho brang bskyod de gshegs// zhugs thab ling nge gshegs// ma

'dug zhi ba'i dang// 'dzam gling shar phyogs nas// rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi grong khyer na// bzhugs kyi nyams re dga'// gtan gyi yul re bzang// rgyal po sku re drang// blon po khong re lhod// btsun mo
mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re sdug 'dod pa de na tshang// rgyal mo bskyod de gshegs// der kyang mi gshegs nas// 'dzam gling lho phyogs na// rgyal po 'phags skyes po'i grong khyer na// bzhugs kyi

nyams re dga'// gtan gyi yul re gzang// rgyal po sku re che// blon po khong re lhod// btsun mo mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re sdug// 'dod pa de na tshang// rgyal mo bskyod de gshegs// 'dzam gling nub
phyogs na// rgyal po sbyan mig bzang gi grong khyer na// bzhugs kyi nyams re dga'// gtan gyi yul re bzang// rgya po sku re che// blon po khong re lhod// btsun mo mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re

sdug// 'dod pa de na tshang// rgyal mo bskyed de gshegs// der kyang mi gshegs sa// der kyang mi gshegs na// 'dzam gling byang phyogs na// rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi grong khyer na// bzhugs kyi nyams re
dga'// gtan gyi yul re bzang// rgyal po sku re drang// blon po khong re lhod// btsum mo mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re sdug// 'dod pa de na tshang// der kyang mi gshags na// 'dzam gling rgya re

che// mgo nag grangs re mang// srid pa gru re yangs// phod brang bskyod de gshegs// bzhugs thab ling ste gshegs// ma gdug zhi ba'i ngang// zhes brjod do// mdos dbye ba'i cho ga'o// gdon dang mi ru dbye
ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o zhes gsugs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// gdon nga mi ru dbye ba'i le'u ste drug cu re brgyad pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol// ye shes rang bzhin srid pa'i
sa// ma mo 'di thugs dam bskang ba la// sngon lam gdab pa ji ltar lags/ yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// yon bdag gi bshams pa'i rdzas chud ma zos pa dang rnal 'byor pa la mi sgrib par bya ba'i
smon lam gdab pa bstan pa'o// smon lam gdab pa ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// gser kyi ri bdun// rol pa'i mtsho bdun// tha ma lcags ri
khyung mos bskor// snang srid sems can gzugs kyis bskor// nam mkha' sna tshogs rgyan dang bcas// dpag bsam shing dang yal khar bcas// za 'og rigs kyi gden dag gur// 'dab chags sgro dang
gcan gzan ras// rin chen sna tshogs 'dod par mdzes// 'thun par bshams te phul ba yis// yon bdag rgyu sbyor ma lus dang// bdag cag rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gnyis// 'dod pa phun
sum mtshogs gyur cig// 'bru sna sna tshogs bcud rnams dang// ma ra gur tsha'i rdzas rnams dang// mthun par bshams te phul ba yis// bdag dang yon gyi bdag po gnyis// mu ge'i bskal pa zad gyur
cig// 'tsho byed sman gyi rnam pa dang// bla ba la sogs sbos rnams dang// mar dag bu ram shing thog rnams// mthun par bshams te phul ba yis// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// nad kyi bskal pa
zad par shog// ral gri bzhi dang mda' bzhi dang// mthun par bshams te phur ba yis// bdag dang yon gyi bdag po gnyis// mtshon gyi bskal pa zad par shog// gling khog phul ba'i yon tan gyis// bdag

dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// phung po'i sdug bsngal byang nas kyang// yul zhing phun sum tshogs nas kyang// skye ba 'di dang phyi ma la// tshad med bzhi dang ldan nas kyang// dga' ldan gnas su skye bar

shog// rin chen sna lnga'i gter phul bas// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// rin chen gter la spyod par shog/ bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// skye ba 'di dang phyi ma la// bdag nyid sangs rgyas
byin rlabs kyis// sems can 'gro don byed par shog/ snang srid sems can ma nga pos dang// sdug cing mdzes sa'i rdzas phul bas// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// ngag gi sgrib pa dag gyur
nas// chos kyi longs spyod rdzogs par shog/ stobs kyi rgyal po drug po dang// shugs kyi rgyal po drug po dang// 'dod chags gtso mo rnams// bskyon nas phul ba'i yon tan gyis// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu
sbyor gnyis// gsung gi dngos grub 'thob nas kyang// 'jig pa kun las thar bar shog/ 'byung ba lnga yi nam mkha' dang// rgyal mtshan me long phul ba yis// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// dug
gsum rtsa bar brdar bcad nas// ye shes lnga yi yon rtogs nas// mngos shes drug dang ldan par shog/ ces gsungs so pa// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// smon lam btab pa'i le'u ste drug cu
re dgu pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ri rab gru 'degs ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul sems dpa'
khyod// hU~M/ ri rab gling bzhi gru 'degs ma// shar lho mtshams kyi ma mo ni// srid pa'i dkar mo mi bza' ma// ral gcig mdzes pa'i 'od 'phro zhing// g.yas na sa yi dkyil 'khor thogs// g.yon ni dar
dkar gur thag 'then// gur nas theg la glung yang bsgrur// gur 'degs glung bsgrur mtha mo che// 'dzam bu gling bskor ra re// srid pa'i gru 'degs skongs se skongs// ri rab shar lho gru

'degs la// gur thag theg la gling sgyur cig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs nas// lho yi nag mo mi zad ma// lcags kyi ral pa bsigs pa yis// gshin rdze'i khams rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas na mi yi
dkyil 'khor thogs// g.yon na dar nag gur thag 'dren// gur thag theg la gling sgyur cig/ gur 'degs glud bsgrur thu mo che// 'dzam bu gling bzhi khyi li li// srid pa'i gru 'degs skongs
se skongs// gur thag theg la gling sgyur cig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs nas// srid pa'i bu med dmar mo la// byu ru'i ral pa gsigs pa yis// klu yi 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas na chu yi

dkyil 'khor thogs// g.yon na dar dmar gur thag 'dren// gur thag theg la gling sgrur cig/ 'dzam bu gling bzhi khyi li li// srid pa'i gru 'degs sha ra ra// gur thag theg la gling sgrur cig// ri rab gling
bzhi'i byag phyogs nas// srid pa'i bud med ljang nag ma// g.yu yi ral pa gsigs pa yis// gnod sbyin khams rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// g.yon na dar ljang gur thag

'dren// gur nas theg la gling yang bsgyur// gru 'degs gling bsgyur mthu mo che// srid pa'i gru 'degs bskor ra re// 'dzam bu gling bzhi khyi li li// gur thag theg la glung sgyur cig// ces gsungs so// bdud
mo bkor byang las// ri rab grA 'degs pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sgo dbye 'phrang bsal ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis

bka' stsal pa// hUM// srid pa'i gting khams ma gi na// rgya mtsho gting sgo e re dam// rgya mtsho'i gting na bdud mo'i sgo re dam// de ring glud sgo ma phye na// nag mo mdos kyi sgo phye dang// de rang chud 'phrang ma

bsal na// nag mo mdoso kyi lam mi rnyed// tsho bdun bdud kyi sgo phye zhig// lam bdun rgyal mos 'phrang sol cig/ shar phyogs 'o mtsho dkar mo'i sgo re dam// shel sgo dkar po thams se thams// dung gi yag

shing e re dam// rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo yis// 'o mtsho dkar mo'i sgo phye zhig// lho na g.yu mtsho sngon mo'i sgo re dam// g.yu yi yag shing e re dam// rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo yang// sngon mo g.yu yi lde mig

cig// g.yu mtsho sngon mo'i sgo phye zhig/ nub nas zangs mtsho dmar mo'i sgo re dam// 'jon dmar yag shing e re dam// pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo mi// dmar mo byi ru'i lde mig can// zangs mtsho dmar po'i sgo phye
zhig/ byang na gser mtsho ser mo'i sgo re dam// ra gan g.yag shing e re dam// las rab rigs kyi rgyal mo ni// ser mtsho ser mo sgo phye zhig/ dbus na dug mtsho nag mo'o sgo re dam// lcags kyi
g.yag shing e re dam// nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo yin// nag mo sbrul gyi lde mig can// dug mtsho nag mo'i sgo phye zhig/ ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// sgo dbye 'phrang bsal ba'i le'u ste
bdun cu don gcig pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// mdos chas cho ga gang lags pa// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// hUM/ nyi ma shar phyogs ma gis
na// dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung// rgyal po sku re btsun// btsun mo bzhin re legs// rgyal bu khung re drang// mdos chas shar du chas// rgyal po chen po sku bzur la// btsun mo na bza' mthar btul

cig// bran g.yog mang pos slar khyer cig/ lho yi gling khams na// rgyal po 'phags skyes po// rgyal po sku re btsun// btsun mo zhin re sdug/ rgyal bu khong re drang// mdos chas lho ru chas// rgyal po sku bzur

la// btsun mo na bza' mthar btul la// bran g.yog mang po slar khyer cig/ nub kyi gling khams na// rgyal po spyan mig bzang// rgyal po sku re btsun// btsun mo bzhin re sdug/ rgyal bu khong re drang// mdos

chas nub tu chas// rgyal bu sku bzur la// btsun mo na bza' mthar btul la// bran g.yog mang po slar khyer cig/ byang gi gling khams na// gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam thos sras// rgyal po sku re btsun// btsun mo

bzhin re sdug/ rgyal bu khong re drang// mdos chas byang du chas// rgyal po sku bzur la// btsun mo na bza' mthar btul la// bran g.yog mang po slar khyer cig/ mdos chas steng du chas// steng gi phyogs kyi gling
khams na// rgyal po sku re btsun// btsun mo bzhin re sdug/ rgyal bu khong re drang// mdos chas steng du chas// rgyal po sku bzur la// btsun mo na bza' mtha' brtul la// bran g.yog mang po slarakhyer

cig// mdos chas 'og tu chas// 'og gi gling khams na// ma la chud kyi yul// bskal pa thang re yang// 'jig rten rgya re che// rgya mtsho gting re zab// rgyal po chen po sku bzur la// btsun mo na bza' mthar
brtul la// bran g.yog mang po slar khyer cig// ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// mdos chas bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu don gnyis pa'o// gnod 'du lha yis yang gsol pa// mdos lam
bstan pa ji ltar pa lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// zhun mar sna lnga bltam// sbos kyi ni dud gtang nas// 'tshal gyi thig drangs te// gur sgo mi srin gyis
phye// yo ba ni mi yis so// glud lam mi yis bstan// de rdze bshas sgo ru shar ra ra// btsun mo dbyings nas bskor// 'khor rnams gnas nas chos// re thag rgyang nas khrol// tshon thag mtha' nas

khros// chon phur mtha' nas thon// da rdze gshegs so sha ra ra// da rje gshegs shar du gshegs// shar phyogs pha gi na// dung mtsho dkar mo'i dky-il shed na// shel gyi gur cig skongs se skongs// des ma zan
sna dgu la// g.yo ngag cho dgu bgyis// jo mo mi byon du re// sgang bu mtho mtho nas// sbos chen dud pa gtong// gsheng bu dma' dma' nas// dngul rigs dkar po 'dri// rdze gshegs de ru gshegs// zla gam
gling chen nyams re dga'// kha dog dkar po 'do re gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// de yi gnas su gshegs// da rdze gshegs lho ru gshegs// lho phyogs pha gi na// g.yu mtsho sngon mo'i nang shed
na// mthing gur sngon mo de skongs se skongs// dar sngon yol bres me re re// de 'dra'i gur yol nang shed na// sngon mo mi bzad 'bum dang sdongs// de jo mo'i g.yog mo lags// ma zan sna dgu la// g.yog
ngag tsho dgu bgyis// jo mo mi byon byon du re sgag bu mthong nas// sbos dkar dud pa 'thul// shong bu dma' dma' nas// g.yu ris sngon mo 'dri// rdze gshegs de ru gshegs// lho phyogs gling du
gshegs// sogs kha gling chen nyams su dga'// mthing sngob 'od regs la// kha dog sna tshogs ldan// de yis gnas su gshegs// da rdze gshegs nub tu gshegs// nub phyogs ya gi na// zangs mtshod
dmar po'i nang shed na// byung ru'i gur cig skongs se skongs// le brgan yol bre me re re// de 'dra'i gur yol gyi nang shed na// bud med dmar mo 'bum dang sdongs// byu ru'i ral pa gsigs pa yis// mi
bzad pho nya 'bum 'phro ma// de jo mo'i g.yog mo lags// mi zan sna dgu la// g.yo ngag cho dgu bgyis// jo mo mi byon byon du re// sgang bu mtho mtho nas// sbos chen dud pa gtong// shong bu dma' dma'
nas// dmar chen mtshal gyis ri mo 'bri// rdze gshegs nub tu gshegs// zlum po chen po nyams re dga'// le brgan dmar po 'od re legs// de na longs sbyod sna tshogs ldan// de yi gnas su
gshegs// da rdze gshegs bskor ra re// gtso mo dbyings nas bskyong// 'khor rnams gnas nas chos// re thag rgyang nas khrol// chos thag mtha' nas btul// chon phur da phyung zhig/ da rje gshegs byang du
gshegs// byang phyogs pha gi na// tsha mtsho mer ba'i gting shed na// bse yi gur cig skongs se skongs// za 'og yol bres khyud de khyud// de 'dra'i gur yol nang shed na// bud med ljang nag 'bum dang
sdongs// bas yi ral pa gsigs pa yis// byang gi 'brog mo skul byed ma// de jo mo'i g.yog mo lags// mi zan sna dgu la// g.yo ngag tsho gu bgyis// jo mo mi byon byon du re// sgang mu mtho mtho
nas// sbos chen dud pa 'thul// shog bu dma' dma' nas// bse rigs khra bo 'dri// da rdze gshegs de ru gshegs// byang phyogs gling du gshegs// gru bzhi glig chen nyams re dga'// kha dog ser po'i 'od

re gsal// gshegs shig byang phyogs gling du gshegs/ rdze gshegs skor ra re// gtso mo dbyings nas bskyong// 'khor rnams gnas nas chos// re thag rgyang nas khrol// chos phur btab pa phyung// byur gyi sha
chibs srog la gshegs// nad kyi rlangs bsdud la gshegs// mtshon gyi gru gu brtul la gshegs// 'og phyogs gling khams na// ma la chud kyi yul// rgya mtsho gting re zab// bskal pa thang re
yangs// longs spyod nyams re yangs// me tog ne sren rgya re che/ skyo cig rgyal po der skyod cig/ ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las// mdos lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu don gsum
pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// chags sdang bral ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul sebs dpa' khyod// ri rab
gling bzhi gling phran brgyad// gser kyi ri bdud rol mtsho bdun// mtha' ma lcags ris bskor ba 'di// snang srid sems can mang pos brgyan// 'byung ba lnga yi nam mkha' btsugs// dpag bsam shing dang
yal gar bcas// nam mkha' sna tshogs gdon dang gur// 'dab chags mang po'i srog dang ni// gcan gzan mang po'i ris kyis brgyan// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du
'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen pa na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyud// rma bya'i gdugs pa dang dar gyi// za 'og gur dang dar dkar yol// mda' dang me long ral

gris brgyan// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig// 'di la chags shing zhes pa na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyud// snang srid dkar po'i nor

rdzas dang// rin chen gser g.yu byung ru dang// 'bru sna sna tshogs bcud rnams dang// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig// 'di la chags shing

zhen gyur na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu// dngar dgu sbyar ba'i zas rnams dang// gla ba sbos dang shing 'khun rnams// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags
shing zhen pa ni// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyud// 'thun pa'i rdzas chen shes sgog 'di// srog dang dbugs dang dngas mar bcas// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du

'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen pa na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin

te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen gyur na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu// yul dang zhing dang 'khor dpe kun// sgo nor rta phyugs thams cad
kun// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen ba na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyud// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo
bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las// chags pa dang bral ba'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// mngon rdzogs rgyal po yab cig lags// sku gsum rdzogs pas thams cad

'dul// 'gran gyi do med srid pa'i lha// bcom ldan dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal stod// rigs kyi khro bo mang po sku la rdzogs// khrag 'thung rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// mam mo 'khor 'gro 'bum gyi

dbus na 'gying// rigs kyi ma mo bran dang g.yog tu 'khol// ma mo 'bum gyi rdze la phyag 'tshal bstod// bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// mngon rdzogs dpal gyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces

bstod do// de nas mu kha le la sogs te chos kyi sku'i ma mo dang// srid pa bde 'gro la sogs pa'i longs spyod pa'i sku'i ma mo dang// srid pa chags byed ma la sogs pa'i sprul pa sku'i ma mo rnams rdzes su yi rang
nas// bcos ldan 'das mngon rdzogs rgyal po dang lha gnod 'dul la gsang ba dges pa'i mchod pa phul lo// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud chen po las// dpal chen po la bstod pa 'phul ba'i
le'u ste don lnga pa'o// bdu mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba bskang thabs stod pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung gi ma tshang pa kha skong ba'i rgyud do//
rgya gar skad du// ma ma karma sarba tan tar tsa ta nA ma// bod skad du// ma mo las thams cad kyi las rgyud lung zhes bya ba// yum chen mo mu kha le la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa'i
dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku dang// gsung dang// thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi b+ha ga la// zo mdog bde ba ca co la sogs med par snyoms par zhugs so// de'i
tshe dba' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa zhing gi rdul snyed dang// 'jig rten gyis gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa dang// srin mo rnams mdun du bdar nas bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po stan las langs te

bskor ba dang phyag 'tshal nas// yum chen mo snang srid bde ba la 'god cing srid mo rnams dbang du 'dzad pa ni ngo mtsher na// las la grub pa'i ma mo rnams ji ltar bsgrub// las kyi dbye ba ji ltar bgyi// yum
gyis bdag bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang// de yi tshe yum chen mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// ma mo nga'i bstan pa 'di la snyigs ma lnga'i dus te// bstan pa rang gi rang 'jigs pa dang// gos su re

ba gon pa dang// zas su lci bza ba dang// nye ba dgra ru ldang ba dang// dam chos rang dgar sbyod pa dang// ma nyes dam las gcod pa dang// gsang sngags sgor kun tu 'jug pa dang// man ngag zong du 'khyer
be dang// rgyal ba'i sku la ring thang 'debs pa dang// lam grog por gyur pa dang// rgyal khams sil bur song ba'i dus su// ma mo yang rang dam rang gis 'das nas man ngag gis grub pa'i dus 'byung
bas// de'i dus su ngas bstan pa dral pa la phan gdags shing// ma mo grub pa'i thams bstan cing bshad par bya yis// brgya byin la sogs legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig// de nas yang dag bshad bya
ba// dang po ma mo sgrub pa'i gnas// dur khyod dag gam mtsho gling dam// ngam grog phug la sogs pa yin// bar chod bgegs dang mi med par// las la grub pa'i rkyen dang ldan// gnas kyi mang ngag shes pa

yis// dang por dben pa'i gnas btsal te// gnas der ma mo'i rdzas btsal pa// mi sha ma yin gzhan gyi sha mi za// mi khrag ma yin gzhan gyis khrag mi btung// misnying ma yin gzhan gyis snying mi bza'// mi

gsur ma yin gzhan gyis gsur mi snom// mi g.yab ma yin gzhan gyis g.yab mi bya// mi gos ma yin gzhan gyis gos mi bgo// mi zhwa ma yin gzhan gyi zhwa mi bgo// zhes ma mo spyi'i dam rdzas so// ma hwa maM la

sogs sha sna stod// ma hwa ra k+ta la sogs khrag sna stong// ma hwa tsit+ta la sogs snying sna stong// rang bzhin shi ba'i lus la btsal// gos su zhing gi g.yang gzhi bgo// zhwa ru srid pa'i sbyi blugs bgo// bud pa rkang
gi gling bu bud// brdab pa thod pa'i cha lad brdab// rdung ba ltag spros rnge'u chung rdung// g.yab ba mi yi g.yab mo g.yob// dkyil 'khor rgyan ni zhing yin te// zhing gi bla re dar gyi phur sgrogs

can// zhing gi yol ba mdzes pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan// zhing gi rgyal mtshan dar gyi sham bu can// sbyo bo la sogs gnas rnams su// rmabya mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ mig la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su// nor bu

mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// ma mo dges pa'i rdzas rnams ni// tsan dan dang ni gur kum dang// rtag tu dri dang ldan par bya// kha dog kyang ni legs par btsal// dper na rang gi kha zas kyang// bza' ba khyad
par ma 'phags tsam// ma mo'i dam rdzas de bzhin no// shing sdog sman mar me tog 'bras bur bcas// 'di yang ma mo'i dam rdzas te// mda' dang ral gri dar sna dang// mtshon thag rtsang skud legs par

btsal// de yang dkyil 'khor rdzas yin te// rus pa'i rdzas dag sbyin sreg rdzas// thun gyi rdzas dang mnan pa'i rdzas// thams cad dang por sngags pas btsal// rdzas rnams shin tu gsang ba ste// mi thos mi

mthong legs par sba// de dag spr-i yi rdzas rnams te// ma mo bye brag rdzas rnams ni// grub blin bzhi yi rdzas rnams ni// zangs chu dngul chu bya lug dkar// bar mtshams blin mo bcu gsum rdzas// khyi khu mig ma
bye ba dang// bya nag sgo nga bcu gsum ste// yar gyi bcu gsum rdzas kyis ming// mda' 'phang bcu gsum yin par 'dod// sngar gyi glud bu bcu gsum yin// kha blin bzhi yi rdzas dag ni// srog med pa yi
mdags bzhi ste// me long dang ni rma bya dang// chu dang mar me yin par 'dod// gzugs can gzugs kyi phung po bzhi// zangs mchu can dang stag glang can// g.yag glang can dang rtsi ber sogs// grub blon
bzhi la de lta bu'i// gzugs bzhi chu srin seng ge dang// hor dang bya khyung bag phye las// gzugs can srog gi bsdud pa bzhi// lug dkar mo la sogs pa yin// srog bcad pa yi 'bras bu gnyis// khyod dkar

rog pa'o// lnga gong nas ni 'bras bu mchog/ mtshams kyi blin po bcu gnyis la// shing a mra'i 'bras bu ste// mi 'bras sngon nas btsal te mchog// btsun mo chas zhugs bcu gnyis te// khyi dkar ra rogs bya
nag mo// bong bu 'bras bu'i chas su zhugs// yang bag phye las// btsun mo chas byas mthing grur nang du zhugs// bar mtshams blon mo bcu gsum la// sems can srog med bcu gsum ste// ngur pa 'phye ba bya
nag mo// rmad lcam khyi dang 'ug pa dang// se rigs su myu gu dang// ti bya bya dkar krung krug yin// btsun mo bcu gsum dar dkar chas// rgyal mo bzhi la srog ma bcad// khra bzhi mtshal dang li khri

dang// me lcags sro lo dmar po yin// sa yin rgyal mo rmig pa yin// chu yi rgyal mo nya rtsang pa// me rgyal srin bu me khyer yin// rlung gi rgyal mo wang pa ste// bag phye gzugs bya chas su gzhug/ sman

mo bcu gcig dag la yang// brgyad la khyod yod gsum la med// khyo skal 'bras bu 'di ltar ste// tsit+ta'i 'bras bu gnya' ba dang// lug rdur ba ru mkhas pas brtag/ chu 'bras bse yi 'bras bu ste// me 'bras
lcags phye yin par nges// srog med sems can bcu gcig ni// dbugadas kyi 'di dag kun gyi rdzas// srog chags gang rung bcu gcig la// mthing nag dar gyi brgyan pa ste// go le ma bzhi rdzas kyang
bzhi// sring mo bzhi la bam chen tshogs// ma bdud rag ta gsum gyi rdzas// gzhon bu ma bzhi mu stegs sogs// dge bsnyen bzhi ni 'di lta ste// gnam gyi dge bsnyen nam mkha' lding// sa yi byi ba sa yi

sbal// mi yi bdug pa yin par nges// cir mi 'ong gi sbun drug bzhi// klu dang btsan dang bdud dang yas// gnod sbyin las grub ma mo bzhi// shing 'bras shing tog sna tshogs te// chu 'bras chu sna tshogs pa
yin// sa yi 'bras bu dmigs pa yin// me 'bras sol ba sna tshogs so// mi bcos mi rung mi mo brgyad// tsit+ta dgu dag mi dbang dgu// gzugs can dgu dang gzugs med dgu// tsit+ta dgu ni 'di lta

ste// shing gi tsit+ta ga bur yin// chu yi tsit+ta ka ra yin// sa yi tsit+ta rgya sbos lags// rlung gi tsit+ta du ru ka// mi yi tsit+ta ga pur thal// nam mkha'i tsit+ta a ru ra// bar snang tsit+ta mi yi snying// brag gi tsit+ta brag sbos

pa// dur khrod tsit+ta ro bsregs thal// de ni srog med tsit+ta dgu// srog chags tsit+ta dgu dag ni// rmug rgya srol po tsat+ta dgu// mi dbang 'bras bu dgu dag ni// sa yi mi dbang ba bras ba bya// me yi mi dbang phye ma

leb// chu yi mi dbang nya tshan pa// nam mkha'i mi dbang ri bong yin// bar snang mi dbag wa yin te// brag gi mi dbang sha ba yin// shing gi mi dbang ri skegs yin// de dag mi dbang dgu yin no// ma mo stong

la rdzas brgya phrag// bdud du nges pa de dag la// de kun mu kha le las byung// tsit+ta dgu yi me tog las// ni dbang dgu yi dbu las byung// gzug brgyad sbyi bo dag las byung// srog ma bcad pa'i rag ta

dgu// pad+ma las byung shi ba med// ro dgu pad+ma'i cha la bzhag/ 'di dag sgo nga las byung ba// ka la yal sha'i dmod po ni// dper na lha mo re ma ti// gsang ba'i mi dbang kyi dbang dang// shi ka'i mtshal thig
shing la sogs// nag mo'i rdzas te de bzhin kun// de ltar gyur pa'i rdzas rnams dang// bod pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa'i rdzas// rten dang dam tshig bsre ba'i rdzas// bskang ba'i rdzas dang rung ba'i
rdzas// sbin sreg rdzas dang thun gyi rdzas// tha mar mnan pa'i rdzas yin te// rdzas 'di dang por shes bya ste// de nas tshul dang mthun par btsal// ma mo'i rdzas rnams 'tshogs gyur na// byis pa me

tog mthong ba ltar// de nyid du ni ma mo rgyug/ de bas dngos grub 'dod pa'i mis// dang por rdzas la nan tan bya// ma mo thams cad las rgyud lung las// ma mo'i dam rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o// de ltar
rdzas rnams gsogs gyur nas// dang po ma mo sten pa tsam// yang kong gdon pa sogs pa yin// phyi bshags dang po legs par bya// de nas mtho gzusadags mthon rnams la// kha byang btags te gtor ma
sbyin// dam bca' las kyi bsgo ba bya// phyi mtshams bcad nas bar mtshams gcad// gnas kyi phyogs mtshams phur pas gdab// de yi cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// de nas gnas kyi them 'og tu// dam sri legs
par gnas par bya// maN+Dal grub bzhi dgra 'am bgegs// de dag legs par mnan par bya// mi bsad pa 'am g.yul nyes pas// de la maN+Dal legs par bya// dang por 'byung po thams cad pa'i// gtor ma

rgya cher sbyin par bya// de nas yo byad cha gsum bgo// cha gcig mchod dang gtor ma bya// cha gcig tshogs dang yo byad bya// cha gcig za tshogs dus su 'bul// sa yi lha mo'i cho ga bya// dur khrod chag chag rnams

kyis gdab// lha srin kun la 'go ma yengs// zhi ba'i tshi gis smra bar bya// de nas thigs gdab sa tshon bri// kri ya'i rgyud dang yo ga'i rgyud// dkyil 'khor bri ba ji lta bar// shes pa rnal 'byor ma mo

ru// mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang// rang rang yig 'bru dgod par bya// de nas rdzas rnams dgod par bya// ste nas zhing gi bla ri ste// phyogs nas zhing gi yol ba

'o// mtshams nas zhing gi rgyal mtshan no// zhing gi lhu sdum la sogs pa// rol mo sna tshogs tshu gyis brgyan// yang na dar gyi yol dang gdugs// zur du mda' dang phur pa dang// gri dang tshon skud dra ba

ris// mda' phur ral gri khro bo ste// skud pa rdo rjer byin gyis brlams// tha mar rtsang gi srin mo 'gros// b+h+yo las srin mo re re bsam// de nas dpal gyi gtor ma yang// chos 'byung dbyibs dang yo byad
bsogs// mdzes sdug rgyan gyis brgyan par bshams// ma mo'i gtor ma'i mtheb kyu'i grangs// gcig dang gsum la sogs pa yin// snod kyi nad dgram da yi nang// khrag gis bkang ba de yi nang// mthun
pa'i rdzas kyis gang bar bya// mtheb kyus thod pa'i rang bzhin te// khrag gi rag ta'i rgya mtshor bsam// snying dbus glo ba shar mcher nub// mkha' ma lho dang byang du bzhag// 'bras bu dbus la
mig ni shar// rna ba nub la sna ni lho// lce ni byang du dgod pa ste// rang rang mthun pa'i dam rdzas te// rang bzhin shi ba'i dam rdzas rnams// rjes yi rang zhing dam tshig rdzas// gzhan yang mchod
pa'i tshogs rnams bshams// rus pa'i rdzas la sogs pa kun// gnas der re zhig bzhag par bya// ma mo las thams cad kyi las rgyud lung las// dkyil 'khor bri zhing rdzas dgod pa'i rim pa ste le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rang kha chas zhugs rtags gdab ste// g.yeng ba'i bar chod kun sbangs te// bde ba'i stan la legs 'dug la// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin rdzogs// ting 'dzin
gsung bsgoms rjes thob la// phyogs bcu'i khro bo'i sku yi mtshams// mtshon cha 'chol ba gsung gi mtshams// rdo rje me mtshams thugs kyi mtshams// mtshams su mkhas pas legs par bcad// mtshams kyi rgya

dang 'phangs kyi tshad// rgya ni lcags ri 'og ni rlung// steg ni 'jig rten 'og min mtshams// de nas dbang chen dkyil 'khor kyang// chags sdang lnga yi dkyil 'khor 'khrug/ de star keng rus ri rab brjid// ri

rab steng du ma mo yi// gzhal yas khang pabartsegs ma bsam// phyi nang rin chen sna lnga ste// nang du thod pa'i gzhal yas khang// 'og nas khrag gi rba klo nga 'khrug// steng na zhing gi bla ra 'phyo// bar na dar nag ru

mtshon 'phyar// de ltar rang rdzogs mchod par bya// bdag nyid che mchog skur gsal nas// dpal gyi mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya// de nas rang nyid gsal bya'i phyir// stong gi 'dzab kyang rang la 'bul// de nas

ma mo'i gnas rnams su// dar tshig snying po de bsams la// rang nyid che ba'i nga rgyal dang// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dran nas// lag tu rnga dril thogs nas su// ma mo gnas nas sbyan drangs te// rang rang gnas

su legs 'ong ste// steng bu snying po la thim nas// rang rang sku dang rgyan du gsal// brda sgo dang ni brda phyag 'tshal// gdan gding la sogs de bzhin no// de nas dus tshigs gang yin pa'i// rab tu brtan par
bzhugs su gsol// sngar dam nyams pa bshags par bya// sman dang khrag sogs byin gyis brlabs// dang po sman mchog de nas khrag/ de nas chang dang gtor ma'o// rnam lnga mchod pa la sogs pa// dang po

nyid du bya ba yin// de nas de la bstod pa bya// de rdzes ma mo'i srog snying nas// drangs te mkhas pas bsnyen pa bya// skabs 'dir ma mo la dmigs pa'i// bzlas lugs yin bar shes par bya// nyin mo shi 'u
mis mi thos// mtshan mo srog tu mda' ltar drang/ man ngag med par srog snying 'dren// sa na ma mo 'khrug par nges// man ngag don ni 'di yin te// mtsho yi gnas pas srog yin te// lus la

srog tu 'dod pa yin// lus kyi snying po snying yin pas// srog snying bya ba snying la yod// srog gi snying po snying de la// yi ge'i rnam pa 'di lta bu// rtsa ru gnas pas srog de yin// drang ba snying gi rtsa

nas 'dren// ting 'dzin mda' ltar snying rtsa drang// snying rtsa drang bas snying yang 'ong// snying 'ongs lus sems dag kyang 'ong// ma mo 'ong bas bsnyen pa yin// srin la sogs pa thams cad kyi// srog sning la

sogs de bzhin no// de ltar thun bzhi sbyod ba yin// mtshan ma'i bar du bsnyen par bya// dang po srog snying ngo bo dang// gnas pa'i tshul lam tshad rnams shes// grangs mang zur yang ma chag na// gug 'greng tsheg

bar ma chad na// 'di ni ma mo'i snying rtsa ste// snying rtsa drangs pas nges par zhugs// bar ma chad par stong stong la// mtshan mo stong tshigs mchod pa dang// bstod pa de bzhin bya ba yin// nyin mo khri sogs mchod
pa bya// de yis dus su zab tshogs la// byin rlabs spyan drangs mchod sogs bya// tshogs la cha bzhir khyo byas la// dang por dpa' bo mar me mchod// bar mas skabs kyi nyams chags bshags// tha mar bar
chod dgra bgegs kyi// gzugs byas bsgral dang btab par bya// de nas mtshan ma byung bar du/ lo dang zla bar bsnyen par bya// ma mo las thams cad kyi las rgyud lung las// bsnyen pa bstan pa'i le'u ste

gsum pa'o// de nas bsnyen pa byas pa dang// de nas bsgrub pa brtsam bya ba// snyen pa'i maN+Dal de nyid la// bdag gi gzugs dang ma mo'i gzugs// gzugs kyi snying khar gsang mtshan nang// dam tshig sngags

kyi de nyid sbyang// lus dang grib ma'i tshul bzhin du// rtag tu gnas pa grub pa yin// de ltar bsgrub pa grub pa na// las la sbyar ba brtsams par bya// sgrub pa'i dus kyi ting 'dzin ni// kha nag lta bu'i ting 'dzin
te// ji ltar snang dang grags pa kun// thams cad ma mo'i rang bzhin te// ma mo rang sems snang ba na// sems dang ma mo tha dad med// ting 'dzin man ngag de ltar ro// bzlas lugs bdag dang ma mo
la// dmigs pa mkhas pas shes par bya// bsnyen pa ma grub sgrub mi brtsam// bsgrub pa ma lus las mi brtsam// las ma grub par las kyi ni// lhag ma la sogs 'bras bu med// ma mo las thams cad kyis

las rgyud lung las// grub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas las la sbyar ba yi// dkyil 'khor rdzas rnams dgos par bya// dgra bo 'grub sa 'brub khung ste// drag po'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya// kun

kyang nag por byas nas kyang// nang du tsher mas bkang byas la// tha ma pho nya rtsang gis bskor// de ni las kyi dkyil 'khor te// de nas dgra yi dri ma drug/ ru pa'i rgyu las ru ba bya// srub mo'i lo ma rkang gis

phrum// skyin dang shal shul rgyal mtshan dum// grogs mkhar sa dang khri tshe phug/ dgra yi gzugs bya rang kha yi// rdzas rnams gang yang mi btang ngo// dpral bar ming la snying khar rus// sbyi bor oM

la 'doms su phaT// snyig khar hUM nag sgril ma'i bar// ni dang dza yi 'brub khung du// gan rkyal bzhag la lha dang dbral// srog lha dgra lha mo lha sogs// srung ba'i lha dang legs par phral// ma nyes 'o dod drag
tu 'bod// de nas ling khar dgra bsam la// kha ti ra dang bse shing gi// me la gzugs de gzugs par bya// de nas 'brub khur nang du gzhug// 'byung po kun tshim gtor ma btang// bden pa'i dam yang
legs par bdar// las kyi rdzas rnams dgos legs bya// sngon du bya ba'i las rnams ni// bsnyen rdzas skabs dang thun mong bya// ting 'dzin gsum dang mchod bstod par// gong ma bzhin du shes par

bya// thun bzhi'i sbyor ba ma chad na// las la sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// sngags kyang dgra bo dgug la sogs// gsad pa'i sngags dang bye brag las// tshig kyang bsad pa'i tshig yin// dgra bsad pa yi las yin
phyir// las la sbyor bar grags pa yin// ting 'dzin ma mo'i thugs kha nas// 'od zer nag mo lcags kyu 'dra// 'phros pas gza' ba'i lha dang dbral// lus la nad gzhi sna tshogs langs// bkrag dang gzi
mdangs nyams pa de// dkar nag dkyil gyi mtshams dag nas// mi yi sa bon nri bkug nas// 'brub khung ling ga la bstims nas// lcagadas kyu lta bu'i ting 'dzin yin// stong gi 'od zer khong pa nas// dgra
la sogs pa'i bzlas pa yin// mtshan ma byung nas ru pa ste// thun dbab ral gris gtubs pa ste// pho g.yas mo ni g.yon nas gtub// shin tu khros sems ting 'dzin bsar// de nas bsreg dang bsteb pa
bya// bsreg pa'i thal ba cha gsum ste// cha gcig b+h+yos gdab gtor mar btab// cha gcig mnan pa'i rten du bzhags// cha gcig shi ba'i rten phyogs su// gtor la brang brdung 'o dod 'bod// las la sbyar

ba'i du drug tu// za tshogs tha ma dgra ru bya// de ltar byas pa'i nam byed nas// sbyugs glu blang zhing gzu dpang gsol// brang brdung tsho nges chen pos brdab// lag mchog dpal gyi gtor ma bya// ma mo gang yang
bsre ba med// 'byung po kun tshim gtor ma sbyin// de la las bcos dpang yang gzugs// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// log la rang gi cho gas bsrung// las la sbyar ba yin par nges// ma mo

las thams cad kyi las rgyud lung las// las la sbyar pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas las kyi lhags ma ni// thun ni 'di ltar bya ba ste// thun rdzas so sor dgram par bya// de la zhing gi dgra brtags sam// rgyus
chen dgrol ba bshams nas kyang// dang por khro bo byin dbab cing// gsur chen gtang zhing chas zhugs la// thun gyi ma mo bskul par bya// de nas thun gyi sngags bzlas te// ting 'dzin dug

gi na bun dang// mtshon gyi char pa nad kyi bskal// byung bar bsams pa na bun gyis// lta ba'i ting 'dzin yin par nges// de nas dur khrod 'chad pa 'am// byang ri mthon po'i khar 'dzegs la// ma mo bskul
ba thun dmigad bca'// de nas thun gyi lam bstan pa// bla nas phyogs dang 'bebs phyogs dang// thun gyi 'gro gzugs srin po dang// srin mo'i 'gros kyis bskor bar bya// rnga ma dang za 'phyong pa yi

tshul// brdeg tshul bskor ba lan gsum bya// de nas gyad kyi 'dug stangs dang// tha ma rten la brdeb par bya// thun gyi gzi byin bskyed pa ni// mchan gyi bu la 'phang ba'i tshe// bdun brgyud rtsa ba gcod sogs

yin// de nas brdeb pa'i gnas bstan pa// mchan gyi bu la khrag thun ya// de nas thun gnas nges bar 'chad// thun gyi mchan nyid shes par bya// khrag dang thos pas sna drangs te// drag po'i gtor mas gzhug
btul lo// de nas thun gyi dbye ba yang// gsad thun dang ni gso thun dang// bskang thun bzlog thun yin par nges// de re'i thun gyi rim pa yang// mkhas pas 'di ltar shes par bya// phur thun yungs thun

tshe thun dang// rdo thun chu thun zangs thun dang// mdung thun ra thun mda' thun dang// khrag thun thod bya thun dang// sgom thun kham thun snying thun dang// dug thun lug thun la sogs pa// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi thun
'phangs pa// ma hA de ba 'jig 'gyur nas// gling bzhi'i mi la smos ci dgos// thun gyi man ngag ma gol ba// dug gi na bun ti 'dzin yin// gol na rang la mtshon cha yin// ma mo las thams cad pa'i las
